sql.query: select nvl (sum(L.LOAN_RECMDAMT),0) as loan_recmdamt from APPLICATIONS A , LOANDETAILS L, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS P , PERAPPLICANT PA , PRODUCTS PR where A.APP_NO=L.LOAN_APPNO and A.APP_NO=P.DEMO_APPNO and P.DEMO_TYPE='a' and p.DEMO_APPID=PA.PERAPP_ID and A.APP_PRDCODE=PR.PRD_CODE and A.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and PA.PERAPP_OLDID='^' and PR.PRD_BANKSCHEME='^'
select grp_id from groups where grp_id in(select usr_grpid from USERS where (USR_ID='^'))
select nvl(prd_power,0) as prd_power from PRD_DELEGATE where prd_userid='^' and prd_schemeid='^'
select NVL(max(doc_SNO),0)+1 as snorelmax from doc_dynamicmaster
delete from globaloptions
insert into loan_drawdown(APP_NO,FAC_SNO,qtr_start_date,qtr_end_date,tot_qtr,amt_qtr,DD_SNO) values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
update loan_drawdown set qtr_start_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),qtr_end_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),tot_qtr=?,amt_qtr=? where APP_NO=? and FAC_SNO=? and DD_SNO=?
select nvl(max(dd_sno),0)+1 as maxsno from loan_drawdown where APP_NO='^' and fac_sno='^'

insert into doc_dynamicmaster(doc_docuname,doc_id,doc_module,doc_doctype,doc_template,doc_sno,doc_createddate,doc_dynamiccontent,doc_jspname,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE,doc_modifieddate,doc_modifiedby) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,sysdate,?)

select cbs_accountno,loan_recmdamt,loan_reqterms,app_inwardno,demo_appid,app_no,loan_modintrate, loan_inttype,loan_emi,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title||'.'||perapp_fname as perapp_name,(loan_modintrate-loan_baserate) as spread,loan_baserate,LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN,perapp_fatname,loan_mclrtype,LOAN_AMTREQD,PERAPP_SEX,app_prdcode,LOAN_CREDITRSKVAL,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL ,LOAN_MCLRTABCODE,LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,to_char(LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,PERAPP_AADHAAR,perapp_marstat,to_char(LOAN_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LOAN_DUEDATE,LOAN_SANCEMI,LOAN_SANCROI from loandetails,perapplicant,applications,per_demographics where app_no='^' and app_no=demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and loan_appno=app_no and loan_appno=demo_appno and demo_type='a' order by DEMO_TYPE

select to_char(qtr_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as qtr_start_date,to_char(qtr_end_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as qtr_end_date,tot_qtr,amt_qtr,DD_SNO, qtr_end_date as qtr_end_date_order from loan_drawdown a where app_no='^' and FAC_SNO='^' order by qtr_end_date_order,DD_SNO

select doc_docuname,doc_id,doc_module,doc_doctype,doc_template,doc_sno,DOC_DYNAMICCONTENT,doc_jspname,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE,to_char(doc_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_createddate from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id='^' order by doc_modifieddate desc
select doc_docuname,doc_id,doc_module,doc_doctype,doc_template,doc_sno,DOC_DYNAMICCONTENT,doc_jspname,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_docuname='^' order by doc_modifieddate desc
delete from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=? and doc_sno=?
delete from loan_drawdown where app_no=? and FAC_SNO=? and DD_SNO=?
insert into globaloptions(glp_orglevel, glp_orgname1, glp_orgname2, glp_orgname3, glp_orgname4, glp_orgname5) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select glp_orgname1, glp_orgname2, glp_orgname3, glp_orgname4, glp_orgname5 from globaloptions
select glp_orglevel, glp_orgname1, glp_orgname2, glp_orgname3, glp_orgname4, glp_orgname5 from globaloptions
select distinct(org_level) from organisations
select org_code, org_name from organisations where org_code like '^%' and org_level ='^' order by org_name
select max(org_code) from organisations where org_code like '^%' and org_level ='^'

select org_code, org_name, org_scode, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, org_zip, org_phone, org_fax, org_url, org_level, org_micr, org_head, org_branchType, org_branchIn, org_region, org_saaBranch, org_village, solid, org_issaral, org_saralhead, c.city_name, s.state_name, org_internet_centre, org_centrename,to_char(org_opendate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as org_opendate,org_district, d.district_desc,org_excelupload_flag,org_manager_ctnum,org_ifsccode,org_abmid,org_abmmobile from organisations , laps_cities c, laps_states s,district_master d where org_code ='^' and d.district_code(+)=org_district and
s.state_code(+)=org_state and c.city_code(+)=org_city

select org_code, org_name, org_scode, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, org_zip, org_phone, org_fax, org_url, org_level, org_micr, org_head, org_branchType, org_branchIn, org_region, org_saaBranch, org_village, solid, org_issaral, org_saralhead, city_name, state_name,to_char(org_opendate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as org_opendate from organisations , laps_cities, laps_states where org_scode ='^' and state_code(+)=org_state and city_code(+)=org_city

select org_code, org_name, org_scode, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, org_zip, org_phone, org_fax, org_url, org_level, org_micr, org_head, org_branchType, org_branchIn, org_region, org_saaBranch, org_village, solid, org_issaral, org_saralhead,to_char(org_opendate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as org_opendate,ORG_MANAGER_CTNUM from organisations where org_scode='^'

insert into organisations(org_code, org_level, org_scode, org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_zip, org_state, org_phone, org_fax, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_url, org_micr, org_head, org_branchType, org_branchIn, org_region, org_saaBranch, org_village, solid, org_issaral, org_saralhead ,org_internet_centre,org_centrename,org_opendate,org_district,org_excelupload_flag,org_manager_ctnum,org_ifsccode,org_abmid,org_abmmobile) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

update organisations set org_level=?, org_scode=?, org_name=?, org_add1=?, org_add2=?, org_city=?, org_zip=?, org_state=?, org_phone=?, org_fax=?, org_taxid=?, org_trasitid=?, org_url=?, org_micr=?, org_head=?, org_branchType=?, org_branchIn=?, org_region=?, org_saaBranch=?, org_village=?, solid=?, org_issaral=?, org_saralhead=?, org_internet_centre=?, org_centrename=?, org_opendate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),org_district=?,org_excelupload_flag=?,org_manager_ctnum=?,org_ifsccode=?,org_abmid=?,org_abmmobile=? where org_code =?
select count(*) from organisations where org_code like '^%' and org_level ='^'
delete from organisations where org_code = ?
select org_code, org_name,org_scode from organisations order by org_name
select org_scode, org_name,org_scode from organisations order by org_name
select org_level, org_code, org_name from organisations where org_level ='^' order by org_name
select org_level, ^ from organisations where org_code like '^%' order by org_name
select org_name,org_scode,ORG_LEVEL,ORG_ADD1,ORG_ADD2 ,ORG_CITY,ORG_ZIP,ORG_STATE,ORG_PHONE,ORG_HEAD from organisations where org_code = '^'
select org_name from organisations where org_code in (^)
insert into groups(grp_id, grp_name, grp_rights, grp_discreteid, grouplimitslist,grp_accessfor, grp_privilege) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete groups where grp_id=?
update groups set grp_name=?,grp_rights=?, grp_discreteid=?, grouplimitslist=?, grp_accessfor=?, grp_privilege=? where grp_id=?
select grp_id, grp_name, grp_rights, grp_discreteid, grouplimitslist, grp_accessfor, grp_privilege from groups order by grp_name
select grp_name,grp_rights,grp_discreteid,grouplimitslist,grp_accessfor from GROUPS where grp_id='^'
select max(grp_id)+1 from groups
select con_country, con_currency from countrysetup
select * from com_assesment where asses_appno='^'

select loan_appamt,loan_amtreqd,loan_recmdamt,loan_reqterms,loan_modintrate,loan_terms,loan_mclrtabcode,loan_inttype,loan_interestcharged,loan_emi, loan_mclrtype,loan_baserate,loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_govt,loan_sub,govt_scheme,loan_sponseragency,loan_subsidytype,loan_intrate, LOAN_DOC_BRANCHCODE as org_scode,to_char(LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,loan_roitype from loandetails where loan_appno='^'

select loan_appamt,loan_amtreqd,loan_recmdamt,loan_reqterms,loan_modintrate,loan_terms,loan_baserate,loan_inttype,loan_interestcharged,loan_emi, loan_mclrtype,loan_baserate,loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_govt,loan_sub,govt_scheme,loan_sponseragency,loan_subsidytype,to_char(LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE from loandetails_ps where loan_appno='^' and loan_proposedappno='^'
select app_totalcolletralcov,app_totalpropcoverage,app_totalexicoverage,app_totalseccoverage from app_securitycoverage where appno='^'
select count(*) from prd_used where prd_org_level ='^' and prd_org_scode like '%^%'
select count(*) from designationmaster where UPPER(design_name)='^'

SELECT usr_id,usr_orgcode, grp_rights, usr_class, org_name, org_level, org_scode, usr_fname || ' ' || usr_lname as usr_name, org_city, org_issaral, solid, grp_accessfor, grp_privilege,usr_department,usr_grpid,user_designation,usr_rlpftype,to_char(LAST_LOGINDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as LAST_LOGINDATE,to_char(LAST_LOGOUTDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as LAST_LOGOUTDATE FROM users, groups, organisations WHERE usr_avail = 'a' AND usr_grpid = grp_id AND usr_orgcode = org_code AND usr_id='^' AND usr_password = '^'
select lnk_usr_id, nvl(lnk_logincount,0) as lnk_logincount from link where lnk_usr_id ='^'
insert into link(lnk_usr_id, lnk_logincount, LNK_LOGINDATE) values(?,?,sysdate)
insert into link(lnk_usr_id, lnk_logincount, lnk_logindate,lnk_ipaddress) values(?,?,sysdate,?)
delete from link where lnk_usr_id=?
update users set usr_password=?,user_first_flag=?,usr_pwdreset_date=sysdate where usr_id=?
select distinct(usr_id) ,usr_fname,usr_lname,usr_class from users order by usr_id
select distinct(usr_id) ,usr_fname,usr_lname,usr_class from users where usr_orgcode='001000000000000'

select usr_id, usr_grpid, usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, user_designation, usr_emailid,usr_department,usr_rmdflag,usr_rlpftype,USR_HRMS_DESIGNATION,USR_HRMS_JOBCODE from users where usr_id='^'

insert into users (usr_id, usr_grpid, usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, user_designation, user_first_flag, usr_emailid,usr_department,usr_rmdflag,usr_rlpftype,USR_HRMS_DESIGNATION,USR_HRMS_JOBCODE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update users set usr_grpid=?, usr_orgcode=?, usr_fname=?, usr_mname=?, usr_lname=?, usr_class=?, usr_supid=?, usr_supstatus=?, usr_avail=?, usr_function=?, usr_sanction_limit=?, user_designation=?, usr_emailid=?,usr_department=?,usr_rmdflag=?,usr_rlpftype=?,USR_HRMS_DESIGNATION=?,USR_HRMS_JOBCODE=? where usr_id=?
update users set usr_password=?,user_first_flag=? where usr_id=?
delete users where usr_id=?

update products set prd_catid=?,prd_desc=?, prd_type=?, prd_rng_from=?, prd_rng_to=?, prd_intro_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_mod_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_stop=?, prd_eff_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_term=?, prd_minterm=?, sec_unsecfl=?, int_tenorfl=?, int_amtfl=?, repay_schefl=?, prd_loantype=?, govt_sponsor=?, prd_loan_type=?, scheme_code=?, subsidary=?, incomeflag=?, prd_principal=?, prd_interest=?, nsc_loan=?, maxmetro=?, maxnon_metro=?, prd_staffprd=?, prd_homeplus=?, prd_validupto_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_internet=?, prd_holiday=?, prd_schemetype=?, prd_addintrate=?, prd_whetheragri=?,prd_bankscheme=?,prd_intrate=?,prd_purpose=?,staff_under=?,prd_staff_maxterm_prin=?, prd_staff_maxterm_intr=?,prd_repaytype=?,prd_deposittype=?,prd_depositloanfor=?,prd_applicablefor=?,prd_vehitype=?,PRD_SHARETYPE=?,PRD_WHTDIGIPRD=?,prd_interesttype=?,PRD_TERM_REST=?,PRD_MINTERM_REST=?,PRD_HOLIDAY_REST=?,PRD_CGTMSEFALG=? where prd_code=?
update products set prd_mod_date=sysdate where prd_code=?
delete from products where prd_code=?

select prd_catid,cat1.cat_name as scatname,cat2.cat_id as cat_id,cat2.cat_name as catname ,prd_desc, prd_type, prd_rng_from, prd_rng_to, TO_CHAR(prd_intro_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as prd_intro_date, TO_CHAR(prd_mod_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as prd_mod_date,prd_stop , TO_CHAR(prd_eff_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as prd_eff_date, prd_saveflag, prd_term, prd_minterm, buss_bussid, buss_termid, prd_loantype, govt_sponsor, prd_loan_type, scheme_code, subsidary, sec_unsecfl, int_tenorfl, int_amtfl, repay_schefl, incomeflag, prd_principal, prd_interest, nsc_loan, maxmetro, maxnon_metro, prd_staffprd, prd_homeplus, prd_subcode,TO_CHAR(prd_validupto_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as prd_validupto_date ,prd_internet, prd_holiday, prd_schemetype, prd_addintrate, prd_whetheragri,prd_bankscheme,prd_intrate,prd_purpose,staff_under,buss_ruleid ,prd_staff_maxterm_prin,prd_staff_maxterm_intr,prd_repaytype,prd_deposittype,prd_depositloanfor,prd_applicablefor,prd_vehitype, PRD_SHARETYPE,PRD_WHTDIGIPRD,prd_interesttype,PRD_TERM_REST,PRD_MINTERM_REST,PRD_HOLIDAY_REST,PRD_CGTMSEFALG from products, prd_category cat1, prd_category cat2, prod_business where prd_code='^' and buss_prdid=prd_code and prd_catid=cat1.cat_id and buss_prdid = prd_code and cat2.cat_id= (select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=prd_catid)
select NVL(max(prd_code),0)+1 as prd_code from products
select * from prd_category where cat_parent ='^' and CAT_ACTION='E'
select count(*) from prd_used where prd_code =^
select count(*) from prd_authority where prd_code =^
select count(*) from prd_workflow where prd_code=^ and prd_workid in (select wrk_flowid from workflow where wrk_flowtype='^')
select count(*) from prd_documents where prd_code=^
select count(*) from prd_interest where prd_code=^
select count(*) from prd_documentcharge where docchrg_prdcode=^
select count(*) from prd_processcharge where PROCESS_PRDCODE=^
select count(*) from prd_margincost where MARGIN_PRDCODE=^
select count(*) from prd_sanction_limit where prd_code=^
select prd_type, prd_rng_from, prd_rng_to from products where prd_code =^ and prd_term=^
select exeappno, fincheck, mgn_check, grp_check,facility_agrschemetype from facilities where facility_appno='^'
select fin_appno, to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year, fin_rowid, fin_audit, fin_unaudit, fin_estimated, fin_projection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^'
select count(*) as cnt from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^'
select cma_no from com_cma_master where ind_code =(select perapp_indcode from perapplicant where perapp_id= (select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='N'))
select distinct fin_tabname from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no= '^' and fin_page='FI'
select fin_tabname from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no= ^ and fin_page='FI' order by fin_rowid
select fin_tabname, min(fin_rowid) as fin_row from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no = ^ and fin_page='FI' group by fin_tabname having count(fin_tabname) > 1 order by fin_row asc
select fin_rowid,fin_rowdesc,fin_rowtype,fin_sno from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no=^ and fin_tabname='^' and fin_page='FI' order by fin_sno

SELECT a.fin_rowid AS myrowid ,a.fin_rowdesc desc1,b.fin_rowdesc desc2,b.fin_rowid,a.fin_rowtype, a.fin_sno FROM com_finmaster a left outer join com_finappdesc b ON a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid WHERE a.fin_cma_no= ^ AND a.fin_tabname='^' AND fin_page='FI' ORDER BY a.fin_sno
select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear,fin_sno from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='^' order by finyear

SELECT fin_audit,fin_unaudit,fin_estimated,fin_projection FROM com_finappvalues a, (select fin_rowid ,fin_sno from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no= ^ and fin_tabname='^' and fin_page='FI') b WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and com_division_id='^' and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid(+) order by b.fin_sno

select to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit,sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')and fin_sno='^' group by fin_year

select to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit,sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date( '^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') group by fin_year

SELECT nvl(^,'0') as txtvalue,b.fin_formula as formula,b.fin_rowid,b.fin_sno FROM com_finmaster b left join com_finappvalues a on (to_char(a.fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and com_division_id='^' and a.fin_sno='^' and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid WHERE b.fin_cma_no= '^' and b.fin_tabname='^' and b.fin_page='FI' order by b.fin_sno

SELECT ^ as txtvalue,b.fin_formula as formula,b.fin_rowid FROM com_finappvalues a, (select fin_rowid ,fin_sno,fin_formula from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no= ^ and fin_tabname='^' and fin_page='FI') b WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and com_division_id='^' and a.fin_sno='^' and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid order by b.fin_sno
select * from com_finappvalues where fin_appno = '^' and com_division_id='^'
delete from com_finappvalues where fin_appno =? and com_division_id=?
delete from com_finappvalues where fin_appno =? and com_division_id=? and fin_sno >= ?
select count(*) as cnt from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='0'
select fin_rowid,fin_rowdesc,fin_rowtype,fin_sno from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no=^ and fin_page='^' order by fin_sno

SELECT a.fin_rowid AS myrowid ,a.fin_rowdesc desc1,b.fin_rowdesc desc2,b.fin_rowid,a.fin_rowtype, a.fin_sno FROM com_finmaster a left outer join com_finappdesc b ON a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid WHERE a.fin_cma_no= ^ AND fin_page='^' ORDER BY a.fin_sno

SELECT fin_audit,fin_unaudit,fin_estimated,fin_projection FROM com_finappvalues WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and com_division_id='0' and fin_sno='^'
select fin_rowid,fin_formula from com_finmaster where fin_page = '^' and fin_cma_no = ^ order by fin_sno
select formula,formula_for,formula_for_type from com_dynamic_formula where formula_rowid = ^

select to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, app_approvedby, usr_fname, initcap(user_designation) as user_designation, to_char(add_months(app_processdate,'6'),'Month- yyyy') as halfyearreview,to_char(add_months(app_processdate,'12'),'Month- yyyy') as yearreview,to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as appcreatedate,to_char(app_reviewdate,'Month - yyyy') as app_reviewdate from applications, users where app_no='^' and app_approvedby=usr_id

select top 1 to_char(fin_year,'yyyy') as prevyear,sum(fin_audit) as audit,sum(fin_unaudit) as unaudit, sum(fin_estimated) as estimated,sum(fin_projection) as projection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='0' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') group by to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') order by to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') desc
select fin_appno from com_finappdesc where fin_appno='^' and fin_rowid=^
update com_finappdesc set fin_rowdesc=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=?
insert into com_finappdesc(fin_appno,fin_rowid,fin_rowdesc) values(?,?,?)

select fin_appno,to_char(fin_year,'yyyy'),fin_rowid from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and fin_rowid=^ and fin_sno='^'
update com_finappvalues set fin_audit=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_sno=? and fin_appno =?
update com_finappvalues set fin_unaudit=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_sno=? and fin_appno =?
update com_finappvalues set fin_estimated=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_sno=? and fin_appno =?
update com_finappvalues set fin_projection=?,fin_stress_projection=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_sno=? and fin_appno =?
update com_finappvalues set fin_projection=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and com_division_id=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_sno=?

select p.prd_code as pcode ,p.prd_catid as pcatid ,p.prd_desc as pdesc ,p.prd_type as ptype,p.prd_rng_from as prfrom, p.prd_rng_to as prto,p.prd_saveflag as psflag ,p1.cat_name as subcategory , p2.cat_name as category from products p,prd_category p1,prd_category p2 where p.prd_catid=p1.cat_id and p1.cat_parent=p2.cat_id
select * from prd_authority where prd_code=^

select doc_code,doc_desc, doc_type, doc_primary, doc_prule, to_char(doc_create_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_create_date from documents where doc_type='^' and doc_create_date in (select max(doc_create_date) from documents group by doc_code) order by doc_desc
select sel_docuname,doc_id,txt_pdtused,sel_availmentpdt,txt_module,txtarea_documentmaster,sno from doc_dynamic_master_samp where doc_id="^"

select prd_doccode,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_desc,to_char(doc_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_create_date,prd_mandatory from prd_documents,doc_dynamicmaster ,static_data where doc_id=to_char(prd_doccode) and prd_code='^' and doc_doctype='^' and doc_modifieddate in (select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster group by doc_id) and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191'

select doc_id,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as docdesc,to_char(doc_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_createddate,STAT_DATA_ACTIVE from doc_dynamicmaster d,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and stat_data_active='Y' and doc_doctype='^' and DOC_MODULE like '%^%' ^ and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where DOC_DOCUNAME=d.DOC_DOCUNAME)
select doc_template,to_char(doc_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_createddate from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id='^'
select doc_code,doc_desc from documents where doc_type='^' and doc_create_date in (select max(doc_create_date) from documents group by doc_code) order by doc_desc

select doc_code, doc_desc, doc_type, doc_primary, doc_prule, TO_CHAR(doc_create_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as doc_create_date, doc_scode, reqdcode, reqddate, reqdvalue, reqdmdate, docreqfl, docmanfl, doc_codename from documents where doc_code=^ and doc_create_date in (select max(doc_create_date) from documents group by doc_code)
select * from subdocument where doc_subid=^
delete from documents where doc_code=?
delete from subdocument where doc_subid=?

insert into documents(doc_code, doc_desc, doc_type, doc_primary, doc_prule, doc_create_date, doc_scode, reqdcode, reqddate, reqdvalue, reqdmdate, docreqfl, docmanfl, doc_codename) values(?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert into subdocument(doc_subid, doc_subalternate, doc_subrule, doc_subidentify) values(?,?,?,?)

select prd_workid, stat_data_desc1,prd_maxclass, prd_duration, wrk_flowname, prd_function from prd_workflow, workflow,static_data where prd_code=^ and prd_workid=wrk_flowid and wrk_flowtype='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC= prd_maxclass and stat_data_id='7' order by prd_flowpoint
delete prd_workflow where prd_code=? and prd_workid in (select wrk_flowid from workflow where wrk_flowtype=?)
insert into prd_workflow(prd_code, prd_flowpoint, prd_workid, prd_maxclass, prd_duration, prd_function) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from prd_interest_limit where prd_code=?
insert into prd_interest_limit(prd_code, prd_sno, prd_termfrom, prd_termto, prd_interest) values(?,?,?,?,?)
select prd_sno,prd_termfrom,prd_termto,prd_interest from prd_interest_limit where prd_code=^ order by prd_sno

select p.prd_code,p.prd_desc as prdesc,p2.cat_name as prdcat,p1.cat_name as prdsubcat, p.prd_rng_from as prdfrom,p.prd_rng_to as prdto,p.prd_type as prdtype,p.prd_saveflag as prdflag, p.prd_stop as prd_stop from products p,prd_category p1,prd_category p2 where p.prd_catid=p1.cat_id and p1.cat_parent=p2.cat_id and p.prd_type like '^%' and UPPER(p.prd_type) like UPPER('%^') and UPPER(p.prd_saveflag) like UPPER('^') and UPPER(p2.cat_name) like UPPER('%^%') and prd_rng_from like '^' and prd_rng_to like '^' and prd_stop ='^' and prd_renew = '^' order by prdcat
select count(app_prdcode)from applications where app_prdcode='^' and APP_DELFLAG!='Y'
select * from prd_category where cat_parent = 0
select * from prd_category where cat_parent = 0 and lower(type)='m'
select * from prd_category where cat_parent != 0
select * from prd_category where cat_parent != 0 and cat_parent= ^
select count(*) from prd_category where cat_name='^' and cat_parent = ^
select count(*) from products where prd_catid = ^
select count(*) from prd_category where cat_parent =^
insert into prd_category(cat_id,cat_name,cat_parent,type,CAT_ACTION) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update prd_category set cat_id=?,cat_name=?,cat_parent=?,CAT_ACTION=? where cat_id= ?

select max(cat_id) from prd_category
select max(wrk_flowid) from workflow
insert into workflow(wrk_flowid, wrk_flowname, wrk_flowtype) values(?,?,?)

delete from workflow where wrk_flowid=?
