select count(*) from workflow where wrk_flowname='^' and wrk_flowtype = '^'
select count(*) from prd_workflow where prd_workid= ^

select app_no,comapp_companyid, app_status, org_name, comapp_companyname from applications, organisations, com_demographics, comapplicant where app_usrid like '^' and app_orgcode like '^' and app_no like '^' and comapp_companyid like '^' and comapp_companyname like '^' and app_loantype='c' and app_delflag='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_no=demo_appno and comapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_comappid ='^'
and app_orgcode in (select org_code from organisations where org_code like substring('^',1,^)||'%')

select app_no, demo_companyid, app_status, org_name, demo_companyname from applications, organisations, com_demographics where app_no in (select mail_appno from appmailbox ap1 where mail_tousrid='^' and mail_date= (select max(mail_date) from appmailbox ap2 where ap2.mail_appno=ap1.mail_appno)) and app_loantype='c' and (upper(app_delflag)='N' or app_delflag is null) and org_code=app_orgcode and app_no=demo_appno

select app_no, demo_companyid, app_status, org_name, demo_companyname from applications, organisations, com_demographics where app_no in (select mail_appno from appmailbox where mail_fromusrid='^') and app_loantype='c' and (upper(app_delflag)='N' or app_delflag is null) and org_code=app_orgcode and app_no=demo_appno

SELECT com_proposals.prop_appno, to_char( com_proposals.prop_receptdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr1, com_proposals.prop_crdpropno, to_char( com_proposals.prop_crdpropdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr2, com_proposals.prop_decision, com_proposals.prop_orgbranch, com_proposals.prop_relmanager, com_proposals.prop_source, com_proposals.prop_loantype, to_char( com_proposals.prop_presentdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr3, com_proposals.prop_sanctionedby, com_proposals.prop_crrreason, to_char( com_proposals.prop_incdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr4, com_proposals.prop_crpolicydev, com_proposals.prop_sectordetails, com_proposals.prop_facilitytype, com_proposals.prop_maxusage, com_proposals.prop_minusage, com_proposals.prop_avgusage, com_proposals.prop_curusage, com_proposals.prop_overdue, com_proposals.prop_curyear, com_proposals.prop_nextyear, com_proposals.prop_overduereason, to_char( applications.app_closeddate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr5,to_char( com_proposals.prop_compdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Expr6, to_char(applications.app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS Exps ,applications.app_approvedby FROM com_proposals INNER JOIN applications ON com_proposals.prop_appno = applications.app_no WHERE (com_proposals.prop_appno LIKE '^')

select app_no, app_prdcode, loan_modintrate, loan_terms, loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_downpay, cat2.cat_name ||'-'|| cat1.cat_name ||'-'||TO_CHAR(prd_rng_from)|| '-'||TO_CHAR(prd_rng_to) as productdesc, prd_lvr, prd_totalint, prd_term, demo_finstandard, demo_industrycode, demo_indrating, prd_type, demo_comappid, app_status, prd_maxintclass, loan_appamt from applications, loandetails, products p, prd_category cat1, prd_category cat2, prd_interest prdi, com_demographics, prd_authority prda where app_loantype='c' and app_no like '^' and app_no*=loan_appno and app_prdcode=p.prd_code and cat1.cat_id=prd_catid and cat2.cat_id=(select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=prd_catid) and p.prd_code=prdi.prd_code and p.prd_code = prda.prd_code and app_no=demo_appno
insert into com_demographics(demo_appno, demo_comappid, demo_finstandard, demo_industrycode, demo_indrating, demo_apptype,demo_comappnewid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into loandetails(loan_appno, loan_modintrate, loan_terms, loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_downpay, loan_appamt,loan_createddate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
update com_demographics set demo_finstandard=? where demo_appno=? and demo_apptype=?
update loandetails set loan_modintrate=?, loan_terms=?, loan_amtreqd=?, loan_costloanprd=?, loan_recmdamt=?, loan_downpay=?, loan_modusrid=?, loan_appamt=? where loan_appno=?

update com_demographics set demo_companyid=?, demo_crptaddress1=?, demo_crptadress2=?, demo_crptcity=?, demo_crptstate=?, demo_crptpin=?, demo_crptphone=?, demo_crptfax=?, demo_factaddress1=?, demo_factaddress2=?, demo_factcity=?, demo_factstate=?, demo_factpin=?, demo_factphone=?, demo_factfax=?, demo_businessnature=?, demo_corpstructure=?, demo_companyrole=?, demo_yrsinbusiness=?, demo_ownership=?, demo_totemployees=? where demo_appno=?
delete com_proposals where prop_appno=?
insert into com_proposals values(?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
select NVL(SUBSTR(max(app_no),^,11),'0') from applications where SUBSTR(app_no,1,^)='^' and APP_MIGRATION is null
select count(*) from applications where app_no='^'
select count(*) from link where lnk_app_no='^' and lnk_usr_id!='^'
update link set lnk_app_no=? where lnk_usr_id=?
update link set lnk_app_no=null where lnk_usr_id=?
select distinct exp_id,exp_desc from exposure where exp_type='^'

select p.prd_code as prdcode,c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory ,p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom,p.prd_rng_to as rangeto,p.prd_term as term, p1.prd_maxintclass as class,p2.prd_lvr as loanratio, p2.prd_totalint as intrest,p.prd_type as prd_type,prd_inttype from prd_category c,prd_category c1,products p , prd_authority p1,prd_interest p2 ,prd_used where p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and Upper(prd_type) like 'P%' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and p.prd_code=p1.prd_code and p.prd_code=p2.prd_code and p.prd_code = prd_used.prd_code and prd_org_scode like '%^%' and prd_renew !='y' and prd_internet !='N' and c1.cat_parent = '^' order by c.cat_name

select p.prd_code as prdcode,c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory ,p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom,p.prd_rng_to as rangeto,p.prd_term as term, p1.prd_maxintclass as class,p2.prd_lvr as loanratio, p2.prd_totalint as intrest,p.prd_type as prd_type,prd_inttype,p2.prd_collweight, p2.prd_repayselfemp,p.prd_desc from prd_category c,prd_category c1,products p , prd_authority p1,prd_interest p2 ,prd_used where p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and p.prd_code=p1.prd_code and p.prd_code=p2.prd_code and p.prd_code = prd_used.prd_code and prd_type like '^%' and UPPER(prd_renew) !=UPPER('Y') and prd_org_scode like '%^%' order by p.prd_code
and p.prd_code in( select prd_code from prd_used where prd_org_scode like '^' )
and p.prd_code in( select prd_code from prd_used,organisations where org_level=prd_org_level and( org_code not like '^%' or org_code='^'))
and p.prd_code in( select prd_code from prd_used,organisations where org_level=prd_org_level and org_code like '^%')

select p.prd_code as prdcode,c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory ,p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom,p.prd_rng_to as rangeto,p.prd_term as term, p1.prd_maxintclass as class,p2.prd_lvr as loanratio, p2.prd_totalint as intrest,p.prd_type as prd_type,prd_inttype from prd_category c,prd_category c1,products p , prd_authority p1,prd_interest p2,prd_used where p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and Upper(prd_type) in ('CW','CT') and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and p.prd_code=p1.prd_code and p.prd_code=p2.prd_code and p.prd_code = prd_used.prd_code and prd_org_scode like '%^%'

select doc_jspname,doc_id,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_desc,to_char(apdoc_rendate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_remarks,to_char(doc_createddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as doc_create_date,apdoc_substatus,apdoc_totpages,apdoc_remarks,APDOC_APPROVERCBSID,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE,STAT_DATA_DESC from doc_dynamicmaster d,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(apdoc_doccode) and apdoc_appno ='^' and apdoc_doctype='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_DELFLAG is null and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by DOC_DOCSUBTYPE

select doc_jspname,doc_id,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_desc,to_char(apdoc_rendate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_remarks,to_char(doc_createddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as doc_create_date,apdoc_substatus,apdoc_totpages,apdoc_remarks,APDOC_APPROVERCBSID,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE,STAT_DATA_DESC from doc_dynamicmaster d,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(apdoc_doccode) and apdoc_appno ='^' and apdoc_doctype='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_FAC_SLNO='^' and APDOC_DELFLAG is null and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by DOC_DOCSUBTYPE
select STAT_DATA_DESC from static_data where STAT_DATA_ID='191' and STAT_DATA_DESC='^'

select doc_code,doc_desc,doc_type,apdoc_substatus,to_char(apdoc_subdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_totpages, to_char(apdoc_rendate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks,doc_primary from documents,appdocuments where apdoc_appno like '^' and doc_code=apdoc_doccode and doc_type='^' order by apdoc_doctype

select doc_doctype,doc_id,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_docname,apdoc_substatus, to_char(apdoc_subdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_totpages, to_char(apdoc_rendate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks,to_char(doc_createddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as doc_create_date,prd_mandatory,doc_jspname,apdoc_approvercbsid,doc_docsubtype,STAT_DATA_DESC from doc_dynamicmaster d,prd_documents,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(prd_doccode) and doc_doctype='^' and prd_code =(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no like '^') and to_char(prd_doccode)= apdoc_doccode and apdoc_appno like '^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by doc_docsubtype,doc_id asc

select doc_doctype,doc_id,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_docname,apdoc_substatus, to_char(apdoc_subdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_totpages, to_char(apdoc_rendate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks,to_char(doc_createddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as doc_create_date,prd_mandatory,doc_jspname,apdoc_approvercbsid,doc_docsubtype,STAT_DATA_DESC from doc_dynamicmaster d,prd_documents,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(prd_doccode) and doc_doctype='^' and prd_code =(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no like '^') and to_char(prd_doccode)= apdoc_doccode and apdoc_appno like '^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_FAC_SLNO='^' order by doc_docsubtype,doc_id asc
delete from appdocuments where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doctype=?
delete from appdocuments where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doccode =?
select doc_docuname from doc_dynamicmaster a,appdocuments b where apdoc_appno='^' and apdoc_doccode='^' and a.doc_id= b.apdoc_doccode

insert into appdocuments(apdoc_appno,apdoc_doccode,apdoc_substatus,apdoc_subdate,apdoc_totpages,apdoc_rendate, apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks, doc_created_date,APDOC_CreateUSERID,APDOC_FAC_SLNO) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,sysdate,?,?)
select NVL(max(apdoc_doccode +1),1) from appdocuments where apdoc_appno='^' and upper(apdoc_substatus)='N'
update appdocuments set apdoc_remarks=?, doc_created_date = TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,apdoc_substatus= ? where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doccode=?
delete from appdocuments where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doccode=? and apdoc_doctype = ?
select doc_primary,doc_prule from documents where doc_code=^
select doc_subalternate,doc_subrule from subdocument where doc_subid=^

select appscan_appno,appscan_doccode,to_char(appscan_validfrom,'DD/MM/YYYY'), to_char(appscan_validto,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_scanby,to_char(appscan_scandate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appscan_verifyby,to_char(appscan_verifydate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_doccustody,appscan_imgtype,appscan_notes, appscan_status,apdoc_totpages,appscan_filename from appdocscanning,appdocuments where appscan_appno='^' and appscan_doccode=^ and appscan_appno=apdoc_appno and appscan_doccode=apdoc_doccode

select appscan_appno,appscan_doccode,to_char(appscan_validfrom,'DD/MM/YYYY'), to_char(appscan_validto,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_scanby,to_char(appscan_scandate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appscan_verifyby,to_char(appscan_verifydate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_doccustody,appscan_imgtype,appscan_notes, appscan_status,apdoc_totpages,doc_desc from appdocscanning,appdocuments,documents where appscan_appno='^' and appscan_doccode=^ and appscan_appno=apdoc_appno and appscan_doccode=apdoc_doccode and doc_code = apdoc_doccode and apdoc_appno = appscan_appno and apdoc_doctype='A'

insert into appdocscanning(appscan_appno,appscan_doccode,appscan_status,appscan_validfrom,appscan_validto, appscan_scanby,appscan_scandate,appscan_verifyby,appscan_verifydate,appscan_doccustody,appscan_imgtype, appscan_notes) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,sysdate,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?)

update appdocscanning set appscan_status=?,appscan_validfrom=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_validto=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_scanby=?, appscan_verifyby=?,appscan_verifydate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),appscan_doccustody=?,appscan_imgtype=?,appscan_notes=? where appscan_appno=? and appscan_doccode=?
update appdocuments set apdoc_totpages=? where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doccode=?
select appscan_document,appscan_filename from appdocscanning where appscan_appno='^' and appscan_doccode='^'
update appdocscanning set appscan_document=?,appscan_filename=? where appscan_appno=? and appscan_doccode=?

select mail_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname, mail_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),mail_type, mail_fromusrid, mail_tousrid from appmailbox left join users usr1 on mail_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id,users usr2 where mail_appno like '^' and mail_tousrid=usr2.usr_id order by mail_date

select prd_flowpoint, wrk_flowname, prd_maxclass, prd_function from prd_workflow, workflow where prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^') and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_workid=wrk_flowid order by prd_flowpoint

select app_status, app_approvedby, app_sanctioningcomments, app_loantype, app_orglevel, to_char(app_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_reviewdate, app_legalcomp, app_vetting, app_vettedby, CBS_ACCOUNTNO,app_deviateduserid,app_prdcode,app_renew_flag, to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,app_finalsanction,app_termflag,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI,app_stockaudit,app_creditaudit,APP_ORGCODE,APP_APPLNHOLDER from applications where app_no='^'

select CBS_ACCOUNTNO,app_applnholder,app_termflag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as APP_CREATEDATE,APP_INWARDNO,app_enchflag,app_enachdate,APP_PRDCODE from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO='^'
select prd_skip, prd_approval from prd_authority where prd_code= (select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^')
select count(mail_fromflowpoint) from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and mail_fromflowpoint=^

select mail_toflowpoint, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(prd_duration+mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_maxclass from appmailbox, prd_workflow where mail_appno='^' and mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox where mail_appno='^') and prd_flowpoint=mail_toflowpoint and prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^')
select mail_toflowpoint,to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),mail_fromusrid from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox where mail_appno='^')

select prd_maxclass, to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), to_char(prd_duration+app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') from applications, prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint=1 and prd_code= (select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^') and app_no='^'
select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,'' as desc1 from users where usr_avail='a' and usr_orgcode=^ order by upper(usr_fname)

select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,cbs_static_data_desc as desc1 from users,cbs_staticdata where usr_avail='a' and cbs_static_data_id='130' and cbs_static_data_code=usr_rlpftype and usr_orgcode=^ order by upper(usr_fname)
update applications set app_vetting=?, app_vettedby=?, app_datevetted=sysdate where app_no=?

insert into appmailbox (mail_appno,mail_fromusrid,mail_tousrid,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint,mail_date,mail_type,mail_from_orgcode, mail_from_orgdept,mail_to_orgcode,mail_to_orgdept) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into appmailbox (mail_appno,mail_fromusrid,mail_tousrid,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint,mail_date,mail_type,mail_from_orgcode, mail_from_orgdept,mail_to_orgcode,mail_to_orgdept,MAIL_REALLOCATION) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete appmailbox where mail_appno=? and mail_date=(select app_processdate from applications where app_no=?)
select * from globaloptions

select usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname,USER_DESIGNATION,(select cbs_static_data_desc from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='27' and cbs_static_data_code=USER_DESIGNATION) as AS_USER_DESIGNATION from users where usr_id='^'
select grp_rights from groups, users where usr_grpid=grp_id and usr_id='^'
select cat_id, cat_name from prd_category where cat_parent = ^ order by cat_name

select ^ from prd_workflow, workflow, products where prd_workid=wrk_flowid and products.prd_code =prd_workflow.prd_code and prd_type like '^%' and prd_catid in(^) and prd_saveflag ='c' order by prd_desc

select ^ from products p, prd_category c1,prd_category c2,prd_used pu,prd_interest pi where p.prd_type like '^%' and pu.prd_code =p.prd_code and pi.prd_code = p.prd_code and p.prd_saveflag ='c' and p.prd_catid=c2.cat_id and p.prd_catid in (^) and c1.cat_id=(select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=p.prd_catid)
select * from prd_category where cat_id in (^)
select org_name,org_code,org_level,org_scode,org_manager_ctnum from organisations where org_scode ='^'
select distinct usr_class from users order by usr_class
select ^ from groups,organisations, users where usr_grpid =grp_id and usr_orgcode=org_code and usr_avail ='^' and org_code in (^) and usr_class in (^) order by org_name
select usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as name,usr_rlpftype,USR_CLASS,USR_ORGCODE,USER_DESIGNATION,USR_DEPARTMENT from users where usr_id='^'
select ^ from groups,organisations,users where usr_grpid =grp_id and usr_orgcode=org_code and org_code in (^)
select * from groups
select * from groups where grp_id in (^)
select grp_rights from groups where grp_id=^
select org_name,org_code from organisations order by org_name
select org_name,org_code,org_scode from organisations ^ and org_code not in ('001001000000000') order by org_name
select org_name,org_code,org_scode from organisations ^ and org_code not in ('001001000000000','001002001000000','001014001000000','001007001000000') order by org_name

select int_mdrates1, int_mdrates2, int_mdrates3, int_mdratio1, int_mdratio2, int_mdratio3, int_indrates1, int_indrates2, int_indrates3, int_indratio1, int_indratio2, int_indratio3, to_char(int_moddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as int_moddate, int_type from interestindex
delete prd_interest where prd_code=?
select prd_internet, prd_used.prd_code as prd_code, prd_org_level, prd_org_scode from prd_used, products where prd_used.prd_code = products.prd_code and prd_used.prd_code = ^
select org_level, org_name, org_scode from organisations order by org_scode
insert into prd_used(prd_code, prd_org_level, prd_org_scode) values(?,?,?)
delete from PRD_USED where PRD_CODE=?
update products set prd_internet=? where prd_code=?
select peremp_yresemp,peremp_empdesig from peremployer,per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_appid = peremp_id and demo_type='a'

select loan_recmdamt, loan_costloanprd, loan_intrate,loan_repaycapacity,loan_metlifepremiumamt,loan_crp,loan_bsp,loan_inttype,loan_mclrtype,loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_modintrate,loan_baserate,LOAN_AMTREQD from loandetails where loan_appno ='^'

select lifestyle_car, lifestyle_scooter, lifestyle_fridge, lifestyle_telephone, lifestyle_computer, lifestyle_mobile, lifestyle_washing_machine, lifestyle_television from per_lifestyle where lifestyle_appno='^'

select loan_modintrate, loan_reqterms, loan_recmdamt, app_prdcode, app_isdeviated, app_deviateduserid,loan_intrate, loan_fileno, loan_inttype, loan_govt,loan_costloanprd,loan_baserate, loan_mclrtype,loan_metlifepremiumamt,loan_profee,to_char(LOAN_DUEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_DUEDATE,govt_scheme,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,LOAN_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,loan_creditrskval, loan_busstatval,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_PENALTY,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI from loandetails, applications where loan_appno = app_no and loan_appno='^'

select loan_modintrate, loan_reqterms, loan_recmdamt,app_prdcode, app_isdeviated, app_deviateduserid,loan_intrate, loan_fileno, loan_inttype, loan_govt,loan_costloanprd,loan_baserate,loan_mclrtype from loandetails, applications,COM_BANKING where loan_appno = app_no and loan_appno=COMBK_APPNO and COMBK_CBSAPPNO is null and COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' and COMBK_APPNO='^'
select app_loantype, app_legalcomp,app_renew_flag,app_inwardno,app_prdcode,APP_MIGRATION,cbs_accountno,app_renew_flag from applications where app_no='^'

select (perapp_fname) as app_name, app_status, demo_appid, app_orgcode, app_inwardno, app_orglevel, app_valuesin, app_applnholder, perapp_panno, org_name ,loan_repaymenttype,CBS_ACCOUNTNO from applications, perapplicant, per_demographics, organisations,loandetails where org_scode=perapp_branchcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_type='a' and demo_appno=app_no and loan_appno=app_no and app_no='^'

select perapp_fname as app_name, app_status, demo_comappid as demo_appid, app_orgcode, app_inwardno, app_orglevel, app_valuesin, app_applnholder, perapp_panno, org_name,'' as loan_repaymenttype,'' as PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT, demo_comappnewid as demo_appnewid,app_renew_flag,'' as loan_takeover,inward_applnprocessat from applications, perapplicant, com_demographics, organisations where org_scode=perapp_branchcode and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_appno=app_no and app_no='^' and demo_apptype='^'
select demo_finstandard, demo_industrycode, demo_indrating, demo_finmodel from com_demographics where demo_appno ='^' and demo_apptype='N'
select to_char(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as date1 from dual

select app_no, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid from applications, products, com_demographics, comapplicant where app_loantype='C' and app_status='CA' and app_prdcode = prd_code and (prd_type='cw' or prd_type='ct') and app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = comapp_id
select org_code,org_name,org_level from organisations where org_scode ='^'

select loan_reqterms as loan_terms, loan_recmdamt, loan_modintrate, TO_CHAR(loan_receivedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as receivedate, loan_govt, loan_facility,loan_ageofveh,loan_costloanprd,loan_metlifepremiumamt,LOAN_DIGI_TOT_PROCESSINGFEE,LOAN_DIGI_PROCESSINGFEEPAID,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME,loan_Digi_deviation,LOAN_UPFRONTFEE,LOAN_UPFRONTFEECOL from loandetails where loan_appno ='^'
select to_char(add_months(sysdate,^),'dd/mm/yyyy') from dual
select count(app_no) as appno, app_loantype from applications where app_applnholder='^' and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and mailchkstatus='Y' and app_delflag='N' group by app_loantype

select count(app_no) as appno from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, comapplicant, organisations, users where mail_appno = app_no and app_no = demo_Appno and demo_comappid=comapp_id and usr_id = mail_tousrid and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_orgcode = org_code and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_date =(selec from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno) and upper(app_loantype)='C'

select count(app_no) as appno, app_loantype from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, organisations, users where mail_appno = app_no and app_no = demo_Appno and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=perapp_id and usr_id = mail_tousrid and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_orgcode = org_code and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno) and lower(app_loantype) in ('p','a') group by app_loantype

select count(app_no) as appno from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, organisations, users where mail_appno = app_no and app_no = demo_Appno and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=perapp_id and usr_id = mail_tousrid and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_orgcode = org_code and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno) and lower(app_loantype)='a'

select count(app_no) as appno from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations, users where mail_appno = app_no and app_no = demo_appno and demo_apptype='N' and demo_comappid=perapp_id and usr_id = mail_tousrid and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_orgcode = org_code and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno) and upper(app_loantype)='T'

select app_no, perapp_fname, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), perapp_id,mail_type from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno=a.mail_appno) and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and mail_tousrid=app_applnholder and app_orgcode=org_code and mail_appno=app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and upper(app_loantype)='T' and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' and mail_tousrid ='^' order by mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and mail_tousrid=app_applnholder and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and upper(app_loantype)='^' and app_delflag='N' and mail_tousrid ='^' order by mail_date desc

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null)) and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and mail_tousrid=app_applnholder and mail_appno=app_no and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_applnholder='^' and lower(app_loantype)='p' and Upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno ) and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and mail_tousrid=app_applnholder and mail_appno=app_no and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_applnholder='^' and lower(app_loantype)='a' and Upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select app_no,app_status,comapp_companyname from applications,comapplicant,com_demographics where app_loantype ='c' and app_no like '%^' and comapp_companyid like '%^' and demo_appno = app_no and demo_comappid = comapp_id and app_orgcode ='^' order by app_no
select perapp_employment from perapplicant where perapp_id= (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')

insert into loandetails(loan_appno, loan_modintrate, loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_downpay, loan_appamt, loan_reqterms, loan_inttype, loan_emi, loan_purposeofloan, loan_filedon, loan_repaymenttype, loan_margin, loan_docfee, loan_profee, loan_bank_refno, loan_interestcharged, loan_repaycapacity, loan_steptype, loan_fileno, loan_intrate, loan_receivedate, loan_modeofpay, loan_facility, loan_govt, loan_sub, offeredmargin, land_measurement, govt_scheme, loan_interest_emi, loan_operativeaccno, loan_sponseragency, loan_subsidytype,loan_copsociety,loan_intcalcmode,loan_prepaycharge,loan_upfrontfee,loan_cgtmse, loan_docrecvd,loan_docspecify,loan_specialcust,loan_interestid,loan_baserate,loan_ageofveh, LOAN_SECURITYCOLLATERAL,LOAN_TIMESOFABOVE,loan_mongrossrent,loan_takeover, loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_mclrtabcode,loan_mclrtype,loan_createddate,loan_lockperiod,loan_dnw_revisions,loan_metlifepremiumamt, LOAN_AGENCYNAME,LOAN_DUEDATE,LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,LOAN_CG_PERCENT,LOAN_TOT_INT,LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE,loan_restr_scheme,loan_roitype,LOAN_ROISCORE,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,LOAN_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,loan_crp,loan_bsp,LOAN_ECSBANKNAME,LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE,LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM,LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE,LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE,Loan_Sanct_Eff_ROI_date) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

insert into applications (app_no, app_createdate, app_prdcode, app_usrid, app_orgcode, app_loantype, app_status, app_delflag, app_inwardno, app_valuesin, app_orglevel, app_applnholder,mailchkstatus,app_clpudate,app_cpcdate,APP_ROHODATE,app_facilityrequired) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,'op','N',?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)
update applications set app_prdcode=? where app_no=?
update applications set app_status=? where app_no=?

update applications set app_status='op', app_processdate=null, app_processorgscode=null, app_processusrclass=null,app_legalcomp='S',app_sanctioningcomments=null, APP_DELODGEDDATE=(case when APP_LODGEDDATE is not null then sysdate else null end) where app_no=?

update applications set app_prdcode=?, app_inwardno=?, app_valuesin=?,app_clpudate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),app_cpcdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),APP_ROHODATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), app_facilityrequired=? where app_no=?
update applications set mailchkstatus=?, app_applnholder=? where app_no = ?
update applications set app_observation1=?,app_observation2=?,app_observation3=? ,app_execomments=?,app_cmdcomments=? where app_no = ?
update applications set app_isdeviated= ? , app_deviateduserid=? where app_no=?

update applications set app_status=?, app_processdate=sysdate, app_approvedby=?, app_sanctioningcomments=?, app_processorgscode=?, app_processusrclass=?,app_reviewdate=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where app_no=?
update applications set app_status=concat('c',substr(app_status,2,2)), app_closeddate=sysdate where app_no=?
update applications set cbs_accountno=?,mondate=sysdate where app_no=?
update applications set app_delflag='Y', app_deldate=sysdate, app_delusrid=? where app_no=?
update applications set app_delflag=?, app_deldate=?, app_delusrid=? where app_no=?
update applications set app_deviateduserid=? where app_no=?
insert into per_demographics(demo_appno,demo_appid,demo_type,demo_relation,demo_includeincome,demo_oldappid,DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,DEMO_DOCPRINT) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update per_demographics set demo_appno=?,demo_appid=?,demo_type=?,demo_relation=?, demo_includeincome=? where demo_appid=?
update per_demographics set demo_appid=? where demo_appno=? and demo_type='a'

update loandetails set loan_modintrate=?, loan_amtreqd=?, loan_costloanprd=?, loan_recmdamt=?, loan_downpay=?, loan_modusrid=?, loan_appamt=?, loan_reqterms=?, loan_inttype=?, loan_emi=?, loan_purposeofloan=?, loan_filedon=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), loan_repaymenttype=?, loan_margin=?, loan_docfee=?, loan_profee=?, loan_bank_refno=?, loan_interestcharged=?, loan_repaycapacity=?, loan_steptype=?, loan_fileno=?, loan_intrate=?, loan_receivedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), loan_modeofpay=?, loan_facility=?, loan_govt=?, loan_sub=?, offeredmargin=?, land_measurement=?, govt_scheme=?, loan_interest_emi=?, loan_operativeaccno=?, loan_sponseragency=?, loan_subsidytype=?,loan_copsociety=?,loan_intcalcmode=?, loan_prepaycharge=?,loan_upfrontfee=?,loan_cgtmse=?,loan_docrecvd=?,loan_docspecify=?, loan_specialcust=?, loan_ageofveh=?,loan_interestid=?,loan_baserate=?,LOAN_SECURITYCOLLATERAL=?, LOAN_TIMESOFABOVE=?,loan_mongrossrent=?,loan_takeover=?, loan_creditrskval=?,loan_busstatval=?,loan_mclrtabcode=?,loan_mclrtype=?,loan_lockperiod=?,loan_dnw_revisions=?,loan_metlifepremiumamt=?, LOAN_AGENCYNAME=?,LOAN_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),LOAN_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),LOAN_CG_PERCENT=?,LOAN_TOT_INT=?, LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE=?,loan_restr_scheme=?,loan_roitype=?,LOAN_ROISCORE=?,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME=?, LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR=?,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT=?,LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO=?,LOAN_PREMIUM_AMOUNT=?,LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME=?,loan_crp=?,loan_bsp=? ,LOAN_ECSBANKNAME=?,LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE=?,LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM=?,LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE=?,LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE=?,Loan_Sanct_Eff_ROI_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where loan_appno=?
delete from per_demographics where demo_appno=? and demo_appid=? and demo_type=?

select demo_appid,perapp_fname as appname, demo_type, demo_relation, demo_includeincome,demo_type||demo_appid as creditappid,DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,demo_cibil,perapp_employment,PERAPP_STATUS,perapp_cbsid,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and demo_type!='a' order by demo_type
select demo_appid,perapp_fname as appname, demo_type, demo_relation from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and demo_type='a' order by demo_type

select demo_appid,perapp_fname as appname,demo_type, demo_relation,perapp_oldid,demo_docprint,DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and upper(demo_type) in('^') and perapp_id=demo_appid order by demo_type

insert into perincexpenses( perinc_id,perinc_monsalary,perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_domesticexp,perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc,perinc_selfincometype, perinc_selfyrsprof,perinc_applnt,perinc_others,perinc_othermondesc) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from perincexpenses where perinc_id=?

select perapp_id, perapp_title, perapp_fname, perapp_lname, perapp_panno, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_marstat, perapp_sex, perapp_employment, perapp_bank, perapp_banksince, perapp_fatname, perapp_branchcode, perapp_status, perapp_religion, perapp_salaryrouted, perapp_regno, perapp_cbsid, perapp_istatus, perapp_occupation, perapp_oldid, org_name, perapp_constitution, perapp_indcode, perapp_companyname from PERAPPLICANT, ORGANISATIONS where perapp_id='^' and org_scode(+)=perapp_branchcode

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and org_code like '^' ^

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age,PERAPP_PANNO,CON_MOBILE,KYC_IDPROOFREF from perapplicant,organisations,CUST_CONTACTINFO,APPLICANT_KYCNORMS where perapp_branchcode=org_scode AND PERAPP_ID=CON_APPID and PERAPP_ID=KYC_CUSTID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and org_code like '^' ^

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and PERAPP_CBSID = (select ADDKBOW_CBS_ID from ADDKBOWERDETAILS where ADDKBOW_APP_NO='^' union select SOL_CBS_ID from SOLVENCY where SOL_APPL_NO='^')

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno,org_name, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and PERAPP_OLDID in (select DEMO_OLDAPPID from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^' and DEMO_TYPE='a' union select DEMO_COMAPPID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^')
Order by perapp_fname
and upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%') Order by perapp_fname
and perapp_lname like '^%' Order by perapp_fname
and perapp_branchcode = '^' Order by perapp_fname
and upper(perapp_panno) like upper('^%') Order by perapp_fname
and to_date(to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') Order by perapp_fname
and perapp_cbsid = '^' Order by perapp_fname
select laps_custid.nextval from dual
insert into perincexpenses (perinc_id,perinc_applnt,perinc_selfincometype) values (?,?,?)
insert into peremployer (peremp_id) values (?)
UPDATE PERAPPLICANT SET perapp_photo = ? , perapp_docname=? where perapp_id=?
select perapp_photo, perapp_docname from perapplicant where perapp_id =^ Order by perapp_id
select prd_termfrom,prd_termto,prd_interest from prd_interest_limit where prd_code='^' order by prd_sno
delete from perapplicant where perapp_id=?

select peremp_id, peremp_name, peremp_address1, peremp_address2, peremp_address3, peremp_occupation, peremp_city, peremp_state, peremp_zip, peremp_phexten, peremp_phone, peremp_fax, peremp_email, peremp_design, peremp_contperson, peremp_yresemp, peremp_prevempname, peremp_prevempcity, peremp_applnt, peremp_retage, peremp_department, peremp_empno, peremp_servleft, to_char(peremp_retdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as peremp_retdate, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, peremp_servleftmon, peremp_category, peremp_yearsinbuss, to_char(peremp_establish,'dd/mm/yyyy') as peremp_establish ,peremp_experience, peremp_lease, to_char(peremp_receipt,'dd/mm/yyyy')as peremp_receipt, peremp_country, peremp_busowned,peremp_licenseno, to_char(peremp_licensedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as peremp_licensedate, sdcom.stat_data_desc1 emp_city, sdperm.stat_data_desc1 emppre_city,peremp_expinyrs, peremp_noofyrs,peremp_confemp,peremp_listcomp,peremp_dealing,PEREMP_SALARYROUTED,PEREMP_INCSOURCE from peremployer, perapplicant,static_data sdcom, static_data_master sdmcom, Static_Data Sdperm, Static_Data_Master Sdmperm Where perapplicant.perapp_id=peremployer.peremp_id(+) and perapp_id='^' and sdcom.stat_data_desc(+) = peremp_city and sdcom.stat_data_id = sdmcom.stat_mast_id (+) and sdmcom.stat_mast_desc(+) = 'City Code' and sdperm.stat_data_desc(+) = peremp_prevempcity and sdperm.stat_data_id = sdmperm.stat_mast_id (+) and Sdmperm.Stat_Mast_Desc(+) = 'City Code'

insert into peremployer( peremp_id, peremp_name, peremp_address1, peremp_address2, peremp_address3, peremp_city, peremp_state, peremp_zip, peremp_phone, peremp_fax, peremp_email, peremp_design, peremp_contperson, peremp_yresemp, peremp_prevempname, peremp_prevempcity, peremp_applnt, peremp_retage, peremp_department,peremp_servleft, peremp_retdate, peremp_phexten, peremp_empno, peremp_occupation, peremp_servleftmon, peremp_category, peremp_yearsinbuss, peremp_establish, peremp_experience, peremp_lease, peremp_receipt, peremp_country, PEREMP_BUSOWNED,peremp_licenseno,peremp_licensedate, peremp_expinyrs,peremp_confemp,peremp_listcomp,peremp_dealing,peremp_noofyrs,peremp_pagestatus,PEREMP_SALARYROUTED,PEREMP_INCSOURCE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from peremployer where peremp_id=?

select a.app_no as appno,pe.perapp_fname as aname,c1.cat_name as category ,c2.cat_name as subcategory ,p.prd_rng_from as rngfrom, p.prd_rng_to as rngto from prd_category c1 ,prd_category c2,applications a,perapplicant pe, per_demographics d,products p where c2.cat_id in (select prd_catid from products where prd_code in (select app_prdcode from applications where app_no =a.app_no )) and c1.cat_id=c2.cat_parent and pe.perapp_id in (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno=a.app_no) and p.prd_code in (select a2.app_prdcode from applications a2 where a2.app_no=a.app_no) and a.app_no in (select app_no from applications where app_createdate=(select max(app_createdate) from applications where app_no in (select demo_appno from per_demographics where demo_appid in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_panno='^' ))) ) and a.app_status like 'c%' and a.app_loantype='p' and d.demo_appno=a.app_no and app_orgcode='^'
select perapp_id ,rtrim(perapp_fname) as perapp_name from perapplicant where (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null) order by perapp_fname
select perapp_id ,rtrim(perapp_fname) as perapp_name from perapplicant where perapp_id!='^' and (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null) order by perapp_fname

select perapp_id ,rtrim(perapp_fname) as perapp_name,perapp_oldid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_cbsstatus, perapp_lname, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_sex, con_comaddr1, con_comaddr2, con_comvillage, con_comcity, con_comstate, con_comzip, con_comphone, con_comfax, con_email,perapp_cbsid from perapplicant, cust_contactinfo where perapp_id!='^' and (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_id=con_appid ^ and perapp_profilestatus='Y' order by perapp_fname
select app_no ,perapp_fname as aname, perapp_panno,org_name,app_status from applications,perapplicant, organisations,per_demographics d where
app_usrid='^' and app_orgcode=org_code and perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and demo_appno=app_no
app_orgcode=org_code and perapp_id= d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and org_code='^'
app_orgcode=org_code and perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and org_code like '^%' and org_code not like '^'
app_orgcode=org_code and perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and org_code like '^%'
perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and app_orgcode=org_code

select app_no ,perapp_fname as aname, perapp_panno,org_name,app_status,mail_fromusrid, to_char(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as mail_date from applications ,perapplicant,organisations,per_demographics d,appmailbox where perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and app_orgcode=org_code and mail_tousrid=app_usrid and app_usrid='^' and mail_date= (select max(m.mail_date) from appmailbox m where mail_tousrid='^' ) and app_loantype='p'

select app_no ,perapp_fname as aname, perapp_panno,org_name,app_status,mail_fromusrid, to_char(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as mail_date from applications ,perapplicant,organisations,per_demographics d,appmailbox where perapp_id=d.demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=demo_appno and app_orgcode=org_code and mail_fromusrid=app_usrid and app_usrid='^' and mail_date= (select max(m.mail_date) from appmailbox m where mail_fromusrid='^' )
and app_no like '^%' and perapp_lname like '^%' and perapp_panno like '^%' and upper(app_loantype)='P' and (upper(app_delflag)='N' or app_delflag is null)

select app_no,comapp_companyid,comapp_companyname, org_name, app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,comapplicant,organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_apptype='N' and demo_comappid=comapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and upper(app_loantype)='C' and UPPER(app_delflag)='Y'

select app_no,comapp_companyid,comapp_companyname, org_name, app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,comapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = comapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and upper(app_loantype)='C' and app_delflag='Y' and app_no like '^'

select app_no, comapp_companyid, comapp_companyname, org_name, app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications, com_demographics,comapplicant, organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappid=comapp_id and org_code=app_orgcode and upper(app_loantype)='C' and app_delflag='Y' and upper(comapp_companyname) like upper('%^%')

select app_no, comapp_companyid, comapp_companyname, org_name, app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications, com_demographics, comapplicant, organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappid=comapp_id and org_code=app_orgcode and upper(app_loantype)='C' and app_delflag='Y' and comapp_companyid like '%^%'

select app_no, perapp_panno, perapp_fname as applname, org_name, app_delusrid, app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and demo_type='a' and org_code=app_orgcode and UPPER(app_loantype)=UPPER('^') and app_delflag='Y'

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,per_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_appid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and UPPER(app_loantype)=UPPER('^') and app_delflag='Y' and app_no like '^'

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid ,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,per_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_appid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and LOWER(app_loantype)=LOWER('^') and app_delflag='Y' and upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%')

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,per_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_appid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and LOWER(app_loantype)=LOWER('^') and app_delflag='Y' and perapp_panno like '^'
delete from ^ where (^ in (?))
select * from organisations where org_code='^'

select app_no,comapp_companyname as aname, comapp_crptaddress1,comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity,comapp_crptstate,comapp_crptpin, comapp_companyname,loan_amtreqd,loan_recmdamt,proc_pymt_mth, to_char(proc_curr_pymt_due_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as proc_curr_pymt_due_date,proc_pymt_amt, proc_curr_amt_due+NVL(proc_carryover_bal,0) as paytotal , proc_carryover_bal,serv_total_pymt_recd,org_scode,org_name,org_scode, org_add1,org_add2,org_city,org_zip,org_state,prd_desc,prd_term, proc_pymt_amt,serv_curr_bal_due, rem_extorgname,rem_extadd1,rem_extadd2,rem_extcity, rem_extstate,rem_extpincode ,rem_extphone,rem_delqletter from

select app_no,perapp_fname as aname, perapp_address1,perapp_address2,perapp_city,perapp_state,perapp_zip, perapp_panno,loan_amtreqd,loan_recmdamt,proc_pymt_mth, to_char(proc_curr_pymt_due_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as proc_curr_pymt_due_date, proc_pymt_amt,proc_curr_amt_due+NVL(proc_carryover_bal,0) as paytotal, proc_carryover_bal,serv_total_pymt_recd,org_scode,org_name,org_scode, org_add1,org_add2,org_city,org_zip,org_state, prd_desc,prd_term,serv_curr_bal_due, rem_extorgname,rem_extadd1,rem_extadd2,rem_extcity, rem_extstate,rem_extpincode,rem_extphone,rem_firstletter,rem_secondletter,rem_thirdletter from

select app_no,comapp_companyname as aname, comapp_crptaddress1,comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity,comapp_crptstate,comapp_crptpin, comapp_companyname,loan_amtreqd,loan_recmdamt,proc_pymt_mth, to_char(proc_curr_pymt_due_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as proc_curr_pymt_due_date, proc_pymt_amt,proc_curr_amt_due+NVL(proc_carryover_bal,0) as paytotal,proc_carryover_bal,serv_total_pymt_recd,org_scode,org_name,org_scode, org_add1,org_add2,org_city,org_zip,org_state, prd_desc,prd_term,serv_curr_bal_due, rem_extorgname,rem_extadd1,rem_extadd2,rem_extcity, rem_extstate,rem_extpincode ,rem_extphone,rem_firstletter,rem_secondletter,rem_thirdletter from
and to_char(dateadd(dd,cast(rem_firstletterperiod as int),proc_curr_pymt_due_date),101)= to_char(to_date(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),101) and substring(proc_letters_flag,2,1)='0'
and to_char(dateadd(dd,cast(rem_secondletterperiod as int),proc_curr_pymt_due_date),101)= to_char(to_date(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),101) and substring(proc_letters_flag,3,1)='0'
and to_char(dateadd(dd,cast(rem_thirdletterperiod as int),proc_curr_pymt_due_date),101)= to_char(to_date(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),101) and substring(proc_letters_flag,4,1)='0'

select a1.app_no as appno,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,TO_CHAR(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_date,app_status, c2.cat_name as prd_desc,loan_amtreqd, loan_recmdamt, appr.code_no as codeno, TO_CHAR( appr.Sanction_Date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as sanctiondate, appr.Sanc_Ref_No as sancrefno, loan_fileno from applications a1, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category c1, prd_category c2, loandetails, appraisalsanction appr where a1.app_no = demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and app_delflag != 'Y' and upper(app_loantype) ='P' and products.prd_code=app_prdcode and a1.app_no=loan_appno and app_orgcode in (^) and upper(app_status) like upper('_^') and demo_type='a' and products.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c1.cat_parent=c2.cat_id and appr.appsanc_appno=a1.app_no

select ^ from organisations,applications,loandetails,products,prd_category cat1, prd_category cat2,per_demographics,perapplicant where org_code =app_orgcode and app_no =demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and products.prd_code=app_prdcode and prd_catid = cat1.cat_id and cat2.cat_id= (select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=prd_catid) and app_delflag!='Y' and upper(app_loantype) ='P' and app_orgcode in ('001000000000000') and upper(app_status) like upper('_P') and demo_type='a' and app_no=loan_appno group by app_status,prd_desc,cat1.cat_name,cat2.cat_name,app_no,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,loan_recmdamt,app_createdate,app_processdate
and p2.prd_flowpoint = (select min(prd_flowpoint) from prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint > mail_toflowpoint and prd_code =p2.prd_code) and upper(app_status) ='OP'
and p2.prd_flowpoint = (select min(prd_flowpoint) from prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint > mail_toflowpoint and prd_code =p2.prd_code) and upper(app_status) ='PA'
and p2.prd_flowpoint = (select min(prd_flowpoint) from prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint >= mail_toflowpoint and prd_code =p2.prd_code) and upper(app_status) = 'PR'

select ^ from organisations,applications, loandetails where org_code =app_orgcode and app_no =loan_appno and app_delflag!= 'Y' and org_code in (^) and upper(app_status) like upper('_^') and TO_DATE(to_char(^,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and upper(app_loantype) ='^' group by org_name,app_status,app_orglevel,LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH

select ^ from organisations,applications, loandetails,users where org_code =usr_orgcode and app_no =loan_appno and ^=usr_id and app_delflag!= 'Y' and org_code in (^) and upper(app_status) like upper('_^') and TO_DATE(to_char(^,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and upper(app_loantype) ='^' group by org_name,app_status
select prd_org_level from organisations where org_code = '^'
select org_scode from organisations where org_code in(^)

select p1.prd_code,prd_desc,prd_catid from products p1,prd_used p2,prd_category where p1.prd_code = p2.prd_code and p1.prd_catid = cat_id and p2.prd_org_scode like '%^%' and upper(prd_type) like '^%' and upper(prd_saveflag)='C'

select distinct products.prd_code,prd_desc from products,prd_used,organisations,applications where products.prd_code =prd_used.prd_code and upper(prd_type) like '^' and upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and org_code = app_orgcode and org_code like '^%' and products.prd_code =app_prdcode

select ^ from organisations,applications, loandetails,products,prd_category where org_code =app_orgcode and app_no =loan_appno and products.prd_code=app_prdcode and prd_catid = cat_id and app_delflag!= 'Y' and app_orgcode in ('^') and app_prdcode in (^) and TO_DATE(to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and upper(app_loantype) ='^' group by org_name,app_status,prd_desc,cat_name

select distinct ^ from applications, per_demographics, perapplicant where app_no = demo_appno and demo_appid =perapp_id and upper(app_loantype) ='P' and app_orgcode in (^) and (upper(app_delflag) != 'Y' or app_delflag is null) and upper(app_status) not like '_R' order by 1

select app_no, perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), prd_desc, perapp_address1, perapp_address2, perapp_city, perapp_state, perapp_zip, perapp_phone, perapp_email, loan_modintrate, loan_amtreqd, app_status, perapp_lname from per_demographics, perapplicant, organisations, products, prd_interest, applications left outer join loandetails on app_no =loan_appno where perapp_id = demo_appid and demo_appno=app_no and org_code = app_orgcode and app_prdcode =products.prd_code and products.prd_code = prd_interest.prd_code and upper(app_loantype) ='P' and app_orgcode in (^)

select app_no, perapp_fname, perapp_lname, perapp_panno, c1.cat_name, c2.cat_name, prd_desc, prd_rng_from, prd_rng_to, TO_CHAR(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), app_status from applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category c1, prd_category c2 where app_no=demo_appno and demo_appid = perapp_id and app_prdcode=products.prd_code and c1.cat_id = (select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=products.prd_catid) and products.prd_catid = c2.cat_id and upper(app_loantype)='P' and (upper(app_delflag) != 'Y' or app_delflag is null) and app_orgcode = '^' ^
select bank_serialno, bank_name, bank_accntno, bank_accnttype, bank_balance, bank_apptype from per_bank, applications where app_no = bank_appno and upper(app_loantype)='P' and app_no = '^'
select stoc_serialno, stoc_desc, stoc_shareval, stoc_noofshares, stoc_applnt from per_stocks, applications where app_no = stoc_appno and upper(app_loantype)='P' and app_no = '^'

select insu_serialno, insu_policyno, insu_surrenderval, insu_agencyname, insu_applnt insu_agencyphone from per_insurance,applications where app_no = insu_appno and upper(app_loantype)='P' and app_no = '^'
select prop_serialno,prop_desc,prop_purchaseval,prop_marketval,prop_applnt from per_properties,applications where app_no = prop_appno and upper(app_loantype)='P' and app_no = '^'

SELECT COUNT(loandetails.loan_appno) AS noofloan, SUM(loandetails.loan_appamt) AS totloan, organisations.org_name, (select cat_name from prd_category where cat_id=(select cat_parent from prd_category where prd_category.cat_id=29))||-||(select cat_name from prd_category where cat_id=29) as cat_name, prd_category.cat_id,products.prd_type FROM loandetails INNER JOIN applications ON loandetails.loan_appno = applications.app_no INNER JOIN organisations ON applications.app_orgcode = organisations.org_code INNER JOIN products ON applications.app_prdcode = products.prd_code INNER JOIN prd_category ON products.prd_catid = prd_category.cat_id WHERE (applications.app_loantype = 'c') AND (applications.app_delflag = 'n') AND (upper(applications.app_status) = 'PA') GROUP BY applications.app_orgcode, organisations.org_name,prd_category.cat_name,prd_category.cat_id,products.prd_type

SELECT org_scode, perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname AS fullname, perapp_category AS Category , perapp_panno, perapp_address1 || ' ' || perapp_address2 || ' ' || perapp_city || ' ' || perapp_state AS address, perapp_zip AS zip, perapp_phone AS phone, perapp_mobile AS mobile, perapp_yrsinpresadd AS YearsOfResi , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(perapp_dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS dob, MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE( perapp_dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'))/12 AS age, perapp_permadd1 || ' ' || perapp_permadd2 || ' ' || perapp_permcity || ' ' || perapp_permstate AS permadd, perapp_permzip AS perzip, perapp_permphone AS perphone, perapp_email AS email, perapp_sex AS Gender , perapp_marstat AS marstatus , perapp_depend AS depend, perapp_childnum AS child, perapp_education AS education , perapp_bankaccno, perapp_bankacctype, peremp_name AS orgname, peremp_design, peremp_address1 || ' ' || peremp_address2 || ' ' || peremp_city || ' ' || peremp_state AS perempadd, peremp_phone, peremp_fax, peremp_zip, perapp_employment AS empemployment , peremp_yresemp AS worksince, peremp_retage, peremp_yresemp, perinc_monsalary, perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome, perinc_rent, perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome, perinc_autoloanexp, perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp, perinc_secdesc, perinc_selfincometype, perinc_selfyrsprof, perinc_others, perinc_selfincometype AS perincselfincometype , loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_modintrate, perinc_autoloanexp + perinc_rentexp AS monthlyexpenses, perinc_autoloanexp, perinc_rent + perinc_agriculture AS familyincome, perapp_yrsinpresadd, perinc_takehome, loan_reqterms, perapp_employment, peremp_email, perapp_typeofprof AS prof , perinc_monsalary, peremp_department, loan_amtreqd,loan_purposeofloan, perapp_status AS status, perapp_status AS dd,TO_CHAR(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS appdate,s.loan_noofinstallment,h.loan_inttype,h.loan_emi, f.peremp_servleft,loan_fileno FROM applications a, organisations b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d, peremployer f, perincexpenses g, loandetails h,per_loan_secure s WHERE a.app_orgcode = b.org_code AND a.app_no = '^' AND c.demo_appno = a.app_no AND c.demo_appid = d .perapp_id AND s.loan_appno=a.app_no AND f.peremp_id = c.demo_appid AND g.perinc_id = c.demo_appid AND h.loan_appno = a.app_no AND c.demo_type='a'
select liab_company,liab_accountno from per_liabilities a,applications b where a.liab_appno= b.app_no and b.app_no='^' and UPPER(liab_loantype) = UPPER('LC')

select distinct perapp_title||' '||perapp_fname as coappname , perapp_address1||' '||perapp_address2||' '||perapp_city as coappaddress, perapp_employment,perapp_phone,perapp_email,perapp_panno,demo_relation, demo_type,perapp_employment,i.perinc_agriculture,i.perinc_rentexp,i.perinc_otherexp, i.perinc_autoloanexp,i.perinc_monsalary,i.perinc_others,i.perinc_rent, (i.perinc_otherincome-i.perinc_takehome+i.perinc_monsalary) as netincome,e.peremp_yresemp, e.peremp_name ||' '||e.peremp_address1||' '||e.peremp_address2||' '||e.peremp_city||' '||e.peremp_state as emp, e.peremp_servleft from perapplicant a,per_demographics,perincexpenses i,peremployer e where a.perapp_id=demo_appid and i.perinc_id=a.perapp_id and demo_appid=i.perinc_id and e.peremp_id= a.perapp_id and e.peremp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and UPPER(demo_type)=UPPER('^')
select (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome) as perinc_monsalary from perincexpenses,per_demographics where perinc_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and UPPER(demo_type)=UPPER('^') order by demo_appid

select NVL(max(aset_prinsno),0)+1 as aset_prinsno from ssi_prinassetliabilities

select ssi_prinfname ||' '|| ssi_prinlname || ' ' || ssi_prinmname as ssi_prinname ,ssi_prinid from ssi_prindemographics where ssi_appno='^'
select terms_termdesc from com_termscond where terms_facid = ^ and terms_factype = ^ and terms_appno = '^'
select org_head from organisations where org_code = (select usr_orgcode from users where usr_id = '^')

select disc_perpartyanncap, disc_grouplimit, disc_perptyfundbased, disc_perptynonfund, disc_perptyunsecured, disc_adhocsanclimit, disc_adhocmonths, disc_adhocunsecured, disc_guarantee, disc_workingcapital, disc_termloan, disc_lgmargin, disc_lgwomargin, disc_lc, disc_bankdeposits, disc_lcpb from discretepowers where disc_grpid = (select grouplimitslist from users,groups where usr_grpid = grp_id and usr_id ='^')

select comapp_group,facility_for,sum(facility_existing) as existing, sum(facility_proposed) as proposed,sum(facility_sanctioned) as sanctioned from facilities,facility_master,comapplicant where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0 and facility_category='R' group by comapp_group,facility_for

select b.facility_for, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_headid, facility_sancamt, facility_sancstatus, a.facility_code, facility_category, facility_months from facilities, facility_master a, facility_master b where b.facility_catid= a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid=facilities.facility_id and a.facility_parent=facility_headid and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0 and facility_sancstatus='A'

select b.facility_for, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_headid, facility_sancamt, facility_sancstatus, f.facility_code, facility_category, facility_months,facility_sno,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as desc1,facility_typefor from facilities f, facility_master a, facility_master b,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_DISPLAYDESC and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_catid= a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid=f.facility_id and a.facility_parent=facility_headid and facility_appno='^' and facility_sancstatus='A'

select comapp_group,facility_for,facility_existing facility_proposed,facility_headid from facilities,facility_master,comapplicant where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0 and facility_category='A'

select facility_for,sum(facility_existing) as existing, sum(facility_proposed) as proposed,sum(facility_sanctioned) as sanctioned from facilities,facility_master,comapplicant,exposure where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_createdate in (select max(app_createdate) from applications,com_demographics where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid in (select comapp_id from comapplicant where comapp_group !=0 and comapp_group = (select comapp_group from comapplicant,com_demographics where comapp_id = demo_comappid and demo_appno='^')) group by app_createdate)) and facility_group=0 and comapp_group (+)= exp_id group by facility_for

select facility_for, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_sancamt from facilities, facility_master, comapplicant,exposure where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_createdate in (select max(app_createdate) from applications,com_demographics where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid in (select comapp_id from comapplicant where comapp_group !=0 and comapp_group = (select comapp_group from comapplicant,com_demographics where comapp_id = demo_comappid and demo_appno='^')) group by app_createdate)) and facility_group=0 and facility_sancstatus='A' and comapp_group (+)= exp_id

select sum(loan_appamt) as approvedamt from applications,loandetails,com_demographics where app_no =loan_appno and demo_appno = app_no and demo_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_processdate in( select max(app_processdate) from applications,com_demographics where app_no =demo_appno and demo_comappid = (select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='N'))) and app_approvedby = '^' and (upper(app_status) ='PA' or upper(app_status) ='CA') and to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') between '^' and '^'
select comapp_group, comapp_indcode, demo_comappid from comapplicant, com_demographics where comapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_appno='^'

select sum(loan_appamt) as approvedamt from applications,loandetails where app_no =loan_appno and app_approvedby = '^' and upper(app_status) ='PA' and to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') between '^' and '^' and (upper(app_loantype) = 'P' or upper(app_loantype) = 'A')

select sum(loan_appamt) as approvedamt from applications,loandetails,com_demographics where app_no =loan_appno and demo_appno = app_no and demo_appno in(select demo_appno from com_demographics where demo_comappid in (select comapp_id from comapplicant where comapp_group =(select comapp_group from comapplicant,com_demographics where comapp_id = demo_comappid and demo_appno='^') )) and app_approvedby = '^' and (upper(app_status) ='PA' or upper(app_status) ='CA') and to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') between '^' and '^'
update loandetails set loan_appamt=?,LOAN_SECURITYCOLLATERAL=? where loan_appno=?

select facility_headid, (select facility_for from facility_master where facility_catid = facility_headid) as facility_for, sum(facility_existing) as existing,sum(facility_proposed) as proposed from facilities,facility_master,comapplicant where facility_id = facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and borrower_id =(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' ) and facility_group=0 and facility_code = 'EC' group by facility_headid,facility_for

select facility_for,facility_months,sum(facility_existing) as existing, sum(facility_proposed) as proposed,sum(facility_sanctioned) as sanctioned from facilities,facility_master,comapplicant where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0 and facility_category='A' group by facility_for ,facility_months

select facility_for, facility_months, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_sancamt from facilities, facility_master, comapplicant where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0 and facility_category='A' and facility_sancstatus='A'

select max(facility_months) as facility_fmonths from facilities, facility_master, comapplicant where facility_headid =facility_catid and comapp_id = borrower_id and facility_appno='^' AND facility_group=0 and facility_category='A' order by facility_for, facility_category desc

select sum(facility_existing) as existing,sum(facility_proposed) as proposed,sum(facility_sancamt) as sanctioned from com_security,facilities where security_facility_id = facility_id and security_facility_headid = facility_headid and facility_appno = security_appno and facility_group=0 and facility_sancstatus='A' and upper(security_securedopt) ='N' and security_appno='^'
update facilities set facility_sanctioned = facility_proposed where facility_appno=?

select prd_type,prd_staffprd,prd_staff_maxterm_prin,prd_staff_maxterm_intr,prd_purpose,prd_deposittype,prd_depositloanfor,PRD_WHETHERAGRI,prd_sharetype,PRD_APPLICABLEFOR,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI,PRD_LOANTYPE from applications,products where prd_code = app_prdcode and app_no='^'

select demo_relation from per_demographics where demo_appid = '^' and demo_appno = '^'

SELECT SUM(bank_balance)AS bankbal, (SUM(stoc_shareval * stoc_noofshares) )AS shares,SUM(prop_marketval)AS perimmovprop, SUM(insu_surrenderval)AS insurance ,SUM(prop_marketval)AS permovprop,SUM(liab_balance)AS totlia FROM per_stocks ps,per_insurance pi,per_properties pp,per_liabilities pl,per_bank pb WHERE pi.insu_applnt='^' AND pi.insu_appno='^' AND ps.stoc_applnt='^' AND ps.stoc_appno='^' AND pp.prop_applnt='^' AND pp.prop_appno='^' AND prop_assettype = '^' AND prop_appno='^' AND pl.liab_applnt='^' AND pl.liab_appno='^' AND bank_appno='^' AND bank_apptype='^'
SELECT SUM(bank_balance)AS bankbal from per_bank where bank_appno='^' AND bank_apptype='^'
SELECT (SUM(stoc_shareval * stoc_noofshares) )AS shares from per_stocks where stoc_appno='^' AND stoc_applnt='^'
SELECT SUM(prop_marketval)AS perimmovprop from per_properties where prop_appno='^' AND prop_applnt='^' AND UPPER(prop_assettype) in ('2','3','4','5','16','14')
SELECT SUM(prop_marketval)AS permovprop from per_properties where prop_appno='^' AND prop_applnt='^' AND UPPER(prop_assettype) not in ('2','3','4','5','16','14')
SELECT SUM(insu_surrenderval)AS insurance from per_insurance where insu_appno='^' AND insu_applnt='^'
SELECT SUM(liab_balance)AS totlia from per_liabilities where liab_appno='^' AND liab_applnt='^'

select * from audit_trial where page_id=(select page_desc from page_master where page_id=^) and key_id='^' and action_date between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')
insert into audit_trial(page_id, usr_id, client_ip_addr, key_id, action_date, action_newdata, action_type) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)
insert into audit_trial(page_id, usr_id, client_ip_addr, key_id, action_date, action_olddata, action_newdata, action_type) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)
insert into audit_trial(page_id, usr_id, client_ip_addr, key_id, action_date, action_olddata, action_newdata, action_type,action_data) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?)

select * from audit_trial where page_id in (select page_id from page_master where module_name='^') and ^ and action_date between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') order by action_date

SELECT at.page_id, at.usr_id, at.client_ip_addr, at.key_id, to_char(at.action_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as action_date, at.action_data, at.action_type, pm.page_desc,pm.page_name, users.usr_fname, users.usr_mname, users.usr_lname FROM audit_trial at INNER JOIN page_master pm ON at.page_id = pm.page_id INNER JOIN users ON trim(at.usr_id) = trim(users.usr_id) WHERE (at.page_id IN (SELECT page_id FROM page_master WHERE module_name like '^%')) AND ^ ORDER BY at.page_id,at.action_date

SELECT at.page_id, at.usr_id, at.client_ip_addr, at.key_id, to_char(at.action_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as action_date, at.action_olddata,at.action_newdata, at.action_type,at.action_data, pm.page_desc, pm.page_name, users.usr_fname, users.usr_mname, users.usr_lname, pm.page_type FROM audit_trial at INNER JOIN page_master pm ON at.page_id = pm.page_id INNER JOIN users ON trim(at.usr_id) = trim(users.usr_id) WHERE (at.page_id IN (SELECT page_id FROM page_master WHERE page_shortcode='^')) AND ^ ORDER BY at.page_id,at.action_date

select ssi_appendix2_appno from ssi_appendix2_structure where ssi_appendix2_appno='^'

insert into ssi_machinerydetails(ssi_machineryappno,ssi_machinerysno,ssi_machinerylist,ssi_machinerytype, ssi_machineryname,ssi_machinerycategory,ssi_machinerymanufacturername,ssi_machineryacquisitiondate,ssi_machineryexpecteddate, ssi_machineryinvoiceprice,ssi_machineryestimatedexp,ssi_machinerytotalcost,ssi_machineryelectricreq) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?)

update ssi_machinerydetails set ssi_machinerylist=?,ssi_machinerytype=?,ssi_machineryname=?, ssi_machinerycategory=?,ssi_machinerymanufacturername=?,ssi_machineryacquisitiondate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ssi_machineryexpecteddate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ssi_machineryinvoiceprice=?,ssi_machineryestimatedexp=?,ssi_machinerytotalcost=?,ssi_machineryelectricreq=? where ssi_machineryappno=? and ssi_machinerysno=?
delete from ssi_machinerydetails where ssi_machineryappno=? and ssi_machinerysno=?

select ssi_machinerysno, ssi_machinerylist,ssi_machinerytype,ssi_machineryname,ssi_machinerycategory, ssi_machinerymanufacturername,to_char(ssi_machineryacquisitiondate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as ssi_machineryacquisitiondate, to_char(ssi_machineryexpecteddate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as ssi_machineryexpecteddate, ssi_machineryinvoiceprice,ssi_machineryestimatedexp,ssi_machinerytotalcost,ssi_machineryelectricreq from ssi_machinerydetails where ssi_machineryappno='^'

select ssi_machinerysno, ssi_machinerylist,ssi_machinerytype,ssi_machineryname,ssi_machinerycategory, ssi_machinerymanufacturername,to_char(ssi_machineryacquisitiondate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as ssi_machineryacquisitiondate, to_char(ssi_machineryexpecteddate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as ssi_machineryexpecteddate, ssi_machineryinvoiceprice,ssi_machineryestimatedexp,ssi_machinerytotalcost,ssi_machineryelectricreq from ssi_machinerydetails where ssi_machinerysno='^' and ssi_machineryappno='^'

delete from ins_security where com_insfacno = ? and inssecurity_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY')
select NVL(prd_type,'C') as prd_type, app_prdcode,PRD_LOANTYPE,prd_desc from applications,products where prd_code = app_prdcode and app_no='^'

select prd_flowpoint,wrk_flowname,prd_maxclass,prd_function from prd_workflow,workflow where prd_code=(select prd_code from products where prd_type = 'C' and (select loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^') between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to) and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_workid=wrk_flowid order by wrk_flowid

select prd_skip,prd_approval from prd_authority where prd_code= (select prd_code from products where prd_type = 'C' and (select loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^') between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to)

select mail_toflowpoint,to_char(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), to_char(dateadd(hour,prd_duration,mail_date),'DD/MM/YYYY')||' '|| convert(varchar(5),dateadd(hour,prd_duration,mail_date),108),prd_maxclass from appmailbox,prd_workflow where mail_appno='^' and mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox where mail_appno='^') and prd_flowpoint=mail_toflowpoint and prd_code=(select prd_code from products where prd_type = 'C' and (select loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^') between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to)

select prd_maxclass,to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_char(dateadd(hour,prd_duration,app_createdate),'DD/MM/YYYY')||' '|| convert(varchar(5),dateadd(hour,prd_duration,app_createdate),108) from applications,prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint=1 and prd_code= (select prd_code from products where prd_type = 'C' and (select loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^') between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to) and app_no='^'

select prd_type,prd_rng_from,prd_rng_to from products where prd_code =(select prd_code from products where prd_type = 'C' and (select loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^') between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to) and prd_term=^

select comapp_id,comapp_companyname,comapp_companyid ,comapp_comtype ,ind_name from comapplicant , industry_master where comapp_companyid like '^' and comapp_indcode =ind_no and comapp_companyname like '^%' and comapp_org_code like '^%' order by comapp_comtype,comapp_companyname

select distinct to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY') as fin_year from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='^' and TO_DATE(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY') ^ TO_DATE(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY')and year(fin_year) = year(to_date(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
select floor(months_between(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY'),sysdate)) as dates from dual

select p.prd_code as prdcode,c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom,p.prd_rng_to as rangeto from prd_category c,prd_category c1,products p, prd_authority p1,prd_interest p2 ,prd_used where p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and Upper(prd_type) like 'P%' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and p.prd_code=p1.prd_code and p.prd_code=p2.prd_code and p.prd_code = prd_used.prd_code and p.prd_code='^' and prd_renew !='y' order by c.cat_name
