select org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate,VALUERS_SANCREFNO,TO_CHAR(VALUERS_EXPDATEOFSANC,'DD/MM/YYYY') as VALUERS_EXPDATEOFSANC,VALUERS_DETOFSECDEP,TO_CHAR(VALUERS_JEWAPPDATEOFAGR,'DD/MM/YYYY') as VALUERS_JEWAPPDATEOFAGR, city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where valuer_cbsid ='^' and valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city

select distinct org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate ,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR(valuers_expdateofsanc,'DD/MM/YYYY')as valuers_expdateofsanc,valuers_detofsecdep,TO_CHAR(valuers_jewappdateofagr, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city order by valuers_name

select distinct org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate ,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR(valuers_expdateofsanc,'DD/MM/YYYY')as valuers_expdateofsanc,valuers_detofsecdep,TO_CHAR(valuers_jewappdateofagr, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where org_code in(^) and valuers_active='1' and valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city and VALUERS_EXPDATEOFSANC >= TRIM(sysdate) order by valuers_name
select design_name from valuersmaster, designationmaster where org_code ='^' and valuers_code ='^' and design_code='^' and valuers_design = design_code

select distinct org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR(valuers_expdateofsanc,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_expdateofsanc, valuers_detofsecdep,to_char(valuers_jewappdateofagr,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_jewappdateofagr,valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where upper(valuers_name) like upper('%^%') and valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city order by valuers_name

select distinct org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR(valuers_expdateofsanc,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_expdateofsanc, valuers_detofsecdep,to_char(valuers_jewappdateofagr,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_jewappdateofagr,valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where org_code in (^) and valuers_active='1' and upper(valuers_name) like upper('%^%') and valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city order by valuers_name and VALUERS_EXPDATEOFSANC >= TRIM(sysdate) order by valuers_name
select NVL(max(coopsoc_code) + 1 ,1) as maxid from coopsoc_master where org_code = '^'
select NVL(max(coopsoc_code), 0) as maxid from coopsoc_master where org_code = '^'

insert into coopsoc_master (org_code, coopsoc_code, coopsoc_no, coopsoc_name, coopsoc_address1, coopsoc_address2, coopsoc_address3, coopsoc_city, coopsoc_state, coopsoc_pincode, coopsoc_country, coopsoc_off_phoneno, coopsoc_off_faxno, coopsoc_res_phoneno, coopsoc_res_mobno, coopsoc_contper, coopsoc_contper_phmobno, coopsoc_email, approvedflag, approvedby, coopsoc_blacklist, coopsoc_blacklistdate) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'))

update coopsoc_master set org_code =?, coopsoc_code =?, coopsoc_no =?, coopsoc_name =?, coopsoc_address1 =?, coopsoc_address2 =?, coopsoc_address3 =?, coopsoc_city =?, coopsoc_state =?, coopsoc_pincode =?, coopsoc_country =?, coopsoc_off_phoneno =?, coopsoc_off_faxno =?, coopsoc_res_phoneno =?, coopsoc_res_mobno =?, coopsoc_contper =?, coopsoc_contper_phmobno =?, coopsoc_email =?, approvedflag =?, approvedby =?, coopsoc_blacklist=?, coopsoc_blacklistdate =TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY') where org_code =? and coopsoc_code =?

select org_code, coopsoc_code, coopsoc_no, coopsoc_name, coopsoc_address1, coopsoc_address2, coopsoc_address3, coopsoc_city, coopsoc_state, coopsoc_pincode, coopsoc_country, coopsoc_off_phoneno, coopsoc_off_faxno, coopsoc_res_phoneno, coopsoc_res_mobno, coopsoc_contper, coopsoc_contper_phmobno, coopsoc_email, approvedflag, approvedby, coopsoc_blacklist, TO_CHAR( coopsoc_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as coopsoc_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name from coopsoc_master,laps_cities,laps_states where org_code ='^' and coopsoc_code ='^' and state_code(+)=coopsoc_state and city_code(+)=coopsoc_city

select org_code, coopsoc_code, coopsoc_no, coopsoc_name, coopsoc_address1, coopsoc_address2, coopsoc_address3, coopsoc_city, coopsoc_state, coopsoc_pincode, coopsoc_country, coopsoc_off_phoneno, coopsoc_off_faxno, coopsoc_res_phoneno, coopsoc_res_mobno, coopsoc_contper, coopsoc_contper_phmobno, coopsoc_email, approvedflag, approvedby, coopsoc_blacklist, TO_CHAR( coopsoc_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as coopsoc_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name from coopsoc_master,laps_cities,laps_states where org_code ='^' and state_code(+)=coopsoc_state and city_code(+)=coopsoc_city

select org_code, coopsoc_code, coopsoc_no, coopsoc_name, coopsoc_address1, coopsoc_address2, coopsoc_address3, coopsoc_city, coopsoc_state, coopsoc_pincode, coopsoc_country, coopsoc_off_phoneno, coopsoc_off_faxno, coopsoc_res_phoneno, coopsoc_res_mobno, coopsoc_contper, coopsoc_contper_phmobno, coopsoc_email, approvedflag, approvedby, coopsoc_blacklist, TO_CHAR( coopsoc_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as coopsoc_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name from coopsoc_master,laps_cities,laps_states where org_code ='^' and upper(coopsoc_name) like upper('%^%') and state_code(+)=coopsoc_state and city_code(+)=coopsoc_city order by coopsoc_name
select org_scode,org_name from organisations where org_code like '^%' order by org_name
select perapp_employment from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'

select sum(perinc_yearsalary) as perinc_yearsalary, sum(perinc_yeardeduction) as perinc_yeardeduction, sum(perinc_yearotherdeduc) as perinc_yearotherdeduc, sum(perinc_secincome) as perinc_secincome, sum(perinc_takehome) as perinc_takehome,sum(perinc_deduction) as perinc_deduction from perincexpenses,per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_appid=perinc_id and demo_type in ('a','c') and demo_includeincome='2'

SELECT perapp_employment, perapp_title, TO_CHAR(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perapp_dob, perapp_status, perinc_yearsalary, peremp_yearsinbuss, floor(nvl(months_between(to_date(peremp_retdate), to_date(sysdate)),0)) as serviceleft, perinc_secincome, perinc_takehome, indinfo_is_staff, indinfo_exservice_man, indinfo_service_years,perapp_constitutionnew,perapp_oldid from perapplicant left join perincexpenses on perapp_id =PERINC_ID left join peremployer on peremp_id =perapp_id left join individual_info on indinfo_appid =perapp_id WHERE perapp_id='^'
select perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome as netincome, (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome)*12 as netincome1 from perincexpenses where perinc_id='^'

select (perapp_title||' '||perapp_fname) as applicantname, demo_appid, (perinc_monsalary-(perinc_deduction+perinc_otherdeduction))+perinc_others as netincome, perinc_domesticexp, (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome)*12 as netincome1, perinc_othermondesc from per_demographics, perincexpenses, perapplicant where demo_appno='^' and demo_type in('C') and perinc_id=demo_appid and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_includeincome='2' order by demo_type

insert into perincexpenses(perinc_id,perinc_monsalary,perinc_takehome,perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture,perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_rentexp,perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc,perinc_selfincometype,perinc_selfyrsprof,perinc_applnt,perinc_others,perinc_othermondesc,perinc_annualtax) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select sum((perinc_monsalary)+(perinc_otherincome)) - sum(perinc_takehome) from perincexpenses where perinc_id ='^'

select perinc_monsalary*12 as gross,(perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome)*12 as net, (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome)*12 as turnover from perincexpenses where perinc_id in (SELECT demo_appid FROM per_demographics WHERE demo_appno = '^' and upper(demo_type)='^' )

select perinc_monsalary*12 as gross,(perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome)*12 as net, (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome)*12 as turnover from perincexpenses where perinc_id in (SELECT demo_appid FROM per_demographics WHERE demo_appno = '^' and upper(demo_type) ='C' )
select perinc_id,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_monsalary, perinc_takehome,perinc_otherincome,perinc_otherincome from perincexpenses where perinc_id ='^'

SELECT org_scode, perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname AS fullname, Category = CASE perapp_category WHEN 1 THEN 'SC and Minority' WHEN 2 THEN 'SC' WHEN 3 THEN 'ST' WHEN 4 THEN 'OBC' WHEN 5 THEN 'Others' WHEN 6 THEN 'Minority' ELSE 'Not Given' END, perapp_panno, perapp_address1 || ' ' || perapp_address2 || ' ' || perapp_city || ' ' || perapp_state AS address, perapp_zip AS zip, perapp_phone AS phone, perapp_mobile AS mobile, YearsOfResi = CASE perapp_yrsinpresadd WHEN 1 THEN 'Greater than 3 years' WHEN 2 THEN 'Less than 2years' WHEN 3 THEN 'Less than 1 year' ELSE 'Not Given' END, to_char( perapp_dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS dob, datediff(mm,TO_DATE( perapp_dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'))/12 AS age, perapp_permadd1 || ' ' || perapp_permadd2 || ' ' || perapp_permcity || ' ' || perapp_permstate AS permadd, perapp_permzip AS perzip, perapp_permphone AS perphone, perapp_email AS email, Gender = CASE perapp_sex WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'Not Given' END, marstatus = CASE perapp_marstat WHEN 1 THEN 'Married' WHEN 2 THEN 'single' WHEN 3 THEN 'Divorce' WHEN 4 THEN 'Widowed' ELSE 'Not given' END, perapp_depend AS depend, perapp_childnum AS child, education = CASE perapp_education WHEN 1 THEN 'Postgratuate' WHEN 2 THEN 'Graduate' WHEN 3 THEN 'Less than Graduate' ELSE 'Not Given' END, perapp_bankaccno, perapp_bankacctype, peremp_name AS orgname, empdesig = CASE peremp_design WHEN 1 THEN 'Executive' WHEN 2 THEN 'Managerial' WHEN 3 THEN 'Clerk' WHEN 4 THEN 'Others' ELSE 'No' END, peremp_design, peremp_address1 || ' ' || peremp_address2 || ' ' || peremp_city || ' ' || peremp_state AS perempadd, peremp_phone, peremp_fax, peremp_zip, empemployment = CASE perapp_employment WHEN 1 THEN 'Salarised In Approved Company' WHEN 2 THEN 'Salaried in Private Sector' WHEN 3 THEN 'Salaried in PSU' WHEN 4 THEN 'Professional' WHEN 5 THEN 'Private Ltd' WHEN 6 THEN 'Self Employed' When 7 Then 'House Wife' ELSE 'No' END, peremp_yresemp AS worksince, peremp_retage, peremp_yresemp, perinc_monsalary, perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc,perinc_selfincometype, perinc_selfyrsprof,perinc_others, perincselfincometype = CASE perinc_selfincometype WHEN '1' THEN 'Private ltd' WHEN '2' THEN 'Partnership' WHEN '3' THEN 'proprietorship' WHEN '4' THEN 'others' ELSE 'Not Given' END, loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_modintrate, perinc_autoloanexp + perinc_rentexp AS monthlyexpenses, perinc_autoloanexp, perinc_rent + perinc_agriculture AS familyincome, perapp_yrsinpresadd, perinc_takehome, loan_reqterms, perapp_employment, peremp_email, prof = CASE perapp_typeofprof WHEN 1 THEN 'Doctor' WHEN 2 THEN 'Architect' WHEN 3 THEN 'CA' WHEN 4 THEN 'MBA' WHEN 5 THEN 'Engineer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Lawyer' WHEN 7 THEN 'Others' ELSE 'Others' END, perinc_monsalary, peremp_department, loan_amtreqd,loan_purposeofloan FROM applications a, organisations b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d, peremployer f, perincexpenses g, loandetails h WHERE a.app_orgcode = b.org_code AND a.app_no = '^' AND c.demo_appno = a.app_no AND c.demo_appid = d .perapp_id AND f.peremp_id = c.demo_appid AND g.perinc_id = c.demo_appid AND h.loan_appno = a.app_no AND c.demo_type='^'

select perinc_id, perinc_yearsalary, perinc_yeardeduction, perinc_yearotherdeduc, perinc_secincome, perinc_takehome, demo_type, perapp_fname from perapplicant, per_demographics,perincexpenses where demo_appno='^' and perapp_id=demo_appid and perinc_id=demo_appid order by demo_type

select (perapp_title||' '||perapp_fname) as applicantname, perinc_id,perinc_monsalary,perinc_monsalary*12 as grossincome,perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_domesticexp,perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc,perinc_selfincometype, perinc_selfyrsprof,perinc_others,demo_type, perapp_fname as appname,peremp_yresemp, perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome as netincome, (perinc_monsalary-perinc_takehome+perinc_otherincome)*12 as netincome1, (perinc_monsalary-(perinc_deduction+perinc_otherdeduction))+perinc_others+perinc_rent+perinc_agriculture as monthlyincome, (perinc_monsalary-(perinc_deduction+perinc_otherdeduction))*12 as yearnetincome, perinc_domesticexp, perapp_id from perapplicant, per_demographics,perincexpenses,peremployer where demo_appno='^' and demo_type in('A') and perapp_id=demo_appid and peremp_id=perapp_id and perinc_id=demo_appid order by demo_type
select (perinc_monsalary-perinc_deduction) as applicantnetsalary from perincexpenses where perinc_id='^'
select perinc_itreturn, perinc_assetandliab from perincexpenses where perinc_id ='^'
select perinc_proof,perinc_yearsalary,perinc_year1_income,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from perincexpenses where perinc_id ='^'
select peremp_servleft, peremp_category, peremp_yearsinbuss,peremp_servleftmon,PEREMP_SALARYROUTED from peremployer where peremp_id='^'
select Sno,year1,year2,year3 from per_fin_stat where appf_id='^'
insert into per_fin_stat (appf_id,Sno,year1,year2,year3) values (?,?,?,?,?)
delete from per_fin_stat where appf_id=?
delete from per_fin where app_id=?
insert into per_fin (app_id,fin_year,fin_type,Sno) values (?,?,?,?)
select fin_year,fin_type from per_fin where app_id= '^'
select design_code, design_name from designationmaster where upper(design_name)='^'
select NVL(max(ref_id),0) as maxid from per_referance where perapp_id ='^'
select NVL(max(ref_id),0)+1 as maxid from per_referance where perapp_id ='^'
insert into per_referance (ref_id,perapp_id,ref_name,ref_design,ref_phoneno,ref_oth_details) values(?,?,?,?, ?,?)
insert into per_referance (ref_id,perapp_id,ref_name,ref_design,ref_phoneno,ref_oth_details) values(?,?,?,?, ?,?)
Update per_referance set ref_name=?,ref_design=?,ref_phoneno=?,ref_oth_details=? where perapp_id=? and ref_id=?
select ref_id,perapp_id,ref_name,ref_design,ref_phoneno,ref_oth_details from per_referance where perapp_id ='^' and ref_id='^'
select ref_id,perapp_id,ref_name,ref_design,ref_phoneno,ref_oth_details from per_referance where perapp_id ='^'
delete from per_referance where perapp_id=? and ref_id=?
select ref_name,ref_design,ref_phoneno,ref_oth_details from per_referance where perapp_id='^'

select perapp_passissue, TO_CHAR( perapp_passexpiry, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_passexpiry, perapp_passport, TO_CHAR( perapp_passissuedt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_passissuedt from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'

insert into perapplicant_nri (appnri_id, appnri_visaupto, appnri_visadesc, appnri_oversea_add, appnri_emp_cont, appnri_terms_cont, appnri_contractdt, appnri_balaprd_cont, appnri_employnat, appnri_prov_renew, appnri_rene_det, appnri_wl_flg, appnri_wl_no, appnri_issuedt, appnri_issauth, appnri_vaildupto, appnri_term_wl, appnri_passport_no, appnri_passport_issuedby, appnri_passport_issuedt, appnri_passport_expirydt) values (?, TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?, TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?,TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

update perapplicant_nri set appnri_visaupto =TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appnri_visadesc = ?, appnri_oversea_add =?, appnri_emp_cont =?, appnri_terms_cont =?, appnri_contractdt =TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appnri_balaprd_cont =?, appnri_employnat =?, appnri_prov_renew =?, appnri_rene_det =?, appnri_wl_flg =?, appnri_wl_no =?, appnri_issuedt =TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appnri_issauth =?, appnri_vaildupto =TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), appnri_term_wl =? where appnri_id = ?

select appnri_id, TO_CHAR( appnri_visaupto, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as appnri_visaupto, appnri_visadesc, TO_CHAR( appnri_pexpirydt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as appnri_pexpirydt, appnri_oversea_add, appnri_emp_cont, appnri_terms_cont, TO_CHAR( appnri_contractdt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as appnri_contractdt, appnri_balaprd_cont, appnri_employnat, appnri_prov_renew, appnri_rene_det, appnri_wl_flg, appnri_wl_no, TO_CHAR( appnri_issuedt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as appnri_issuedt, appnri_issauth, TO_CHAR( appnri_vaildupto, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as appnri_vaildupto, appnri_term_wl, appnri_passport_issuedby, TO_CHAR( appnri_passport_expirydt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_passexpiry, appnri_passport_no, TO_CHAR( appnri_passport_issuedt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_passissuedt from perapplicant_nri where appnri_id = '^'
delete from perapplicant_nri where appnri_id = ?
select appnri_oversea_add from perapplicant_nri where appnri_id='^'
select prd_term,prd_desc,prd_staffprd from products where prd_code='^'

select distinct(p.prd_code) as prdcode, c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto, p.prd_term as term,p.prd_minterm as minterm, p.nsc_loan as nsc_loan ,p1.prd_maxintclass as class, p.prd_type as prd_type, nvl(prd_principal,0) as prd_principal, nvl(prd_interest,0) as prd_interest, p.incomeflag, prd_staffprd, p2.prd_appminage, p2.prd_guaminage,p.scheme_code,p.prd_desc,p.prd_purpose,p.PRD_HOLIDAY,p.staff_under,p.prd_repaytype, p.prd_staff_maxterm_prin,p.prd_staff_maxterm_intr,prd_deposittype,prd_depositloanfor,prd_bankscheme,MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC,prd_vehitype,PRD_SHARETYPE, p.PRD_TERM_REST,p.PRD_MINTERM_REST,PRD_HOLIDAY_REST,p.prd_CGTMSEFALG as prd_CGTMSEFALG from prd_category c, prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1, prd_interest p2, prd_used,MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=p.PRD_BANKSCHEME and p1.prd_code=p.prd_code and p2.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_org_scode like '^' and prd_used.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_type='^' and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date(p.prd_eff_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_date(p.prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(prd_renew)='N' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and (PRD_WHTDIGIPRD!='Y' or PRD_WHTDIGIPRD is null) and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent ^ order by c.cat_name

insert into valuationentry (app_no ,valu_sno ,entry_date ,valuers_code ,let_cer_no ,let_cer_date ,mark_val_land ,mark_val_build ,esti_val_force ,remark_note ,valuation_dt ,reference_rt ,guidance_rt , send_date, branchpanel,valuername,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG) values(?,?,TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?, TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?)

update valuationentry set valuers_code =?,entry_date = TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),let_cer_no =?, let_cer_date = TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), mark_val_land=?, mark_val_build =?, esti_val_force =?, remark_note =?, valuation_dt = TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),reference_rt=?,guidance_rt=?, send_date = TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),branchpanel=?,valuername=?,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG=? where app_no =? and valu_sno=?
select NVL(max(valu_sno),0)+1 as maxid from valuationentry where app_no ='^'
select NVL(max(valu_sno),0) as maxid from valuationentry where app_no ='^'

select app_no,valu_sno,TO_CHAR(entry_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as entry_date,valuers_code,let_cer_no,TO_CHAR(let_cer_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as let_cer_date,mark_val_land,mark_val_build,esti_val_force,remark_note,TO_CHAR(valuation_dt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuation_dt,reference_rt,guidance_rt, TO_CHAR( send_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as send_date from valuationentry where app_no='^' and valu_sno='^'
select valuers_name from valuersmaster a, valuationentry b where a.valuers_code= b.valuers_code and app_no='^' and b.valuers_code='^' and valu_sno ='^' and a.org_code='^'

WHERE loan_APPNO =? and loan_SLNO=?

INSERT INTO PER_loanagainstdeposit (loan_SLNO, loan_APPNO, loan_issuebranch, loan_STANDNAME, loan_accno, laon_dateofissue, loan_faceval, loan_rateofint, loan_presentos,loan_presentason, loan_maturityval,loan_tenure,loan_matdate, loan_rateincharges,loan_margin, loan_banktype, loan_secid, loan_updflag, loan_entryflag) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE( ?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

select perapp_bankacctype,perapp_bankaccno,perapp_bank,org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_zip, org_state ,perapp_title, perapp_religion,perapp_sex,perapp_fname as appname,to_char(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_date,perapp_address1, perapp_address2,perapp_address3, perapp_city, perapp_state, perapp_zip, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,perapp_husname, perapp_fatname,perapp_hname,PERAPP_PHONE from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode and perapp_id='^'

select l.loan_reqterms as lterms,l.loan_recmdamt as loan_recmdamt, l.loan_emi as loanemi,loan_repaymenttype as repaymenttype,l.loan_modintrate as loanintrate,l.loan_appamt as loanmargin,TO_CHAR(l.loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loancreatedate, l.loan_inttype as loan_type from perapplicant pa,prd_category pc,prd_category pc1,products p,loandetails l,applications ap,per_demographics d, prd_interest pri,prd_authority par where l.loan_appno=ap.app_no and d.demo_appno=ap.app_no and ap.app_no='^' and pc1.cat_id=(select prd_catid from products where prd_code=(select a1.app_prdcode from applications a1 where a1.app_no=ap.app_no))and pc.cat_id=pc1.cat_parent and p.prd_code=(select a2.app_prdcode from applications a2 where a2.app_no=ap.app_no)and pri.prd_code=p.prd_code and par.prd_code=p.prd_code and d.demo_type='a'and pa.perapp_id = d.demo_appid

select demo_appid,perapp_title,perapp_fname as appname,demo_type, demo_relation, perapp_address1, perapp_address2, perapp_address3, perapp_city, perapp_state,perapp_state, perapp_zip,perapp_husname,perapp_sex, perapp_fatname,perapp_hname from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='G' and perapp_id=demo_appid order by demo_type

select demo_appid,perapp_title,perapp_fname as appname,demo_type, demo_relation, perapp_address1, perapp_address2, perapp_address3, perapp_city, perapp_state,perapp_state, perapp_zip,perapp_husname,perapp_sex, perapp_fatname,perapp_hname from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='C' and perapp_id=demo_appid order by demo_type
select Sanction_Amount,to_char(Sanction_Date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as Sancdate,to_char(apprisal_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as appcom_date, Sanc_Ref_No from appraisalsanction where appsanc_appno='^'
select loan_modintrate,loan_purposeofloan, loan_reqterms from loandetails where loan_appno='^'

select app_no,to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_createdate, prd_code, per1.perapp_title||' '||per1.perapp_fname as applname, per1.perapp_status, per1.perapp_category, per1.perapp_sex, per1.perapp_marstat, per1.perapp_address1 as perapp_address1, per1.perapp_address2 as perapp_address2,per1.perapp_address3 as perapp_address3, per1.perapp_city as perapp_city ,per1.perapp_state as perapp_state, per1.perapp_zip as perapp_zip ,cat2.cat_name as catdesc,cat1.cat_name as subcatdesc , loan_modintrate , loan_inttype , loan_costloanprd , loan_emi , loan_reqterms , loan_margin, loan_recmdamt ,loan_purposeofloan as prd_desc , to_char( loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_filedon ,loan_repaymenttype,org_city,organisations.org_name, organisations.org_add1, organisations.org_add2, organisations.org_zip, organisations.org_state,to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_processdate,app_approvedby, loan_interestcharged, loan_bank_refno, perapp_religion,loan_repaycapacity, loan_steptype, loan_fileno, loan_intrate, TO_CHAR( loan_receivedate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_receivedate from applications,products p,prd_category cat1,prd_category cat2,loandetails, perapplicant per1, per_demographics ,organisations where app_no='^' and app_prdcode=p.prd_code and cat1.cat_id=prd_catid and cat2.cat_id=(select cat_parent from prd_category where cat_id=prd_catid) and loan_appno= app_no and demo_appno= app_no and per1.perapp_id=demo_appid and organisations.org_code = applications.app_orgcode and demo_type='a'

insert into per_conf_informants(per_appno, per_infomant1_name, per_infomant2_name, per_infomant3_name) values(?,?,?,?)

delete from per_conf_informants where per_appno=?

select days_rd_mon, no_km_day, fare_perkm, ave_incom, other_incom, tot_incom, fuel_perlitre, motor_tax, insu_premium, garage_rent, depreciation, int_borrowings, maintain_exp, cost_oil_spares, draw_oper, others, tot_exp, incom_tax,Net_surplus, depreciation_add, net_cash_accruals, fuel_perlitre_km, fuel_cost_month, staff_salary, surplus,instalments_termloan from operational_viability where ope_appno='^'

insert into operational_viability(ope_appno,days_rd_mon, no_km_day, fare_perkm, ave_incom, other_incom, tot_incom, fuel_perlitre,motor_tax,insu_premium, garage_rent, depreciation, int_borrowings, maintain_exp, cost_oil_spares, draw_oper, others, tot_exp, incom_tax, Net_surplus, depreciation_add, net_cash_accruals, fuel_perlitre_km, fuel_cost_month, staff_salary,surplus,instalments_termloan) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from operational_viability where ope_appno=?
select usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as appname,usr_id from users where usr_orgcode = '^' and usr_avail='a'
select usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as username from users where usr_id='^'

select TO_CHAR( apprisal_Date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as apprisal_Date,TO_CHAR(Emi_lastrepay_dt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as Emi_lastrepay_dt,Apprised_by, TO_CHAR( Review_Date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as Review_Date, code_no, TO_CHAR( Sanction_Date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as Sanction_Date, Sanc_Ref_No, apprised_scheme, premium_amount, appraisal_sanclevel, appraisal_sancauth,appraisal_department, sanction_amount,APPRAISAL_BRANCH,to_char(appref_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as appref_sancdate from appraisalsanction where appsanc_appno='^'

insert into appraisalsanction(apprisal_Date, Apprised_by, appsanc_appno, apprised_scheme, sanction_amount, premium_amount, appraisal_flag, appraisal_sanclevel, appraisal_sancauth,appraisal_department,sanc_ref_no,APPRAISAL_BRANCH,appref_sancdate) values(TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

update appraisalsanction set apprisal_Date = TO_DATE(?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), Apprised_by = ?, apprised_scheme=?, sanction_amount=?, premium_amount=?, appraisal_flag=?, appraisal_sanclevel=?, appraisal_sancauth=?,appraisal_department=?,sanc_ref_no=?,APPRAISAL_BRANCH=?,appref_sancdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where appsanc_appno = ?
update appraisalsanction set appraisal_flag='N' where appsanc_appno=?

insert into appraisalsanction (appsanc_appno, code_no, emi_commence_dt, emi_lastrepay_dt, Sanction_Date, Sanc_Ref_No, Review_Date) values(?, ?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

Update appraisalsanction set apprisal_Date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),Emi_Commence_Dt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), Emi_lastrepay_dt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),Apprised_by=?, Review_Date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where appsanc_appno=?

update appraisalsanction set code_no = ?, emi_commence_dt = TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), emi_lastrepay_dt = TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), Sanction_Date = TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), Sanc_Ref_No = ?, Review_Date = TO_DATE( ?, 'DD/MM/YYYY') where appsanc_appno = ?
delete from appraisalsanction where appsanc_appno=?

select prd_code,pc.cat_name as category,pc1.cat_name as subcategory, l.loan_modintrate as mintrate, l.loan_reqterms as lreqterms, l.loan_amtreqd as amtreqd, l.loan_emi as emi, l.loan_purposeofloan as loan_purposeofloan, l.loan_margin as loan_margin, p.prd_desc as prd_desc, l.loan_recmdamt, upper(nvl(i.indinfo_is_staff, 'N')) indinfo_is_staff, nvl(p.prd_interest,0) prd_interest, prd_principal, loan_interest_emi, loan_govt, TO_CHAR(l.loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS loan_filedon, prd_staffprd, p.prd_homeplus, app.APP_ISDEVIATED, loan_appamt, buss_bussid, loan_repaycapacity, to_char(app.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate ,to_char(l.loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_filedon,l.loan_repaymenttype,BUSS_RULEID, l.loan_interestcharged,l.loan_intcalcmode,prd_loantype,prd_type,l.loan_mclrtype,l.loan_baserate,l.loan_inttype, l.loan_creditrskval,l.loan_busstatval,l.loan_mclrtype,l.loan_interestid,l.loan_msmeexposure,l.loan_goldrate_masterid,p.prd_whetheragri,l.LOAN_CFR_VERIFIED,l.LOAN_CFR_BORNAME,l.LOAN_CFR_DEV_RENFO, l.STATUS_VERIFIED,l.LOAN_USERID1,TO_CHAR(l.LOAN_APPR_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_APPR_DATE,l.LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE,prd_bankscheme,l.LOAN_CERSAI_CHECK,app.APP_ORGLEVEL,l.LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH,govt_scheme,l.LOAN_ROISCORE,l.LOAN_ROITYPE from prd_category pc, prd_category pc1, products p, applications app, loandetails l, perapplicant pa, per_demographics, prod_business, individual_info i where p.prd_catid=pc1.cat_id and pc.cat_id=pc1.cat_parent and app.app_prdcode=p.prd_code and buss_prdid=p.prd_code and app.app_no=l.loan_appno and demo_appno=app.app_no and demo_appid=perapp_id and i.indinfo_appid = pa.perapp_id and demo_type='a' and app.app_no='^'

select distinct perapp_title||' '||perapp_fname as coappname, demo_appno, demo_type, demo_appid, demo_relation, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob , perapp_employment, (prd_selfretireage*12)-floor(months_between(TO_DATE('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),TO_DATE(to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))) as remselfage, (prd_empretireage*12)-floor(months_between(TO_DATE('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),TO_DATE(to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))) as remempage, floor(months_between(TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),TO_DATE(to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))/12) as age,perapp_networth as networth,demo_oldappid from perapplicant, per_demographics, applications, prd_interest where prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno=app_no and app_no='^' order by demo_type

select sum(bank_balance) as bankbal ,(select sum(stoc_shareval * stoc_noofshares) from per_stocks where stoc_applnt='^' and stoc_appno='^' )as share,(select sum(insu_surrenderval) from per_insurance where insu_applnt='^' and insu_appno='^' )as insurance,(select sum(prop_marketval) from per_properties where prop_applnt='^' and prop_assettype = 'M' and prop_appno='^' )as permovprop, (select sum(prop_marketval) from per_properties where prop_applnt='^' and prop_assettype = 'I' and prop_appno='^' )as perimmovprop, (select sum(liab_balance) from per_liabilities where liab_applnt='^' and liab_appno='^' )as totlia from per_bank where bank_appno='^' and bank_apptype='^'
select NVL(sum(bank_balance),0) as bankbal from per_bank where bank_appno='^' and bank_apptype='^'
select NVL(sum(stoc_shareval * stoc_noofshares),0) as shares from per_stocks where stoc_applnt='^' and stoc_appno='^'
select NVL(sum(insu_surrenderval),0) as insurance from per_insurance where insu_applnt='^' and insu_appno='^'
select NVL(sum(prop_marketval),0) as permovprop from per_properties where prop_applnt='^' and prop_assettype = 'M' and prop_appno='^'
select NVL(sum(prop_marketval),0) as perimmovprop from per_properties where prop_applnt='^' and prop_assettype != 'M' and prop_appno='^'
select NVL(sum(liab_balance),0) as totlia from per_liabilities where liab_applnt='^' and liab_appno='^'

select NVL(max(serialNo),0)+1 as maxid from appraisalQuest

update perapp_Apprisal set Comments =?, Comme_Type =?, Ques1 =?, Ques2 =?, Ques3 =?, Sanction_Flag=?, Sanction_ref =?, Ques4=?, Ques5=? , Ques6=?, Ques7=? where app_no=? and perapp_id=? and Comme_Type =?

select app_no, perapp_id, Comments, Comme_Type, Ques1, Ques2, Ques3, Sanction_Flag, Sanction_ref, Ques4, Ques5, Ques6, Ques7 from perapp_Apprisal where app_no='^' and Comme_Type='^' and perapp_id='^'
select app_no, perapp_id, Comments, Comme_Type, Ques1, Ques2, Ques3, Sanction_Flag, Sanction_ref, Ques4, Ques5, Ques6, Ques7 from perapp_Apprisal where app_no='^' and Comme_Type='^'

select demo_appid,perapp_fname as appname,demo_type, demo_relation from perapplicant a, per_demographics, perapp_Apprisal b where demo_appno='^' and a.perapp_id=demo_appid and b.perapp_id=demo_appid and Comme_Type='^' order by demo_type

select p.prd_code as prdcode,c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory ,p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom,p.prd_rng_to as rangeto from prd_category c,prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1,prd_interest p2 ,prd_used where p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and Upper(prd_type) like 'P%' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and p.prd_code=p1.prd_code and p.prd_code=p2.prd_code and p.prd_code = prd_used.prd_code and prd_renew !='y' order by c.cat_name

select perinc_id,perinc_monsalary,perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_domesticexp,perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc,perinc_selfincometype, perinc_selfyrsprof,perinc_others,perinc_deduction,perinc_desc, perinc_otherdeduction, perinc_yearsalary, perinc_yeardeduction, perinc_yearotherdeduc,perinc_itreturn, perinc_assetandliab, perinc_year1, perinc_year2, perinc_year3, perinc_year1_income, perinc_year2_income, perinc_year3_income,perinc_pattern,perinc_proof ,perinc_loyalty,perinc_history,perinctype,perinc_it,perinc_depreciation_year1, perinc_depreciation_year2,perinc_intonliab_year1,perinc_intonliab_year2,to_char(perinc_itrdate1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_itrdate1,to_char(perinc_itrdate2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_itrdate2,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1,to_char(perinc_yearend2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend2, PERAPPACTUALINCOME,perinc_capitalgain,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS1,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS2,PERINC_INC_SUPPORTDOC from perincexpenses where perinc_id=(select p2.PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT p1,PERAPPLICANT p2 where p1.PERAPP_OLDID=p2.PERAPP_OLDID and (p2.PERAPP_RENEW is null or p2.PERAPP_RENEW='n') and p1.PERAPP_ID='^')

insert into perincexpenses( perinc_id,perinc_monsalary,perinc_takehome, perinc_otherincome,perinc_rent,perinc_agriculture, perinc_secincome,perinc_autoloanexp,perinc_domesticexp,perinc_rentexp, perinc_otherexp,perinc_secdesc, perinc_applnt,perinc_others,perinc_othermondesc,perinc_deduction,perinc_desc, perinc_otherdeduction, perinc_yearsalary, perinc_yeardeduction, perinc_yearotherdeduc,perinc_itreturn, perinc_assetandliab, perinc_year1, perinc_year2, perinc_year3, perinc_year1_income, perinc_year2_income, perinc_year3_income, perinc_selfincometype,perinc_pattern,perinc_proof,perinc_loyalty,perinc_history,perinctype,perinc_it, perinc_depreciation_year1,perinc_depreciation_year2,perinc_intonliab_year1,perinc_intonliab_year2,perinc_pagestatus,perinc_itrdate1,perinc_itrdate2,perinc_yearend1,perinc_yearend2, PERAPPACTUALINCOME,PERINC_CAPITALGAIN,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS1,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS2,PERINC_INC_SUPPORTDOC) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)

update npa_sarfaesi set activity_fin=?,persent_act=?,doc_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),doc_completed=?,clarify_advocate=?, doc_clearing=?,comp_branch=?,detail_comp=?,det_disposal=?,security=?,possession=?, due_detail=?,frame=?,approve_detail=?,od_payment=?,borr_ident=?,mult_bank=? where sar_appno=?

insert into npaprudwriteoff(pru_appno,pru_activity,pru_advancedt,pru_npasincedt,pru_doubtfuldt,pru_lossdt, pru_prov_date,pru_prov,pru_unit_yesno,pru_unit,pru_claims_yesno,pru_claims,,pru_reviewdt,pru_review, pru_inspndt,pru_suitdt,pru_suitamt,pru_recovery,pru_acctvaln,pru_mortgage,pru_lapse) values(?,?,convert(datetime,?,103),convert(datetime,?,103),convert(datetime,?,103),convert(datetime,?,103), convert(datetime,?,103),?,?,?,?,?,convert(datetime,?,103),?,convert(datetime,?,103),convert(datetime,?,103), ?,?,?,?,?)

select(pru_appno,pru_activity, convert(varchar(10),pru_advancedt,103) as pru_advancedt,convert(varchar(10), pru_npasincedt,103) as pru_npasincedtdt, convert(varchar(10),pru_doubtfuldt,103) as pru_doubtfuldt,convert(varchar(10),pru_lossdt,103) as pru_lossdt, convert(varchar(10),pru_prov_date,103)as pru_prov_date,pru_prov,pru_unit_yesno,pru_unit,pru_claims_yesno,pru_claims, convert(varchar(10),pru_reviewdt,103) as pru_reviewdt,pru_review,convert(varchar(10),pru_inspndt,103) as pru_inspndt, convert(varchar(10),pru_suitdt,103) as pru_suitdt,pru_suitamt,pru_recovery,pru_acctvaln,pru_mortgage,pru_lapse) from npaprudwriteoff where pru_appno='^'

insert into npasuit_details3(npasuit_borrid,npasuitborrappno,npasuit_amtofinst,npasuit_totinstal,npasuit_lastinstaldt, npasuit_startdate,npasuit_pledgeof,npasuit_pledgeamt,npasuit_pledgedt,npasuit_equitat,npasuit_equitamt,npasuit_equitvaldt, npasuit_secchargeon,npasuit_resiamt,npasuit_valudt,npasuit_bankreg,npasuit_creditfacrenew,npasuit_lastinspdt) values (?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

update npasuit_details3 set npasuit_amtofinst=?,npasuit_totinstal=?,npasuit_lastinstaldt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), npasuit_startdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),npasuit_pledgeof=?,npasuit_pledgeamt=?,npasuit_pledgedt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,npasuit_equitat=?,npasuit_equitamt=?,npasuit_equitvaldt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), npasuit_secchargeon=?,npasuit_resiamt=?,npasuit_valudt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), npasuit_bankreg=?,npasuit_creditfacrenew=?,npasuit_lastinspdt=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where npasuit_borrid=? and npasuitborrappno=?

select npasuit_borrid,npasuitborrappno,npasuit_amtofinst,npasuit_totinstal,to_char(npasuit_lastinstaldt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_lastinstaldt,to_char(npasuit_startdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_startdate, npasuit_pledgeof,npasuit_pledgeamt,to_char(npasuit_pledgedt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_pledgedt,npasuit_equitat,npasuit_equitamt,to_char(npasuit_equitvaldt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_equitvaldt,npasuit_secchargeon,npasuit_resiamt,to_char(npasuit_valudt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_valudt,npasuit_bankreg, npasuit_creditfacrenew,to_char(npasuit_lastinspdt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as npasuit_lastinspdt from npasuit_details3 where npasuit_borrid=^ and npasuitborrappno=^

select com_compdtappno, com_compdtid, com_compdttype, com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname, com_compdtmname, to_char(com_compdtdob,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdtdob, com_compdtaddress1, com_compdtaddress2, com_compdtcity, com_compdtstate, com_compdtpin, com_compdtphone, com_compdtfax, com_compdtemail, com_comdtpershare, com_compdtshareheld, com_compdtnetworth, to_char(com_compdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdate, CapContribution, com_percent, COM_COMPDSEX, COM_COMPDACA, COM_COMPDEXP, COM_COMPDSTKHOLDER from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_compdttype='^'

select com_rmappno,com_rmid,com_rmdesc,com_rmunit,com_rmunitcost,com_rmpuritylevel, com_rmcostprod,com_rmrawmatcost,com_rmtype,com_rmlocation,com_rmfrom,totalquantity from com_rawmaterialinput where com_rmappno='^' and com_rmtype='type2' order by COM_RMID

select com_grpappno,com_grpid,com_grpcompname,com_grpcompactivity,com_grpfundbob,com_grpnonfundbob,com_grpfundbased,com_grpnonfundbased,com_grpremarks,com_banktype from com_groupcompany where com_grpappno='^' and com_grpid=^

select doc_desc, comdoc_docnature, comdoc_doccode, to_char(expiry_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as expiry_date, doc_primary from documents a, com_facdocuments b where B.COMDOC_FACSNO='^' and b.comdoc_doctype='^' and comdoc_isdocdel != 'Y' and b.comdoc_appno='^' and doc_code=comdoc_doccode

select ^ as columname from com_finappvalues where fin_appno = '^' and to_char(fin_year,'YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE('^','YYYY'),'YYYY') and fin_rowid= ^ and com_division_id='^'

select repay_moratorium,repay_no_instalmt,repay_periodicity, to_char(repay_disbursement,'dd/mm/yyyy') as disbursementon, to_char(add_months(repay_disbursement,repay_moratorium),'dd/mm/yyyy') as repayon, to_char(add_months(repay_disbursement,repay_moratorium),'mm') as startmonth, to_char(add_months(repay_disbursement,repay_moratorium),'yyyy') as startyear, (facility_proposed/repay_no_instalmt) prin ,to_char(repay_endon,'mm'),to_char(repay_endon,'yyyy') from fac_repayment,facilities where repay_appno = facility_appno and repay_fac_sno = facility_sno and repay_appno ='^' and repay_fac_sno = ^
select to_char(add_months(to_date(add_months('^',^),'dd/mm/yyyy'),^),'dd/mm/yyyy') from dual

insert into fac_repayment(repay_appno,repay_fac_sno,repay_moratorium,repay_no_instalmt,repay_periodicity,repay_disbursement,repay_endon) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))

update fac_repayment set repay_moratorium = ?,repay_no_instalmt = ?, repay_periodicity =?,repay_disbursement = to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), repay_endon = to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where repay_appno =? and repay_fac_sno = ?
delete from fac_repayment where repay_appno =? and repay_fac_sno=?
update comapp_relationship set comapp_emprelno=?, comapp_borrel=?, comapp_scale=?, comapp_placepost=?, comapp_loancomments=? where comapp_id=? and comapp_relsno=?

select com_compdtappno, com_compdtid, com_compdttype, com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname, com_compdtmname, to_char(com_compdtdob,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdtdob,com_compdtaddress1||','||com_compdtaddress2||','||com_compdtcity||','||com_compdtstate||','||com_compdtpin as cor_promoteraddress, com_compdtphone, com_compdtfax, com_compdtemail, com_comdtpershare, com_compdtshareheld, com_compdtnetworth, to_char(com_compdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdate, CapContribution, com_percent, COM_COMPDSEX, COM_COMPDACA, COM_COMPDEXP, COM_COMPDSTKHOLDER from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_compdttype like'%G@%'

select com_compdtappno, com_compdtid, com_compdttype, com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname, com_compdtmname, to_char(com_compdtdob,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdtdob, com_compdtaddress1, com_compdtaddress2, com_compdtcity, com_compdtstate, com_compdtpin, com_compdtphone, com_compdtfax, com_compdtemail, com_comdtpershare, com_compdtshareheld, com_compdtnetworth,to_char(com_compdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_compdate, CapContribution, com_percent, COM_COMPDSEX, COM_COMPDACA, COM_COMPDEXP, COM_COMPDSTKHOLDER from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_compdttype like '%PT@%'

select perapp_id,perapp_title,(perapp_fname)as GuaAppname, perapp_address1, perapp_address2, perapp_address3, perapp_city, perapp_state, perapp_zip, perapp_phone, state_name, city_name from perapplicant, per_demographics, laps_cities, laps_states where perapp_id =demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='g' and state_code(+)=perapp_state and city_code(+)=perapp_city order by GuaAppname

select perinc_id, perinc_monsalary, perinc_deduction, perinc_yearsalary, perinc_yeardeduction, perinc_selfincometype, PERINC_YEAROTHERDEDUC, perinc_otherdeduction, perinc_otherincome from perincexpenses, static_data, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and upper(demo_type)=upper('^') and perinc_id=demo_appid

select to_char(peremp_establish,'dd/mm/yyyy') as establishdate, peremp_design,(NVL(months_between(TO_DATE(peremp_retdate),TO_DATE(sysdate)),0))/12 as serviceleft from peremployer, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and upper(demo_type)=upper('^') and peremp_id=demo_appid
select bank_appno,bank_apptype,bank_name,bank_accntno, bank_accnttype,bank_balance,bank_iscoll,bank_yrsacchold,remarks from per_bank where bank_appno='^' and bank_iscoll='Y'
select distinct perapp_fname as appname from perapplicant,per_demographics where perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^'

select bank_appno, bank_apptype, bank_serialno, bank_name, bank_accntno, bank_accnttype, bank_balance, bank_iscoll, bank_yrsacchold, remarks from per_bank where bank_appno='^' and bank_iscoll='Y' order by bank_serialno

select org_name, org_level, org_city, org_add1, org_add2, org_zip, org_state, org_phone, org_fax, org_url, org_taxid, org_head as orghead, org_saralhead as saralhead, state_name, city_name from organisations, applications, laps_states, laps_cities where city_code(+)=org_city and state_code(+)=org_state and org_code=app_orgcode and app_no='^'
select org_code,org_name from organisations where org_code like '^' and org_level='R'
select perapp_recfrom from perapplicant where perapp_id in (SELECT demo_appid FROM per_demographics WHERE demo_appno = '^' and demo_type='a' )

select stoc_appno, stoc_applnt, stoc_desc, stoc_shareval, stoc_noofshares, stoc_iscoll, to_char(stoc_dateofissue,'DD/MM/YYYY') as stoc_dateofissue, to_char(stoc_dateofmaturity,'DD/MM/YYYY') as stoc_dateofmaturity, stoc_amount from per_stocks where stoc_appno='^' and stoc_iscoll='Y'
select to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as currentdate,to_char(sysdate,'dd-mm-yyyy')as currentdate1 from dual

select insu_appno,insu_applnt, insu_policyno, insu_surrenderval, insu_agencyname, insu_agencyphone, to_char(insu_matdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as insu_matdate, insu_prepaid from per_insurance where insu_appno='^' and insu_iscoll='Y'
select perapp_dob from perapplicant where perapp_id ='^'
select ca.comapp_companyid,ca.comapp_companyname,exp.exp_id from comapplicant ca,exposure exp where ca.comapp_id=exp.exp_id
select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd-mm-yyyy') as fin_year,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd-mm-yyyy') AS finyear from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='0' order by finyear

select b.fin_rowdesc,to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,fin_audit,fin_unaudit, fin_estimated,fin_projection,b.fin_rowtype,b.fin_formula from com_finappvalues a, com_finmaster b where fin_sno='^' and b.fin_cma_no='^' and fin_appno = '^' and a.com_division_id='0' and fin_tabname='^' and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid and fin_page='FI' order by a.fin_year

select b.fin_rowdesc,to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,fin_audit,fin_unaudit, fin_estimated,fin_projection,b.fin_rowtype,b.fin_formula from com_finappvalues a, com_finmaster b where fin_sno='^' and b.fin_cma_no='^' and fin_appno = '^' and a.com_division_id='0' and fin_tabname='^' and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid and fin_page='FI' and to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') order by a.fin_year

select to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit, sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='0' and to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE( '^', 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') group by fin_year

select to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit, sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='0' and to_char(fin_year,'YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE( '^','YYYY'),'YYYY') group by fin_year
insert into FIN_AGR_APPVALUES(FIN_AGR_APPNO,FIN_AGR_YEAR,FIN_AGR_ITEMID,FIN_AGR_VALUE,fin_agr_type) values(?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?)

select to_char(fin_agr_year,'DD/MM/YYYY') as fin_agr_year,fin_agr_value from FIN_AGR_APPVALUES where fin_agr_appno='^' and fin_agr_itemid='^' and fin_agr_type='^'

select OD_AVGMONTHLYSALES, OD_ELECPOWERREQ, OD_UNSKILLEDLABOUR, OD_SKILLEDLABOUR,OD_SUPERVISOR,OD_OFFICER from com_ssi_otherdetails where od_appno='^'
update com_ssi_otherdetails set OD_AVGMONTHLYSALES=?,OD_ELECPOWERREQ=?,OD_UNSKILLEDLABOUR=?,OD_SKILLEDLABOUR=?,OD_SUPERVISOR=?,OD_OFFICER=? where od_appno=?
insert into com_ssi_otherdetails (OD_APPNO,OD_AVGMONTHLYSALES,OD_ELECPOWERREQ,OD_UNSKILLEDLABOUR,OD_SKILLEDLABOUR,OD_SUPERVISOR,OD_OFFICER)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

delete from COM_TAKEOVERWORKING where WORKING_APPNO=?

select WORKING_APPNO, WORKING_NORMS, WORKING_NORMSAVAIL, WORKING_REASONS, working_slno from COM_TAKEOVERWORKING where WORKING_APPNO='^' order by working_slno

insert into additional_cbsparameter(cbsid, guardian, minor, trade_finance, trade_inland, intr_title, intr_name, relation_address, comtype, custid, gua_name)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select guardian, minor, trade_finance, trade_inland, intr_title, intr_name, relation_address, gua_name from additional_cbsparameter where custid='^' and comtype='^'

insert into additional_parameternew(param_appnonew, tax_slab, subsector, operation_mode, sanction_level, sector_code, sanction_authority, purpose_advance, comtype, FreeText7, borrowcat, advmode, advtype, indtype, label,cbs_cust_type,cbs_health_code,cbs_freecode7) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select tax_slab, subsector, operation_mode, sanction_level, sector_code, sanction_authority, purpose_advance, FreeText7, sd4.stat_data_desc ||'-' || sd4.stat_data_desc1 as freetextdesc, borrowcat, advmode, advtype, indtype, label,sd5.stat_data_desc1 as labeldesc, cbs_cust_type,sd1.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_cust_typedesc,cbs_health_code, sd2.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_health_codedesc,cbs_freecode7,sd3.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_freecode7desc from additional_parameternew, static_data sd5,static_data sd4, static_data sd1,static_data sd2,static_data sd3 where param_appnonew='^' and comtype='^' and sd4.stat_data_id(+)='6' and sd5.stat_data_id(+)='66' and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='67' and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='68' and sd3.stat_data_id(+)='69' and sd4.stat_data_desc(+)=FreeText7 and sd5.stat_data_desc(+)=label and sd1.stat_data_desc(+)=cbs_cust_type and sd2.stat_data_desc(+)=cbs_health_code and sd3.stat_data_desc(+)=cbs_freecode7
delete from additional_parameternew where param_appnonew=? and comtype=?

delete from ram_laps_countrymaster where cc_countrycode=?
select perapp_id,perapp_fname,perapp_panno from perapplicant where upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%')
select comapp_id,comapp_companyname,comapp_companyid from comapplicant where upper(comapp_companyname) like upper('%^%')

select perapp_id, perapp_title, perapp_fname, perapp_lname, perapp_panno, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_marstat, perapp_sex, perapp_employment, perapp_bank, perapp_fatname, perapp_branchcode, perapp_status, perapp_religion, perapp_salaryrouted, perapp_regno, perapp_cbsid, perapp_istatus, perapp_occupation, perapp_oldid, org_name, perapp_constitution, perapp_indcode, perapp_companyname, cbs_static_data_desc as constitutiondesc from perapplicant, organisations, per_demographics, cbs_staticdata where demo_appno='^' and upper(demo_type)=upper('^') and perapp_id=demo_appid and cbs_static_data_code(+)=perapp_constitution and cbs_static_data_id='2' and org_scode(+)=perapp_branchcode

select a.loan_purposeofloan, a.loan_modintrate, a.loan_costloanprd, a.loan_margin, a.loan_facility, a.loan_reqterms, b.loan_secure, a.loan_recmdamt from loandetails a,per_loan_secure b where a.loan_appno='^' and a.loan_appno=b.loan_appno
select perapp_fname,perapp_lname from perapplicant,per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='g' and demo_appid=perapp_id
select doc_desc from appdocuments,documents where apdoc_appno='^' and apdoc_substatus='Y' and apdoc_doccode=doc_code
select to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_createdate from applications
select org_name from organisations,applications where app_no='^' and org_code=app_orgcode
select perinc_proof from perincexpenses, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='^' and demo_appid=perinc_id

select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_sex,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd-mm-yyyy') as perapp_dob,perapp_address1, perapp_address2,perapp_address3,perapp_state, perapp_zip,perapp_country,perapp_permadd1,perapp_permadd2,perapp_permadd3, perapp_permstate,perapp_permzip,perapp_permcountry,perapp_status,perapp_passport, perapp_passissue,peremp_occupation,perinc_selfincometype,peremp_address1, peremp_address2, peremp_address3, peremp_occupation, peremp_state, peremp_zip,peremp_country,to_char(per_dateofNRI,'dd-mm-yyyy') as per_dateofNRI from perapplicant,perincexpenses,peremployer where perapp_id=perinc_id and perapp_id=peremp_id and perapp_id=(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')
select perapp_istatus, perapp_istaff from perapplicant where perapp_id= '^'

select app.perapp_istatus, app.perapp_istaff, status.STAT_DATA_DESC1 stats_desc from perapplicant app, static_data status where app.perapp_id= '^' and status.stat_data_id(+) = 15 and status.stat_data_desc(+) = app.perapp_istatus

select app.company_status, app.company_staff, status.STAT_DATA_DESC1 from comapplicant app, static_data status, com_demographics demo where demo.demo_appno = '^' and app.comapp_id = demo.demo_comappid and status.stat_data_id(+) = 15 and status.stat_data_desc(+) = app.company_status
select sd.stat_data_desc,sd.stat_data_desc1 from static_data sd, static_data_master sdm where sdm.stat_mast_id = sd.stat_data_id and sd.stat_data_id='^' and sd.stat_data_desc like upper('^')
select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select count(*) as cnt from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^'

select to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fin_year, sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit, sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit, sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYY') group by fin_year
select distinct to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY') from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' group by TO_CHAR(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')

select to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fin_year, sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit, sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated, sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'YYYY')=^ group by fin_year
select state_id, state_code, state_name from laps_states where STATE_ACTION='E' order by state_name
select city_id, city_code, city_name from laps_cities where state_id='^' and active_flag='E' order by city_name
select city_id, city_code, city_name from laps_cities where state_id='^' and upper(city_name) like upper('%^%') and active_flag='E' order by city_name
select state_name,state_code,state_pinmin,state_pinmax,STATE_ACTION from laps_states where state_id='^'
select city_name,state_id,city_code from laps_cities where city_code='^'
select state_name from laps_states where state_id='^'
select NVL(max(STAFF_ID),0)+1 as snorelmax from STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER where staff_prd_code='^'
insert into STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER(STAFF_ID, min_service, max_service, MAX_ELIGIBLE_AMOUNT, staff_prd_code) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER set min_service=?,max_service=?,MAX_ELIGIBLE_AMOUNT=? where staff_prd_code=? and STAFF_ID=?
select STAFF_ID, min_service, max_service, MAX_ELIGIBLE_AMOUNT from STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER where staff_prd_code='^'
delete from STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER where STAFF_ID=?

select count(*)as staffservice from STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER where STAFF_PRD_CODE ='^' and (('^' between MIN_SERVICE and MAX_SERVICE) or ('^' between MIN_SERVICE and MAX_SERVICE) or (MIN_SERVICE between '^' and '^' ) or (MAX_SERVICE between '^' and '^'))

select count(*)as staffservice from STAFFLOAN_PARAMETER where STAFF_PRD_CODE ='^' and STAFF_ID !='^' and (('^' between MIN_SERVICE and MAX_SERVICE) or ('^' between MIN_SERVICE and MAX_SERVICE) or (MIN_SERVICE between '^' and '^' ) or (MAX_SERVICE between '^' and '^'))
select prd_rng_from,prd_rng_to from products where prd_code='^'
select comapp_div_name from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id='^' and comapp_id='^'
insert into perapplicant_idmap (perapp_oldid, perapp_newid) values (?,?)

select apdoc_doccode from appdocuments appdoc, prd_documents prddoc where appdoc.apdoc_appno = '^' and appdoc.apdoc_doccode = prddoc.prd_doccode and prddoc.prd_code = '^' and upper(nvl(prddoc.prd_mandatory,'N')) = 'Y' and upper(nvl(appdoc.apdoc_substatus,'N')) = 'N'

select apdoc_doccode from appdocuments appdoc, prd_documents prddoc where appdoc.apdoc_appno = '^' and appdoc.apdoc_doccode = prddoc.prd_doccode and prddoc.prd_code = '^' and upper(nvl(prddoc.prd_mandatory,'N')) = 'Y' and upper(nvl(appdoc.apdoc_substatus,'N')) = 'N' and appdoc.apdoc_doctype='PA'

select o.org_name, a.perapp_title ||' '||a.perapp_fname as appname, a.perapp_address1, a.perapp_address2|| ' '||a.perapp_address3 as address2, city_name, state_name, a.perapp_zip, to_char(l.loan_filedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_receivedate, l.loan_recmdamt, l.loan_purposeofloan, l.loan_inttype, l.loan_facility, l.loan_modintrate, l.loan_reqterms, l.loan_emi, ls.loan_noofinstallment, r.rating_score from perapplicant a, per_demographics d, loandetails l,organisations o, applications app, per_loan_secure ls,laps_cities c, laps_states s, ram_laps_retailscoring r where l.loan_appno='^' and l.loan_appno=d.demo_appno and d.demo_appid=a.perapp_id and d.demo_type='a' and app.app_no=l.loan_appno and app.app_orgcode=o.org_code and ls.loan_appno=l.loan_appno and c.city_code=a.perapp_city and c.state_id=s.state_id and r.rating_appno = l.loan_appno
select formula_rowid,formula_rowname, formula, formula_desc, formula_for, formula_shortcode, formula_cma_no, formula_for_type from com_dynamic_formula where formula_cma_no=^ and formula_for like '^'
select repay_fac_sno from fac_repayment,facilities where repay_appno = facility_appno and repay_fac_sno = facility_sno and repay_appno ='^'

select facility_sno,(select facility_catdesc from facility_master where facility_catid= facility_id) as fac_desc from facility_master a,facilities b where b.facility_headid = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and a.facility_code='TF' and facility_group=0 and facility_category='R'
select distinct perapp_title||' '||perapp_fname as appname from perapplicant a,per_demographics where a.perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and UPPER(demo_type)=UPPER('A')

update loandetails set loan_recmdamt=?, loan_emi=?, loan_interest_emi=?, offeredmargin=(loan_costloanprd-?), loan_repaycapacity=?,LOAN_SECURITYCOLLATERAL=?,loan_modintrate=?,loan_baserate=?,loan_interestid=?,loan_creditrskval=?,loan_busstatval=?,loan_profee=?, LOAN_CFR_VERIFIED=?,LOAN_CFR_BORNAME=?,LOAN_CFR_DEV_RENFO=?,STATUS_VERIFIED=?,LOAN_USERID1=?, LOAN_APPR_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),LOAN_CERSAI_CHECK=?,LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH=?,LOAN_SANCEMI=?,LOAN_SANCROI=? where loan_appno=?

select sum(perinc_yearsalary) as maxlimit,sum(perinc_secincome) as maxlimit1 FROM perincexpenses, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where perinc_id = DEMO_APPID AND demo_appno='^' and demo_type in ('a','c','o','g') and demo_includeincome='2'
select NVL(max(com_rmsuppid),0) as maxid from com_rawmatlsupplied where com_rmsuppappno='^'
select doc_desc from appdocuments, documents where apdoc_appno='^' and apdoc_doctype='PI' and apdoc_doccode=doc_code
select com_rmmsupptype, com_rmsuppmatl from com_rawmatlsupplied where com_rmsuppappno='^' and com_rmsuppid=^
update com_rawmatlsupplied set com_rmmsupptype=?, com_rmsuppmatl=? where com_rmsuppappno=? and com_rmsuppid=?
delete from com_rawmatlsupplied where com_rmsuppappno=? and com_rmsuppid=?
delete from app_reject_reasons where app_no=?
insert into app_reject_reasons( app_no, rej_code)values(?,?)

select months_between(TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'), TO_DATE(to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) as agecompleted, demo_type, demo_appid, perapp_employment, perapp_title, perapp_fname as appname from perapplicant, per_demographics where demo_includeincome='2' and demo_appno='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and demo_type in ('a','c') order by demo_type
select count(demo_appid) as maxsize from per_demographics where demo_includeincome='2' and demo_appno='^' and demo_type in ('a','c')
select prop_type from perpropertydet where prop_appid='^'
select min(min_service) as minimumservice from staffloan_parameter where staff_prd_code='^'
select max(max_service) as maximumservice from staffloan_parameter where staff_prd_code='^'
select max(max_eligible_amount) as max_eligible_amount from staffloan_parameter where staff_prd_code='^' and ^ between min_service and max_service

select months_between(loan_filedon, nvl(indinfo_dateof_joining,loan_filedon))/12 as service_completed from perapplicant, per_demographics, loandetails, individual_info where loan_appno='^' and demo_appno=loan_appno and perapp_id=demo_appid and indinfo_appid=demo_appid and demo_type='a'

select perapp_id, upper(perapp_fname) as perappname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode = org_scode and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and (upper(PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS)='Y' or PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS is null) and perapp_branchcode ^ and nvl(perapp_staffusrid,'0')!='^' and nvl(perapp_istaff, 'N') like '^' group by perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_dob, perapp_id, perapp_oldid order by perapp_fname

select perapp_id, upper(perapp_fname) as perappname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode = org_scode and (upper(PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS)='Y' or PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS is null) ^ and nvl(perapp_staffusrid,'0')!='^' and nvl(perapp_istaff, 'N') like '^' group by perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_dob, perapp_id, perapp_oldid order by perapp_fname

select upper(perapp_fname) as perappname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid from perapplicant, organisations,individual_info where ^ and nvl(indinfo_is_staff, 'N') like '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_branchcode=org_scode and indinfo_appid=perapp_id and org_code like '^' order by perappname
select perapp_fname , org_name from perapplicant,organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode and perapp_id='^'

select trunc(floor(months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob)/12)) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth, to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,perapp_employment,PERAPP_CBSID from perapplicant where perapp_id =(select p2.PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT p1,PERAPPLICANT p2 where p1.PERAPP_OLDID=p2.PERAPP_OLDID and (p2.PERAPP_RENEW is null or p2.PERAPP_RENEW='n') and p1.PERAPP_ID='^')

select sum(EXP.year1)as EXP1, sum(EXP.year2)as EXP2, sum(EXP.year3)as EXP3, sum(EXP.year4)as EXP4 from agr_machboat_op_exp EXP where EXP.mach_op_appno = '^'

select max(sno) as maxsno from sanction_details where appno='^'

select company_id, sno, facility_name, facility_catid, ram_rating, existing_limit, proposed_limit, (proposed_limit - existing_limit) as requested_amt, sanctioned_amt, ram_interest, sanctioned_interest, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as start_date, cbs_taxslab, cbs_noofflows, cbs_loan_frequency, cbs_loan_period, cbs_sector_code, cbs_subsector_code, cbs_purposeof_advance, cbs_operation_mode, cbs_natureof_advance, cbs_sanction_level, cbs_sanction_authority, cbs_sanction_refno, cbs_payment_method, cbs_operating_accno, scheme_code, facility_parent, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd-mm-yyyy') as loan_start_date, FreeText7, cbs_borrowercat, cbs_advtype, cbs_advmode, cbs_indtype, facility_stat_flag,cbs_cust_type,sd1.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_cust_typedesc,cbs_health_code, sd2.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_health_codedesc,cbs_freecode7,sd3.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_freecode7desc from sanction_details,static_data sd1,static_data sd2,static_data sd3 where appno='^' and sno='^' and trim(sd1.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_cust_type and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='67'and trim(sd2.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_health_code and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='68' and trim(sd3.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_freecode7 and sd3.stat_data_id(+)='69'

select company_id,sno,facility_name, facility_catid, ram_rating, existing_limit, proposed_limit, (proposed_limit - existing_limit) as requested_amt, sanctioned_amt, ram_interest, sanctioned_interest, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as start_date, cbs_taxslab,cbs_noofflows, cbs_loan_frequency, cbs_loan_period, cbs_sector_code, cbs_subsector_code, cbs_purposeof_advance, cbs_operation_mode, cbs_natureof_advance, cbs_sanction_level, cbs_sanction_authority, cbs_sanction_refno, cbs_payment_method, cbs_operating_accno, scheme_code, facility_parent, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd-mm-yyyy') as loan_start_date, FreeText7, cbs_accountno, cbs_borrowercat, cbs_advtype, cbs_advmode, cbs_indtype,cbs_cust_type,cbs_health_code,cbs_freecode7 from sanction_details where appno='^' and sno='^' and facility_stat_flag='^'

insert into sanction_details( appno, company_id, company_name, sno, scheme_code, facility_name, facility_catid, facility_parent, ram_rating, existing_limit, proposed_limit, sanctioned_amt, ram_interest, sanctioned_interest, loan_start_date, cbs_taxslab, cbs_noofflows, cbs_loan_frequency, cbs_loan_period, cbs_sector_code, cbs_subsector_code, cbs_purposeof_advance, cbs_operation_mode, cbs_natureof_advance, cbs_sanction_level, cbs_sanction_authority, cbs_sanction_refno, cbs_payment_method, cbs_operating_accno, FreeText7, facility_stat_flag, cbs_accountno, cbs_borrowercat, cbs_advtype, cbs_advmode, cbs_indtype,cbs_cust_type,cbs_health_code,cbs_freecode7) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update sanction_details set ram_rating=?,existing_limit=?, proposed_limit=?, sanctioned_amt=?, ram_interest=?, sanctioned_interest=?, loan_start_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), cbs_taxslab=?, cbs_noofflows=?, cbs_loan_frequency=?, cbs_loan_period=?, cbs_sector_code=?, cbs_subsector_code=?, cbs_purposeof_advance=?, cbs_operation_mode=?, cbs_natureof_advance=?, cbs_sanction_level=?, cbs_sanction_authority=?, cbs_sanction_refno=?, cbs_payment_method=?, cbs_operating_accno=?, FreeText7=?, facility_stat_flag=?, cbs_borrowercat=?, cbs_advtype=?, cbs_advmode=?, cbs_indtype=?,cbs_cust_type=?,cbs_health_code=?,cbs_freecode7=? where appno=? and sno=? and facility_catid=?

select loan_modintrate, loan_terms, loan_amtreqd, loan_costloanprd, loan_recmdamt, loan_downpay,loan_appamt,least(loan_amtreqd,loan_appamt) as recmdamt,loan_metlifepremiumamt,loan_margin,LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME from loandetails where loan_appno='^'

select home_appno, home_applnt,home_appid,home_sino, home_titleaccnt, home_titleadd1, home_titleadd2, home_titlecity,city_name,state_name, home_titlestate, home_titlezip, home_contperson,home_yrbuilt, home_purchaseval, home_monpymt, home_appval,home_mortval, home_extent, home_surveyno, to_char(home_propertytax,'DD/MM/YYYY') as home_propertytax, to_char(home_watertax,'DD/MM/YYYY') as home_watertax, home_other, home_desc, city_name, state_name, home_contperson2, home_contperson3 from per_home, laps_cities, laps_states s where home_appno='^' and home_applnt in ('a','c','g') and city_code(+)=home_titlecity and s.state_code(+)=home_titlestate

select insu_appno,insu_applnt,insu_serialno, insu_policyno,insu_surrenderval,insu_agencyname, insu_agencyphone,insu_iscoll,to_char(insu_matdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as insu_matdate,insu_prepaid from per_insurance where insu_appno='^' and upper(insu_iscoll)='Y' order by insu_serialno
select p.prd_rng_from AS prd_rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to AS prd_rangeto from products p where prd_code='^'

select perapp_fatname,con_comaddr1 as perapp_address1,con_comaddr2 as perapp_address2,con_comvillage as perapp_address3, con_comcity as perapp_city,con_comstate as perapp_state,precity.city_name as perapp_cityname, prestate.state_name as perapp_statename,con_comzip as perapp_zip,con_mobile as perapp_phone, con_permaddr1 as perapp_permadd1,con_permaddr2 as perapp_permadd2,con_permvillage as perapp_permadd3, con_permcity as perapp_permcity,con_permstate as perapp_permstate,con_permzip as perapp_permzip, peremp_address1,peremp_address2,peremp_address3,peremp_city,peremp_state,peremp_zip, peremp_phone,con_permphone as perapp_permphone,permcity.city_name as perapp_permcityname,permstate.state_name as perapp_permstatename, perapp_constitution,stat_data_desc1 as constitution,PEREMP_NAME,PEREMP_EMAIL from laps_cities permcity,perapplicant, cust_contactinfo, peremployer, laps_states permstate, laps_cities precity, laps_states prestate, static_data where stat_data_desc(+)=perapp_constitution and stat_data_id(+)='103' and perapp_id=peremp_id and con_appid=peremp_id and permcity.city_code(+) =con_permcity and permstate.state_code(+)=con_permstate and precity.city_code(+)=con_comcity and prestate.state_code(+)=con_comstate and perapp_id='^'
select loanamount from agr_bullock_repay where appno='^'

select perapp_fname, perapp_address1, perapp_address2, perapp_address3, perapp_city, perapp_state, city_name, state_name, perapp_zip from perapplicant left outer join laps_cities on perapplicant.perapp_city=laps_cities.city_code left outer join laps_states on perapplicant.perapp_state=laps_states.state_code where perapplicant.perapp_id='^'
select duename from duediligencereport where dueappno='^'

select perapp_fname,perapp_address1 ||' '|| perapp_address2 ||' '||perapp_address3 as address, perapp_zip ,perapp_phone,city_name,state_name ,stat_data_desc1 as constitution,org_name from perapplicant, per_demographics, laps_cities,organisations, laps_states,perincexpenses, static_data where demo_appno='^'and org_scode=PERAPP_BRANCHCODE and demo_type in ('a','c','g') and demo_appid=perinc_id and demo_appid=perapp_id and city_code=perapp_city and state_code=perapp_state and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=perinc_selfincometype order by demo_type,perapp_id

select perapp_fname,perapp_address1 ||' '|| perapp_address2 ||' '||perapp_address3 as address, perapp_zip, perapp_phone, perappcity.city_name as perappcityname, perappstate.state_name as perappstatename, stat_data_desc1 as constitution, org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, org_zip, orgcity.city_name, orgstate.state_name from perapplicant, per_demographics, laps_cities perappcity, organisations, laps_states perappstate, static_data, laps_cities orgcity, laps_states orgstate where orgcity.city_code(+)=org_city and orgstate.state_code(+)=org_state and demo_appid='^' and demo_appno='^' and org_scode=PERAPP_BRANCHCODE and demo_type='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and perappcity.city_code=perapp_city and perappstate.state_code=perapp_state and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=perapp_constitution order by demo_type,perapp_id

select perapp_fname,perapp_address1 ||' '|| perapp_address2 ||' '||perapp_address3 as address, perapp_zip ,perapp_phone,city_name,state_name ,stat_data_desc1 as constitution,org_name from perapplicant, per_demographics, laps_cities,organisations, laps_states, static_data where demo_appno='^' and org_scode=PERAPP_BRANCHCODE and demo_type='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and city_code=perapp_city and state_code=perapp_state and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=perapp_constitution order by demo_type,perapp_id
select * from com_technical_page1 where appno='^'and page_type='I'

select com_compdtid,com_compdtaddress1,com_compdtaddress2,com_compdtcity,com_compdtstate,com_compdtpin,com_compdtphone, com_compdtfname||' '||com_compdtmname||' '||com_compdtlname as com_compdtname from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_compdtid='^'

select CR_FATNAME, CR_OFFADD, CR_OFFTELNO, CR_RESADD, CR_RESTELNO, CR_PERMADD, CR_PERMTELNO, CR_APPTYPE, CR_MINORTYPE, CR_AGRITYPE, cr_established, cr_sideline, cr_mainbussiness, stat_data_desc1 as constitution from creditreport, static_data where stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=cr_constitution and cr_appno='^' and CR_APPTYPE='^' order by CR_APPTYPE

select comapp_oldid, comapp_companyname, solid, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regpin, comapp_regcountry, comapp_ownership, CBS_COMPANYCODE, to_char(app_processdate,'DD-MM-YYYY') as sanction_date, to_char(app_processdate+365,'DD-MM-YYYY') as expiry_date, to_char(app_createdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as application_date, to_char(sysdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as current_date, comapp_corpstructure, to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'dd-mm-yyyy') as doi, app_loantype from comapplicant, organisations, com_demographics, applications where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = comapp_id and comapp_org_scode = org_scode and app_no like '^' order by comapp_companyname

select sum(loan_appamt) as approvedamt from applications, loandetails, com_demographics where app_no=loan_appno and demo_appno = app_no and demo_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_processdate in(select max(app_processdate) from applications, com_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappid in(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_id=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='N') or perapp_oldid=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='N')))) and app_approvedby = 'admin' and (upper(app_status)='PA' or upper(app_status)='CA') and to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') between '^' and '^'
