select to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, round((months_between(TO_DATE(sysdate),TO_DATE(perapp_dob)))/12) as agecompleted, perapp_sex, perapp_yrsinpresadd, perapp_education, perapp_category, perapp_branchcode, perapp_brdet, perapp_relativedet, perapp_status, perapp_eduothers, perapp_religion, perapp_hname, perapp_passissue, perapp_salaryrouted, perapp_placeofdomicile, perapp_residencetype, perapp_regno, per_country, per_type_applicant, per_area_specify, per_other_doc, perapp_cbsid, perapp_seladd, perapp_selphysical, perapp_selexservice, perapp_selminority, perapp_country, perapp_permcountry, perapp_istatus, perapp_istaff, perapp_earn, perapp_pension, perapp_spousetitle, perapp_occupation, perapp_yrs_service, perapp_otherearn, perapp_oldid, org_name, perapp_constitution, org_region from perapplicant, organisations, com_demographics where perapp_id = demo_comappid and demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='^' and org_scode(+)=perapp_branchcode

select company_id, sno, facility_name, facility_catid, ram_rating, existing_limit, proposed_limit, (proposed_limit - existing_limit) as requested_amt, sanctioned_amt, ram_interest, sanctioned_interest, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as start_date, cbs_taxslab, sd1.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_taxslab1, cbs_noofflows, cbs_loan_frequency, cbs_loan_period, cbs_sector_code, sd2.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_sector_code1, cbs_subsector_code, sd3.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_subsector_code1, cbs_purposeof_advance, sd4.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_purposeof_advance1, cbs_operation_mode, sd5.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_operation_mode1, cbs_natureof_advance, cbs_sanction_level, cbs_sanction_authority, cbs_sanction_refno, cbs_payment_method, cbs_operating_accno, scheme_code, facility_parent, to_char(loan_start_date,'dd-mm-yyyy') as loan_start_date, FreeText7, cbs_borrowercat, cbs_advtype, cbs_advmode, cbs_indtype, facility_stat_flag,cbs_cust_type,sd6.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_cust_typedesc,cbs_health_code, sd7.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_health_codedesc,cbs_freecode7,sd8.stat_data_desc1 as cbs_freecode7desc from sanction_details, static_data sd1, static_data sd2, static_data sd3, static_data sd4, static_data sd5,static_data sd6,static_data sd7,static_data sd8 where appno='^' and sno='^' and trim(sd1.stat_data_desc(+))=trim(cbs_taxslab) and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='25' and trim(sd2.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_sector_code and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='18' and trim(sd3.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_subsector_code and sd3.stat_data_id(+)='19' and trim(sd4.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_purposeof_advance and sd4.stat_data_id(+)='22' and trim(sd5.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_operation_mode and sd5.stat_data_id(+)='16' and trim(sd6.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_cust_type and sd6.stat_data_id(+)='67' and trim(sd7.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_health_code and sd7.stat_data_id(+)='68' and trim(sd8.stat_data_desc(+))=cbs_freecode7 and sd8.stat_data_id(+)='69'

select ap.perapp_title, ap.perapp_fname, ap.perapp_istatus, ap.PERAPP_SEX, ap.PERAPP_ADDRESS1, ap.PERAPP_ADDRESS2, ap.PERAPP_ADDRESS3 , ap.perapp_cbsid, ap.PERAPP_CITY, ap.PERAPP_STATE, ap.PERAPP_ZIP, perapp_country, ap.PERAPP_RELIGION, ap.perapp_category, ap.PERAPP_SELPHYSICAL||ap.PERAPP_SELEXSERVICE as handiservice, solid, perapp_constitution, to_char(app_processdate,'DD-MM-YYYY') as sanction_date, to_char(app_processdate+365,'DD-MM-YYYY') as expiry_date, to_char(app_createdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as application_date, to_char(sysdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as current_date, to_char(ap.perapp_dob,'dd-mm-yyyy') as perapp_dob, ap.perapp_panno, ap.perapp_marstat, app_loantype from applications, perapplicant ap, com_demographics, organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype='N' and demo_comappid=perapp_id and perapp_branchcode=org_scode
select facility_schemecode from facility_master where facility_catid='^'

select org_code, org_scode, org_name, org_add1||' '|| org_add2 as address, org_city, org_state, org_zip from applications, com_demographics, organisations where app_no='^' and demo_appno=app_no and app_orgcode=org_code and demo_apptype='N'

select facility_id, cbs_accountno,facility_code,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,facility_oldappno, facility_oldappsno,facility_months from facilities,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'

select facility_proposed,repay_no_instalmt,repay_periodicity from fac_repayment, facilities where repay_appno = facility_appno and repay_fac_sno = facility_sno and repay_appno ='^' and facility_headid='^' and facility_id='^'
delete from per_renewal_details where per_appno=?
insert into per_renewal_details(per_appno,per_compliance,per_documents,per_fdc,per_audit) values(?,?,?,?,?)
select per_appno,per_compliance,per_documents,per_fdc,per_audit from per_renewal_details where per_appno='^'
delete from com_proposalin where prop_appno=?
insert into com_proposalin (prop_appno, prop_valuesin) values(?,?)
select app_valuesin as prop_valuesin from applications where app_no='^'

select to_char(visitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as visitdate,visitname1,visitdes1,visitname2,visitdes2,visitname3, visitdes3 ,north,east,west,south,suitability,primary_security,coll_security,present_status,availability, licenses,operation,borrower_name,proper_main,credit_limit,confirmation,other_features,san_inwardno, to_char(dateofreport,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dateofreport from com_pre_sanction_report where appno='^'

select to_char(visitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as visitdate, visitname1, visitdes1, visitname2,visitdes2,visitname3, visitdes3, north, east, west, south, suitability, primary_security, coll_security,present_status,availability, licenses,operation, borrower_name, proper_main, credit_limit,confirmation,other_features,san_inwardno, to_char(dateofreport,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dateofreport from com_pre_sanction_report where san_inwardno='^'
delete from com_pre_sanction_report where appno=?
delete from com_pre_sanction_report where san_inwardno=?

insert into com_pre_sanction_report(appno, visitdate, visitname1, visitdes1, visitname2, visitdes2, visitname3, visitdes3, north, east, west, south, suitability, primary_security, coll_security, present_status, availability, licenses, operation, borrower_name, proper_main, credit_limit, confirmation, other_features,san_inwardno,dateofreport) values(?,TO_DATE(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select combk_bankname, combk_lmtfundexist, combk_lmtfundprop, combk_lmtnonfundexist, combk_lmtnonfundprop from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_bankname!='UBI'
select perapp_title from perapplicant where perapp_id=^
select nvl(count(demo_apptype),0)as promotercount from com_demographics where demo_apptype='^' and demo_appno='^'

select nvl(facility_proposed,0) as proposed_amount, nvl(sec_margin,0) as marginperct from facilities, fac_security_details where sec_facsno(+)=facility_sno and sec_appno(+)=facility_appno and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0
SELECT perapp_id,(perapp_fname)as perapplicant_name,perapp_constitutionnew,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR FROM PERAPPLICANT where perapp_id='^'

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no=demo_appno and demo_apptype='N' and demo_comappid=perapp_id and org_code=app_orgcode and UPPER(app_loantype)=UPPER('^') and UPPER(app_delflag)='Y'

select app_no, perapp_panno, perapp_fname as applname, org_name, app_delusrid, app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and LOWER(app_loantype)=LOWER('^') and LOWER(app_delflag)='y' and perapp_panno like '^'

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid ,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and LOWER(app_loantype)=LOWER('^') and LOWER(app_delflag)='y' and upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%')

select app_no,perapp_panno,perapp_fname as applname,org_name,app_delusrid,app_deldate, app_inwardno from applications,com_demographics,perapplicant,organisations where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = perapp_id and org_code = app_orgcode and UPPER(app_loantype)=UPPER('^') and UPPER(app_delflag)='Y' and app_no like '^'
select demo_apptype from perapplicant, com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype!='N' and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_apptype='SH@'
select ind_no, ind_bsr_code, ind_name, ind_exposure, to_char(ind_exp_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ind_exp_expirydate from industry_master where ind_grpcode ='^' order by ind_name
update industry_master set ind_exposure=?,ind_exp_expirydate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where ind_no=?

SELECT exp_id,exp_type,static_data.stat_data_desc1 exp_desc,exp_maxexp, to_char(exp_expirydate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as exp_expirydate, static_data.stat_data_desc as exp_grpcode,exp_panno,exp_groupborr from exposure, static_data where static_data.stat_data_id='47' and static_data.stat_data_sno=exposure.exp_id and exp_id=^
select ind_no, ind_bsr_code, ind_name, ind_exposure, to_char(ind_exp_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ind_exp_expirydate, ind_grpcode from industry_master where ind_no ='^' order by ind_name

SELECT exp_id,exp_type,static_data.stat_data_desc1 exp_desc,exp_maxexp, to_char(exp_expirydate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as exp_expirydate, static_data.stat_data_desc as exp_grpcode from exposure, static_data where static_data.stat_data_id='47' and static_data.stat_data_sno=exposure.exp_id and static_data.stat_data_desc='^' and exposure.exp_type='Industry'
select IND_SANCLIMIT, IND_OSLIMIT from indgrpexpdetails where IND_GRP='^'
select to_char(sysdate-1,'DD/MM/YYYY') as date1 from dual
insert into consexposure (exp_type, exp_constitution, exp_publictype, exp_maxlimit) values(?,?,?,?)
delete from consexposure where exp_type=? and exp_constitution=? and exp_publictype=?

select exp_type, exp_constitution, exp_publictype, exp_maxlimit, static_data.stat_data_desc1 as constitution from consexposure, static_data where static_data.stat_data_id='14' and static_data.stat_data_desc= consexposure.exp_constitution order by exp_type

select (int_intvalue+nvl(prd_adjust,0)) as prd_interest, prd_adjust,prd_interestid,int_intvalue as prd_baserate,prd_creditrskpremium,prd_busstrategicpremium from prd_interest_limit pil, bobinterestindex intindex where prd_intid = (select prdint_sno from prdint_master where upper(prdint_inttype)=upper('^') and prdint_prdcode='^' and prd_amtrangefrom ^ '^' and prd_amtrangeto ^ '^') and intindex.int_intid=prd_interestid and INT_USEFLAG='Y' order by prd_termfrom

select max((int_intvalue+nvl(prd_adjust,0))) as prd_interest from prd_interest_limit pil, bobinterestindex intindex where prd_intid = (select prdint_sno from prdint_master where upper(prdint_inttype)=upper('^') and prdint_prdcode='^' and prd_amtrangefrom ^ '^' and prd_amtrangeto ^ '^') and prd_termfrom ^ '^' and intindex.int_intid=prd_interestid and INT_USEFLAG='Y' order by prd_termfrom

select (int_intvalue+nvl(prd_adjust,0)) as prd_interest, prd_termfrom, prd_termto from prdint_master, prd_interest_limit, bobinterestindex where INT_USEFLAG='Y' and prd_intid=prdint_sno and upper(prdint_inttype)=upper('Combo') and prdint_prdcode='^' and bobinterestindex.int_intid=prd_interestid and prd_amtrangefrom ^ '^' and prd_amtrangeto ^ '^' and prd_termfrom ^ '^' order by to_number(prd_termfrom)

select (int_intvalue+nvl(prd_adjust,0)) as prd_interest, prd_termfrom, prd_termto from prdint_master, prd_interest_limit, bobinterestindex where INT_USEFLAG='Y' and prd_intid=prdint_sno and upper(prdint_inttype)=upper('Combo') and prdint_prdcode='^' and bobinterestindex.int_intid=prd_interestid and prd_amtrangefrom ^ '^' and prd_amtrangeto ^ '^' and prd_termfrom ^ '^' order by to_number(prd_termfrom) desc

insert into appinwardreg (inward_no, inward_sector, inward_createdon, inward_appliedon, inward_custname, inward_borrowertype, inward_cbscustid, inward_add1, inward_add2, inward_city, inward_state, inward_zipcode, inward_phone,inward_enquirypurpose, inward_mobile, inward_email, inward_dob, inward_pantan, inward_purpose, inward_scheme, inward_termloanamt, inward_wcloanamt, inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_ADDITIONALDETAILS, inward_docreceivedon, inward_docreceived, inward_applnprocessat, inward_orgscode, inward_usrid, inward_valuesin, inward_modifiedby, inward_modifieddate,inward_appliedfor,inward_proptype,inward_passportnumber,inward_voterid,inward_gender,inward_cibilreport, inward_dist,inward_appstatus,inward_rejreason,inward_schemedesc,inward_bankscheme, inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsamount,inward_sponagency,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency,INWARD_SSI,INWARD_TINY,inward_clpudate,inward_canvassedbystaff, inward_staffid,inward_borrowerstatus,inward_nsdlrefno,inw_leadno,INWARD_LEADGENBY,INWARD_AGENTID,INWARD_CONVERTEDBY,INWARD_LEADREGION,UNIQUEID,SOURCE_BY,REASON_JS) values(?,?,sysdate,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update appinwardreg set inward_sector=?, inward_appliedon=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), inward_custname=?, inward_borrowertype=?, inward_cbscustid=?, inward_add1=?, inward_add2=?, inward_city=?, inward_state=?, inward_zipcode=?, inward_phone=?,inward_mobile=?, inward_email=?, inward_dob=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), inward_pantan=?, inward_purpose=?, inward_scheme=?, inward_termloanamt=?, inward_wcloanamt=?, inward_nonwcloanamt=?, inward_ADDITIONALDETAILS=?, inward_docreceivedon=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), inward_docreceived=?, inward_applnprocessat=?, inward_valuesin=?, inward_modifiedby=?, inward_modifieddate=sysdate,inward_appliedfor=?,inward_proptype=?, inward_passportnumber=?,inward_voterid=?,inward_enquirypurpose=?,inward_gender=?, inward_cibilreport=?,inward_dist=?,inward_appstatus=?,inward_rejreason=?,inward_schemedesc=?,inward_bankscheme=?, inward_govtspons=?,inward_schmetype=?,inward_subsamount=?,inward_sponagency=?,inward_subsdtype=?,inward_otheragency=?,INWARD_SSI=?, INWARD_TINY=?,inward_clpudate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),inward_canvassedbystaff=?,inward_staffid=?,inward_borrowerstatus=?,inw_leadno=?,INWARD_LEADGENBY=?,INWARD_AGENTID=?,INWARD_CONVERTEDBY=?,INWARD_LEADREGION=? ,UNIQUEID=?,SOURCE_BY=?,REASON_JS=? where inward_no=?
update appinwardreg set inward_assignusrid=?, inward_assigndate=sysdate where inward_no=?
delete from appinwardreg where inward_no = ?

select inward_no, inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_createdon,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon, inward_custname, inward_borrowertype, inward_cbscustid, inward_add1, inward_add2, inward_city, inward_state, inward_zipcode, inward_phone, inward_mobile, inward_email, to_char(inward_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_dob, inward_pantan, inward_purpose, inward_scheme, inward_termloanamt, inward_wcloanamt, inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_ADDITIONALDETAILS, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon, inward_docreceived, inward_applnprocessat, city_name, state_name, inward_orgscode, org_name, inward_appatached, inward_brstatus, inward_appliedfor from appinwardreg, laps_cities, laps_states, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and inward_city=city_code(+) and inward_state=state_code(+) and upper(inward_custname) like upper('%^%') and inward_orgscode='^'

select inward_no, inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_createdon,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon, inward_custname, inward_borrowertype, inward_cbscustid, inward_add1, inward_add2, inward_city, inward_state, inward_zipcode, inward_phone, inward_mobile, inward_email, to_char(inward_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_dob, inward_pantan, inward_purpose, inward_scheme, inward_termloanamt, inward_wcloanamt, inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_ADDITIONALDETAILS, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon, inward_docreceived, inward_applnprocessat, city_name, state_name, inward_orgscode, org_name, inward_appatached, inward_brstatus, inward_appliedfor from appinwardreg, laps_cities, laps_states, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and inward_city=city_code(+) and inward_state=state_code(+) and inward_no='^' and inward_orgscode='^'
select inwardseq.nextval from dual

select inward_no, inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_createdon,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon, inward_custname, inward_borrowertype, inward_cbscustid, inward_add1, inward_add2, inward_city, inward_state, inward_zipcode, inward_phone, inward_mobile, inward_email, to_char(inward_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_dob, inward_pantan, inward_purpose, inward_scheme, inward_termloanamt, inward_wcloanamt, inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_ADDITIONALDETAILS, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon, inward_docreceived, inward_applnprocessat, inwardcity.city_name as custcity,inwardstate.state_name as custstate, inward_orgscode, org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, org_zip, org_phone, inward_appliedfor, orgcity.city_name,orgstate.state_name,Inward_brstatus,inward_assignusrid,inward_appatached,inward_valuesin,decode(inward_sector,'c','Corporate','p','Retail','t','Tertiary','a','Agricultue') as sectordesc,inward_proptype,inward_passportnumber,inward_voterid,inward_enquirypurpose,inward_gender,inward_cibilreport,inward_dist,inward_appstatus,inward_rejreason,inward_schemedesc,inward_bankscheme, inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsamount,inward_sponagency,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency,INWARD_SSI,INWARD_TINY,to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate, inward_canvassedbystaff,inward_staffid,inward_borrowerstatus,inward_nsdlrefno,inw_leadno,inward_usrid,INWARD_LEADGENBY,INWARD_AGENTID,INWARD_CONVERTEDBY,
INWARD_EXTERNALAPP_FLAG,INWARD_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,INWARD_CIBILSCORE,INWARD_CIBILDETAILS,INWARD_LEADREGION,UNIQUEID,SOURCE_BY,REASON_JS from appinwardreg,
laps_cities inwardcity, laps_states inwardstate, organisations, laps_cities orgcity,laps_states orgstate where orgstate.state_code(+)=org_state and orgcity.city_code(+)=org_city and inward_orgscode=org_scode and inwardcity.city_code(+)=inward_city and inwardstate.state_code(+)=inward_state and inward_no='^' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null

select inward_no, inward_custname, inward_docreceived,INWARD_ADD1,INWARD_ADD2,INWARD_CITY, INWARD_STATE,INWARD_ZIPCODE,INWARD_PHONE,INWARD_MOBILE,INWARD_EMAIL,to_char(INWARD_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as inward_dob,INWARD_PANTAN, INWARD_PASSPORTNUMBER,INWARD_VOTERID,INWARD_GENDER,inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_subsamount,inward_sponagency,inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency,inward_bankscheme, to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon,inward_nsdlrefno,to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon, (select mis_static_data_desc from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and mis_static_data_code=INWARD_BANKSCHEME) as bankScheme from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^%' and upper(inward_custname) like upper('%^%') ^ and inward_applnprocessat='^' and inward_sector in (^) and inward_appatached='N' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null and inward_appstatus='1' and INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' order by inward_no

select inward_no, inward_custname, decode(inward_sector,'c','Corporate','p','Retail','t','Tertiary','a','Agricultue') as sector, inward_brstatus, inward_assignusrid, inward_appatached, inward_valuesin, org_name, inward_borrowertype, decode(inward_proptype,'C','Corporate-Regular','H','Corporate-Adhoc','V','Corporate-Short term','E','Corporate-Short Term Review Extension') as proptype from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and inward_applnprocessat='^' and org_code like '^%' and inward_docreceived='Y' and inward_brstatus ^ order by inward_brstatus desc,inward_no asc
select NVL(max(Scheme_RULENO),0)+1 as Scheme_RULENO from setschemedocument where Scheme_ID='^'
select distinct(Scheme_ID), Scheme_DESC from setschemedocument where Scheme_sector='^' order by Scheme_ID
select Scheme_ID, Scheme_RULENO, Scheme_DESC, Document_CONTENT, Scheme_sector,Scheme_Active from setschemedocument where Scheme_ID='^'
select nvl(max(to_number(CR_SLNO)),0)+1 as maxsno from creditreport where CR_INWARDNO='^'

update creditreport set CR_NAME=?, CR_FatName=?, CR_Offadd=?, CR_OffTelno=?, CR_Resadd=?, CR_ResTelno=?, CR_Permadd=?, CR_PermTelno=?,CR_APPTYPE=?, CR_AGRITYPE=?, CR_MINORTYPE=? ,cr_mainbussiness=?,cr_sideline=?,cr_constitution=?,cr_established=? where cr_inwardno=? and cr_slno=?

select CR_APPNO, CR_NAME, CR_FATNAME, CR_OFFADD, CR_OFFTELNO, CR_RESADD, CR_RESTELNO, CR_PERMADD, CR_PERMTELNO, CR_APPTYPE, CR_MINORTYPE, CR_AGRITYPE, CR_INWARDNO, CR_SLNO, CR_MAINBUSSINESS, CR_SIDELINE, CR_CONSTITUTION, CR_ESTABLISHED, stat_data_desc1 as constitution from creditreport, static_data where stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=cr_constitution and cr_inwardno='^' and CR_SLNO='^'
select NVL(max(Scheme_RULENO),0)+1 as Scheme_RULENO from setschemedocument where Scheme_ID='^'
delete setschemedocument where Scheme_ID=? and Scheme_RULENO =?
insert into setschemedocument (Scheme_ID, Scheme_RULENO, Scheme_DESC, Document_CONTENT, Scheme_sector,Scheme_Active) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
update setschemedocument set Scheme_DESC=?,Document_CONTENT=?,Scheme_Active=? where Scheme_ID = ? and Scheme_RULENO = ?
select NVL(max(Scheme_ID),0)+1 as Scheme_ID from setschemedocument
delete from creditreport where cr_inwardno=? and CR_SLNO=?
delete from creditreport where cr_inwardno=?

select cr_appno, cr_name, cr_fatname, cr_offadd, cr_offtelno, cr_resadd, cr_restelno, cr_permadd, cr_permtelno, cr_apptype, cr_minortype, cr_agritype, cr_inwardno, cr_slno, cr_mainbussiness, cr_sideline, cr_constitution, cr_established from creditreport where cr_inwardno='^' and cr_appno is null order by cr_slno
select max(CR_SLNO) as slno from creditreport where cr_inwardno='^'
select count(cr_appno) as crcount from creditreport where cr_appno='^'

select Scheme_ID,SCHEME_RULENO,scheme_Desc,Document_content,mis_static_data_desc from setschemedocument,MIS_STATICDATA where Scheme_ID='^' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=Scheme_ID order by SCHEME_ID,SCHEME_RULENO
update creditreport set cr_apptype=?,cr_appno=? where cr_inwardno=? and cr_slno=?
update creditreport_totmeans set cr_appno=?, cr_apptype=? where cr_inwardno=? and cr_slno=?
update creditreport_assets set cr_appno=?, cr_apptype=? where cr_inwardno=? and cr_slno=?
update appinwardreg set inward_brstatus=?, inward_assignusrid=null where inward_no=?
update creditreport set CR_APPNO=?,CR_APPTYPE=? where cr_inwardno=?
update com_pre_sanction_report set appno=? where san_inwardno=?
select app_no from applications where app_inwardno='^' and app_delflag='N'
update appinwardreg set inward_appatached=?,inward_appstatus_online=? where inward_no=?

select inward_brstatus,inward_appliedfor,inward_internetapp,app_orgcode,inward_no,app_renew_flag, app_parent_appno,inward_nsdlrefno,app_exceluploadflag,inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt,inward_bankscheme from appinwardreg, applications where inward_no=app_inwardno and app_no='^'
update ops_inspectionreport set ins_appno=? where ins_inwardno=?
update ops_inspectionfacility set ins_appno=? where ins_inwardno=?
update duediligencereport set dueappno=? where dueinwardno=?
update presanctionvisitreport set pre_strAppno=? where pre_inwardno=?
delete from brrecomdfacility where brrecmd_inwardno=? and brrecmd_facsno=?
delete from brrecomdfacility where brrecmd_inwardno=?

insert into brrecomdfacility(brrecmd_inwardno, brrecmd_facsno, brrecmd_facnature, brrecmd_factype, brrecmd_limitapplied, brrecmd_purpose, brrecmd_limitrecmd, brrecmd_appno, brrecmd_facgroup,brrecmd_limitexist) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update brrecomdfacility set brrecmd_facnature=?, brrecmd_factype=?, brrecmd_limitapplied=?, brrecmd_purpose=?, brrecmd_limitrecmd=?, brrecmd_facgroup=?,brrecmd_limitexist=? where brrecmd_inwardno=? and brrecmd_facsno=?
select (nvl(max(brrecmd_facsno),0)+1) as srno from brrecomdfacility where brrecmd_inwardno='^'

select brrecmd_facsno, brrecmd_facnature, brrecmd_factype, brrecmd_limitapplied, brrecmd_purpose, brrecmd_limitrecmd, brrecmd_facgroup,brrecmd_limitexist from brrecomdfacility where brrecmd_inwardno='^' and brrecmd_facgroup='^'

select brrecmd_facsno, brrecmd_facnature, brrecmd_factype, brrecmd_limitapplied, brrecmd_purpose, brrecmd_limitrecmd, brrecmd_facgroup,brrecmd_limitexist from brrecomdfacility where brrecmd_appno='^' and brrecmd_facgroup='^'
select (nvl(max(brrecmd_secsno),0)+1) as srno from brrecmdsecurity where brrecmd_inwardno='^'
delete from brrecmdsecurity where brrecmd_inwardno=? and brrecmd_secsno=?
delete from brrecmdsecurity where brrecmd_inwardno=?
insert into brrecmdsecurity (brrecmd_inwardno, brrecmd_secsno, brrecmd_sectype, brrecmd_secvalue, brrecmd_secdesc, brrecmd_appno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
update brrecmdsecurity set brrecmd_sectype=?, brrecmd_secvalue=?, brrecmd_secdesc=? where brrecmd_inwardno=? and brrecmd_secsno=?
select brrecmd_secsno, brrecmd_sectype, brrecmd_secvalue, brrecmd_secdesc from brrecmdsecurity where brrecmd_inwardno='^' order by brrecmd_sectype

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno and mail_type='CC') and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and mail_type='CC' and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and lower(app_loantype)='p' and Upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno ) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and mail_type='CC' and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and lower(app_loantype)='a' and Upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), perapp_id,mail_type from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno=a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid='^' and mail_type='CC' and app_orgcode=org_code and mail_appno=app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and upper(app_loantype)='T' and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_type='CC' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and upper(app_loantype)='^' and app_delflag='N' order by mail_date desc

select count(app_no) as appno, app_loantype from appmailbox a, applications where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno and mail_type='CC') and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid = '^' and mail_type='CC' and Upper(app_status) not like 'C_' and Upper(app_status) not like 'P_' and app_delflag='N' group by app_loantype

select inward_no, inward_custname, decode(inward_sector,'c','Corporate','p','Retail','t','Tertiary','a','Agriculture') as sector,inward_brstatus, inward_assignusrid, inward_appatached, inward_valuesin, org_name, inward_borrowertype, inward_appliedfor, inward_applnprocessat, org_scode, inward_usrid,(select USR_FNAME from users where USR_ID=inward_usrid) as inward_usrname, (select USR_FNAME from users where USR_ID=inward_assignusrid) as inward_assignusrname, inward_applnprocessat,inward_appstatus from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^' and upper(INWARD_CUSTNAME) like upper('%^%') and INWARD_DELFLAG is null order by INWARD_CREATEDON desc

select lawyer_code, lawyer_name, lawyer_address1, lawyer_address2, lawyer_address3, lawyer_city, lawyer_state, lawyer_pincode, lawyer_country, lawyer_off_phoneno, lawyer_off_faxno, lawyer_res_phoneno, lawyer_res_mobno, lawyer_contper, lawyer_contper_phmobno, lawyer_design, lawyer_email, TO_CHAR(lawyer_empaneleddt,'DD/MM/YYYY') as lawyer_empaneleddt, lawyer_active, lawyer_comments, lawyer_blacklist, TO_CHAR( lawyer_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as lawyer_blacklistdate,lawyer_regionalcode, lawyer_seqno from lawyermaster where lawyer_seqno = '^'

select inward_no, inward_custname, inward_docreceived,INWARD_ADD1,INWARD_ADD2,INWARD_CITY, INWARD_STATE,INWARD_ZIPCODE,INWARD_PHONE,INWARD_MOBILE,INWARD_EMAIL,to_char(INWARD_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as inward_dob,INWARD_PANTAN, INWARD_PASSPORTNUMBER,INWARD_VOTERID,INWARD_GENDER,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon, inward_subsamount,inward_sponagency,inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency,inward_bankscheme, inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt,inward_nsdlrefno,to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon ,(select mis_static_data_desc from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and mis_static_data_code=INWARD_BANKSCHEME) as bankScheme from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^%' and inward_no = '^' ^ and inward_applnprocessat='^' and inward_sector in (^) and inward_appatached='N' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null and inward_appstatus='1' and INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' order by inward_no

select distinct(p.prd_code) as prdcode, c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto, p.prd_term as term,p.prd_minterm as minterm, p.nsc_loan as nsc_loan ,p1.prd_maxintclass as class, p.prd_type as prd_type, nvl(prd_principal,0) as prd_principal, nvl(prd_interest,0) as prd_interest, p.incomeflag, prd_staffprd, p2.prd_appminage, p2.prd_guaminage,p.scheme_code from prd_category c, prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1, prd_interest p2, prd_used where p1.prd_code=p.prd_code and p2.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_org_scode like '^' and prd_used.prd_code=p.prd_code and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date(p.prd_eff_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_date(p.prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(prd_renew)='N' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and (PRD_WHTDIGIPRD!='Y' or PRD_WHTDIGIPRD is null) and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and ^ and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and upper(c1.cat_name) like upper('%^%') and prd_type='^' order by c.cat_name

update products set prd_desc =?, prd_internet='N' where prd_code=?

select (perinc_takehome/12) as income_salaried,((perinc_year1_income+perinc_year2_income)/2) as income_nonsalaried,perinc_year1_income as nonsal_itry1, perinc_year2_income as nonsal_itry2, perinc_depreciation_year1 as depreciation1, perinc_depreciation_year2 as depreciation2, perinc_intonliab_year1 as intonliab1,perinc_intonliab_year2 as intonliab2 from PERINCEXPENSES where perinc_id=(select demo_appid from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')

select (perinc_takehome/12) as income_salaried,((perinc_year1_income+perinc_year2_income)/2) as income_nonsalaried,perinc_year1_income as nonsal_itry1, perinc_year2_income as nonsal_itry2, perinc_depreciation_year1 as depreciation1, perinc_depreciation_year2 as depreciation2, perinc_intonliab_year1 as intonliab1,perinc_intonliab_year2 as intonliab2,perinc_monsalary as grossincome_salaried ,perinc_otherincome,TO_CHAR(perinc_itrdate1,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perinc_itrdate1,TO_CHAR(perinc_itrdate2,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perinc_itrdate2,TO_CHAR(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perinc_yearend1,to_char(perinc_yearend2,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perinc_yearend2,perinc_takehome from PERINCEXPENSES where perinc_id='^'

insert into PERAPPLICANT(perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid, perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_fatname,perapp_constitution,perapp_panno,perapp_sex, perapp_dob,perapp_marstat,perapp_istatus,perapp_status,perapp_branchcode,perapp_regno,perapp_taxslab,perapp_employment,perapp_occupation, perapp_loa_since,perapp_bank,perapp_banksince,perapp_salaryrouted,perapp_relation_bankstaff,perapp_relation_staffname, perapp_blood_relation,perapp_introname,perapp_introstatus,perapp_tradefinance,perapp_inlandtrade,perapp_indcode, perapp_religion,perapp_companyname,perapp_satisfactory,perapp_id,perapp_appdate,perapp_cbsstatus,perapp_just_details,perapp_relat_staffid,PERAPP_NETWORTH,PERAPP_NETWORTHASON, PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID,perapp_constitutionnew,perapp_lending,perapp_stakeheld_women,perapp_aadhaar,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DET,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_REGNO, PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,PERAPP_COM_AUTHCAPTAL,PERAPP_COM_PAIDUPCAP,PERAPP_COM_MOAVERIFIED,PERAPP_COM_AMENDEDMOA,PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_TRUST_REGTYPE,PERAPP_TRUST_PERMREFNO, PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_LEGAL_ENTITYID,PERAPP_LEGAL_EXPIRYDATE, PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER_DATE,PERAPP_CRITERIA_SALES_TURNOVER, PERAPP_CERTIFICATION_DATE ,PERAPP_MSME_CLASSIFICATION) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)

update PERAPPLICANT set perapp_cbsid=?,perapp_title=?,perapp_fname=?,perapp_lname=?,perapp_fatname=?, perapp_constitution=?,perapp_panno=?,perapp_sex=?,perapp_dob=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),perapp_marstat=?, perapp_istatus=?,perapp_status=?,perapp_branchcode=?,perapp_regno=?,perapp_taxslab=?, perapp_employment=?,perapp_occupation=?,perapp_loa_since=?,perapp_bank=?,perapp_banksince=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), perapp_salaryrouted=?,perapp_relation_bankstaff=?,perapp_relation_staffname=?,perapp_blood_relation=?,perapp_introname=?, perapp_introstatus=?,perapp_tradefinance=?,perapp_inlandtrade=?,perapp_indcode=?,perapp_religion=?,perapp_companyname=?, perapp_satisfactory=?,perapp_appdate=sysdate,perapp_just_details=?, perapp_relat_staffid=?,PERAPP_NETWORTH=?,PERAPP_NETWORTHASON=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_INTROTYPE=?,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID=?, PERAPP_INTROCBSID=?,perapp_constitutionnew=?,perapp_lending=?,perapp_stakeheld_women=?,perapp_aadhaar=?, PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DET=?,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_REGNO=?, PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_COM_AUTHCAPTAL=?,PERAPP_COM_PAIDUPCAP=?,PERAPP_COM_MOAVERIFIED=?,PERAPP_COM_AMENDEDMOA=?, PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_TRUST_REGTYPE=?,PERAPP_TRUST_PERMREFNO=?, PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR=?,PERAPP_MSE_REGNO=?,PERAPP_LEGAL_ENTITYID=?,PERAPP_LEGAL_EXPIRYDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO=?,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER=?, PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER_DATE =to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_CRITERIA_SALES_TURNOVER=?,PERAPP_CERTIFICATION_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_MSME_CLASSIFICATION=?,PERAPP_INVOCDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_INVOCUSRID=?,PERAPP_INVOCREATDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'), PERAPP_PAGESTATUS=? where perapp_id=?

SELECT perapp_id, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid, perapp_title, perapp_fname, perapp_lname, perapp_fatname, perapp_constitution, perapp_panno, perapp_sex, TO_CHAR(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perapp_dob, perapp_marstat, perapp_status, perapp_istatus, perapp_branchcode, perapp_regno, perapp_taxslab, perapp_employment, perapp_occupation, perapp_loa_since, perapp_bank, TO_CHAR(perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perapp_banksince, perapp_salaryrouted, perapp_relation_bankstaff, perapp_relation_staffname, perapp_blood_relation, perapp_introname, perapp_introstatus, perapp_tradefinance, perapp_inlandtrade, perapp_indcode, perapp_religion, perapp_companyname, perapp_satisfactory, org_name,perapp_just_details,perapp_relat_staffid,PERAPP_NETWORTH,to_char(PERAPP_NETWORTHASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_NETWORTHASON, PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID,perapp_constitutionnew,perapp_lending,indinfo_resident_status, indinfo_resident_country, indinfo_is_staff, TO_CHAR(indinfo_dateof_joining,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS indinfo_dateof_joining, indinfo_staff_id, indinfo_caste, indinfo_minority, indinfo_religion, indinfo_dependents_child, indinfo_dependents_others, indinfo_earning_member, indinfo_edu_qual, indinfo_area_specialized, indinfo_senior_citizen, indinfo_physically_challanged, indinfo_exservice_man, indinfo_service_years, indinfo_is_minor, indinfo_guardian_appid, indinfo_guardian_name, indinfo_guardian_relation, indinfo_guardian_address, indinfo_spouse_title, indinfo_spouse_name, TO_CHAR(indinfo_spouse_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS indinfo_spouse_dob, indinfo_spouse_occupation, indinfo_spouse_qualification, indinfo_spouse_panno, indinfo_spouse_employer, indinfo_spouse_income, indinfo_spouse_address, TO_CHAR(cominfo_commencement_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cominfo_commencement_date, TO_CHAR(cominfo_incorporation_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cominfo_incorporation_date, cominfo_ownership_type, cominfo_roc_number, cominfo_cin, cominfo_tin, cominfo_groupid, cominfo_groupname, cominfo_industry_type, cominfo_total_employees, cominfo_loa_nbfc, cominfo_nbfc_deposit, cominfo_nbfc_infra, cominfo_nbfc_asset, cominfo_micro_fin_inst, cominfo_minority_community, cominfo_shg_location, cominfo_shg_members, cominfo_shg_beneficiaries, cominfo_shg_scheme, cominfo_shg_ngo, cominfo_shg_acctno,indinfo_family_income, indinfo_bankarrangement,indinfo_banksector,INDINFO_BLIND,COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,companyinfo_typeofliability,(SELECT cbs_static_data_desc FROM cbs_staticdata WHERE cbs_static_data_id = '31' AND cbs_static_data_code = cominfo_comgroupid) as com_groupname,cominfo_comgroupid, perapp_stakeheld_women,perapp_aadhaar,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DET,TO_CHAR(PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_REGNO, TO_CHAR(PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,PERAPP_COM_AUTHCAPTAL,PERAPP_COM_PAIDUPCAP,PERAPP_COM_MOAVERIFIED,PERAPP_COM_AMENDEDMOA, TO_CHAR(PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_TRUST_REGTYPE,PERAPP_TRUST_PERMREFNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_LEGAL_ENTITYID, TO_CHAR(PERAPP_LEGAL_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_LEGAL_EXPIRYDATE,TO_CHAR(PERAPP_LEGAL_ISSUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LEI_ISSUE_DATE,c.COMINFO_IEC,c.COMINFO_GSTIN,c.COMINFO_GSTINREG,p.PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,c.COMINFO_GSTIN,pr.PEREMP_EXPINYRS, to_char(cominfo_employees_asondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cominfo_employees_asondate,c.COMINFO_GST_EXEMPTED,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER, to_char(PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER_DATE ,PERAPP_CRITERIA_SALES_TURNOVER ,to_char(PERAPP_CERTIFICATION_DATE ,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_CERTIFICATION_DATE,PERAPP_MSME_CLASSIFICATION,pr.peremp_department,to_char(pr.peremp_retdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as peremp_retdate,pr.PEREMP_ID,to_char(pr.PEREMP_ESTABLISH,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PEREMP_ESTABLISH,to_char(PERAPP_INVOCDATE ,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_INVOCDATE ,to_char(perapp_invocdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_invocdate from perapplicant p left join peremployer pr on pr.PEREMP_ID=p.perapp_id, organisations o, individual_info i, company_info c where p.perapp_id='^' and o.org_scode =p.perapp_branchcode and i.indinfo_appid=p.perapp_id and c.cominfo_appid=p.perapp_id

SELECT perapp_id, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid, perapp_title, perapp_fname, perapp_lname, perapp_fatname, perapp_constitution, perapp_panno, perapp_sex, TO_CHAR(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perapp_dob, perapp_marstat, perapp_status, perapp_istatus, perapp_branchcode, perapp_regno, perapp_taxslab, perapp_employment, perapp_occupation, perapp_loa_since, perapp_bank, TO_CHAR(perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS perapp_banksince, perapp_salaryrouted, perapp_relation_bankstaff, perapp_relation_staffname, perapp_blood_relation, perapp_introname, perapp_introstatus, perapp_tradefinance, perapp_inlandtrade, perapp_indcode, perapp_religion, perapp_companyname, perapp_satisfactory, org_name,perapp_just_details,perapp_relat_staffid,PERAPP_NETWORTH,to_char(PERAPP_NETWORTHASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_NETWORTHASON, PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID,perapp_constitutionnew,perapp_lending,indinfo_resident_status, indinfo_resident_country, indinfo_is_staff, TO_CHAR(indinfo_dateof_joining,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS indinfo_dateof_joining, indinfo_staff_id, indinfo_caste, indinfo_minority, indinfo_religion, indinfo_dependents_child, indinfo_dependents_others, indinfo_earning_member, indinfo_edu_qual, indinfo_area_specialized, indinfo_senior_citizen, indinfo_physically_challanged, indinfo_exservice_man, indinfo_service_years, indinfo_is_minor, indinfo_guardian_appid, indinfo_guardian_name, indinfo_guardian_relation, indinfo_guardian_address, indinfo_spouse_title, indinfo_spouse_name, TO_CHAR(indinfo_spouse_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS indinfo_spouse_dob, indinfo_spouse_occupation, indinfo_spouse_qualification, indinfo_spouse_panno, indinfo_spouse_employer, indinfo_spouse_income, indinfo_spouse_address, TO_CHAR(cominfo_commencement_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cominfo_commencement_date, TO_CHAR(cominfo_incorporation_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cominfo_incorporation_date, cominfo_ownership_type, cominfo_roc_number, cominfo_cin, cominfo_tin, cominfo_groupid, cominfo_groupname, cominfo_industry_type, cominfo_total_employees, cominfo_loa_nbfc, cominfo_nbfc_deposit, cominfo_nbfc_infra, cominfo_nbfc_asset, cominfo_micro_fin_inst, cominfo_minority_community, cominfo_shg_location, cominfo_shg_members, cominfo_shg_beneficiaries, cominfo_shg_scheme, cominfo_shg_ngo, cominfo_shg_acctno,indinfo_family_income, indinfo_bankarrangement,indinfo_banksector,INDINFO_BLIND,COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,companyinfo_typeofliability,(SELECT cbs_static_data_desc FROM cbs_staticdata WHERE cbs_static_data_id = '31' AND cbs_static_data_code = cominfo_comgroupid) as com_groupname,cominfo_comgroupid from perapplicant p, organisations o, individual_info i, company_info c where (p.perapp_id=(select PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_OLDID='^' and (PERAPP_RENEW is null or perapp_renew='n')) or p.perapp_id='^') and o.org_scode =p.perapp_branchcode and i.indinfo_appid=p.perapp_id and c.cominfo_appid=p.perapp_id order by p.PERAPP_ID desc

insert into INDIVIDUAL_INFO(indinfo_resident_status,indinfo_resident_country,indinfo_is_staff,indinfo_dateof_joining,indinfo_staff_id, indinfo_caste,indinfo_minority,indinfo_religion,indinfo_dependents_child,indinfo_dependents_others,indinfo_earning_member, indinfo_edu_qual,indinfo_area_specialized,indinfo_senior_citizen,indinfo_physically_challanged,indinfo_exservice_man, indinfo_service_years,indinfo_is_minor,indinfo_guardian_appid,indinfo_guardian_name,indinfo_guardian_relation,indinfo_guardian_address, indinfo_spouse_title,indinfo_spouse_name,indinfo_spouse_dob,indinfo_spouse_occupation,indinfo_spouse_qualification, indinfo_spouse_panno,indinfo_spouse_employer,indinfo_spouse_income,indinfo_spouse_address,indinfo_appid,indinfo_family_income, indinfo_bankarrangement,indinfo_banksector,INDINFO_BLIND) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from INDIVIDUAL_INFO where indinfo_appid=?

insert into COMPANY_INFO (cominfo_appid,cominfo_commencement_date,cominfo_incorporation_date,cominfo_ownership_type,cominfo_roc_number,cominfo_cin, cominfo_tin,cominfo_groupid,cominfo_groupname,cominfo_industry_type,cominfo_total_employees,cominfo_loa_nbfc,cominfo_nbfc_deposit, cominfo_nbfc_infra,cominfo_nbfc_asset,cominfo_micro_fin_inst,cominfo_minority_community,cominfo_shg_location, cominfo_shg_members,cominfo_shg_beneficiaries,cominfo_shg_scheme,cominfo_shg_ngo,cominfo_shg_acctno,COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,companyinfo_typeofliability,cominfo_comgroupid,COMINFO_IEC,COMINFO_GSTIN,COMINFO_GSTINREG,COMINFO_GST_EXEMPTED,cominfo_employees_asondate) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
delete from COMPANY_INFO where cominfo_appid=?
delete from CORP_AAROGYA where corp_appno=?
select cmt_comments,cmt_intercomments from per_comments where cmt_appno='^' and cmt_pgtype='^'
insert into per_comments (cmt_appno, cmt_pgtype, cmt_comments,cmt_intercomments) values (?,?,?,?)
delete from per_comments where cmt_appno=? and cmt_pgtype=?
select cmt_bankcomments,cmt_bankcomments2 from per_bankcomment where cmt_appid='^' and cmt_pagetype='^'
insert into per_bankcomment (cmt_appid, cmt_pagetype, cmt_bankcomments,cmt_bankcomments2) values (?,?,?,?)
delete from per_bankcomment where cmt_appid=? and cmt_pagetype=?
select richrg_rangefrom, richrg_rangeto, richrg_chrgcollect1, richrg_chrgcollect2 from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode = '^' and richrg_id ='^'
insert into prd_rentinsurecharge (richrg_prdcode, richrg_id, richrg_rangefrom, richrg_rangeto, richrg_chrgcollect1, richrg_chrgcollect2) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
update prd_rentinsurecharge set richrg_rangefrom=?, richrg_rangeto=?, richrg_chrgcollect1=?, richrg_chrgcollect2=? where richrg_prdcode=? and richrg_id=?
delete from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode=? and richrg_id=?
select richrg_id, richrg_rangefrom, richrg_rangeto from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode='^' order by richrg_rangefrom

select count(*)as products from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode ='^' and (('^' between richrg_rangefrom and richrg_rangeto) or ('^' between richrg_rangefrom and richrg_rangeto) or (richrg_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (richrg_rangeto between '^' and '^'))

select count(*)as products from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode ='^' and richrg_id!='^' and (('^' between richrg_rangefrom and richrg_rangeto) or ('^' between richrg_rangefrom and richrg_rangeto) or (richrg_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (richrg_rangeto between '^' and '^'))
select NVL(max(richrg_id),0)+1 from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode ='^'
select jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_rangeto, jachrg_percentchrg, jachrg_minactualchrg, jachrg_maxactualchrg, jachrg_staticval from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode = '^' and jachrg_id ='^'

insert into prd_jewelappraisalcharge (jachrg_prdcode, jachrg_id, jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_rangeto, jachrg_percentchrg, jachrg_minactualchrg, jachrg_maxactualchrg, jachrg_staticval) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update prd_jewelappraisalcharge set jachrg_rangefrom=?, jachrg_rangeto=?, jachrg_percentchrg=?, jachrg_minactualchrg=?, jachrg_maxactualchrg=?, jachrg_staticval=? where jachrg_prdcode=? and jachrg_id=?
delete from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode=? and jachrg_id=?
select jachrg_id, jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_rangeto from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode='^' order by jachrg_rangefrom

select count(*)as products from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode ='^' and (('^' between jachrg_rangefrom and jachrg_rangeto) or ('^' between jachrg_rangefrom and jachrg_rangeto) or (jachrg_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (jachrg_rangeto between '^' and '^'))

select count(*)as products from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode ='^' and jachrg_id!='^' and (('^' between jachrg_rangefrom and jachrg_rangeto) or ('^' between jachrg_rangefrom and jachrg_rangeto) or (jachrg_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (jachrg_rangeto between '^' and '^'))
select NVL(max(jachrg_id),0)+1 from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode ='^'
select prd_type from products where prd_code='^'

insert into goldratemaster (grm_sno, grm_moddate, grm_retglquick, grm_agriglquick, grm_retglclassic, grm_agriglclassic, grm_retglcomfort, grm_agriglcomfort, grm_retglstaff, grm_agriglstaff, grm_comments, grm_activeflag, grm_maxnetweight, grm_maxgoldloans,grm_avgmargin,grm_latestmargin, grm_recurrexpmargin,grm_agridevelopmargin,grm_agriavgmargin_ibja,grm_agrilatestmargin_ibja) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update goldratemaster set grm_activeflag='N'

select grm_sno, to_char(grm_moddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as grm_moddate, grm_retglquick, grm_agriglquick, grm_retglclassic, grm_agriglclassic, grm_retglcomfort, grm_agriglcomfort, grm_retglstaff, grm_agriglstaff, grm_comments, grm_maxnetweight, grm_maxgoldloans,grm_avgmargin,grm_latestmargin,grm_recurrexpmargin,grm_agridevelopmargin, grm_agriavgmargin_ibja,grm_agrilatestmargin_ibja from goldratemaster where grm_activeflag='^' order by grm_sno desc
select NVL(max(grm_sno),0)+1 as maxid from goldratemaster
select grm_sno from goldratemaster where to_char(grm_moddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') in (select to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') from dual)
select prd_schemetype from products where prd_code='^'
select grm_sno,^ as strGoldValue from goldratemaster where grm_activeflag='Y'
select richrg_chrgcollect1, richrg_chrgcollect2 from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode = '^' and '^' between richrg_rangefrom and richrg_rangeto
select loan_reqterms, loan_noofinstallment from loandetails l, per_loan_secure p where l.loan_appno=p.loan_appno and l.loan_appno='^'

select jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_percentchrg, jachrg_minactualchrg, jachrg_maxactualchrg, jachrg_staticval from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode = '^' and '^' between jachrg_rangefrom and jachrg_rangeto
select demo_appid,demo_docprint from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select count(*) from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode=^
select count(*) from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode=^

insert into PER_CONDUCTOPERATION (con_appno, con_compliance, con_internalinspection, con_rbiinspection, con_auditsobser, con_offsiteobserv, con_roclreport,con_periodcovered,con_rocreason,con_emreg, con_emreason,con_chargesnoted, con_chargesreason,con_conducttldpn) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select con_compliance, con_internalinspection, con_rbiinspection, con_auditsobser, con_offsiteobserv, con_roclreport,con_periodcovered,con_rocreason,con_emreg,con_emreason,con_chargesnoted, con_chargesreason,con_conducttldpn from PER_CONDUCTOPERATION where con_appno='^'

insert into PER_INSPECTIONCOMMENTS (INS_APPNO,INS_INTERNALCOMMENT,INS_INTERNALACTION, INS_RBICOMMENT, INS_RBIACTION,INS_UNITCOMMENT,INS_UNITACTION,INS_RMDCOMMENT,INS_RMDACTION,INS_AUDITCOMMENT,INS_AUDITACTION, INS_OFFSITECOMMENT,INS_OFFSITEACTION,INS_INTERNALDATE,INS_RBIASONDATE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select ins_appno,ins_internalcomment,ins_internalaction, ins_rbicomment,ins_rbiaction, ins_unitcomment,ins_unitaction,ins_rmdcomment,ins_rmdaction,ins_auditcomment,ins_auditaction, ins_offsitecomment,ins_offsiteaction,to_char(ins_internaldate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_internaldate,to_char(ins_rbiasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_rbiasondate from per_inspectioncomments where ins_appno='^'

insert into security_furnitures(sec_id,sec_natureofasset,sec_make,sec_model,sec_year,sec_purchasevalue,sec_presentvalue,sec_valuervalue,SEC_ADDRESS1,SEC_ADDRESS2,SEC_SALUTATION_NAME,SEC_CITY,SEC_DISTRICT,SEC_STATE,SEC_PINCODE,SEC_COUNTRY,SEC_SALUTATION,SEC_SURVEYNO,SEC_CBSID)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into SECURITY_TITLETOGOODS(sec_id,sec_receiptno,sec_dateofissue,sec_issuername,sec_goodsheld,sec_quantity,sec_value)values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?)

insert into INDIVIDUAL_INFO(indinfo_appid,indinfo_area_specialized,indinfo_caste,indinfo_dateof_joining,indinfo_dependents_child,indinfo_dependents_others, indinfo_earning_member,indinfo_edu_qual,indinfo_exservice_man,indinfo_guardian_address,indinfo_guardian_appid,indinfo_guardian_name,indinfo_guardian_relation, indinfo_is_minor,indinfo_is_staff,indinfo_minority,indinfo_physically_challanged,indinfo_religion,indinfo_resident_country,indinfo_resident_status, indinfo_senior_citizen,indinfo_service_years,indinfo_spouse_address,indinfo_spouse_dob,indinfo_spouse_employer,indinfo_spouse_income, indinfo_spouse_name,indinfo_spouse_occupation,indinfo_spouse_panno,indinfo_spouse_qualification,indinfo_spouse_title,indinfo_staff_id,INDINFO_BLIND,indinfo_family_income,INDINFO_BANKSECTOR,INDINFO_BANKARRANGEMENT) select ?, indinfo_area_specialized,indinfo_caste,indinfo_dateof_joining,indinfo_dependents_child,indinfo_dependents_others, indinfo_earning_member,indinfo_edu_qual,indinfo_exservice_man,indinfo_guardian_address,indinfo_guardian_appid,indinfo_guardian_name,indinfo_guardian_relation, indinfo_is_minor,indinfo_is_staff,indinfo_minority,indinfo_physically_challanged,indinfo_religion,indinfo_resident_country,indinfo_resident_status, indinfo_senior_citizen,indinfo_service_years,indinfo_spouse_address,indinfo_spouse_dob,indinfo_spouse_employer,indinfo_spouse_income, indinfo_spouse_name,indinfo_spouse_occupation,indinfo_spouse_panno,indinfo_spouse_qualification,indinfo_spouse_title,indinfo_staff_id,INDINFO_BLIND,indinfo_family_income,INDINFO_BANKSECTOR,INDINFO_BANKARRANGEMENT from INDIVIDUAL_INFO where indinfo_appid=?

insert into COMPANY_INFO(cominfo_appid,cominfo_commencement_date,cominfo_incorporation_date,cominfo_roc_number,cominfo_cin,cominfo_tin,cominfo_groupid, cominfo_industry_type,cominfo_total_employees,cominfo_loa_nbfc,cominfo_nbfc_deposit,cominfo_nbfc_infra,cominfo_nbfc_asset, cominfo_micro_fin_inst,cominfo_minority_community,cominfo_shg_location,cominfo_shg_members,cominfo_shg_beneficiaries, cominfo_shg_scheme,cominfo_shg_ngo,cominfo_shg_acctno,cominfo_ownership_type,cominfo_groupname,COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,companyinfo_typeofliability,cominfo_comgroupid,COMINFO_IEC,COMINFO_GSTIN,COMINFO_GSTINREG,cominfo_employees_asondate) select ?, cominfo_commencement_date,cominfo_incorporation_date,cominfo_roc_number,cominfo_cin,cominfo_tin,cominfo_groupid, cominfo_industry_type,cominfo_total_employees,cominfo_loa_nbfc,cominfo_nbfc_deposit,cominfo_nbfc_infra,cominfo_nbfc_asset, cominfo_micro_fin_inst,cominfo_minority_community,cominfo_shg_location,cominfo_shg_members,cominfo_shg_beneficiaries, cominfo_shg_scheme,cominfo_shg_ngo,cominfo_shg_acctno,cominfo_ownership_type,cominfo_groupname,COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,companyinfo_typeofliability,cominfo_comgroupid,COMINFO_IEC,COMINFO_GSTIN,COMINFO_GSTINREG,cominfo_employees_asondate from COMPANY_INFO where cominfo_appid=?
select perapp_constitution,perapp_sex,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW from perapplicant,per_demographics where perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select cbs_static_data_desc from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code='^'

select perapp_fname,perapp_employment,peremp_confemp,peremp_listcomp,peremp_dealing,peremp_noofyrs,indinfo_resident_status,perinc_takehome,perinc_year2_income, perapp_id,peremp_servleft,peremp_expinyrs,ceil(months_between(sysdate,peremp_establish)) as presentempmonths,peremp_incsource from perapplicant left join peremployer on peremp_id=perapp_id,individual_info,perincexpenses,per_demographics where demo_appid=indinfo_appid and indinfo_appid=perinc_id and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and DEMO_TYPE='^'

select perapp_employment,peremp_confemp,peremp_listcomp,peremp_dealing,peremp_noofyrs,indinfo_resident_status,perinc_takehome,perinc_year2_income, perapp_id,peremp_servleft from perapplicant,peremployer,per_demographics,individual_info,perincexpenses where perapp_id=peremp_id and peremp_id=demo_appid and demo_appid=indinfo_appid and indinfo_appid=perinc_id and demo_appno='^' and DEMO_TYPE in ('a','c') and demo_includeincome='2' order by DEMO_TYPE

select PERAPP_TITLE||'. '||PERAPP_FNAME as cusname,perapp_employment,peremp_confemp,peremp_listcomp, peremp_dealing,peremp_noofyrs,indinfo_resident_status,perinc_takehome,perinc_year2_income,perapp_id from perapplicant,peremployer,per_demographics,individual_info,perincexpenses where perapp_id=peremp_id and peremp_id=demo_appid and demo_appid=indinfo_appid and indinfo_appid=perinc_id and demo_appno='^'

select floor(abs(months_between(TRUNC(sysdate),TRUNC(perapp_dob)))) as age, perapp_employment, perapp_bank, perapp_satisfactory, floor(nvl(months_between((TRUNC(sysdate)),(TRUNC(perapp_banksince))),0)) as perapp_banksince from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'

select floor(abs(months_between(TRUNC(peremp_retdate),TRUNC(perapp_dob)))) as age, floor(abs(months_between(to_date(peremp_retdate),to_date(sysdate)))) as ret_date from perapplicant, peremployer where perapp_id=peremp_id and peremp_id='^'

select floor(abs(months_between(to_date(sysdate),to_date(avail_date)))) as avail_date,floor(abs(months_between(to_date(sysdate),to_date(due_date)))) as due_date,repay_period from perapp_takeover where app_no='^'

select to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon,to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate from appinwardreg where inward_no in (select app_inwardno from applications where app_no='^')

select INWARD_TERMLOANAMT,INWARD_WCLOANAMT,INWARD_NONWCLOANAMT,INWARD_SCHEMEDESC,inward_docreceived,inward_agentid,inward_bankscheme,inw_leadno,inward_no,INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from APPINWARDREG,APPLICATIONS where INWARD_NO=APP_INWARDNO and APP_NO='^'
select auto_vehicletype, auto_category, auto_take_over,to_char(registration_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as registration_date from per_auto where auto_appno='^' and auto_applnt='^'
select to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate from applications where app_no='^'
select sec_id,sec_name from security_master where sec_parent='^' and sec_action='E' order by sec_id
select s.sec_id,s.sec_name from cus_securities c,security_master s where c.cus_sec_id='^' and s.sec_id='^' and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE=s.sec_parent and SEC_ACTION='D' order by s.sec_id

insert into security_land (sec_id, sec_propertytype, sec_surveyno, sec_plotno, sec_totalarea, sec_measurement, sec_extentofbuilding, sec_extentofground, sec_extentofland, sec_year,sec_valuervalue, sec_salevalue, sec_branch, sec_propertyacq, sec_otherinfo, sec_address, sec_address1, sec_city, sec_district, sec_state, sec_zip, sec_west, sec_east, sec_north, sec_south,sec_extofbuildmeas,sec_extofgroundmeas,sec_extnotcoveredmeas,SEC_BOUNDARIES,SEC_DEPOSIT_DATE,SEC_STREETNO, SEC_WARDNO,SEC_PROP_STAGE,SEC_PROPACQUISITION ,SEC_PROPACQUISITION_OTHERS,sec_saleamount,sec_buildername,sec_refnoapprov,sec_nofloor,sec_ageofbuilding,SEC_CERSAI_ID, SEC_CERSAI_DATE,SEC_WHT_PROJECTAPPROVED,SEC_BUILDERCODE,SEC_PROJECTNAME,SEC_CERSAIREFNO,SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,SEC_REMARKS,SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,SEC_CHARG_REFLECT,SEC_OTHERBNK_REMARK,SEC_REMARK_NOT_REFLECT,SEC_PROP_OBSERVED,SEC_CROPTYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

Select sec_propertytype, sec_surveyno, sec_plotno, sec_totalarea, sec_measurement, sec_extentofbuilding, sec_extentofground, sec_extentofland, Sec_Year,Sec_Valuervalue, Sec_Salevalue, Sec_Branch, Sec_Propertyacq, Sec_Otherinfo, Sec_Address, Sec_Address1,lc.City_Code as Sec_City,district_code as Sec_District,district_desc as districtdesc, ls.State_Code as Sec_State, Sec_Zip, Sec_West, Sec_East, Sec_North, Sec_South, Lc.City_Name As Custcity,Ls.State_Name As Custstate, Org.Org_Name ,sec_extofbuildmeas,SEC_CERSAI_ID,SEC_CERSAI_DATE, sec_extofbuildmeas,sec_extnotcoveredmeas,SEC_BOUNDARIES,to_char(SEC_DEPOSIT_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_DEPOSIT_DATE,SEC_STREETNO,SEC_WARDNO,SEC_PROP_STAGE,SEC_PROPACQUISITION,SEC_PROPACQUISITION_OTHERS,sec_saleamount, sec_buildername,sec_refnoapprov,sec_nofloor,sec_ageofbuilding,SEC_WHT_PROJECTAPPROVED,SEC_BUILDERCODE,SEC_PROJECTNAME,CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION ,SEC_CERSAIREFNO,SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,SEC_REMARKS,SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,SEC_CHARG_REFLECT,SEC_OTHERBNK_REMARK,SEC_REMARK_NOT_REFLECT,SEC_PROP_OBSERVED,SEC_CROPTYPE From Security_Land Sl left join Laps_States Ls on LS.State_Code=SL.Sec_State left join Laps_Cities Lc on LC.City_Code=SL.Sec_City and Ls.state_id=Lc.STATE_ID left join district_master on district_code=Sec_District left join Organisations Org on org.org_scode=SL.sec_branch,CUS_SECURITIES where Sec_Id='^' and Sec_Id=CUS_SEC_ID
delete from security_land where sec_id=?
select perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID='^'
select CUSTOMER_SECURITY_SEQ.nextval from dual
select nvl(max(sno+1),1) as sno from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID='^'

insert into CUS_SECURITIES (cus_sec_id,cus_sec_type,cus_sec_type_specify,cus_sec_classification, cus_sec_classification_specify,cus_sec_security_description,cus_sec_collateral_start_date, cus_sec_collateral_end_date,cus_sec_already_charged,cus_sec_amount_charged,cus_sec_name_institution, cus_sec_netsecurity,cus_sec_residual_riskflag,cus_sec_valuer_name,cus_sec_valuation_date, cus_sec_insurence_company,cus_sec_insured_amount,cus_sec_due_date,cus_sec_joint_holder, cus_sec_createdby,cus_sec_created_branch,cus_sec_created_on,cus_sec_reidualval,cus_sec_natureofcharge,cus_sec_isliqidsecu,cus_sec_matuliddate,cus_sec_totalsecvalue,cus_sec_statusflag,cus_releaseflag, cus_companycode,cus_companyshareval,cus_companyshare_cnt,cus_valsubmitteddate,cus_valrecvdate,CUS_SEC_INTID_ROC,CUS_SEC_CHARGEID_ROC,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,CUS_SEC_SHARETYPE,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_DATE,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER ,CUS_PROPERTY_LEASEHOLD,CUS_PROPERTY_LESSOR) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP (cus_owner_security_id,cus_owner_laps_id,cus_owner_sno) values(?,?,?)
delete from CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_id=?
delete from CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP where cus_owner_security_id=?

select cus_sec_id, cus_sec_type,cus_sec_type_specify,cus_sec_classification,cus_sec_classification_specify,cus_sec_security_description, to_char(cus_sec_collateral_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_collateral_start_date,to_char(cus_sec_collateral_end_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_collateral_end_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY, cus_sec_already_charged,cus_sec_amount_charged,cus_sec_name_institution,cus_sec_insurence_company,cus_sec_insured_amount,to_char(cus_sec_due_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_due_date,cus_sec_joint_holder, cus_sec_createdby,cus_sec_created_branch,to_char(cus_sec_created_on,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_created_on,CUS_SEC_Residual_RiskFlag,CUS_SEC_Valuer_Name, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE,to_char(cus_sec_matuliddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_sec_matuliddate , cus_sec_isliqidsecu,cus_sec_totalsecvalue,cus_sec_statusflag,cus_releaseflag,to_char(CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE, to_char(CUS_VALRECVDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUS_VALRECVDATE,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,CUS_SEC_INTID_ROC,CUS_SEC_CHARGEID_ROC,CUS_COMPANYCODE,CUS_COMPANYSHAREVAL,CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER from CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_id='^' order by cus_sec_id
select sec_name from SECURITY_MASTER where SEC_ID='^'
select cus_owner_security_id,cus_owner_laps_id,cus_owner_sno from CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP where cus_owner_security_id='^' order by cus_owner_sno asc
select PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_TITLE ||'.'|| PERAPP_FNAME as name from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID='^'
select cus_owner_security_id,cus_owner_laps_id,cus_owner_sno from cus_security_ownership where cus_owner_laps_id='^' order by cus_owner_security_id
insert into security_master (sec_id,sec_name,sec_parent,sec_cbssecurity,SEC_COLLATFLAG,sec_isliquidflag,sec_action) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select NVL(max(sec_id),0)+1 as snomax from security_master
select sec_id,sec_name,sec_parent,sec_cbssecurity,SEC_COLLATFLAG,sec_isliquidflag,sec_action from security_master where sec_parent = '^'
select sec_id,sec_name,sec_parent,sec_cbssecurity,SEC_COLLATFLAG,sec_isliquidflag from security_master where sec_parent != '^' order by SEC_PARENT
select sec_id,sec_name,sec_parent,sec_cbssecurity,SEC_COLLATFLAG,sec_isliquidflag,sec_action from security_master where sec_parent!='^' and sec_parent='^'
update security_master set sec_name=?,sec_cbssecurity=?,SEC_COLLATFLAG=?,sec_isliquidflag=?, sec_action=? where sec_id=?
delete from security_master where sec_id=?
select PRD_MARGIN from PRD_SPECIALMARGIN where PRD_CODE='^' and PRD_FROM ^'^' and PRD_TO ^'^'
update loandetails set LOAN_MARGIN=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
delete from CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP where cus_owner_security_id=? and cus_owner_sno=?
select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC as stat_data_desc1 from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='32' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE='^'

select margin_prdcode,margin_id,margin_range_from,margin_range_to,margin_perct from prd_splmargincost where margin_prdcode='^' and MARGIN_ID ='^'
select margin_prdcode,margin_id,margin_range_from,margin_range_to,margin_perct from prd_splmargincost where margin_prdcode='^'
insert into prd_splmargincost( margin_prdcode,margin_id,margin_range_from,margin_range_to,margin_perct) values (?,?,?,?,?)
update prd_splmargincost set margin_range_from=?,margin_range_to=?,margin_perct=? where margin_prdcode=? and margin_id=?
delete from prd_splmargincost where margin_prdcode=? and margin_id=?

select count(*)as products from prd_splmargincost where margin_prdcode ='^' and (('^' between margin_range_from and margin_range_to) or ('^' between margin_range_from and margin_range_to) or (margin_range_from between '^' and '^') or (margin_range_to between '^' and '^'))

select count(*)as products from prd_splmargincost where margin_prdcode ='^' and margin_id!='^' and (('^' between margin_range_from and margin_range_to) or ('^' between margin_range_from and margin_range_to) or (margin_range_from between '^' and '^') or (margin_range_to between '^' and '^'))
select max(cus_owner_sno) as cus_owner_sno_max from cus_security_ownership where cus_owner_security_id='^'

SELECT usr_id,usr_orgcode, grp_rights, usr_class, org_name, org_level, org_scode, usr_fname || ' ' || usr_lname as usr_name, org_city, org_issaral, solid, grp_accessfor, grp_privilege,usr_department,usr_grpid,user_designation,usr_rlpftype FROM users, groups, organisations WHERE usr_avail = 'a' AND usr_grpid = grp_id AND usr_orgcode = org_code AND usr_id='^'
insert into cus_securities(cus_sec_id, cus_sec_type, cus_sec_classification, cus_sec_already_charged, cus_sec_netsecurity,cus_releaseflag) values(?,?,?,?,?,'N')

insert into prd_rentinsurecharge (richrg_prdcode, richrg_id, richrg_rangefrom, richrg_rangeto, richrg_chrgcollect1, richrg_chrgcollect2) select ?, richrg_id, richrg_rangefrom, richrg_rangeto, richrg_chrgcollect1, richrg_chrgcollect2 from prd_rentinsurecharge where richrg_prdcode=?

insert into prd_jewelappraisalcharge (jachrg_prdcode, jachrg_id, jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_rangeto, jachrg_percentchrg, jachrg_minactualchrg, jachrg_maxactualchrg, jachrg_staticval) select ?, jachrg_id, jachrg_rangefrom, jachrg_rangeto, jachrg_percentchrg, jachrg_minactualchrg, jachrg_maxactualchrg, jachrg_staticval from prd_jewelappraisalcharge where jachrg_prdcode=?
delete from app_deviation where appno=?
delete from per_auto where auto_appno=?
delete from per_home where home_appno=?

select agr_secid from agr_goldloan where agr_artcatid='^'
update cus_securities set cus_sec_netsecurity=? where cus_sec_id=?
select min(floor(abs(months_between(to_date(sysdate),to_date(loan_matdate))))) as loan_repayperiod from per_loanagainstdeposit where loan_appno ='^'
select floor(abs(months_between(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI'),to_date(loan_matdate)))) as loan_repayperiod from per_loanagainstdeposit where loan_appno ='^' order by loan_repayperiod desc
select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,PERAPP_OLDID,perapp_fname from perapplicant where perapp_cbsid='^' and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n'
select max(perapp_id) as perapp_maxid from perapplicant where perapp_cbsid='^'

select sch_datasno,sch_datavalue,sch_dataid,sch_datadescription,sch_tenorfrom,sch_tenorto,sch_typeadv,sch_subsector from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_dataid='^' and sch_del_flag='n' order by sch_datasno

select sch_datasno,sch_datavalue,sch_dataid,sch_datadescription,sch_tenorfrom,sch_tenorto,sch_typeadv,sch_subsector from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_dataid='^' and sch_datasno='^' and sch_del_flag='n'

insert into set_retailschemecodedata(sch_dataid,sch_datasno,sch_datavalue,sch_datadescription,sch_createdate, sch_del_flag,sch_tenorfrom,sch_tenorto,sch_typeadv,sch_subsector) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,'n',?,?,?,?)
update set_retailschemecodedata set sch_datavalue=?,sch_datadescription=?,sch_tenorfrom=?,sch_tenorto=?,sch_typeadv=?, sch_subsector=? where sch_dataid=? and sch_datasno=?
update set_retailschemecodedata set sch_deletedate=sysdate,sch_del_flag='y' where sch_dataid=? and sch_datasno=?

select count(*) from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_datavalue='^' and sch_datadescription='^' and sch_dataid='^' and sch_datasno not in('^') and ((^ between sch_tenorfrom and sch_tenorto) or (^ between sch_tenorfrom and sch_tenorto)) and sch_del_flag!='y'

select count(*) from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_datavalue='^' and sch_datavalue='^' and sch_dataid='^' and ((^ between sch_tenorfrom and sch_tenorto) or (^ between sch_tenorfrom and sch_tenorto)) and sch_del_flag!='^'
select sch_datasno,sch_datavalue,sch_datadescription,sch_tenorfrom,sch_tenorto from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_dataid = '^' and sch_del_flag='n' order by sch_datasno
select nvl(max(sch_datasno),0) as maxid from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_dataid='^'
select distinct sch_datavalue from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_dataid='^' and upper(sch_del_flag)='N'

select prd_interest from prd_interest_limit where prd_intid='^' and prd_termto=(select max(prd_termto) from prd_interest_limit where prd_intid='^')
select floor(abs(months_between(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'), to_date(sysdate)))) as maturemonths from dual

select p.perapp_id,p.perapp_cbsid, r.prd_code, r.scheme_code, l.loan_modintrate, l.loan_inttype, l.loan_recmdamt, l.loan_reqterms, l.loan_modeofpay, l.loan_operativeaccno, r.prd_type, c.loan_periodicity, l.loan_repaymenttype,l.LOAN_ECSBANKNAME,l.LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE,l.LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE,l.LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM,l.LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE,l.LOAN_MODEOFPAY, l.loan_reqterms-c.loan_noofinstallment as excludeholiday, c.loan_noofinstallment, to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ac_opening_date, l.loan_emi, to_char(a.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, s.appraisal_sanclevel, s.appraisal_sancauth, p.perapp_constitution, a.app_renew_flag, r.prd_bankscheme, s.appraisal_department,l.loan_fileno,l.loan_baserate,r.prd_whetheragri,c.loan_servised,l.loan_interestcharged,l.loan_intcalcmode ,l.loan_mclrtabcode,l.loan_creditrskval,l.loan_busstatval,l.loan_mclrtype,l.govt_scheme,to_char(loan_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_duedate,loan_margin,a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI from perapplicant p, products r, applications a, per_demographics d, loandetails l, per_loan_secure c, appraisalsanction s where p.perapp_id=d.demo_appid and d.demo_appno=a.app_no and a.app_prdcode=r.prd_code and a.app_no=l.loan_appno and s.appsanc_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=c.loan_appno and a.app_no='^' and d.demo_type='a'
select sch_datadescription from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_datavalue='^' and (sch_subsector like '^%' or sch_subsector like '%^%') and (sch_del_flag='n' or sch_del_flag is null)

insert into per_cuscbsaccountdata(APPNO,FREECODE6,FREECODE7,FREECODE8,MODE_OF_OPERATION, DRAWING_PWR_IND,DRAWING_PWR,ACCT_HANDOFF_COMPLETE_FLAG, NATUREOFADV, TYPEOFADV, MODEOFADV, PURPOSEOFADV, FREECODE3, LOANDISBBRANCH, SECURITYCODE,INTRATEFREQ,FREECODE7FINCODE,FREECODE8FINCODE, LBRCODE,FACILITY_SNO,CER_GISTOFSECURITUES,facility_schemecode,facility_glsubheadcode,LAPS_CODE_1,LAPS_CODE_2,LAPS_CODE_3) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select p.APPNO,p.FREECODE6,p.FREECODE7,p.FREECODE8,p.MODE_OF_OPERATION,p.DRAWING_PWR_IND,p.DRAWING_PWR, p.ACCT_HANDOFF_COMPLETE_FLAG,s.FC_DESC from per_cuscbsaccountdata p ,SET_FREECODES s where p.FREECODE7 = s.FC_REFNO and APPNO = ^ and s.FC_LEVEL = ^

select APPNO,FREECODE6,FREECODE7,FREECODE8,MODE_OF_OPERATION,DRAWING_PWR_IND,DRAWING_PWR, ACCT_HANDOFF_COMPLETE_FLAG, NATUREOFADV, TYPEOFADV, MODEOFADV, PURPOSEOFADV, FREECODE3, LOANDISBBRANCH, SECURITYCODE,INTRATEFREQ, LBRCODE, FREECODE7FINCODE, FREECODE8FINCODE,FACILITY_SNO, CER_GISTOFSECURITUES,facility_schemecode,decode(facility_glsubheadcode,'S','',facility_glsubheadcode) as facility_glsubheadcode,LAPS_CODE_1,LAPS_CODE_2,LAPS_CODE_3 From PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA where APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO ='^'

update per_cuscbsaccountdata set freecode6=?,freecode7=?,freecode8=?,mode_of_operation=?,drawing_pwr_ind=?,drawing_pwr=?, natureofadv=?, typeofadv=?, modeofadv=?, purposeofadv=?, freecode3=?, loandisbbranch=?, securitycode=?,freecode7fincode=?, freecode8fincode=?,facility_schemecode=?,facility_glsubheadcode=?,intratefreq=?, lbrcode=? where appno=? and facility_sno =?

select p.perapp_title ||' '|| p.perapp_fname as perapp_name, c.con_comaddr1, c.con_comaddr2, c.con_comvillage, c.con_comcity, c.con_comdist, c.con_comstate, c.con_comzip, c.con_comcountry, d.demo_type, c.CON_PERMADDR1,c.CON_PERMADDR2,c.CON_PERMVILLAGE,c.CON_PERMCITY,c.CON_PERMDIST,c.CON_PERMSTATE,c.CON_PERMZIP,c.CON_PERMCOUNTRY, ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from perapplicant p, cust_contactinfo c, per_demographics d, INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii where p.perapp_id=c.con_appid and p.perapp_id=d.demo_appid and p.PERAPP_ID=ii.INDINFO_APPID and d.demo_appno='^' and ^ order by demo_type
