select con_country from countrysetup where con_countrycode='^'
select mis_stat_mast_id,mis_stat_mast_desc from misstatic_data_master order by mis_stat_mast_desc
select mis_static_data_code,mis_static_data_desc,mis_static_data_show,mis_slno,mis_static_data_id,MIS_SCHEMATIC,MIS_MCLR_SCHEME from MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='^'
select nvl(max(mis_slno),0) as maxid from MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='^'
insert into MIS_STATICDATA(mis_static_data_id,mis_static_data_code,mis_static_data_desc,mis_static_data_show,mis_slno,MIS_SCHEMATIC,MIS_MCLR_SCHEME) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update MIS_STATICDATA set mis_static_data_code=?, mis_static_data_desc=?,mis_static_data_show=?,MIS_SCHEMATIC=?,MIS_MCLR_SCHEME=? where mis_static_data_id=? and mis_slno=?
delete from MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id= ? and mis_slno=?
select mis_static_data_code, mis_static_data_desc from MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='^' and mis_static_data_show='^' order by mis_static_data_id

select ma.mis_sno, ma.mis_mainact, ma.mis_subactcode, ma.mis_subactdesc, ma.mis_show, ms.mis_static_data_desc as mainactdesc from mis_activity ma, mis_staticdata ms where ma.mis_sno='^' and ms.mis_static_data_id='2' and ma.mis_mainact=ms.mis_static_data_code and ms.mis_static_data_show='E'
update mis_activity set mis_mainact=?, mis_subactcode=?, mis_subactdesc=?, mis_show=? where mis_sno=?
insert into mis_activity(mis_sno, mis_mainact, mis_subactcode, mis_subactdesc, mis_show) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from mis_activity where mis_sno=?
select nvl(max(mis_sno),0)+1 as mis_sno from mis_activity

select ma.mis_sno, ma.mis_mainact, ma.mis_subactcode, ma.mis_subactdesc, ma.mis_show, ms.mis_static_data_desc as mainactdesc from mis_activity ma, mis_staticdata ms where ms.mis_static_data_id='2' and ma.mis_mainact=ms.mis_static_data_code and ms.mis_static_data_show='E' and mis_subactcode='^'

select ma.mis_sno, ma.mis_mainact, ma.mis_subactcode, ma.mis_subactdesc, ma.mis_show, ms.mis_static_data_desc as mainactdesc from mis_activity ma, mis_staticdata ms where ms.mis_static_data_id='2' and ma.mis_mainact=ms.mis_static_data_code and ms.mis_static_data_show='E' and upper(mis_subactdesc) like upper('%^%')
select mis_static_data_code, mis_static_data_desc, mis_slno from mis_staticdata where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_show='E' order by mis_static_data_desc

select mac.act_sno, mac.act_mainactcode, mac.act_subactcode, mac.act_purposecode, mac.act_activitycode, mac.act_bsrcode, mac.act_bsr1code, mac.act_displayscreen,mac.act_industrytype, mac.act_show, mac.act_createdate, mac.act_modifieddate, mac.act_purposesno, msd.mis_static_data_desc, mac.act_userid,mac.act_lbrcode ,mac.act_busruleid,mac.act_schematicflag,mac.act_freecode6,mac.act_freecode7,mac.act_freecode8,mac.act_freecode7fincode,mac.act_freecode8fincode,mac.act_cgtmse,mac.ACT_ALLIED from mis_activitycode mac,mis_staticdata msd where mac.act_purposecode=msd.mis_static_data_code and msd.mis_static_data_id='3' and mac.act_purposesno=msd.mis_slno and mac.act_show='E' ^

insert into mis_activitycode(act_sno, act_mainactcode, act_subactcode, act_purposecode, act_activitycode, act_bsrcode, act_bsr1code, act_displayscreen, act_industrytype, act_show, act_createdate, act_modifieddate, act_purposesno, act_userid,act_lbrcode,act_busruleid,act_schematicflag,act_freecode6,act_freecode7,act_freecode8,act_freecode7fincode,act_freecode8fincode,ACT_CGTMSE,ACT_ALLIED) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update mis_activitycode set act_mainactcode=?, act_subactcode=?, act_purposecode=?, act_activitycode=?, act_bsrcode=?, act_bsr1code=?, act_displayscreen=?, act_industrytype=?, act_show=?, act_modifieddate=TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),act_purposesno=?,act_userid=?,act_lbrcode=?,act_busruleid=?,act_schematicflag=?,act_freecode6=?,act_freecode7=?,act_freecode8=?,act_freecode7fincode=?,act_freecode8fincode=?,ACT_CGTMSE=?,ACT_ALLIED=? where act_sno=?
delete from mis_activitycode where act_sno=?
select nvl(max(act_sno),0)+1 as act_sno from mis_activitycode
select mis_subactcode, mis_subactdesc from mis_activity where mis_mainact='^'
select ind_bsr_code, ind_name from industry_master where ind_active='Y'
select mis_slno from mis_staticdata where mis_static_data_id='3' and mis_static_data_code='^' and upper(mis_static_data_desc)=upper('^')

select inward_brstatus,inward_appliedfor,inward_internetapp,org_code,org_name,CITY_NAME as ORG_CITY,to_char(INWARD_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INWARD_CREATEDON,org_level,APP_ORGLEVEL,app_loantype from appinwardreg, applications, organisations left join laps_cities on city_code(+)=org_city where inward_no=app_inwardno and app_no='^' and inward_orgscode=org_scode and rownum='1'

select upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,perapp_panno,org_name,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_constitution,perapp_status,perapp_cbsstatus,perapp_id from perapplicant,organisations where perapp_branchcode = org_scode and perapp_cbsid='^' and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,perapp_panno,org_name,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_constitution,perapp_status,perapp_cbsstatus,perapp_id from perapplicant,organisations,applications, per_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=perapp_id and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and ^

select upper(perapp_fname) as perappname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_constitution,perapp_status,perapp_cbsstatus,perapp_id from perapplicant, organisations,individual_info where ^ and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_branchcode=org_scode and indinfo_appid=perapp_id and org_code like '^' order by perappname
select extract(year from add_months(sysdate, -3))|| '-' || extract(year from add_months( sysdate, 9)) as FinancialYear from dual

select count(app_no) as goldloans from per_demographics , perapplicant, applications, products where app_no=demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and perapp_oldid='^' and app_prdcode=prd_code and app_status in ('op','pa') and app_renew_status is null and (app_delflag='N' or app_delflag is null) and demo_type='a' and prd_type ='pG' and APP_NO!='^'
select cbs_static_data_desc as modeofoper from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='17' and cbs_static_data_code in (select mode_of_operation from per_cuscbsaccountdata where appno='^')

select o.org_add1, o.org_add2, lc.city_name, ls.state_name, o.org_zip from organisations o, laps_states ls, laps_cities lc where o.org_level='C' and lc.city_code(+)=o.org_city and ls.state_code(+)=o.org_state
select to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, app_prdcode,to_char(add_months(app_processdate,'^'),'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_duedate from applications where app_no='^'

select loan_repaymenttype, loan_purposeofloan, loan_cgtmse,loan_recmdamt as sancamount,loan_costloanprd,loan_mongrossrent,loan_modintrate,loan_reqterms,loan_docrecvd from loandetails where loan_appno='^'

select distinct(app_no) as app_no,PRD_DESC,LOAN_RECMDAMT,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SanctionedDate,APP_PROCESSDATE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS , PERAPPLICANT,APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS,PRODUCTS,ORGANISATIONS where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_OLDID='^' and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO ^ and APP_ORGCODE like '^' order by APP_PROCESSDATE

select distinct(app_no) as app_no,PRD_DESC,LOAN_RECMDAMT,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SanctionedDate,APP_PROCESSDATE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS , PERAPPLICANT,APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS,PRODUCTS,ORGANISATIONS,APPINWARDREG,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_OLDID='^' and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and appno=app_no and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO ^ and (INWARD_ORGSCODE not like '^' or loandisbbranch not like '^') and cbs_accountno is not null order by APP_PROCESSDATE

select distinct(app_no) as app_no,PRD_DESC,LOAN_RECMDAMT,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SanctionedDate,APP_PROCESSDATE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS , PERAPPLICANT,APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS,PRODUCTS,ORGANISATIONS,APPINWARDREG,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_OLDID='^' and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and appno=app_no and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO ^ and (INWARD_ORGSCODE like '^' or loandisbbranch like '^') and cbs_accountno is not null order by APP_PROCESSDATE

select distinct(app_no) as app_no,PRD_DESC,LOAN_RECMDAMT,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SanctionedDate,APP_PROCESSDATE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS , PERAPPLICANT,APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS,PRODUCTS,ORGANISATIONS,APPINWARDREG,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_OLDID='^' and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and appno=app_no and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO ^ and (INWARD_ORGSCODE not like '^' or loandisbbranch not like '^') and (APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG is null or (APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG='Y' and APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS<>'op')) order by APP_PROCESSDATE
select org_code,org_level,org_name,USR_FNAME||' '||USR_MNAME||' '||USR_LNAME as name from organisations,users where org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_id='^'
select app_prdcode, app_valuesin,app_inwardno, cbs_accountno, app_isdeviated,APP_DEVIATEDUSERID,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI from applications where app_no='^'

insert into applications (app_no, app_createdate, app_prdcode, app_usrid, app_orgcode, app_loantype, app_status, app_delflag, app_inwardno, app_valuesin, app_orglevel, app_applnholder,mailchkstatus,app_clpudate,app_cpcdate,app_renew_flag,app_parent_appno,app_renew_status,app_isdeviated,APP_DEVIATEDUSERID) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,'op','N',?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?)

select demo_appno,demo_appid,demo_type,demo_relation, demo_includeincome,demo_oldappid,demo_cbsrelationtype,demo_docprint,DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid,PERAPP_UDHYAMCRT_FLAG from PERAPPLICANT where perapp_id='^'
select perapp_id,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_fatname from PERAPPLICANT where perapp_oldid='^' and (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null)
insert into per_demographics(demo_appno,demo_appid,demo_type,demo_relation, demo_includeincome,demo_oldappid,demo_cbsrelationtype,demo_docprint) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into appinwardreg( inward_no,inward_sector,inward_createdon,inward_appliedon,inward_custname,inward_add1,inward_add2,inward_city,inward_state,inward_zipcode,inward_phone,inward_mobile,inward_email, inward_dob,inward_pantan,inward_purpose,inward_scheme,inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_additionaldetails,inward_docreceivedon,inward_docreceived,inward_appcreateat,inward_orgscode,inward_appatached, inward_applnprocessat,inward_brstatus,inward_valuesin,inward_usrid,inward_assignusrid,inward_modifiedby,inward_modifieddate,inward_assigndate,inward_borrowertype,inward_cbscustid,inward_appliedfor,inward_proptype, inward_cibilreport,inward_passportnumber,inward_voterid,inward_enquirypurpose,inward_gender,inward_internetapp,inward_dist,inward_clpudate, inward_appstatus,inward_rejreason,inward_schemedesc,inward_bankscheme,inward_subsamount, inward_sponagency,inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency, inward_ssi,inward_tiny,inward_exceluploadflag,inward_phone_stdcode,inward_totalloanamt,inward_drivinglic,inward_aadhar,inward_canvassedbystaff,inward_borrowerstatus,inward_staffid) values(?,?,sysdate,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select inward_no,inward_sector,to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_createdon,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon,inward_custname,inward_add1,inward_add2,inward_city,inward_state,inward_zipcode,inward_phone,inward_mobile,inward_email, to_char(inward_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_dob,inward_pantan,inward_purpose,inward_scheme,inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt, inward_additionaldetails,to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon,inward_docreceived,inward_appcreateat,inward_orgscode,inward_appatached, inward_applnprocessat,inward_brstatus,inward_valuesin,inward_usrid,inward_assignusrid,inward_modifiedby,to_char(inward_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_modifieddate,to_char(inward_assigndate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_assigndate,inward_borrowertype,inward_cbscustid,inward_appliedfor,inward_proptype, inward_cibilreport,inward_passportnumber,inward_voterid,inward_enquirypurpose,inward_gender,inward_internetapp,inward_dist, inward_appstatus,inward_rejreason,inward_schemedesc,inward_bankscheme,inward_subsamount, inward_sponagency,inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency, inward_ssi,inward_tiny,inward_appstatus_online,inward_exceluploadflag,inward_phone_stdcode,inward_totalloanamt,inward_drivinglic, inward_aadhar,inward_canvassedbystaff,inward_borrowerstatus,inward_staffid from appinwardreg where inward_no='^'

select loan_appno,loan_modintrate,loan_terms,loan_amtreqd,loan_costloanprd,loan_recmdamt,loan_downpay, loan_tradein,loan_loantrade,loan_modusrid,loan_appamt,loan_reqterms,loan_termrange,loan_inttype,loan_emi,loan_purposeofloan, to_char(loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_filedon,loan_repaymenttype,loan_margin,loan_docfee,loan_profee,loan_bank_refno,loan_interestcharged, loan_repaycapacity,loan_steptype,loan_fileno,loan_intrate,to_char(loan_receivedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_receivedate,loan_deviationloanamount, loan_furmargin,loan_type,loan_modeofpay,loan_facility,loan_govt,loan_sub,offeredmargin,salarylimit, land_measurement,govt_scheme,loan_annualincome,loan_interest_emi,loan_operativeaccno,loan_sponseragency, loan_subsidytype,loan_copsociety,loan_intcalcmode,loan_prepaycharge,loan_upfrontfee,loan_cgtmse, loan_docrecvd,loan_docspecify, loan_specialcust,loan_interestid,loan_baserate, loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_mclrtabcode,loan_mclrtype,loan_goldrate_masterid,loan_lockperiod,loan_dnw_revisions, loan_metlifepremiumamt,to_char(loan_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_duedate from loandetails where loan_appno='^'

insert into loandetails(loan_appno, loan_modintrate,loan_terms,loan_amtreqd,loan_costloanprd,loan_recmdamt,loan_downpay, loan_tradein,loan_loantrade,loan_modusrid,loan_appamt,loan_reqterms,loan_termrange,loan_inttype, loan_emi, loan_purposeofloan, loan_filedon,loan_repaymenttype, loan_margin, loan_docfee, loan_profee,loan_bank_refno,loan_interestcharged, loan_repaycapacity, loan_steptype, loan_fileno, loan_intrate, loan_receivedate,loan_deviationloanamount,loan_furmargin,loan_type, loan_modeofpay, loan_facility, loan_govt,loan_sub, offeredmargin,salarylimit,land_measurement, govt_scheme,loan_annualincome, loan_interest_emi, loan_operativeaccno, loan_sponseragency,loan_subsidytype,loan_copsociety,loan_intcalcmode, loan_prepaycharge,loan_upfrontfee,loan_cgtmse,loan_docrecvd,loan_docspecify, loan_specialcust, loan_interestid,loan_baserate,loan_ageofveh,loan_schemedesc,loan_bankscheme,loan_takeover, loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_mclrtabcode,loan_mclrtype,loan_createddate, loan_goldrate_masterid,loan_lockperiod,loan_dnw_revisions,loan_metlifepremiumamt,loan_duedate,LOAN_AGENCYNAME,LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE, LOAN_RESTR_SCHEME,LOAN_ROITYPE,LOAN_ROISCORE,LOAN_PROCESSED_TYPE,LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,LOAN_CG_PERCENT,LOAN_TOT_INT,LOAN_CRP,LOAN_BSP) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into APPMAILBOX (mail_appno,mail_fromusrid,mail_tousrid,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint,mail_date,mail_type,mail_from_orgcode, mail_from_orgdept,mail_to_orgcode,mail_to_orgdept) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

select Agr_artcatid, agr_artno, agr_artdesc, agr_artgrosswt, agr_artnetwt, agr_artqtytouch, agr_artmktrate, agr_artrate, agr_estrate, agr_bankvalue, agr_quantity, agr_grsno, agr_secid, agr_articletype,agr_netvalue from AGR_GOLDLOAN where agr_artcatid='^' order by agr_artno asc

insert into AGR_GOLDLOAN(agr_artcatid, agr_artno, agr_artdesc, agr_artgrosswt, agr_artnetwt, agr_artqtytouch, agr_artmktrate, agr_artrate, agr_estrate, agr_bankvalue, agr_quantity, agr_grsno, agr_secid, agr_articletype,agr_netvalue,AGR_DATE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
select prd_type from products where prd_code='^'

SELECT loan_SLNO,loan_APPNO,loan_issuebranch, loan_STANDNAME, loan_accno, to_char(laon_dateofissue,'DD/MM/YYYY') as laon_dateofissue, loan_faceval, loan_rateofint, loan_presentos, to_char(loan_presentason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_presentason, loan_maturityval, loan_tenure, to_char(loan_matdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_matdate, loan_rateincharges, loan_margin, loan_banktype, loan_secid,loan_updflag, loan_entryflag FROM PER_loanagainstdeposit WHERE loan_APPNO ='^'

insert into PER_LOANAGAINSTDEPOSIT (loan_slno, loan_appno,loan_issuebranch, loan_standname, loan_accno, laon_dateofissue,loan_faceval, loan_rateofint, loan_presentos,loan_presentason, loan_maturityval,loan_tenure,loan_matdate, loan_rateincharges,loan_margin, loan_banktype, loan_secid, loan_updflag, loan_entryflag) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date( ?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date( ?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date( ?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

select apdoc_appno,apdoc_doccode,apdoc_substatus,to_char(apdoc_subdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as apdoc_subdate,apdoc_totpages, to_char(apdoc_rendate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as apdoc_rendate,apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks,to_char(doc_created_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_created_date from APPDOCUMENTS where apdoc_appno='^'

insert into APPDOCUMENTS(apdoc_appno,apdoc_doccode,apdoc_substatus,apdoc_subdate,apdoc_totpages,apdoc_rendate, apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks,doc_created_date)values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
insert into per_loan_secure(loan_appno, loan_noofinstallment, loan_periodicity, loan_secure, loan_secureamount, loan_servised) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

delete from per_cuscbsaccountdata where APPNO = ? and FACILITY_SNO = ?

insert into com_packingcredit (pc_appno,pc_seltype,pc_sancamt,pc_cheno,pc_cheamt,pc_retno,pc_retamt, pc_remarks,pc_sno,pc_year_sno,com_excesspermitted) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

delete from com_packingcredit where pc_appno=? and pc_year_sno=?
select NVL(max(pc_sno),0)+1 from com_packingcredit where pc_appno ='^'

update com_packingcredit set pc_appno=?,pc_seltype=?,pc_sancamt=?,pc_cheno=?,pc_cheamt=?,pc_retno=?, pc_retamt=?,pc_remarks=?,pc_sno=?,pc_year_sno=?,com_excesspermitted=? where pc_appno=? and pc_sno=?
select fin_appno,to_char(fin_year,'yyyy'),fin_rowid from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and fin_rowid=^
update com_finappDSCR set fin_audit=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
update com_finappDSCR set fin_unaudit=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
update com_finappDSCR set fin_estimated=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=?
update com_finappDSCR set fin_projection=?,fin_stress_projection=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=?

insert into com_finappDSCR(fin_appno, fin_year, fin_rowid, fin_audit, fin_unaudit, fin_estimated, fin_projection,fin_stress_projection, com_division_id,fin_sno) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit,sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') group by fin_year

SELECT ^ as txtvalue,b.fin_formula as formula,b.fin_rowid FROM com_finappDSCR a, (select fin_rowid ,fin_sno,fin_formula from com_finmaster) b WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid order by b.fin_sno
select * from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno = '^'

select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno ='^' and (FIN_AUDIT+FIN_UNAUDIT+FIN_ESTIMATED+FIN_PROJECTION)!='0' order by finyear

SELECT ^ as txtvalue,b.fin_formula as formula,b.fin_rowid FROM com_finappDSCR a, (select fin_rowid ,fin_sno,fin_formula from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no= ^ and fin_page='DSCR') b WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid order by b.fin_sno
select ^ as columname from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno = '^' and to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')= to_char(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') and fin_rowid= ^ and com_division_id='^'
select ^ as columname from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno = '^' and to_char(fin_year,'YYYY')=to_char(TO_DATE('^','YYYY'),'YYYY') and fin_rowid= ^ and com_division_id='^'
select NVL(fin_stress,'N') as fin_stress , NVL(fin_stress_percent,0) as fin_stress_percent from com_finmaster where fin_page='DSCR' and fin_rowid = ^

select to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY'),sum(fin_audit),sum(fin_unaudit),sum(fin_estimated), sum(fin_projection) from com_finappdscr where fin_appno='^' and fin_year ^ TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') group by fin_year order by fin_year desc

select top 1 datediff(dd,fin_year, TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') ) as prevyear from com_finappdscr where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='0' and year(fin_year) ^ year(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by fin_year desc
select top 1 datediff(dd,'^','^') as prevyear from com_finappdscr where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='0' and year(fin_year) ^ year(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by fin_year desc
select fin_year from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno='^' and year(fin_year)='^' group by fin_year
update com_finappDSCR set fin_audit=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
update com_finappDSCR set fin_unaudit=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
update com_finappDSCR set fin_estimated=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
update com_finappDSCR set fin_projection=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
delete from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=?
select sum(fin_audit+fin_estimated+ fin_projection+fin_unaudit) as avgdscr from com_finappdscr where fin_sno=(select max(fin_sno) as MaxSno from com_finappdscr) and fin_appno ='^'

select * from (select count(app_no) as appno,app_loantype from applications where app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype in ('A','C') group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,app_loantype from applications,products where prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pV','pJ','pS','pB') and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'J' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'D' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PR') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'MD' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PC') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='C' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'JD' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PJ') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'AG' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PA') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='A' group by app_loantype)

select app_no,perapp_fname, PRD_DESC, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus,app_renew_flag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,org_scode,APP_NPREFID,MAIL_QRDPND_NO_DAYS from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and prd_type in ('^') and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_loantype='P' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select app_no,perapp_fname, PRD_DESC, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus,app_renew_flag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and prd_type in ('^') and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_loantype='P' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is not null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode,APP_NPREFID from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select facility_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, facility_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, borrower_id, to_char(facility_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_date, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_difference, facility_margin, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, facility_sno, facility_group, facility_desc, facility_category, facility_months, facility_for, facility_interest, facility_branchname, facility_application, BPLR, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, cbs_accountno, facility_intadjustment, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason, facility_existbanktype, facility_propbanktype, facility_purpose,facility_sancinterest, facility_sancstatus,facility_sancamt,facility_inttype,facility_govtsponschem,facility_schemetype,facility_sponsagency,facility_subsidytype, facility_subsidyamunt,facility_repaytype,a.facility_code,facility_details,facility_agrschemetype,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_INTERESTREC,FACILITY_INTERESTCHARGED,FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,FACILITY_OPERATIONACCNO,facility_remarks,FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,FACILITY_INTINDEXID,FACILITY_BASERATE from facilities a, facility_master b, perapplicant where facility_headid=facility_catid and perapp_id=borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=^ and a.FACILITY_SNO!='^' order by facility_category, facheaddesc, facility_for desc

select to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')as fin_year,sum(fin_audit)as sumaudit,sum(fin_unaudit) as sumunaudit,sum(fin_estimated) as sumestimated,sum(fin_projection) as sumprojection from com_finappDSCRSENS where fin_appno='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') group by fin_year

update com_finappdescsens set fin_rowdesc=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=?
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_audit=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_unaudit=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_estimated=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_projection=?,fin_stress_projection=? where fin_appno =? and fin_rowid=? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')

SELECT ^ as txtvalue,b.fin_formula as formula,b.fin_rowid FROM com_finappDSCRsens a, (select fin_rowid ,fin_sno,fin_formula from com_finmaster) b WHERE (to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) AND (fin_appno = '^') and a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid order by b.fin_sno
select sum(fin_audit+fin_estimated+ fin_projection+fin_unaudit) as avgdscr from com_finappdscrsens where fin_sno=(select max(fin_sno) as MaxSno from com_finappdscrsens) and fin_appno ='^'

select ^ as columname from COM_FINAPPDSCRSENS where fin_appno = '^' and to_char(fin_year,'DD/MM/YYYY')= to_char(TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') and fin_rowid= ^ and com_division_id='^'

update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_unaudit=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_estimated=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?
update com_finappDSCRsens set fin_projection=? where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and com_division_id=?

select STAT_DATA_DESC,STAT_DATA_DESC1 from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_ID='146' order by stat_data_sno
update APP_SECURITYDETAILS set APP_SEC_ATTACHED='R' where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and APP_SEC_SECID=? and app_sec_parent_facsno=? and app_sec_parentappno=? and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='E'
select app_totalexposure,app_total_nfexposure from app_securitycoverage where appno='^' and customerid=(select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id='^')

select count(*) as value from COM_OTHERCOMMENTS where COM_APPNO='^' and (((COM_FROMDATE between (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')) and (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'))) or(COM_TODATE between (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')) and (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')))) or ((to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') between COM_FROMDATE and COM_TODATE) or (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') between COM_FROMDATE and COM_TODATE)))
select (fin_audit+fin_unaudit+fin_estimated+fin_projection) as fin_value,fin_sno as fin_value from com_finappdscrsens where fin_appno='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' order by fin_sno asc
select decode(cre_rating,'','Y','N') as flag from CREDITSCORING where CRE_APPNO='^' and cre_userid='^' and cre_freeze='Y'
insert into CREDITSCORING(cre_appno,cre_sno,cre_nonpoolflag,cre_freeze,cre_userid,cre_ratingerror,cre_rmdflag,cre_asondate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
select edu_year1,edu_year2,edu_year3,edu_year4,edu_year5,edu_year6,edu_col_total,edu_comments,edu_type from edu_course_exp where edu_appno = '^' and edu_type !='s' order by edu_id
select edu_year1,edu_year2,edu_year3,edu_year4,edu_year5,edu_year6,edu_col_total,edu_comments,edu_type from edu_course_exp where edu_appno = '^' and edu_type !='e' order by edu_id
select com_comments,com_selswot from com_swotanalysis where com_appno='^' order by com_selswot
select nvl(max(term_comid),0)+1 as term_comid from com_takeover where term_appno='^'
update com_takeover set comtak_bankname=?,comtak_natureloan=?, comtak_mainlimit=?,comtak_outstanding=?,comtak_bankid=? where term_appno=? and term_comid=?
select COM_SNO,COM_COMMENTS,to_char(COM_DACCODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_DACCODATE from COM_COMMENTS where COM_PAGE='^' and COM_APPNO='^' order by COM_SNO

select inward_no, inward_custname, decode(inward_sector,'c','Corporate','p','Retail','t','Tertiary','a','Agriculture') as sector,inward_brstatus, inward_assignusrid, inward_appatached, inward_valuesin, org_name, inward_borrowertype, inward_appliedfor, inward_applnprocessat, org_scode, inward_usrid,(select USR_FNAME from users where USR_ID=inward_usrid) as inward_usrname, (select USR_FNAME from users where USR_ID=inward_assignusrid) as inward_assignusrname, inward_applnprocessat,inward_appstatus from appinwardreg,organisations,perapplicant where perapp_cbsid=INWARD_CBSCUSTID and INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null) and inward_orgscode=org_scode and INWARD_DELFLAG is null order by INWARD_CREATEDON desc
select mis_static_data_code,mis_static_data_desc from mis_staticdata where mis_static_data_id='^' order by mis_static_data_code
select mis_mainact||'-'||mis_subactcode as mis_code,mis_subactdesc from mis_activity order by mis_mainact

SELECT terms_termdesc,terms_termtype,terms_id,terms_status,TERMS_PARENTID FROM com_termscond WHERE terms_appno='^' and terms_termtype= '^' and terms_isdel!='Y' and terms_mode='^' and terms_factype in ('^','A') and TERMS_PARENTID='^' and terms_status='Y' order by terms_id
insert into COM_TAKEOVER_DETAILS(COMTAK_APPNO,COMTAK_ISTAKEOVER,COMTAK_REASON) values(?,?,?)
delete from com_takeover_details where comtak_appno=?
delete from com_takeover where term_appno=?
select comtak_istakeover,comtak_reason from com_takeover_details where comtak_appno='^'
Select inward_docreceived,INWARD_CBSCUSTID,INWARD_SECTOR,INWARD_APPATACHED,inward_bankscheme from appinwardreg where inward_no='^' and INWARD_APPATACHED='N' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null
Select distinct INWARD_CBSCUSTID from appinwardreg where upper(inward_custname) like upper('%^%') and INWARD_APPATACHED='N' and INWARD_SECTOR='^' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null

select c.perapp_title,c.perapp_fname,c.perapp_id,c.rate_date,c.rate_type,c.rate_grade,d.exp,c.perapp_oldid from (select a.comapp_div_appid,b.perapp_id,b.perapp_fname,b.perapp_title,to_char(COM_COMPRATINGASON1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as rate_date,case COM_COMPRATINGTYPE1 when 'A' then 'Audited' when 'E' then 'Estimated' when 'U' then 'Unaudited' when 'P' then 'Projection' end as rate_type,com_compratinggrade1 as rate_grade,b.perapp_oldid from comapp_company_divisions a,perapplicant b where comapp_id in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^') and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)) and a.comapp_div_appid=b.perapp_id and (COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='Sister concern' or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='Group concern')) c left join (select app_proposed as exp,customerid from APP_BORROWEREXP where appno='^' and APP_TYPE='SUBTOT') d on c.perapp_oldid=d.customerid order by c.perapp_id
select com_individual,com_group from com_briefbackground where com_appno='^'
Select demo_comappid,demo_finstandard from com_demographics where demo_appno='^'
Select DEMO_APPID,demo_oldappid,demo_appid as perapp_id from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' order by demo_type
delete from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno=?
Delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='E'
Delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_applicant not in (select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno=?)
Delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_applicant not in (select demo_oldappid from per_demographics where demo_appno=? and demo_type='a')
delete from com_banking where combk_appno=? and COMBK_CREDITTYPE=?

select (perapp_fname) as app_name, app_status, demo_appid, app_orgcode, app_inwardno, app_orglevel, app_valuesin, app_applnholder, perapp_panno, org_name ,loan_repaymenttype,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT, demo_appid as demo_appnewid,app_renew_flag,loan_takeover,inward_applnprocessat as inward_applnprocessat,INWARD_DIGIAPPNO,app_stptype from applications, perapplicant,per_demographics,organisations,loandetails,appinwardreg where org_scode=INWARD_ORGSCODE and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_type='a' and demo_appno=app_no and loan_appno=app_no and app_no='^' and app_inwardno=inward_no(+)
Select LAWYER_NAME,LAWYER_CODE,lawyer_blacklist,LAWYER_ELITEPANEL,lawyer_seqno from lawyermaster where org_code in(^) and lawyer_active='1'
Select LAWYER_NAME,LAWYER_CODE,lawyer_blacklist,lawyer_elitepanel,lawyer_seqno from lawyermaster where org_code in(^) and LAWYER_NAME like upper('%^%') and lawyer_active='1'
Select phpa_take_over from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where phpa_appno='^'
Select count(*) as count from perapp_takeover where app_no='^'

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno, org_name, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and org_code like '^' ^
select FACILITY_APPNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO from FACILITIES where FACILITY_MIGRATION='Y' order by FACILITY_APPNO
update FACILITIES set FACILITY_SNO=? where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=? and FACILITY_MIGRATION='Y'
select comapp_div_id,comapp_div_name,comapp_div_id_old,comapp_id from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id_old='^'
select CORPPRDINT_PRDCODE from CORPPRDINT_MASTER where CORPPRDINT_SNO='^'

select sum(loan_recmdamt)as sanctionamt from loandetails l,per_demographics pd,perapplicant p,applications ap,products pr where p.perapp_id in('^') and p.perapp_id=pd.demo_appid and pd.demo_type='a' and pd.demo_appno=l.loan_appno and pd.demo_appno=ap.app_no and (upper(ap.app_delflag)='N' or ap.app_delflag is null) and upper(ap.app_status) in ('PA') and pr.prd_code=ap.app_prdcode and pr.prd_type in ('pG','pR')
select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid from perapplicant where perapp_oldid='^' and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname AS fullname,floor(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(to_char(perapp_dob,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY'))/12) AS age,CON_PERMADDR1 || ' ' || CON_PERMADDR2 || ' ' || CON_PERMCITY || ' ' || CON_PERMSTATE || ' ' || CON_PERMZIP AS permadd, perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,perinc_takehome as netincome from PERAPPLICANT,PERINCEXPENSES,CUST_CONTACTINFO where perapp_id='^' and PERAPP_ID=PERINC_ID and PERAPP_ID=CON_APPID

select org_code,org_name,to_char(inward_createdon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as receiveddate,app_prdcode,inward_applnprocessat,app_orglevel from organisations, applications,APPINWARDREG,users where app_no='^' and APP_INWARDNO=inward_no and org_scode=inward_orgscode and usr_id=inward_usrid
select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='147' and stat_data_desc='^'

select distinct facility_sno, facility_catdesc as fac_desc from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and c.COM_SUBFAC=a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_category in ('R','A') and b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE in (^) and c.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE!='OD' and (b.facility_sancstatus='A' or b.facility_sancstatus is null)

select inward_no, inward_custname, inward_docreceived,INWARD_ADD1,INWARD_ADD2,INWARD_CITY, INWARD_STATE,INWARD_ZIPCODE,INWARD_PHONE,INWARD_MOBILE,INWARD_EMAIL,to_char(INWARD_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as inward_dob, INWARD_PANTAN, INWARD_PASSPORTNUMBER,INWARD_VOTERID,INWARD_GENDER,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon, to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^%' and inward_docreceived ^ and inward_applnprocessat='^' and inward_sector in (^) and inward_appatached='N' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null and inward_appstatus='1' and INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' order by inward_no
Select inward_docreceived,inward_no,INWARD_CBSCUSTID,INWARD_SECTOR,INWARD_APPATACHED from appinwardreg where INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' and INWARD_APPATACHED='N' and INWARD_SECTOR='^'

select inward_no, inward_custname, inward_docreceived,INWARD_ADD1,INWARD_ADD2,INWARD_CITY, INWARD_STATE,INWARD_ZIPCODE,INWARD_PHONE,INWARD_MOBILE,INWARD_EMAIL,to_char(INWARD_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as inward_dob,INWARD_PANTAN, INWARD_PASSPORTNUMBER,INWARD_VOTERID,INWARD_GENDER,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon,inward_nsdlrefno, inward_subsamount,inward_sponagency,inward_govtspons,inward_schmetype,inward_subsdtype,inward_otheragency,inward_bankscheme, inward_termloanamt,inward_wcloanamt,inward_nonwcloanamt,to_char(inward_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_clpudate, to_char(INWARD_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INWARD_CREATEDON, to_char(inward_docreceivedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_docreceivedon ,(select mis_static_data_desc from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and mis_static_data_code=INWARD_BANKSCHEME) as bankScheme from appinwardreg, organisations where inward_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^%' ^ and inward_applnprocessat='^' and inward_sector in (^) and inward_appatached='N' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null and inward_appstatus='1' and INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' order by inward_no
select sch_datasno,sch_datadescription,sch_datavalue from set_retailschemecodedata where sch_datavalue='^' and (sch_del_flag='n' or sch_del_flag is null)

insert into applications (app_no, app_createdate, app_prdcode, app_usrid, app_orgcode, app_loantype, app_status, app_delflag, app_inwardno, app_valuesin, app_orglevel, app_applnholder,mailchkstatus,app_clpudate,app_cpcdate) select ?, app_createdate, app_prdcode, app_usrid, app_orgcode, app_loantype, 'op', app_delflag, app_inwardno, app_valuesin, app_orglevel, app_applnholder,mailchkstatus,app_clpudate,app_cpcdate from applications where app_no=?
select sanction_limit from groups, prd_sanction_limit where sanc_groupid=grp_id and prd_code='^' and grp_id='^'
select RATING_SNO,RATING_CODE,RATING_DESC from SET_RATINGCODES
select app_facilityrequired,app_parent_appno,app_renew_flag,app_prdcode,cbs_accountno from applications where app_no='^'

select distinct to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear,com_sno,com_finyear from corp_fin_year where com_appno ='^' and com_division='^' order by com_finyear
select app_no from applications,com_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and lower(app_status) in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and demo_comappnewid=^
update facilities set facility_renew=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?
select l.loan_recmdamt,l.loan_reqterms,s.loan_noofinstallment from loandetails l,per_loan_secure s where l.loan_appno='^' and l.loan_appno=s.loan_appno

select distinct(p.prd_code) as prdcode, c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto, p.prd_term as term,p.prd_minterm as minterm, p.nsc_loan as nsc_loan ,p1.prd_maxintclass as class, p.prd_type as prd_type, nvl(prd_principal,0) as prd_principal, nvl(prd_interest,0) as prd_interest, p.incomeflag, prd_staffprd, p2.prd_appminage, p2.prd_guaminage,p.scheme_code,p.prd_desc,p.prd_purpose,p.PRD_HOLIDAY,p.staff_under,p.prd_repaytype, p.prd_staff_maxterm_prin,p.prd_staff_maxterm_intr,prd_deposittype,prd_depositloanfor,prd_bankscheme,MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC,prd_vehitype, prd_sharetype,p.prd_CGTMSEFALG as prd_CGTMSEFALG from prd_category c, prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1, prd_interest p2, prd_used,MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=p.PRD_BANKSCHEME and p1.prd_code=p.prd_code and p2.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_org_scode like '^' and prd_used.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_type in ('^') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date(p.prd_eff_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_date(p.prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(prd_renew)='N' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and (PRD_WHTDIGIPRD!='Y' or PRD_WHTDIGIPRD is null) and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent ^ order by c.cat_name
select buss_prdid,buss_bussid,BUSS_RULEID from prod_business where buss_prdid='^'
update applications set app_renew_flag=? where app_no=?
insert into prd_solkpowflowpoint(prd_code,prd_flowpoint,prd_workid,prd_minclass,prd_duration,prd_action) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into prd_solkpowactivity(prd_code,prd_minclassapproval,prd_minclassapprovaltxt,prd_minclassskip, prd_minclassskiptxt,prd_activitytype) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select prd_code,prd_minclassapproval,prd_minclassapprovaltxt,prd_minclassskip,prd_minclassskiptxt from prd_solkpowactivity where prd_code='^'
delete from prd_solkpowactivity where prd_code=?
delete from prd_solkpowflowpoint where prd_code=? and prd_action=?
select count(sol_appl_no) as appno,sol_loantype from solvency where sol_applnholder='^' and sol_status in ('OP','PA','PR') group by sol_loantype

select sol_appl_no,sol_applicant_name,org_name,to_char(as_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'),a.as_fromusrid, sol_appid,sol_status,'' as app_renew_flag,org_scode from solvency,organisations,appmailbox_solvency a where org_code=sol_orgcode and as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno) and as_appno=sol_appl_no and as_tousrid='^' and sol_status in ('OP','PA','PR')
SELECT terms_termdesc FROM com_termscond where terms_appno='^' and terms_factype='^' and terms_isdel != 'Y' and terms_termtype='^' and terms_mode='P' and terms_facid='^'
update APP_SECURITYDETAILS set APP_SEC_ATTACHED='R' where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and APP_SEC_SECID=? and APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P'

select app_sec_facid,APP_SEC_MARGIN,app_sec_securitytype,app_sec_loantype,app_sec_parentappno,app_sec_parent_facsno,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_secid='^' and App_sec_facsno='^' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='A' order by app_sec_loantype desc

select count(*) as count from applications a,app_securitydetails s left join facilities f on s.APP_SEC_APPNO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and s.APP_SEC_FACSNO=f.FACILITY_SNO where a.app_no=s.app_sec_appno and s.app_sec_secid='^' and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N' and s.app_sec_loantype='P' and (f.FACILITY_STATUS in('^') or (a.APP_STATUS in('^') and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P'))

select distinct a.APP_NO from applications a,app_securitydetails s where a.app_no=s.app_sec_appno and a.app_status in ('^') and s.app_sec_secid='^' and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N' and s.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P'
select loan_takeover,loan_ageofveh,loan_metlifepremiumamt,loan_profee,govt_scheme,loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select sum(facility_proposed) as facility_proposed from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_group=0
select loan_periodicity,loan_noofinstallment,loan_servised from PER_LOAN_SECURE where LOAN_APPNO='^'

insert into lapsnfb_aif(LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM,FACILITY_SNO,SOL_ID,CUST_ID,BG_TYPE, SANCT_LIM,LIMIT_PREFIX,LIMIT_SUFFIX,BG_NUM,PROCESSED_FLG,laps_rcre_time,RENEW_FLG,project_loan,DCCO_date,facility_category)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
select LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM,FACILITY_SNO from lapsnfb_aif where LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM='^'
select facility_sno from facilities where facility_status='ca' and facility_appno='^'
update facilities set cbs_accountno=?,FACILITY_PREFIX=?,FACILITY_SUFFIX=? where facility_appno=?

select p.perapp_cbsid,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE from perapplicant p,applications a,facilities f where p.perapp_id=f.BORROWER_ID and f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and a.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and f.FACILITY_SNO='^'
delete from solvency where sol_appl_no=?
select NVL(max(to_number(substr(sol_appl_no,length(sol_appl_no)-5,length(sol_appl_no)-5)))+1,1) as sol_appl_no from solvency where sol_appl_no not like '%D%' and SUBSTR(sol_appl_no,1,4)='^'

insert into solvency(sol_applicant_name,sol_purpose,sol_amount,sol_commission_earned,sol_networth,sol_existing_accno,sol_certf_no,sol_date,sol_sanctioned_by,sol_address_one,sol_address_two,sol_village_taluk_town,sol_city,sol_district,sol_state,sol_pincode,sol_country,sol_cbs_id, sol_appid,sol_appl_no,sol_usrid,sol_applnholder,sol_mailchkstatus,sol_loantype,sol_orgcode,sol_status,sol_oldid,sol_solvencyno,SOL_SANCTIONING_DEPT,SOL_SANCTIONING_BRANCH,Sanction_Date,Sanc_Ref_No) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
insert into appmailbox_solvency(as_appno,as_fromusrid,as_tousrid,as_date,as_fromflwpt,as_toflwpt,as_type,as_fromorgcode,as_fromorgdept,as_toorgcode,as_toorgdept) values(?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

Select sol_applicant_name,sol_purpose,sol_amount,sol_commission_earned,sol_networth, sol_existing_accno,sol_certf_no,to_char(sol_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sol_date,sol_sanctioned_by,sol_address_one, sol_address_two,sol_village_taluk_town,sol_city,sol_district,sol_state,sol_pincode,sol_country,sol_cbs_id, sol_appid,sol_appl_no,sol_mailchkstatus,sol_loantype,sol_applnholder,sol_usrid,sol_status,org_name,sol_oldid,sol_solvencyno,SOL_SANCTIONING_DEPT,SOL_SANCTIONING_BRANCH, to_char(Sanction_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Sanction_Date,Sanc_Ref_No from solvency,organisations where sol_appid='^' and sol_orgcode=org_code and sol_appl_no='^'

select perapp_cbsid,perapp_id,perapp_fname,perapp_lname as perapp_mname,perapp_lname,perinc_yearsalary,PERINC_YEAR1_INCOME,perapp_networth, con_appid,con_comaddr1,perapp_employment,perinc_takehome, con_comaddr2,con_comvillage,con_comcity,con_comdist,con_comstate,con_comzip,con_comcountry,perapp_oldid,to_char(PERAPP_NETWORTHASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as networthason,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS ,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,CON_PERMVILLAGE,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMDIST,CON_PERMSTATE,CON_PERMZIP,CON_PERMCOUNTRY from cust_contactinfo,perapplicant,perincexpenses,individual_info where con_appid='^' and perapp_id=con_appid and perinc_id=con_appid and INDINFO_APPID=con_appid

insert into appmailbox_solvency(as_appno,as_fromusrid,as_tousrid,as_type,as_date,as_fromflwpt,as_toflwpt,AS_REALLOCATION_FLAG,as_fromorgcode,as_fromorgdept,as_toorgcode,as_toorgdept) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update solvency set sol_mailchkstatus=?, sol_applnholder=?,sol_comments=? where sol_appl_no=?
update solvency set sol_status=?,sol_comments=?,SOL_APPROVE_DATE=sysdate where sol_appl_no=?
update solvency set sol_status=?,sol_undousrid=?,sol_undoflag=?,SOL_APPROVE_DATE=null where sol_appl_no=?

select count(fin_ratappno) as appno from fin_rating,appmailbox_financialrating a where a.af_date=(select max(af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno=a.af_appno) and af_appno=fin_ratappno and af_touserid='^' and fin_status in ('OP') and (af_type='C' or af_type is null) order by fin_status

select perapp_id,PERAPP_SHGMEMBER,(select count(SHG_ID) from PERAPP_SHGMEMBERS where SHG_ID=perapp_id and SHG_MEM_CBSID is not null) as memb_count from perapp_shgdetails where perapp_id ='^'
select fin_ratappno from fin_rating where fin_cbsid='^' and fin_status='OP'

update com_demographics set demo_comappnewid=? where demo_comappnewid=? and demo_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_status in ('op','ol'))

insert into agr_landholdings(LAND_APPID, land_id, land_apptype, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security, land_fruit, land_nonfruit, land_datemortgage, LAND_IRRIGSIZE,LAND_NONIRRIGA,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE,LAND_CULTIVATABLE,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY,LAND_APPNO,LAND_NATURE,LAND_TYPE,LAND_LLF_TYPE) select ?,land_id, land_apptype, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security, land_fruit, land_nonfruit, land_datemortgage, LAND_IRRIGSIZE,LAND_NONIRRIGA,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE,LAND_CULTIVATABLE,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY,LAND_APPNO,LAND_NATURE,LAND_TYPE,LAND_LLF_TYPE from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID=?

select * from (select count(app_no) as appno,app_loantype from applications where app_applnholder = '^' and app_status='ol' and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype in ('A','C') group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,app_loantype from applications,products where prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pV','pJ','pS') and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status='ol' and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'J' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status='ol' and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'AG' app_loantype from applications,products where prd_type in ('pA') and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_applnholder = '^' and app_status='ol' and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='A' group by app_loantype)

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus,app_renew_flag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_type in ('^') and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and lower(app_loantype)='p' and app_status='ol' and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status='ol' and upper(app_loantype)='^' and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc
