update applications set app_status=?,app_applnholder=? where app_no=?
update applications set app_status=?,app_delodgeddate=sysdate,app_delodgeduser=?,app_delodgeduserorg=?,app_delodgeduserdept=? where app_no=?
update com_termscond set terms_termdesc = ? ,terms_status=?,TERMS_SUPPORTDOC=?,terms_termtype='A' where terms_appno=? and terms_id = ? and terms_mode=? and terms_factype=?
update com_companydetails set com_compdtappid=? where com_compdtappid=? and com_compdtappno in (select app_no from applications where app_status in ('op','ol'))
update com_demographics set demo_finstandard=? where demo_finstandard=? and demo_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_status='op') and demo_finstandard!='0'

select facility_sno, sd.stat_data_desc1 as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c,static_data sd where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and sd.stat_data_desc=b.facility_displaydesc and sd.stat_data_id='180' and b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE in ('NE','OD','LC','CO','BG','DD','PC','PS') and c.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE!='OD' and b.FACILITY_SANCSTATUS='A'
update applications set app_renew_status=? where app_no=?
select count(distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as yearcount from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='773' and com_division_id='0'

select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year, to_char(fin_year,'yyyy') as yearvalue,fin_sno,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear from com_finappvalues where fin_appno ='^' and com_division_id='0' and fin_sno in( select finprintyear_selsno from financial_printyear where finprintyear_appno='^' ^) order by finyear

select to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year, to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'yyyy') as yearvalue,COM_SNO as fin_sno,to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear, to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear_start from CORP_FIN_YEAR where COM_APPNO='^' and COM_SNO in (select FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR where FINRATEYEAR_APPNO='^') order by COM_SNO
select cbs_static_data_code,cbs_static_data_desc,cbs_static_data_show from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='^' and cbs_static_data_passing_code like '%^%'
update CUS_SECURITIES set cus_releaseflag=?,cus_releasedby=?,cus_releasedon=sysdate where cus_sec_id=?

select cus_sec_id, cus_sec_type,cus_sec_type_specify,cus_sec_classification,cus_sec_classification_specify,cus_sec_security_description, to_char(cus_sec_collateral_start_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_collateral_start_date,to_char(cus_sec_collateral_end_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_collateral_end_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY, cus_sec_already_charged,cus_sec_amount_charged,cus_sec_name_institution,cus_sec_insurence_company,cus_sec_insured_amount,to_char(cus_sec_due_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_due_date,cus_sec_joint_holder, cus_sec_createdby,cus_sec_created_branch,to_char(cus_sec_created_on,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cus_sec_created_on,CUS_SEC_Residual_RiskFlag,CUS_SEC_Valuer_Name, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE,to_char(cus_sec_matuliddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_sec_matuliddate , cus_sec_isliqidsecu,cus_sec_totalsecvalue,cus_sec_statusflag,cus_releaseflag,cs.cus_owner_sno,to_char(cus_releasedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_releasedon, cus_companycode,cus_companyshareval,cus_companyshare_cnt,to_char(cus_valrecvdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_valrecvdate,to_char(cus_valsubmitteddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_valsubmitteddate,CUS_SEC_COMMENTS,CUS_SEC_INTID_ROC,CUS_SEC_CHARGEID_ROC,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,CUS_SEC_SHARETYPE,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_DATE,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER,CUS_PROPERTY_LEASEHOLD,CUS_PROPERTY_LESSOR from CUS_SECURITIES,cus_security_ownership cs where cs.cus_owner_laps_id='^' and cus_sec_id=cs.cus_owner_security_id order by cus_sec_id desc
update app_securitydetails set app_sec_freeze=? where APP_SEC_APPNO=?
update ORGANISATIONS set ORG_CODE=? where ORG_CODE=?
update users set USR_ORGCODE=? where USR_ORGCODE=?
update APPLICATIONS set APP_ORGCODE=? where APP_ORGCODE=?
update solvency set SOL_ORGCODE=? where SOL_ORGCODE=?
update addkbowerdetails set ADDKBOW_ORGCODE=? where ADDKBOW_ORGCODE=?
update fin_rating set FIN_ORGCODE=? where FIN_ORGCODE=?
update lawyermaster set org_code=?,lawyer_regionalcode=? where org_code=?
update valuersmaster set org_code=replace(org_code,?,?) where
update buildermaster set org_code=? where org_code=?
update companymaster set org_code=? where org_code=?
select sum(app_sec_securityvalue) as secvalue from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_securitytype='^'
insert into loandetails (loan_appno,loan_filedon,loan_receivedate,loan_createddate)values(?,sysdate,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),sysdate)
select tl_slno,tl_faccode,TL_FEQUENCY,TL_NOOFINST,TL_INSTAMT,TL_TOTALAMT from tl_repayschedule where tl_appno='^' and tl_faccode='^' and tl_repaymentfor='^' order by TL_SLNO

select a.app_prdcode,l.loan_recmdamt,LOAN_BASERATE,l.loan_modintrate,l.loan_reqterms,ps.loan_noofinstallment, l.loan_inttype,l.loan_repaymenttype,ps.loan_periodicity, l.loan_emi,pc.cat_name AS subcategory, pc1.cat_name AS category,l.loan_profee,substr(l.LOAN_MCLRTYPE,0,1) as mclr_type,LOAN_MCLRTYPE from loandetails l,applications a,products p, per_loan_secure ps,prd_category pc,prd_category pc1 where a.app_no='^' and a.app_no=l.loan_appno and l.loan_appno=ps.loan_appno and p.prd_code=a.app_prdcode and pc.cat_id = p.prd_catid and pc.cat_parent =pc1.cat_id

select (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc,(select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=com_subfac and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc,(select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180') as facility_displaydesc,facility_sancamt,facility_proposed,facility_months,facility_perinstall, facility_baserate,facility_intsubtype,facility_perinstall,facility_interest,COM_FACNATURE,FACILITY_PURPOSE,facility_sno,facility_sancinterest,(select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_id and facility_parent!=0) as facheaddesc,(select COM_COMMENTS from COM_COMMENTS where COM_APPNO=facility_appno and COM_SNO=facility_sno and com_page='commentsonintrestrate') as int_comm_comments,com_headfac,facility_repaytype,facility_group,BPLR,facility_holidayperiod,facility_inttype,(select substr(mclr.FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,0,1) from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD mclr where mclr.FACILITY_APPNO=fac.facility_appno and mclr.FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO) as mclr_type,(select mclr.FACILITY_MCLRTYPE from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD mclr where mclr.FACILITY_APPNO=fac.facility_appno and mclr.FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO) as FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,facility_interestcharged from facilities fac,facility_corp where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^' and com_facid=facility_code

select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,CASE sec_id WHEN 1 THEN 0.00 when 2 then 0.00 when 3 then 0.00 when 4 then 0.00 ELSE a.app_sec_securityvalue END as app_sec_securityvalue,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO ='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE

select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,CASE sec_id WHEN 1 THEN 0.00 when 2 then 0.00 when 3 then 0.00 when 4 then 0.00 ELSE a.app_sec_securityvalue END as app_sec_securityvalue,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE

select loan_appno,loan_modintrate,loan_terms,loan_amtreqd,loan_costloanprd,loan_recmdamt,loan_downpay, loan_tradein,loan_loantrade,loan_modusrid,loan_appamt,loan_reqterms,loan_termrange,loan_inttype,loan_emi,loan_purposeofloan, loan_repaymenttype,loan_margin,loan_docfee,loan_profee,loan_bank_refno,loan_interestcharged, loan_repaycapacity,loan_steptype,loan_fileno,loan_intrate,to_char(loan_receivedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_receivedate,loan_deviationloanamount, loan_furmargin,loan_type,loan_modeofpay,loan_facility,loan_govt,loan_sub,offeredmargin,salarylimit, land_measurement,govt_scheme,loan_annualincome,loan_interest_emi,loan_operativeaccno,loan_sponseragency, loan_subsidytype,loan_copsociety,loan_intcalcmode,loan_prepaycharge,loan_upfrontfee,loan_cgtmse, loan_docrecvd,loan_docspecify, loan_specialcust,loan_interestid,loan_baserate,loan_ageofveh, loan_schemedesc,loan_bankscheme,loan_takeover,loan_creditrskval,loan_busstatval,loan_mclrtabcode,loan_mclrtype, loan_goldrate_masterid,loan_lockperiod,loan_dnw_revisions,loan_metlifepremiumamt,to_char(loan_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_duedate,LOAN_CG_PERCENT,LOAN_TOT_INT,LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE ,LOAN_AGENCYNAME,LOAN_RESTR_SCHEME,LOAN_ROITYPE,LOAN_ROISCORE,LOAN_PROCESSED_TYPE,LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,LOAN_CRP,LOAN_BSP from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
delete from KEYFACT_FEES_DETAILS where KF_APPNO=? and KF_FACSNO=?

insert into KEYFACT_FEES_DETAILS(KF_APPNO,KF_FACSNO,KF_APP_FEE,KF_TERM_FEE,KF_FORECLOSURE_FEE,KF_REFUND_FEE,KF_CONVERSION_FEE,KF_PENALTY_FEE,kf_userid,kf_userorgscode,kf_userorgdept,kf_asondate) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)

insert into KEYFACT_FEES_DETAILS_HISTORY(KF_APPNO,KF_FACSNO,KF_APP_FEE,KF_TERM_FEE,KF_FORECLOSURE_FEE,KF_REFUND_FEE,KF_CONVERSION_FEE,KF_PENALTY_FEE,kf_userid,kf_userorgscode,kf_userorgdept,kf_asondate,KF_ACTION) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)
select KF_APPNO,KF_FACSNO,KF_APP_FEE,KF_TERM_FEE,KF_FORECLOSURE_FEE,KF_REFUND_FEE,KF_CONVERSION_FEE,KF_PENALTY_FEE from KEYFACT_FEES_DETAILS where KF_APPNO='^' and KF_FACSNO='^'
select KF_APPNO,KF_FACSNO,KF_APP_FEE,KF_TERM_FEE,KF_FORECLOSURE_FEE,KF_REFUND_FEE,KF_CONVERSION_FEE,KF_PENALTY_FEE from KEYFACT_FEES_DETAILS where KF_APPNO='^'
select DEMO_APPNO,DEMO_TYPE,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as name,PERAPP_FNAME from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' order by DEMO_TYPE

select DEMO_APPNO,'a' as type_desc,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as name from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' union all select COM_COMPDTAPPNO,COM_COMPDTTYPE,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as name from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,PERAPPLICANT where COM_COMPDTAPPID=PERAPP_ID and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and (COM_COMPDTTYPE like '%C@%' or COM_COMPDTTYPE like '%G@%')
insert into set_rbiguidelines_restr(rbi_restr_sno, rbi_restr_desc, rbi_restr_for,rbi_compliance,rbi_active_type) values (?,?,?,?,?)
update set_rbiguidelines_restr set rbi_restr_desc=?,rbi_compliance=?, rbi_active_type=? where rbi_restr_for=? and rbi_restr_sno=?
delete from set_rbiguidelines_restr where rbi_restr_sno=?
select rbi_restr_sno, rbi_restr_desc,rbi_active_type from set_rbiguidelines_restr where rbi_restr_for='^' and rbi_compliance='^' order by rbi_restr_sno
select NVL(max(rbi_restr_sno),0)+1 as rbi_restr_maxsno from set_rbiguidelines_restr
insert into com_rbiguidelines_restr(restr_rbi_appno, restr_rbi_slno, restr_rbi_guidelines, restr_rbi_compliance,restr_rbi_chkbox,restr_rbi_comments,restr_pagetype)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select restr_rbi_appno, restr_rbi_guidelines, restr_rbi_compliance, restr_rbi_slno,restr_rbi_chkbox,restr_rbi_comments from com_rbiguidelines_restr where restr_rbi_appno='^' and restr_pagetype='^' order by restr_rbi_slno
delete from com_rbiguidelines_restr where restr_rbi_appno=? and restr_pagetype=?

select restr_rbi_appno, restr_rbi_guidelines, restr_rbi_compliance, restr_rbi_slno,restr_rbi_chkbox,restr_rbi_comments,restr_pagetype from com_rbiguidelines_restr where restr_rbi_appno='^' and restr_rbi_chkbox='1' order by restr_rbi_slno
select facility_sno from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_oldappno='^' and facility_oldappsno='^'
insert into app_post_sanction(ps_app_no,ps_app_sno,ps_old_app_no,ps_old_app_sno,ps_modify_terms,ps_modify_pageid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select org_code from APPLICATIONS,organisations where org_scode=app_processorgscode and APP_NO='^'
select max(EXC_SCREEN_ID) as maxscreenid from xl_reference

select EXC_SCREEN_ID,EXC_SCREEN_SNO,EXC_SCREEN_NAME,EXC_TABNAME,EXC_COLNAME,EXC_COLNUM,EXC_ROWNUM, EXC_TYPE,EXC_MODULE,EXC_ENTRY,EXC_SHEET_NO from xl_reference where EXC_SCREEN_ID='^' and EXC_SCREEN_SNO='1' order by EXC_SCREEN_ID,EXC_SCREEN_SNO

select EXC_SCREEN_ID,EXC_SCREEN_SNO,EXC_SCREEN_NAME,EXC_TABNAME,EXC_COLNAME,EXC_COLNUM,EXC_ROWNUM, EXC_TYPE,EXC_MODULE,EXC_ENTRY,EXC_SHEET_NO from xl_reference where EXC_SCREEN_ID='^' order by EXC_SCREEN_ID,EXC_SCREEN_SNO
select perapp_profilestatus,perapp_id,perapp_oldid from perapplicant where (PERAPP_RENEW='n' or PERAPP_RENEW is null) and PERAPP_CBSID='^'

select * from (select decode(app_loantype,'P','Retail','A','Agriculture','C','Corporate') as loantype,count(app_no) as count,decode(app_loantype,'P','1','A','2','C','3') as apptype from APPMAILBOX AM,applications a where a.app_no=am.MAIL_APPNO and app_status !='ol' and AM.MAIL_TOUSRID='^' and AM.MAIL_DATE = (select max (MAIL_DATE) from APPMAILBOX where MAIL_APPNO in (select APP_NO from APPLICATIONS where APP_APPLNHOLDER='^' and APP_NO=AM.MAIL_APPNO) and MAIL_TOUSRID='^') group by app_loantype union select decode(app_loantype,'P','Retail - Lodged','A','Agriculture - Lodged','C','Corporate - Lodged') as loantype,count(app_no)as count,decode(app_loantype,'P','4','A','5','C','6') as apptype from APPMAILBOX AM,applications a where a.app_no=am.MAIL_APPNO and app_status ='ol' and AM.MAIL_TOUSRID='^' and AM.MAIL_DATE = (select max (MAIL_DATE) from APPMAILBOX where MAIL_APPNO in (select APP_NO from APPLICATIONS where APP_APPLNHOLDER='^' and APP_NO=AM.MAIL_APPNO) and MAIL_TOUSRID='^') group by app_loantype) order by apptype

select * from (select 'Solvency' as loantype,count(sol_appl_no) as count,'7' as apptype from solvency,appmailbox_solvency a where as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno) and as_appno=sol_appl_no and as_tousrid='^' union select 'K Power' as loantype,count(addkbow_app_no),'8' as apptype from addkbowerdetails,appmailbox_kpower a where ak_date=(select max(ak_date) from appmailbox_kpower b where b.ak_appno=a.ak_appno) and ak_appno=addkbow_app_no and ak_tousrid='^' union
select 'Financial Rating' as loantype,count(fin_ratappno),'9' as apptype from fin_rating, appmailbox_financialrating a where af_date=(select max(af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno=a.af_appno) and af_appno=fin_ratappno and af_touserid='^' and (af_type='C' or af_type is null)
union
select 'Permission' as loantype,count(d.DEV_APPNO),'10' as apptype from appl_deviation d, DEV_APPMAILBOX a where DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO) and d.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO and DEV_TOUSRID='^' and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null) and nvl(DEV_DELFLAG,'N')='N') order by apptype

update APPMAILBOX AM set AM.MAIL_TOUSRID=? where AM.MAIL_TOUSRID=? and AM.MAIL_DATE = (select max (MAIL_DATE) from APPMAILBOX where MAIL_APPNO in (select APP_NO from APPLICATIONS where APP_APPLNHOLDER=? and APP_NO=AM.MAIL_APPNO) and MAIL_TOUSRID=?) and AM.MAIL_APPNO not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid=?) and AM.MAIL_APPNO is not null

update APPLICATIONS set APP_APPLNHOLDER=? where APP_APPLNHOLDER=? and app_no not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid=?) and app_no is not null

update appmailbox_solvency a set as_tousrid=? where a.as_tousrid=? and as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno in (select sol_appl_no from solvency where SOL_APPLNHOLDER=? and sol_appl_no=a.as_appno) and b.as_tousrid=?)
update solvency set SOL_APPLNHOLDER=? where SOL_APPLNHOLDER=?

update appmailbox_kpower a set ak_tousrid=? where a.ak_tousrid=? and ak_date=(select max(b.ak_date) from appmailbox_kpower b where b.ak_appno in (select addkbow_app_no from addkbowerdetails where ADDKBOW_APPLNHOLDER=? and addkbow_app_no=a.ak_appno) and b.ak_tousrid=?)
update addkbowerdetails set ADDKBOW_APPLNHOLDER=? where ADDKBOW_APPLNHOLDER=?

update appmailbox_financialrating a set af_touserid=? where a.af_touserid=? and af_date=(select max(b.af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno in (select fin_ratappno from fin_rating where FIN_APPHOLDER=? and af_appno=a.af_appno) and b.af_touserid=?) and a.af_appno not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid=?) and a.af_appno is not null

update fin_rating set FIN_APPHOLDER=? where FIN_APPHOLDER=? and FIN_RATAPPNO not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid=?) and FIN_RATAPPNO is not null
update appl_deviation set DEV_APPLHOLDER=? where DEV_APPLHOLDER=?

select PS_APP_NO,p2.cat_name as cat_name,cbs_accountno,p1.cat_name as prdsubcat,loan_recmdamt,ps_old_app_no,PRD_STAFFPRD,PRD_TYPE,LOAN_INTTYPE,scheme_code,prd_loantype from applications a,APP_POST_SANCTION,loandetails,products,prd_category p1, prd_category p2 where p2.cat_id= p1.cat_parent and p1.cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and loan_appno=APP_NO and app_no=PS_OLD_APP_NO and PS_APP_NO='^'

insert into tl_repayschedule(tl_appno,tl_slno,tl_faccode,TL_FEQUENCY,TL_NOOFINST,TL_INSTAMT,TL_TOTALAMT,TL_REPAYMENTFOR) select ?,tl_slno,?,TL_FEQUENCY,TL_NOOFINST,TL_INSTAMT,TL_TOTALAMT,'P' from tl_repayschedule where tl_appno=? and tl_faccode=?
delete from tl_repayschedule where tl_appno=?
select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid in (select comapp_div_appid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id_old='^') and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select perapp_id ,rtrim(perapp_fname) as perapp_name,perapp_oldid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_cbsstatus, perapp_lname, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_sex, con_comaddr1, con_comaddr2, con_comvillage, con_comcity, con_comstate, con_comzip, con_comphone, con_comfax, con_email,perapp_cbsid,perapp_networth from perapplicant, cust_contactinfo where perapp_oldid='^' and (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_id=con_appid and perapp_profilestatus='Y' order by perapp_fname

select perapp_fname as appname,floor((months_between((sysdate),(perapp_dob)))/12) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason, perinc_takehome,perinc_year1_income,perapp_employment,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1,perapp_cbsid from perapplicant,perincexpenses where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_id=(select p2.PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT p1,PERAPPLICANT p2 where p1.PERAPP_OLDID=p2.PERAPP_OLDID and (p2.PERAPP_RENEW is null or p2.PERAPP_RENEW='n') and p1.PERAPP_ID='^')
select NVL(SUBSTR(max(GROUP_ID),6,3),'0') from cus_groups where SUBSTR(GROUP_ID,4,2) ='^'
insert into cus_groups(group_id,group_name,group_solid,cus_delflag)values(?,?,?,'N')
update cus_groups set group_name=? where group_id=?
update cus_groups set cus_delflag='Y' where group_id=?
select group_id,group_name,grp_updflag from cus_groups where cus_delflag='N' ^
select cgm_groupname,cgm_groupid from cus_groupsmembers where cgm_memberid='^'
select count(cgm_groupname) as memcount from cus_groupsmembers where CGM_GROUPID='^'

select perapp_id ,rtrim(perapp_fname) as perapp_name,perapp_oldid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_cbsstatus, perapp_lname, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_sex, con_comaddr1, con_comaddr2, con_comvillage, con_comcity, con_comstate, con_comzip, con_comphone, con_comfax, con_email,perapp_cbsid from perapplicant, cust_contactinfo where (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_id=con_appid ^ and perapp_profilestatus='Y' order by perapp_fname
insert into cus_groupsmembers(cgm_groupid,cgm_sno,cgm_groupname,cgm_memberid,cgm_membercbsid,cgm_membername,cgm_memberoldid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(cgm_sno),'0') as sno from cus_groupsmembers where cgm_groupid='^'
select cgm_groupid,cgm_sno,cgm_groupname,cgm_memberid,cgm_membercbsid,cgm_membername,cgm_memberoldid from cus_groupsmembers where cgm_groupid='^'
delete from cus_groupsmembers where cgm_groupid=? and cgm_memberid=?

select KYC_CUSTID,kyc_occupationcode,KYC_IDPROOFTYPE,KYC_IDPROOFREF,perinc_yearsalary,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,perapp_constitution,PERINC_YEAR1_INCOME,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,con_mobile,con_email,perapp_panno,perapp_aadhaar,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_TITLE,PERAPP_FNAME, PERAPP_LNAME,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_SEX,indinfo_caste,indinfo_minority,indinfo_physically_challanged from perapplicant,applicant_kycnorms,perincexpenses,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where con_appid=perapp_id and KYC_CUSTID=perapp_id and PERINC_ID=perapp_id and perapp_oldid=(select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id='^') and indinfo_appid=perapp_id and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select perapp_fname,perapp_panno,con_mobile,con_email,demo_type,perapp_aadhaar from per_demographics,perapplicant, cust_contactinfo where con_appid=perapp_id and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and DEMO_OLDAPPID not in (select perapp_oldid from comapp_company_divisions,perapplicant where comapp_id='^' and perapp_id=comapp_div_appid) order by demo_type
update loandetails set loan_receivedate=sysdate where loan_appno=?
select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid='^'
select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and CRE_APPNO='^'

select appnumber,MAIL_FROMUSRID,MAIL_TOUSRID,MAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT,MAIL_TOFLOWPOINT,MAIL_DATE,MAIL_TYPE,MAIL_FROM_ORGCODE,MAIL_FROM_ORGDEPT,MAIL_TO_ORGCODE,MAIL_TO_ORGDEPT from (select MAIL_APPNO as appnumber,MAIL_FROMUSRID,MAIL_TOUSRID,MAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT,MAIL_TOFLOWPOINT,MAIL_DATE,AM.MAIL_TYPE,AM.MAIL_FROM_ORGCODE,AM.MAIL_FROM_ORGDEPT,AM.MAIL_TO_ORGCODE,AM.MAIL_TO_ORGDEPT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY mail_appno ORDER BY mail_appno,mail_date DESC) AS SEQNUM from APPMAILBOX AM where AM.MAIL_TOUSRID='^' and AM.MAIL_DATE = (select max (MAIL_DATE) from APPMAILBOX where MAIL_APPNO in (select APP_NO from APPLICATIONS where APP_APPLNHOLDER='^' and APP_NO=AM.MAIL_APPNO) and MAIL_TOUSRID='^') and MAIL_APPNO not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid='^') ^ and MAIL_APPNO is not null and nvl(MAIL_TYPE,'C')='C')where SEQNUM='1'

select a.AS_APPNO as appno from appmailbox_solvency a where as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno) and as_tousrid='^' union select a.AK_APPNO as appno from appmailbox_kpower a where ak_date=(select max(ak_date) from appmailbox_kpower b where b.ak_appno=a.ak_appno) and ak_tousrid='^' union select a.AF_APPNO as appno from appmailbox_financialrating a where af_date=(select max(af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno=a.af_appno) and af_touserid='^' and nvl(af_type,'C')='C' and a.af_appno not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid='^') and af_appno is not null union select a.DEV_APPNO as appno from DEV_APPMAILBOX a where DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO) and DEV_TOUSRID='^' and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null)

select appno,AS_FROMUSRID,AS_TOUSRID,AS_FROMFLWPT,AS_TOFLWPT,AS_TYPE,as_date from (select a.AS_APPNO as appno,AS_FROMUSRID,AS_TOUSRID,AS_FROMFLWPT,AS_TOFLWPT,AS_TYPE,as_date,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AS_APPNO ORDER BY AS_APPNO,as_date DESC) AS SEQNUM from appmailbox_solvency a where as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno) and as_tousrid='^' ^ ) where SEQNUM='1'

select appno,AK_FROMUSRID,AK_TOUSRID,AK_FROMFLWPT,AK_TOFLWPT,AK_TYPE,ak_date from (select a.AK_APPNO as appno,AK_FROMUSRID,AK_TOUSRID,AK_FROMFLWPT,AK_TOFLWPT,AK_TYPE,ak_date,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AK_APPNO ORDER BY AK_APPNO,ak_date DESC) AS SEQNUM from appmailbox_kpower a where ak_date=(select max(ak_date) from appmailbox_kpower b where b.ak_appno=a.ak_appno) and ak_tousrid='^' ^) where SEQNUM='1'

select appno,AF_FROMUSERID,AF_TOUSERID,AF_TYPE,'',af_date from (select a.AF_APPNO as appno,AF_FROMUSERID,AF_TOUSERID,AF_TYPE,'',af_date,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AF_APPNO ORDER BY AF_APPNO,af_date DESC) AS SEQNUM from appmailbox_financialrating a where af_date=(select max(af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno=a.af_appno) and af_touserid='^' and nvl(af_type,'C')='C' and a.af_appno not in (select cre_appno from creditscoring where cre_rating is null and cre_weight is null and cre_freeze='Y' and cre_userid='^') and af_appno is not null ^ ) where SEQNUM='1'

select appno,DEV_FROMUSRID,DEV_TOUSRID,DEV_MAILTYPE,'',DEV_SENTDATE,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT,DEV_FROM_ORGCODE,DEV_FROM_ORGDEPT,DEV_TO_ORGCODE,DEV_TO_ORGDEPT from (select a.DEV_APPNO as appno,DEV_FROMUSRID,DEV_TOUSRID,DEV_MAILTYPE,'',DEV_SENTDATE,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT,DEV_FROM_ORGCODE,DEV_FROM_ORGDEPT,DEV_TO_ORGCODE,DEV_TO_ORGDEPT,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a.DEV_APPNO ORDER BY a.DEV_APPNO,DEV_SENTDATE DESC) AS SEQNUM from DEV_APPMAILBOX a where DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO) and DEV_TOUSRID='^' ^ and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null)) where SEQNUM='1'
delete from LOAN_ACCOUNT_DETAILS where app_no=?
insert into mpbf_calculation(mpbf_appno,mpbf_eligibleamount) select ?,LOAN_RECMDAMT from mpbf_calculation,loandetails where mpbf_appno=loan_appno and loan_appno=?

loan_steptype,loan_fileno,loan_intrate,to_date(loan_receivedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as receivedate,loan_deviationloanamount,loan_furmargin, loan_timesofabove,loan_securityratio,loan_securitycollateral,loan_mongrossrent,loan_schemedesc, LOAN_ROITYPE,LOAN_ROISCORE,LOAN_PROCESSED_TYPE,LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME,LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,LOAN_CRP,LOAN_BSP from loandetails where loan_proposedappno=?
update loandetails set loan_purposeoflo=? where loan_appno=?

delete from loandetails where loan_appno=?
update facilities set facility_renew=? where facility_appno=?
delete from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_groupid=? and comapp_div_id_old=? and comapp_div_appid not in (select cgm_memberoldid from cus_groupsmembers where cgm_groupid=?)

insert into comapp_company_divisions(comapp_div_id_old,comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid,comapp_divisiontype,comapp_divisionsubtype,comapp_docexecutant,comapp_accountoperted,comapp_chf_promoter) select ?,(select NVL(max(comapp_div_id),0) as maxid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id_old=?)+to_number(rownum) as comapp_div_id,?,perapp_fname as name, CON_COMADDR1||' '||CON_COMADDR2||' '||CON_COMVILLAGE as address,CON_COMCITY,CON_COMSTATE, CON_COMZIP,CON_COMPHONE,CON_COMFAX,CON_COMDIST,perapp_id,PERAPP_CBSID,?,'Group concern','001','N','N','N' from perapplicant, CUST_CONTACTINFO where CON_APPID=perapp_id and perapp_oldid in (select cgm_memberoldid from CUS_GROUPSMEMBERS where CGM_GROUPID=? and CGM_MEMBEROLDID not in ? and CGM_MEMBEROLDID not in (select COMAPP_DIV_APPID from COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS where comapp_id=? and COMAPP_div_appid is not null)) and (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n')
delete from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_groupid=? and comapp_id=?
update cus_groupsmembers set cgm_memberid=? where cgm_memberid=?

select demo_appid,perapp_cbsid from applications,per_demographics,perapplicant where perapp_id=demo_appid and app_no=demo_appno and lower(app_status) in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and demo_appid in (select CGM_MEMBERID from cus_groupsmembers where CGM_GROUPID='^') union select demo_comappnewid,perapp_cbsid from applications,com_demographics,perapplicant where perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and app_no=demo_appno and lower(app_status) in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and demo_comappnewid in (select CGM_MEMBERID from cus_groupsmembers where CGM_GROUPID='^')
update cus_groups set grp_updflag=? where group_id=?
select group_id,group_name,grp_updflag from cus_groups where group_id='^' and cus_delflag='N'

select app_no,app_status from applications a,app_post_sanction ps where a.app_no=ps.ps_app_no and ps.PS_OLD_APP_NO in (select PS_OLD_APP_NO from app_post_sanction where ps_app_no='^') and a.app_status='op' and a.app_delflag='N' union select app_no,app_status from applications a1 where app_processdate not in (select max(app_processdate) from app_post_sanction ps1,applications app1 where app1.app_no=ps1.ps_app_no and ps1.PS_OLD_APP_NO in (select ps2.PS_OLD_APP_NO from app_post_sanction ps2 where ps2.ps_app_no='^')) and a1.app_status='pa' and a1.app_no='^'

select app_no from applications,per_demographics,products where app_no=demo_appno and demo_oldappid='^' and app_prdcode=prd_code and prd_type='pA' and scheme_code='TSCQV' and app_status in ('op','pa') and app_delflag='N' and app_no!='^'
update LOAN_ACCOUNT_DETAILS set restr_eff_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where app_no=? and fac_sno=? and loan_sno=?

select facility_sno, facility_catdesc as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_category in ('O') and b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE in (^) and c.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE!='OD' and b.facility_sel_type in ('1','2') union all select facility_sno, facility_catdesc as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c,app_post_sanction where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE in (^) and c.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE!='OD' and b.facility_sel_type in ('4') and Ps_App_No=facility_appno and PS_APP_SNO=facility_sno and (ps_modify_terms like '%DLA%' ) union all select facility_sno, facility_catdesc as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c,app_post_sanction where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE in (^) and c.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE!='OD' and b.facility_sel_type in ('4') and Ps_App_No=facility_appno and PS_APP_SNO=facility_sno and (ps_modify_terms like '%DATEEX%') order by facility_sno

select facility_sno, facility_catdesc as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_typefor in ('S') and b.FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG='Y' order by facility_sno

select org_name,org_scode,cbs_static_data_desc as draw_power_indicator,drawing_pwr,facility_schemecode,facility_glsubheadcode from PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA,organisations,cbs_staticdata where org_scode=LOANDISBBRANCH and APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='16' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE(+)=drawing_pwr_ind

select org_name,org_scode,cbs_static_data_desc as draw_power_indicator,drawing_pwr,facility_schemecode,facility_glsubheadcode from organisations,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA_PS,cbs_staticdata where org_scode=LOANDISBBRANCH and APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and APP_PROPOSEDSNO='^' and APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO='^' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='16' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE(+)=drawing_pwr_ind

select perapp_fname as appname,round((months_between((sysdate),(perapp_dob)))/12) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason, perinc_takehome,perinc_year1_income,perapp_employment,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from perapplicant,perincexpenses where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_oldid='^' and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select com_compdttype,perapp_fname as appname,round((months_between((sysdate),(perapp_dob)))/12) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason, perinc_takehome,perinc_year1_income,perapp_employment,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from perapplicant,perincexpenses,com_companydetails where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_id=com_compdtappid and perinc_id=com_compdtappid and com_facility_sno='^' and com_compdtappno='^'
select com_oldlapsid as appid,com_compdttype,COM_COMPDTID from com_companydetails where com_facility_sno='^' and com_compdtappno='^'
select com_oldlapsid as appid,com_compdttype from com_companydetails_ps where com_proposedfacility_sno=^ and com_proposed_appno='^' and com_facility_sno='^' and com_compdtappno='^'

select facility_months,facility_sancamt,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc from facilities f,static_data where facility_appno='^' and facility_group='^' and facility_sel_type='1' and STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180'

select demo_type,perapp_fname as appname,round((months_between((sysdate),(perapp_dob)))/12) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason, perinc_takehome,perinc_year1_income,perapp_employment,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from perapplicant,perincexpenses,per_demographics where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type!='a'

select demo_type,perapp_fname as appname,round((months_between((sysdate),(perapp_dob)))/12) as age,perapp_constitution,perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason, perinc_takehome,perinc_year1_income,perapp_employment,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from perapplicant,perincexpenses,per_demographics_ps where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_proposedapp_no='^' and demo_type!='a'
select org_code, org_name from organisations where org_level='A' order by org_name
select USR_ID,USR_FNAME||''||USR_MNAME||''||USR_LNAME as username from users where USER_DESIGNATION in ('009','047') order by usr_id
insert into set_afo_branchmaster(sbm_userid,sbm_homeorgcode,sbm_clusterbranchcode, sbm_modifieddate,sbm_modified_user) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?)
delete from set_afo_branchmaster where sbm_userid=?
select sbm_userid,sbm_homeorgcode,sbm_clusterbranchcode from set_afo_branchmaster where sbm_userid='^'
update users set usr_orgcode=? where usr_id=?
select org_code,org_name from organisations where org_code in (^)
select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno ='^' order by finyear
select distinct to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,TO_DATE(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS finyear from com_finappDSCRSENS where fin_appno ='^' order by finyear
delete from com_finappdscrsens where fin_appno =? and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and com_division_id=?

select prd_interest,prdint_inttype,prd_creditrskpremium,prd_busstrategicpremium,prd_interestid from prdint_master,prd_interest_limit where prdint_sno=prd_intid and prdint_prdcode='^' and '^' between prd_amtrangefrom and prd_amtrangeto and (select prd_term from products where prd_code='^') between prd_termfrom and prd_termto and prd_roitype='O' and PRDINT_REFTYPE='O'
update loandetails set loan_recmdamt=? where loan_appno=?

select 1 as dep_count,case PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT when '1' then PERINC_YEARSALARY when '9' then PERINC_YEARSALARY else PERINC_YEAR1_INCOME end as tot_inc from PERAPPLICANT,PERINCEXPENSES,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_ID=PERINC_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' union all select nvl(INDINFO_DEPENDENTS_CHILD+INDINFO_DEPENDENTS_OTHERS,0),INDINFO_FAMILY_INCOME from PERAPPLICANT,INDIVIDUAL_INFO,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_ID=INDINFO_APPID and DEMO_APPNO='^'

select 1 as dep_count,case PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT when '1' then PERINC_YEARSALARY when '9' then PERINC_YEARSALARY else PERINC_YEAR1_INCOME end as tot_inc from PERAPPLICANT,PERINCEXPENSES,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_APPID and DEMO_TYPE='a' and PERAPP_ID=PERINC_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' union all select nvl(INDINFO_DEPENDENTS_CHILD+INDINFO_DEPENDENTS_OTHERS,0),INDINFO_FAMILY_INCOME from PERAPPLICANT,INDIVIDUAL_INFO,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_APPID and DEMO_TYPE='a' and PERAPP_ID=INDINFO_APPID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select nvl(sum(PERAPP_NETWORTH),0) as networth from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select nvl(sum(PERAPP_NETWORTH),0) as networth from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,PERAPPLICANT where COM_COMPDTAPPID=PERAPP_ID and COM_COMPDTTYPE='^' and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^'
select nvl(sum(PERAPP_NETWORTH),0) as networth from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_TYPE='^' and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select CIBIL_RAT_STATUS,CIBIL_SCORE from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,CUS_CIBILDETAILS where to_char(DEMO_COMAPPNEWID)=CIBIL_APPID and CIBIL_RAT_STATUS='Y' and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select CIBIL_RAT_STATUS,CIBIL_SCORE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,CUS_CIBILDETAILS where to_char(DEMO_APPID)=CIBIL_APPID and DEMO_TYPE='a' and CIBIL_RAT_STATUS='Y' and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select PEREMP_EXPINYRS,PERINC_OTHERINCOME from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PEREMPLOYER,PERINCEXPENSES where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERINC_ID and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PEREMP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select PEREMP_EXPINYRS,PERINC_OTHERINCOME from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PEREMPLOYER,PERINCEXPENSES where DEMO_APPID=PERINC_ID and DEMO_TYPE='a' and DEMO_APPID=PEREMP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select nvl(sum(LAND_ACREAGE),0)*0.4 as land_hectare from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,AGR_LANDHOLDINGS where DEMO_TYPE='a' and DEMO_APPID=LAND_APPID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select nvl(sum(LAND_ACREAGE),0)*0.4 as land_hectare from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,AGR_LANDHOLDINGS where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=LAND_APPID and DEMO_APPNO='^'

select floor(nvl((A/(select LOAN_RECMDAMT from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^')),0)*100) as sec_coverage from (select distinct(APP_SEC_SECID),sum(APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE) a from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_APPNO ='^' group by APP_SEC_SECID)

select com_oldlapsid,com_compdtappid,com_compdttype,com_compdtfname,com_compborrname,com_comprelationship,trunc(months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob)/12) as age,perapp_networth, to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,perapp_employment,perinc_takehome, perinc_year1_income,to_char(perinc_yearend1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perinc_yearend1 from com_companydetails, perincexpenses,perapplicant where perinc_id=perapp_id and perapp_id=com_compdtappid and com_compdtappno in (select ps_old_app_no from app_post_sanction where ps_app_no='^')

select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_valuer_name,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,to_char(cus_sec_valuation_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cus_sec_valuation_date,sec_surveyno,sec_plotno,sec_totalarea,sec_valuervalue,sec_measurement,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER from cus_securities,security_land where cus_securities.cus_sec_id=sec_id and sec_id in( select app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' ^)
select DEMO_APPNO,DEMO_APPID,DEMO_TYPE,DEMO_RELATION,DEMO_INCLUDEINCOME,DEMO_OLDAPPID,DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,DEMO_DOCPRINT,DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED from per_demographics where demo_appno='^'
select count(com_compdtappno) as cnt from com_companydetails,app_post_sanction where com_oldlapsid='^' and com_facility_sno=ps_old_app_sno and com_compdtappno=ps_old_app_no and ps_app_no='^'
delete from com_companydetails where com_facility_sno=? and com_compdtappno=?
select ps_app_no,ps_app_sno,ps_old_app_sno,ps_old_app_no from app_post_sanction where ps_modify_terms is null and ps_app_no='^'

select sum(app_sec_securityvalue) as secvalue from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_type in('^') and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_securitytype='1' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_appno='^'

select sum(combk_limit) as combk_limit,sum(combk_os) as combk_os from com_banking,products where prd_type='pH' and prd_code=substr(COMBK_FACILITY,1,length(COMBK_FACILITY)-2) and combk_credittype='E' and combk_modtype in('p','r') and combk_appno='^'
select demo_appno,DEMO_OLDAPPID from applications,per_demographics,products where prd_type='pH' and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^'

select demo_appno,DEMO_OLDAPPID from applications,per_demographics,products where prd_type='pV' and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_no=demo_appno and app_status in ('op','pa') and app_delflag='N' and APP_RENEW_STATUS is null and demo_type='a' and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and app_no!='^'
select count(demo_appno) as count,demo_type from per_demographics where demo_type!='a' and demo_appno='^' group by demo_appno,demo_type

insert into edu_details(edudetail_appno, edu_id, edu_exam, edu_university, edu_yearpass, edu_attempts, edu_marks, edu_class) select ?, edu_id, edu_exam, edu_university, edu_yearpass, edu_attempts, edu_marks, edu_class from edu_details where edudetail_appno=?

insert into edu_scholar(eduscholar_appno, edu_id, edu_exam, edu_academic, edu_name, edu_amount, edu_from, edu_to) select ?, edu_id, edu_exam, edu_academic, edu_name, edu_amount, edu_from, edu_to from edu_scholar where eduscholar_appno=?

insert into edu_loan (eduloan_appno,edu_coursename, edu_course_approved, edu_course_approvedby,edu_univ_name,edu_univ_approved,edu_univ_approvedby, edu_univ_addr,edu_qual_proposed,edu_partfull,edu_duration, edu_commencedate,edu_mode_secure,edu_univ_situ_domicile, edu_comp_stay_hostel,edu_comments1,edu_comments2,edu_comments3, edu_comments4, edu_studies_in,expected_income,EDU_MERITORIOUS,EDU_QUALIFYINGEXA,edu_typeofcourse,edu_schemetype,EDU_OTHR_SUBSIDY, EDU_INC_CERT,EDU_INC_CERT_NUMBER,EDU_INC_CERT_DATE,EDU_INC_CERT_AUTHORITY,EDU_COURSE_EXTEND,EDU_COURSE_STRTDATE) select ?,edu_coursename, edu_course_approved, edu_course_approvedby,edu_univ_name,edu_univ_approved,edu_univ_approvedby, edu_univ_addr,edu_qual_proposed,edu_partfull,edu_duration, edu_commencedate,edu_mode_secure,edu_univ_situ_domicile, edu_comp_stay_hostel,edu_comments1,edu_comments2,edu_comments3, edu_comments4, edu_studies_in,expected_income,EDU_MERITORIOUS,EDU_QUALIFYINGEXA,edu_typeofcourse,edu_schemetype,EDU_OTHR_SUBSIDY, EDU_INC_CERT,EDU_INC_CERT_NUMBER,EDU_INC_CERT_DATE,EDU_INC_CERT_AUTHORITY,EDU_COURSE_EXTEND,EDU_COURSE_STRTDATE from edu_loan where eduloan_appno=?

insert into edu_course_exp (edu_appno,edu_id,edu_type, edu_comments, edu_year1, edu_year2, edu_year3, edu_year4, edu_year5,edu_year6,edu_col_total) select ?,edu_id,edu_type, edu_comments, edu_year1, edu_year2, edu_year3, edu_year4, edu_year5,edu_year6,edu_col_total from edu_course_exp where edu_appno=?

insert into per_instacash(insta_appno,insta_sno,insta_sectype,insta_amount,insta_maturitydate,insta_margin,insta_marginamt,insta_eligibleamt)select ?,insta_sno,insta_sectype,insta_amount,insta_maturitydate,insta_margin,insta_marginamt,insta_eligibleamt from per_instacash where insta_appno=?
update applications set app_finalsanction=? where app_no=?

select com_appno,to_char(com_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comdate,com_proposedappno from com_comments_ps,applications where (app_delflag='N' or app_delflag is null) and app_no=com_proposedappno and com_sno='^' and com_appno='^' and com_page='BreifDetaisTL' order by com_date

select facility_appno,to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facilityduedate, facility_proposedappno,to_char(facility_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_reviewdate from facilities_ps,applications where (app_delflag='N' or app_delflag is null) and app_no=facility_proposedappno and facility_sno='^' and facility_appno='^' order by facility_duedate
select app_sec_appno from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_type in('^') and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_appno='^'

select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_security_description,cus_sec_netsecurity, cus_sec_type,cus_sec_classification,perapp_fname,perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid from CUS_SECURITIES,cus_security_ownership,perapplicant where (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_oldid=CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and CUS_OWNER_SNO='1' and cus_owner_security_id=cus_sec_id and cus_sec_id='^'

select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_security_description,cus_sec_netsecurity, cus_sec_type,cus_sec_classification,p1.perapp_fname as exappname,p1.perapp_oldid as exapplapsid,p1.perapp_cbsid as exappcbsid, p2.perapp_fname newappname,p2.perapp_oldid as newapplapsid,sec_createdby,p2.perapp_cbsid as newappcbsid,sec_approvedby from CUS_SECURITIES,cus_security_ownership_temp,perapplicant p1,perapplicant p2 where security_statusflag='op' and (p1.perapp_renew is null or p1.perapp_renew='n') and p1.perapp_oldid=sec_existingownerid and (p2.perapp_renew is null or p2.perapp_renew='n') and p2.perapp_oldid=sec_newownerid and sec_secid=cus_sec_id and cus_sec_id='^'
insert into cus_security_ownership_temp (sec_secid,sec_existingownerid,sec_newownerid, sec_createdby,sec_createddate,security_statusflag,org_scode) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)
update cus_securities set cus_releaseflag=? where cus_sec_id=?
delete from cus_security_ownership_temp where sec_secid=? and security_statusflag='op'
select count(SEC_SECID) as appno from cus_security_ownership_temp where security_statusflag='op' and (sec_approvedby='^' or sec_approvedby is null) and org_scode='^'

select cus_sec_id,perapp_fname,sm1.sec_name as sectype, sm2.sec_name as secclassification, SEC_CREATEDBY, to_char(SEC_CREATEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_CREATEDDATE,sec_approvedby,sec_createdby from cus_security_ownership_temp,cus_securities,perapplicant,SECURITY_MASTER sm1,SECURITY_MASTER sm2 where(perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_oldid=sec_existingownerid and sm1.SEC_Id=cus_sec_type and sm2.sec_id=cus_sec_classification and sec_secid=cus_sec_id and security_statusflag='op' and (sec_approvedby='^' or sec_approvedby is null) and org_scode='^' order by sec_approvedby
update cus_security_ownership_temp set sec_approvedby=? where sec_secid=? and security_statusflag='op'
update cus_security_ownership_temp set sec_approveddate=sysdate,security_statusflag=? where sec_secid=? and security_statusflag='op'
update cus_security_ownership set cus_owner_laps_id=? where cus_owner_laps_id=? and cus_owner_security_id=?

select app_no,DEMO_OLDAPPID,app_no as appno from applications a,app_securitydetails s left join per_demographics on demo_appno=app_sec_appno and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' where a.app_no=s.app_sec_appno and app_loantype='P' and a.app_status in ('pa') and s.app_sec_secid='^' and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N' and app_sec_loantype='P' and nvl(app_renew_flag,'F')!='P' union select app_no||'-'||APP_SEC_FACSNO,com_oldlapsid,app_no as appno from applications a,FACILITIES fac,app_securitydetails s left join com_companydetails on com_compdtappno=app_sec_appno and APP_SEC_FACSNO = COM_FACILITY_SNO and com_oldlapsid='^' where a.app_no=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and fac.FACILITY_APPNO=s.APP_SEC_APPNO and fac.FACILITY_SNO=s.APP_SEC_FACSNO and app_loantype in ('A','C') and fac.FACILITY_STATUS in ('pa') and s.app_sec_secid='^' and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N' and app_sec_loantype='P' and nvl(app_renew_flag,'F')!='P'

select APPSANC_APPNO from APPRAISALSANCTION where APPRAISAL_SANCAUTH in ('14','15','16') and SANC_REF_NO is null and APPSANC_APPNO='^' union select COM_APPNO from COM_BRIEFBACKGROUND where COM_SANCAUTHORITY in ('14','15','16') and COM_SANCREFNO is null and COM_APPNO='^'

update app_securitydetails set app_sec_customerid=?,app_sec_applicant=? where app_sec_secid=? and app_sec_customerid=? and app_sec_appno in (select app_no from applications a, app_securitydetails s where a.app_no=s.app_sec_appno and s.app_sec_secid=? and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N')
update cus_groupsmembers set cgm_groupname=? where cgm_groupid=?
insert into mclrmaster (mclr_sno,mclr_type,mclr_baseratespread,mclr_tablecode,mclr_effectivefrom,MCLR_ACTIVE,MCLR_TABLECODEOVERDRAFTS) values(mclr_mastersno.nextval,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
update mclrmaster set mclr_type=?,mclr_baseratespread=?,mclr_tablecode=?,mclr_effectivefrom=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),MCLR_ACTIVE=?,MCLR_TABLECODEOVERDRAFTS=? where mclr_sno=?
update mclrmaster set MCLR_ACTIVE=? where mclr_sno=?

select mclr_sno,MCLR_TYPE,MCLR_BASERATESPREAD,MCLR_TABLECODE,to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy') as effdate,cs.cbs_static_data_desc as description,MCLR_ACTIVE,MCLR_TABLECODEOVERDRAFTS from MCLRMASTER a,cbs_staticdata cs WHERE CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=a.MCLR_TYPE and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='34' and MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM = (select max(b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) from MCLRMASTER b WHERE a.MCLR_TYPE=b.MCLR_TYPE and b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM ^= sysdate) and MCLR_ACTIVE='Y'

select mclr_sno,MCLR_TYPE,MCLR_BASERATESPREAD,MCLR_TABLECODE,to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy') as effdate,cs.cbs_static_data_desc as description,MCLR_TABLECODEOVERDRAFTS from MCLRMASTER a,cbs_staticdata cs WHERE CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=a.MCLR_TYPE and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='34' and MCLR_ACTIVE='Y' and MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM = (select max(b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) from MCLRMASTER b WHERE a.MCLR_TYPE=b.MCLR_TYPE and b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM ^= sysdate) and MCLR_ACTIVE='Y' and cbs_static_data_desc not like '%FBIL%'
select mclr_baseratespread,mclr_tablecode from mclrmaster where mclr_effectivefrom=to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and mclr_type='^'
update loandetails set LOAN_MCLRTABCODE=? where loan_appno=?
select mclr_id,mclr_desc,mclr_parent from mclr_spreadmaster where mclr_parent=^ ^
select mclr_id,mclr_desc,mclr_parent,mclr_activeflag from mclr_spreadmaster where mclr_id=^
select NVL(max(mclr_id),0)+1 as sno from mclr_spreadmaster
insert into mclr_spreadmaster(mclr_id,mclr_desc,mclr_parent,mclr_activeflag) values(?,?,?,?)
update mclr_spreadmaster set mclr_desc=?,mclr_parent=?,mclr_activeflag=? where mclr_id=?
update mclr_spreadmaster set mclr_desc=? where mclr_parent=?
insert into available_users(au_usr_id,au_usr_name,au_org_code,au_ip_address,au_intime) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate)
delete from available_users where au_usr_id=?
delete from FACILITY_MCLRSPREADVALUE where FACILITY_APPNO=?
delete from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD where FACILITY_APPNO=?
delete from FACILITY_MCLRSPREADVALUE where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO in (select FACILITY_SNO from FACILITIES where FACILITY_HEADID='5' and FACILITY_ID='48' and FACILITY_APPNO=?)
delete from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO in (select FACILITY_SNO from FACILITIES where FACILITY_HEADID='5' and FACILITY_ID='48' and FACILITY_APPNO=?)
update FACILITIES set FACILITY_INTEREST=?,BPLR=?,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST=? where FACILITY_INTTYPE='Flo' and FACILITY_APPNO=?
update FACILITIES set FACILITY_INTEREST=?,BPLR=?,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST=? where FACILITY_INTTYPE='Flo' and FACILITY_HEADID='5' and FACILITY_ID='48' and FACILITY_APPNO=?
select FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_ID from FACILITIES where FACILITY_HEADID='5' and FACILITY_APPNO='^'

select FACILITY_SNO,com_bankscheme,com_gecltype from FACILITIES f,facility_corp,com_otherdet o where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.facility_code=com_facid and com_bankscheme in ('061','063','064','065') and f.facility_code=o.facility_code
select count(*) from prdint_master,prd_interest_limit where prd_intid=prdint_sno and prdint_prdcode='^'

select '' as prd_interest, prd_adjust,prd_interestid,'' as prd_baserate,prd_creditrskpremium,prd_busstrategicpremium,prd_intid,prd_sno from prd_interest_limit pil where prd_intid = (select prdint_sno from prdint_master where upper(prdint_inttype)=upper('^') and prdint_prdcode='^' and prd_amtrangefrom ^ '^' and prd_amtrangeto ^ '^' and prd_roitype='^' and prdint_reftype='^') and prd_termfrom ^ '^' and prd_termto ^ '^'

select sum(loan_recmdamt) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,PRODUCTS prd where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and prd.PRD_CODE=a.APP_PRDCODE and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('op','pa') and a.app_delflag!='Y' and d.demo_type='a' and prd.PRD_BANKSCHEME in (select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E' and MIS_MCLR_SCHEME='Y' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1')

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('pa','op') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and (f.facility_sancstatus is null or f.facility_sancstatus='A') and fc.COM_BANKSCHEME in (select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E' and MIS_MCLR_SCHEME='Y' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1') group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin
select MCLRMSME_INT_RATE from SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE where '^' between MCLRMSME_AMT_FROM and MCLRMSME_AMT_TO

select COM_FACID from FACILITIES,FACILITY_CORP where FACILITY_CODE=COM_FACID and FACILITY_SNO='^' and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and COM_BANKSCHEME in (select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E' and MIS_MCLR_SCHEME='Y' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1')
update loandetails set loan_modintrate=?,loan_intrate=?,loan_inttype=?,loan_mclrtabcode=?,loan_mclrtype=? where loan_appno=?
update loandetails set loan_modintrate =?,loan_intrate=? where loan_appno =?

select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC|| ',' ||ap.perapp_fname as appname,perapp_fname, con_comaddr1 ,con_comaddr2 ,con_comvillage ,d.district_desc ,trim(c.city_name)as cityname ,s.state_name ,con_comzip, CON_PERMADDR1 ,CON_PERMADDR2 ,CON_PERMVILLAGE ,d2.district_desc as permdist,trim(lc2.city_name) as permcity ,ls2.state_name as permstate ,CON_PERMZIP,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from perapplicant ap, ^, cust_contactinfo, laps_cities c,laps_states s, district_master d,cbs_staticdata,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,district_master d2 where CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=perapp_title and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and s.state_code =con_comstate AND c.city_code(+)=con_comcity and c.STATE_ID=s.state_id AND d.district_code(+)=con_comdist and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=ap.PERAPP_ID and d2.district_code(+)=con_permdist and c.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E' and con_appid=perapp_id and perapp_id=^ and demo_appno='^'

select loan_recmdamt,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,LOAN_MCLRTYPE,LOAN_MODINTRATE,loan_inttype,app_prdcode,loan_reqterms,loan_roitype,loan_baserate,to_char(loan_mclr_migration_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_mclr_migration_date,LOAN_CREDITRSKVAL,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL,APP_PARENT_APPNO from loandetails,applications where loan_appno=app_no and app_no='^'

select f.facility_sancamt,f2.cbs_Accountno,f1.facility_mclrType,f.facility_sancinterest,to_char(f.FAC_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,MCLR_CRP_TOTAL,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,f.facility_sno from facilities f, facility_mclrspread f1,facilities f2 where f1.facility_sno=f.facility_sno and f1.facility_appno=f.facility_appno and f.facility_inttype='Flo' and f2.facility_appno=f.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and f2.facility_sno=f.facility_oldappsno and f.facility_intsubtype in ('MCLR','MCLEC') and f.facility_appno='^'

select f.facility_sancamt,f2.cbs_Accountno,f1.facility_mclrType,f.facility_sancinterest,to_char(f.FAC_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_MCLR_MIGRATION_DATE,MCLR_CRP_TOTAL,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,f.facility_sno from facilities f, facility_mclrspread f1,facilities f2 where f1.facility_sno=f.facility_sno and f1.facility_appno=f.facility_appno and f.facility_inttype='Flo' and f2.facility_appno=f.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and f2.facility_sno=f.facility_oldappsno and f.facility_intsubtype in ('SMTB','TYGS') and f.facility_appno='^'
select to_char(min(loan_matdate),'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate from PER_loanagainstdeposit where loan_APPNO='^'

insert into agr_goldloan(AGR_ARTCATID, AGR_ARTNO, AGR_ARTDESC, AGR_ARTGROSSWT, AGR_ARTNETWT, AGR_ARTQTYTOUCH, AGR_ARTMKTRATE, AGR_ARTRATE, AGR_ESTRATE, AGR_BANKVALUE, agr_quantity, agr_grsno, agr_secid, agr_articletype,agr_netvalue,AGR_DATE) select AGR_ARTCATID, AGR_ARTNO, AGR_ARTDESC, AGR_ARTGROSSWT, AGR_ARTNETWT, AGR_ARTQTYTOUCH, ?, ?,least(? * AGR_ARTNETWT, ? * AGR_ARTNETWT) , ? * AGR_ARTNETWT, agr_quantity, agr_grsno, agr_secid, agr_articletype,? * AGR_ARTNETWT,sysdate from AGR_GOLDLOAN where AGR_ARTCATID=?
delete from AGR_GOLDLOAN where AGR_ARTCATID=? and (AGR_DATE is null or to_date(to_char(AGR_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')
select to_char(agr_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as agr_date from AGR_GOLDLOAN where AGR_ARTCATID='^'

select b.facility_sno as sno,a.FACILITY_APPNO,a.FACILITY_SNO,a.facility_group,a.facility_sancstatus,a.facility_months,a.facility_proposed,a.facility_sancamt,a.facility_status, STAT_DATA_DESC1 as displaydesc from facilities a,FACILITIES b,static_data sd where b.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and b.facility_sancstatus='A' and b.facility_category='A' and STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and a.facility_appno=regexp_substr(b.FACILITY_ADHOCFAC,'[^~]+',1,1) and a.facility_sno=regexp_substr(b.FACILITY_ADHOCFAC,'[^~]+',1,2)

select MCLR_TYPE,MCLR_BASERATESPREAD,MCLR_TABLECODE from MCLRMASTER a WHERE MCLR_ACTIVE='Y' and MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM = (select max(b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) from MCLRMASTER b WHERE a.MCLR_TYPE=b.MCLR_TYPE and b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM ^= sysdate) and a.MCLR_TYPE='Y'
select sec_id,sec_name from security_master where sec_id in (^) order by sec_id

select inward_no,INDINFO_IS_STAFF from appinwardreg left join PERAPPLICANT on PERAPP_CBSID=INWARD_CBSCUSTID and (PERAPP_RENEW='n' or PERAPP_RENEW is null) left join INDIVIDUAL_INFO on PERAPP_ID=INDINFO_APPID where INWARD_CBSCUSTID='^' and INWARD_BANKSCHEME='^' and INWARD_APPATACHED='N' and INWARD_SECTOR='p' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null and inward_appstatus='1'

select app_no,app_status,app_loantype,to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as created_date,app_nprefid from applications,appinwardreg where (app_delflag='N' or app_delflag is null ) and APP_INWARDNO=inward_no and inward_no='^'
update loandetails set loan_govt=?,loan_sub=?,govt_scheme=?,loan_sponseragency=?, loan_subsidytype=?,LOAN_AGENCYNAME=? where loan_appno=?
select nvl(max(USER_SNO),0)+1 as maxsno from USER_ACCESS_CONTROL
insert into USER_ACCESS_CONTROL(USER_SNO,USER_PAGE_VAL,USER_STAFF_ID,USER_ADDED_ON,USER_ADDED_BY) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?)
delete from USER_ACCESS_CONTROL where USER_SNO=?
select USER_SNO,USER_PAGE_VAL,USER_STAFF_ID,USR_FNAME,ORG_NAME from USER_ACCESS_CONTROL,ORGANISATIONS,USERS where USER_STAFF_ID=USR_ID and USR_ORGCODE=ORG_CODE and USER_PAGE_VAL='^' order by USER_SNO
select USER_PAGE_VAL from USER_ACCESS_CONTROL where USER_STAFF_ID='^'
select CLR_BAL_AMT,ROI,DISC_RATE,to_char(IDMD_EFF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as int_dmd_date,to_char(DUE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as due_date from VW_FVALUE_LAPS where FORACID='^' and SHDL_STATUS='^'
update APP_SECURITYDETAILS set APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION=(select CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID) where APP_SEC_APPNO=?

select perapp_id,perapp_title||'.'||perapp_fname as perapp_name,perapp_fatname,PERAPP_SEX,perapp_marstat,indinfo_spouse_name,INDINFO_STAFF_ID from perapplicant,INDIVIDUAL_INFO where perapp_cbsid='^' and perapp_id=INDINFO_APPID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)
update appdocuments set apdoc_approvercbsid=? where apdoc_appno=?
update appdocuments set apdoc_approvercbsid=? where apdoc_appno=? and APDOC_FAC_SLNO =?
delete from app_post_sanction where PS_APP_NO=? and PS_APP_SNO=?

select distinct(app_no) as app_no,PRD_DESC,LOAN_RECMDAMT,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SanctionedDate,APP_PROCESSDATE from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS , PERAPPLICANT,APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS,PRODUCTS,ORGANISATIONS,APPINWARDREG,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_OLDID='^' and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and appno=app_no and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO ^ and cbs_accountno is not null order by APP_PROCESSDATE

select sum(app_sec_securityvalue) as secvalue from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_type in('^') and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_securitytype='2' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_appno='^'
select (trunc(to_date(prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy'))-(to_date(sysdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy'))) as datediff,prd_stop from products where prd_code='^'
select deviation_newvalue from app_deviation where appno='^' and deviation_req='Y' and deviation_apprej='A' and deviation_type='IR'
update solvency set sol_appid=? where sol_appid=? and sol_status='OP'
update addkbowerdetails set addkbow_app_id=? where addkbow_app_id=? and addkbow_status='OP'
update solvency set SOL_NETWORTH=? where sol_appl_no=?
update addkbowerdetails set addkbow_Networth=?,addkbow_GrossAnnincome=? where addkbow_app_no=?
select PERAPP_NETWORTH,perapp_cbsid from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'
select valuers_seqno from VALUERSMASTER where valuer_cbsid='^' and valappflag='^' ^

select distinct org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR(valuers_expdateofsanc,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_expdateofsanc, valuers_detofsecdep,to_char(valuers_jewappdateofagr,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_jewappdateofagr,VALUER_CBSID,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC from valuersmaster, laps_cities, laps_states where upper(valuer_cbsid) like upper('%^%') and valappflag='^' and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city order by valuers_name
select com_facility_stop from facility_corp where com_facid='^'
update facilities set facility_reattachflag=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?
update loandetails set loan_goldrate_masterid=? where loan_appno=?

select grm_sno, to_char(grm_moddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as grm_moddate, grm_retglquick, grm_agriglquick, grm_retglclassic, grm_agriglclassic, grm_retglcomfort, grm_agriglcomfort, grm_retglstaff, grm_agriglstaff, grm_comments, grm_maxnetweight, grm_maxgoldloans,grm_avgmargin,grm_latestmargin,grm_recurrexpmargin,grm_agridevelopmargin, grm_agriavgmargin_ibja,grm_agrilatestmargin_ibja from goldratemaster where grm_sno='^'
select (trunc(to_date(prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy'))-(to_date(sysdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy'))) as datediff,prd_stop from products,applications where prd_code=app_prdcode and app_no='^'
select com_facility_stop,facility_sno,COM_FACDESC from facility_corp,facilities where facility_appno='^' and COM_FACID=facility_code and (facility_sancstatus is null or facility_sancstatus='A')

select com_facility_stop,facility_sno,COM_FACDESC from facility_corp,facilities where facility_appno='^' and COM_FACID=facility_code and (facility_sancstatus is null or facility_sancstatus='A') and facility_sno='^'
update facilities set facility_reattachflag=? where facility_appno=?
update perincexpenses set PERAPPACTUALINCOME=? where perinc_id=?
select perinc_yearsalary,perinc_year1_income from perincexpenses where perinc_id='^'
select app_sec_securitytype from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and cus_sec_id=app_sec_secid and app_sec_loantype='P' and cus_sec_type in ('18')
select app_sec_securitytype from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and cus_sec_id=app_sec_secid and app_sec_loantype='P' and cus_sec_type in ('18')
select loan_repaymenttype,to_char(loan_receivedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_receivedate from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select * from edu_loan where eduloan_appno='^'

select grp_id,grp_name,sanction_limit,sanction_security from groups,com_facilitydelegation,users where grp_id = sanc_groupid and usr_id='^' and USR_GRPID=grp_id and facility_code='^' order by grp_name

select sum(nvl(app_sec_securityvalue,0)) as secval from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES,security_master where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION and SEC_ISLIQUIDFLAG='Y' and app_sec_loantype='P'

select perapp_title||'.'||perapp_fname as perapp_guarname,PERAPP_CBSID ,DEMO_TYPE as app_type from applications,per_demographics,perapplicant where APP_NO=demo_appno and APP_NO='^' and perapp_id=demo_appid and perapp_id in (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_docprint='^')
update appinwardreg set inward_govtspons=?,inward_schmetype=?,inward_subsamount=?,inward_sponagency=?,inward_subsdtype=?,INWARD_OTHERAGENCY=? where INWARD_NO=?
delete from appinwardreg_ps where inward_proposal_no=?

inward_clpudate,inward_exceluploadflag,inward_phone_stdcode,inward_totalloanamt,inward_drivinglic,inward_aadhar,inward_nsdlrefno, inward_canvassedbystaff,inward_borrowerstatus,inward_staffid,?,? from inward_state,inward_zipcode,inward_phone,inward_mobile,inward_email,inward_dob,inward_pantan,inward_purpose,inward_scheme,inward_termloanamt,
