where inward_proposal_no=? and inward_exproposal_no=?

select facility_govtsponschem,facility_schemetype,facility_sponsagency,facility_subsidytype,facility_subsidyamunt,facility_agency,app_inwardno, facility_sno from facilities,applications where app_no=facility_appno and facility_appno='^' order by facility_govtsponschem

select facility_govtsponschem,facility_schemetype,facility_sponsagency,facility_subsidytype,facility_subsidyamunt,facility_agency,app_inwardno, facility_sno from facilities,applications where app_no=facility_appno and facility_appno='^' and facility_sno not in (select PS_OLD_APP_SNO from app_post_sanction where PS_APP_NO='^' and PS_OLD_APP_NO=facility_appno and PS_MODIFY_TERMS like '%MODGSS%') order by facility_govtsponschem
update appinwardreg set inward_govtspons=?,inward_schmetype=?,inward_sponagency=?,inward_subsdtype=?,inward_subsamount=?,inward_otheragency=? where inward_no=?

select inward_no,ps_app_no,ps_app_sno,f1.FACILITY_APPNO,f1.FACILITY_SNO,INWARD_GOVTSPONS,case when f1.FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM=INWARD_GOVTSPONS then 'Y' else 'N' end as govt, case when nvl(f1.FACILITY_SUBSIDYAMUNT,0)=nvl(INWARD_SUBSAMOUNT,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as subsidyflag, case when f1.FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY=INWARD_SPONAGENCY then 'Y' else 'N' end as sponsagency, case when f1.FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE=INWARD_SCHMETYPE then 'Y' else 'N' end as schemetype, case when f1.FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE=INWARD_SUBSDTYPE then 'Y' else 'N' end as subsidytype, case when nvl(f1.FACILITY_AGENCY,0)=nvl(INWARD_OTHERAGENCY,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agency, f2.facility_govtsponschem,f2.facility_subsidyamunt,f2.facility_sponsagency,f2.facility_schemetype,f2.facility_subsidytype,f2.facility_agency from applications,facilities f1,facilities f2,appinwardreg,app_post_sanction where f1.facility_appno=app_no and APP_INWARDNO=inward_no and app_no=PS_OLD_APP_NO and f1.facility_appno=ps_old_app_no and f1.facility_sno=PS_OLD_APP_SNO and f2.facility_appno=PS_APP_NO and f2.facility_sno=ps_app_sno and PS_MODIFY_TERMS like '%MODGSS%' and PS_APP_NO='^' order by f1.FACILITY_APPNO,f1.FACILITY_SNO,f1.FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM
select PS_OLD_APP_NO,APP_INWARDNO from app_post_sanction,applications where PS_APP_NO='^' and app_no=PS_OLD_APP_NO and PS_MODIFY_TERMS like '%MODGSS%'

update CUS_SECURITIES set cus_sec_type=?,cus_sec_type_specify=?,cus_sec_classification=?, cus_sec_classification_specify=?,cus_sec_security_description=?,cus_sec_collateral_start_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), cus_sec_collateral_end_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),cus_sec_already_charged=?,cus_sec_amount_charged=?,cus_sec_name_institution=?, cus_sec_netsecurity=?,cus_sec_residual_riskflag=?,cus_sec_valuer_name=?,cus_sec_valuation_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), cus_sec_insurence_company=?,cus_sec_insured_amount=?,cus_sec_due_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),cus_sec_joint_holder=?, cus_sec_reidualval=?,cus_sec_natureofcharge=?,cus_sec_isliqidsecu=?,cus_sec_matuliddate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),cus_sec_totalsecvalue=?, cus_releaseflag='N',cus_companycode=?,cus_companyshareval=?,cus_companyshare_cnt=?,cus_valsubmitteddate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), cus_valrecvdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),CUS_SEC_COMMENTS=?,CUS_SEC_INTID_ROC=?,CUS_SEC_CHARGEID_ROC=?,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE=?,CUS_SEC_SHARETYPE=?,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID=?,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_DATE=? ,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER =?,CUS_PROPERTY_LEASEHOLD=?,CUS_PROPERTY_LESSOR=? where cus_sec_id=?
select perapp_stakeheld_women,perapp_constitutionnew from perapplicant p,per_demographics d where p.perapp_id=d.demo_appid and d.demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select a.app_prdcode,p.prd_catid,p.prd_type,p.prd_desc,p.prd_applicablefor,p.prd_vehitype,p.prd_rng_to from applications a,products p where app_prdcode=p.prd_code and a.app_no='^'
select NVL(max(lawyer_history_sno),0)+1 as lawyer_history_sno from lawyermaster_history where lawyer_history_code='^'
insert into lawyermaster_history(lawyer_history_code,lawyer_history_sno,lawyer_history_eliteval,lawyer_history_userid,lawyer_history_date,lawyer_history_orgcode) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)

select * from (select count(app_no) as appno,app_loantype from appmailbox a, applications,users where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid = usr_id and usr_orgcode='^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype in ('A','C') and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and (select count(facility_appno) from facilities where facility_appno=app_no)=(select count(facility_appno) from facilities where facility_appno=app_no and cbs_accountno is not null and facility_status='pa') group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,app_loantype from appmailbox a, applications,products,users where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pV','pJ') and prd_code=app_prdcode and mail_tousrid = usr_id and usr_orgcode='^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and cbs_accountno is not null group by app_loantype union select count(app_no)as appno,'J' app_loantype from appmailbox a, applications,products,users where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd_code=app_prdcode and mail_tousrid = usr_id and usr_orgcode='^' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and app_delflag='N' and app_loantype='P' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) and cbs_accountno is not null group by app_loantype)

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('pa','pr','ca') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus,app_renew_flag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and prd_type in ('^') and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_loantype='P' and app_status in('pa','pr','ca') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select sol_appl_no,sol_applicant_name,org_name,to_char(as_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'),a.as_fromusrid, sol_appid,sol_status,'' as app_renew_flag,org_scode from solvency,organisations,appmailbox_solvency a where org_code=sol_orgcode and as_date=(select max(as_date) from appmailbox_solvency b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno) and as_appno=sol_appl_no and as_tousrid='^' and sol_status in ('PA','PR')

select addkbow_app_no,addkbow_borrowername,org_name,to_char(ak_date,'dd/mm/yyyy'),a.ak_fromusrid, addkbow_app_id,addkbow_status,'' as app_renew_flag,org_scode from addkbowerdetails,organisations,appmailbox_kpower a where org_code=addkbow_orgcode and ak_date=(select max(ak_date) from appmailbox_kpower b where b.ak_appno=a.ak_appno) and ak_appno=addkbow_app_no and ak_tousrid='^' and addkbow_status in ('PA','PR')

select fin_ratappno,fin_appname,org_name,fin_status,af_fromuserid, to_char(af_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as af_date,fin_finid,fin_bussid,'' as app_renew_flag,org_scode from fin_rating, appmailbox_financialrating a,organisations where org_code=fin_orgcode and af_date=(select max(af_date) from appmailbox_financialrating b where b.af_appno=a.af_appno) and af_appno=fin_ratappno and af_touserid='^' and fin_status in ('PA','PR','cA') and (af_type='C' or af_type is null) order by fin_status

select a.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,DEV_FROMUSRID,to_char(DEV_SENTDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DEV_SENTDATE,decode(DEV_APPSTATUS,'op','Open/Pending', 'pa','Processed/Approved','pr','Processed/Rejected',''),a.DEV_ORGSCODE,PG_EMPLOYERNAME from APPL_DEVIATION a,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST p ,DEV_APPMAILBOX m where DEV_APPLHOLDER='^' and a.DEV_APPNO=p.DEV_APPNO and (upper(DEV_DELFLAG)='N' or DEV_DELFLAG is null) and m.dev_appno=a.dev_appno and DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.dev_appno=m.dev_appno) and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null) and dev_appstatus in('pa','pr')
insert into com_Financialparticulars(comfin_appno,comfin_sno,comfin_fieldname,comfin_amount) select ?,comfin_sno,comfin_fieldname,comfin_amount from com_Financialparticulars where comfin_appno=?
update per_cuscbsaccountdata set FREECODE6=?,FREECODE7=?,FREECODE8=?,FREECODE7FINCODE=?,FREECODE8FINCODE=?,LBRCODE=? where APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?
select usr_fname from USERS where USR_ID=(select ORG_HEAD from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_CODE='^')

select org_scode,d.perapp_id,upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment,c.demo_type as app_type, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat from applications a, organisations b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and c.demo_appno = a.app_no and c.demo_appid = d.perapp_id and c.demo_appid=e.con_appid and c.DEMO_DOCPRINT='^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E'

select org_scode,d.perapp_id,upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment,c.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat from applications a, organisations b, COM_COMPANYDETAILS c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and c.COM_COMPDTAPPNO = a.app_no and c.COM_COMPDTAPPID = d.perapp_id and c.COM_COMPDTAPPID=e.con_appid and c.COM_FAC_DOCPRINT='^' and c.COM_FACILITY_SNO='^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E'

select distinct(a.app_no),org_scode,d.perapp_id,upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cm.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from applications a, organisations b, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cm where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID='^' and d.PERAPP_ID=e.CON_APPID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E' and a.app_no=cm.COM_COMPDTAPPNO and cm.COM_FACILITY_SNO='^' and d.PERAPP_OLDID=cm.COM_OLDLAPSID union all select distinct(a.app_no),org_scode,d.perapp_id,upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cm.DEMO_APPTYPE as app_type from applications a, organisations b, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cm where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID='^' and d.PERAPP_ID=e.CON_APPID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E' and cm.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=d.PERAPP_ID

select CON_APPID,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_COMVILLAGE,CON_COMCITY,DISTRICT_DESC AS CON_COMDIST,CON_COMSTATE,CON_COMZIP,CON_COMCOUNTRY,CON_COMPHONE,CON_COMFAX,CON_MOBILE,CON_WEBSITE,CON_RESTYPE,CON_YEARS,CON_EMAIL,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,CON_PERMVILLAGE,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMDIST,CON_PERMSTATE,CON_PERMZIP,CON_PERMCOUNTRY, CON_PERMPHONE,CON_PERMFAX,CON_ADMADDR1,CON_ADMADDR2,CON_ADMVILLAGE,CON_ADMCITY,CON_ADMDIST,CON_ADMSTATE,CON_ADMZIP,CON_ADMCOUNTRY,CON_ADMPHONE,CON_ADMFAX,CON_PERMIS,CON_ADMIS,con_comphone1,con_peremail ,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from CUST_CONTACTINFO left join district_master on district_code=CON_COMDIST , INDIVIDUAL_INFO where CON_APPID='^' and CON_APPID=INDINFO_APPID

select add_months(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),^)- add_months(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),^) as days, ceil(months_between(add_months(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),^),to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'))) as reqmonths, ceil(months_between(add_months(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),^),to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'))) as availblemonths from dual
select cbs_static_data_code,cbs_static_data_desc,cbs_static_sanc_refno,cbs_static_data_show from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='^' and cbs_static_data_code in('^')
update loandetails set loan_msmeexposure=? where loan_appno=?
select round(months_between(sysdate,cominfo_commencement_date)/12) as businessyrs from com_demographics,company_info where cominfo_appid=demo_comappnewid and demo_appno='^'
select round(months_between(sysdate,cominfo_commencement_date)/12) as businessyrs from per_demographics,company_info where cominfo_appid=demo_appid and demo_type='a' and demo_appno='^'
delete from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno=? and AGR_FACSNO=?
select mis_static_data_code, mis_static_data_desc,mis_static_data_show from MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='^' order by mis_static_data_id
select term_appno from com_takeover where term_appno='^'

select count(*) as count from applications a,app_securitydetails s left join facilities f on s.APP_SEC_APPNO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and s.APP_SEC_FACSNO=f.FACILITY_SNO where a.app_no=s.app_sec_appno and s.app_sec_secid='^' and s.app_sec_attached='A' and a.app_delflag='N' and s.app_sec_loantype='P' and ((f.FACILITY_STATUS in('op') or (a.APP_STATUS in('op') and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P')) or ((f.FACILITY_STATUS in('pa') or (a.APP_STATUS in('pa') and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P')) and (nvl(app_renew_flag,'F') in ('F','R','S'))))
select app_sec_securitytype,app_sec_loantype,APP_SEC_EXISTING,app_sec_show,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^'
delete from com_comments where com_appno=? and com_sno=? and com_page in ('COPMOF','SOM','release','BreifDetaisTL','CommentsProj')
delete from com_copmof where COM_APPNO=? and com_facsno=?
delete from COM_COPMOF_MARGIN where com_cofmof_sno=? and COM_APPNO=? and COM_FACSNO=?

select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_docname,doc_jspname,doc_doctype,doc_id,APDOC_FAC_SLNO,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,prd_documents,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(prd_doccode) and prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^') and to_char(prd_doccode)= apdoc_doccode and apdoc_appno='^' and (doc_doctype in ('I','O') or (doc_doctype='A' and DOC_DOCSUBTYPE ='^')) and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) union select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_desc,doc_jspname,doc_doctype,doc_id,APDOC_FAC_SLNO,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(apdoc_doccode) and apdoc_appno ='^' and (doc_doctype in ('I','O') or (doc_doctype='A' and DOC_DOCSUBTYPE ='^')) and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_DELFLAG is null and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by APDOC_FAC_SLNO

select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_docname,doc_jspname,doc_doctype,doc_id,APDOC_FAC_SLNO,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,prd_documents,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(prd_doccode) and prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^') and to_char(prd_doccode)= apdoc_doccode and apdoc_appno='^' and doc_doctype='A' and DOC_DOCSUBTYPE ='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) union select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_desc,doc_jspname,doc_doctype,doc_id,APDOC_FAC_SLNO,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(apdoc_doccode) and apdoc_appno ='^' and doc_doctype='A' and DOC_DOCSUBTYPE ='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_DELFLAG is null and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by APDOC_FAC_SLNO
select apa_sno,apa_filename,apa_userid,apa_doccode,APA_GENERATED_URL from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and apa_delflag is null

select apa_sno,apa_filename,apa_userid,APA_DOC_FACSLNO,apa_doccode,APA_GENERATED_URL from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and APA_DOC_FACSLNO='^' and apa_delflag is null
update app_docattachments set apa_delflag='Y',apa_deluseid=?,apa_deldate=sysdate where apdoc_appno = ? and apdoc_doctype = ? and apa_doccode = ? and apa_sno = ?
update app_docattachments set apa_delflag='Y',apa_deluseid=?,apa_deldate=sysdate where apdoc_appno = ? and apdoc_doctype = ? and apa_doccode = ? and apa_sno = ? and APA_DOC_FACSLNO = ?

select nvl(max(apa_sno)+1,1) as apa_sno from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^'
select apa_sno from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and apa_filename = '^' and apa_delflag is null
select apa_sno from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and apa_filename = '^' and APA_DOC_FACSLNO='^' and apa_delflag is null

select apa_filename,to_char(APA_CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APA_CREATED_DATE from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and apa_sno = '^' and apa_delflag is null
select apdoc_appno from app_docattachments where APDOC_APPNO='^' and APA_FILENAME='^' and apa_delflag is null

select perapp_cbsid from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'

update appdocuments set APDOC_DELFLAG=?,APDOC_DELUSERID=?,APDOC_DELDATE=sysdate where apdoc_appno=? and APDOC_DOCCODE=?
update appdocuments set APDOC_DELFLAG=?,APDOC_DELUSERID=?,APDOC_DELDATE=sysdate where apdoc_appno=? and APDOC_DOCCODE=? and APDOC_FAC_SLNO=?

select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,con_comaddr1,con_permaddr1, con_comaddr2,con_permaddr2,con_comcity,con_permcity,con_comstate,con_permstate,con_comzip,con_permzip,con_comphone as con_permphone, con_email as con_peremail,perapp_constitution,con_permdist,con_comdist,con_mobile,PERAPP_NETWORTH,con_comcountry,con_permcountry,con_comphone1, PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_AADHAAR,APPNRI_PASSPORT_NO,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,PERAPP_MARSTAT,perapp_sex,perapp_fatname from perapplicant left join PERAPPLICANT_NRI on APPNRI_ID=PERAPP_ID,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where perapp_profilestatus='Y' and (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_id=con_appid and indinfo_appid=con_appid and perapp_id=indinfo_appid and PERAPP_CBSID='^' ^

select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,con_comaddr1,con_permaddr1, con_comaddr2,con_permaddr2,con_comcity,con_permcity,con_comstate,con_permstate,con_comzip,con_permzip,con_comphone as con_permphone,con_email as con_peremail, perapp_constitution,con_permdist,con_comdist,con_mobile,PERAPP_NETWORTH,con_comcountry,con_permcountry,con_comphone1,PERAPP_OLDID, INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_MARSTAT from perapplicant,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where perapp_profilestatus='Y' and (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_id=con_appid and indinfo_appid=con_appid and perapp_id=indinfo_appid and upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%') and indinfo_is_staff='02'

select demo_type,demo_appno,demo_oldappid,perapp_title||'.'||perapp_fname as fname,demo_docprint,DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED from per_demographics,perapplicant where perapp_oldid=demo_oldappid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type in ('a','c','g','p','o') and (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n')order by demo_type
