update com_companydetails set COM_FAC_DOCPRINT=?, COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED=? where COM_OLDLAPSID=? and COM_COMPDTAPPNO=? and COM_FACILITY_SNO=?
update loandetails set loan_doc_branchcode=?, loan_releasedateofmclr=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where loan_appno=?
update FACILITIES set FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),fac_printflag=?,FACILITY_DOC_BRANCHCODE=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? AND FACILITY_SNO=?
update applications set app_docprintflag=? where app_no=?

select d.perapp_id,perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.perapp_fname,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from per_demographics c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i where c.demo_appno ='^' and c.demo_appid = d.perapp_id and c.demo_appid=e.con_appid and (c.DEMO_DOCPRINT='c' or demo_type='a') and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and d.perapp_id=i.INDINFO_APPID order by DEMO_DOCPRINT

select d.perapp_id,perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.perapp_fname,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from per_demographics c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i where c.demo_appno ='^' and c.demo_appid = d.perapp_id and c.demo_appid=e.con_appid and c.DEMO_DOCPRINT in ('o','g') and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and d.perapp_id=i.INDINFO_APPID order by DEMO_DOCPRINT

select d.perapp_id,perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.perapp_fname,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS from COM_COMPANYDETAILS c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i where c.COM_COMPDTAPPNO ='^' and c.COM_COMPDTAPPID = d.perapp_id and c.COM_COMPDTAPPID=e.con_appid and c.COM_FAC_DOCPRINT in ('CO','G') and c.COM_FACILITY_SNO='^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and d.perapp_id=i.INDINFO_APPID order by COM_FAC_DOCPRINT

select PERAPP_ID,DEMO_APPNO,'a' as type_desc,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as perapp_fname from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' union all select COM_COMPDTAPPID,COM_COMPDTAPPNO,COM_COMPDTTYPE,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as perapp_fname from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,PERAPPLICANT where COM_COMPDTAPPID=PERAPP_ID and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and COM_FAC_DOCPRINT='C'
update per_demographics set demo_docprint=?,DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED=? where demo_appno=? and demo_type='a'
select mclr_baseratespread from MCLRMASTER where MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM < =to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and MCLR_TYPE='^' order by MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM desc

select SEC_VEHICLETYPE,SEC_MAKE,SEC_MODEL,SEC_PURCHASEVALUE,SEC_HPNO,SEC_REGNO, sec_ownername,sec_ownerdoorno,sec_owneraddress1,sec_owneraddress2, sec_ownercity,sec_ownerstate,sec_ownerdistrict,sec_ownercountry,sec_ownerzipcode,SEC_CHASSISNO,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY from security_vehicle,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs where lc.CITY_CODE(+)= SEC_OWNERCITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=SEC_OWNERSTATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=sec_ownerdistrict and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=sec_ownercountry and sec_id in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P')

select sec_rated,sec_agency,sec_symbol,sec_policyno,to_char(sec_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_policydate, STAT_DATA_DESC1 as sec_issuedby,sec_specify,sec_currencytype,sec_facevalue,sec_maturityvalue,sec_surrendervalue, to_char(sec_maturitydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_maturitydate,PERAPP_FNAME from security_nontradeble,PERAPPLICANT,cus_security_ownership,static_data where cus_owner_security_id=sec_id and cus_owner_sno='1' and sec_id in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P') and PERAPP_oldID=cus_owner_laps_id and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and stat_data_id='117' and STAT_DATA_DESC=sec_issuedby
select NVL(max(doc_sno),0)+1 as count from document_print_history where doc_appno='^'
insert into document_print_history (doc_sno,doc_appno,doc_code,doc_usrid,doc_print_time)values(?,?,?,?,sysdate)
insert into document_print_history (doc_sno,doc_appno,doc_code,doc_usrid,doc_print_time,DOC_FACSNO)values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)

select d.doc_code,d.doc_usrid,to_char(d.doc_print_time,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as doc_print_time,u.usr_fname,u.usr_mname,u.usr_lname,o.org_name,(select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='191' and stat_data_desc=trim(substr(d.doc_code,5)))as doc_name from document_print_history d,users u,organisations o where doc_appno='^' and u.usr_id(+)=d.doc_usrid and o.org_code(+)=u.usr_orgcode order by doc_sno

select d.doc_code,d.doc_usrid,to_char(d.doc_print_time,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as doc_print_time,u.usr_fname,u.usr_mname,u.usr_lname,o.org_name,(select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='191' and stat_data_desc=trim(substr(d.doc_code,5)))as doc_name from document_print_history d,users u,organisations o where doc_appno='^' and DOC_FACSNO='^' and u.usr_id(+)=d.doc_usrid and o.org_code(+)=u.usr_orgcode order by doc_sno

select org_scode,d.perapp_id,perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment,c.demo_type as app_type, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry, e.con_permaddr1,e.con_permaddr2,e.con_permvillage,e.con_permdist,e.con_permzip,e.con_permcountry,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME , a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,lc1.CITY_NAME as con_permcity,ls1.STATE_NAME as con_permstate,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,d.perapp_marstat from applications a, organisations b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc1,LAPS_STATES ls1 where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^'and c.DEMO_APPID='^' and c.demo_appno = a.app_no and c.demo_appid = d.perapp_id and c.demo_appid=e.con_appid and c.demo_appid=ii.INDINFO_APPID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc1.city_code(+)=con_permcity and ls1.STATE_CODE=e.con_permstate and ls1.STATE_ID=lc1.STATE_ID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc1.active_flag='E'
update app_termsandcond set app_termprint=?,terms_supportdoc=? where app_termappno=? and app_termid = ? and app_termstype = ?

select * from (select app_no,'1' as sno,cbs_accountno,cat_name as desc1,LOAN_RECMDAMT,decode(prd_type,'pG','Gold Loan','pR','Deposit Loan','Retail') as Moduletype, to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'' as factype,decode(prd_type,'pG','2','pR','3','1') as no, decode(upper(app_status),'OL','Open/Lodged','PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from applications,per_demographics,products,loandetails,prd_category where app_no=loan_appno and prd_code=app_prdcode and app_no=demo_appno and cat_id=prd_catid and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and APP_LOANTYPE='P' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' union select app_no,to_char(facility_sno) as sno,f.cbs_accountno,FACILITY_CATDESC as desc1,FACILITY_SANCAMT,decode(APP_LOANTYPE,'A','Agriculture','Corporate') as Moduletype, to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,decode(facility_group,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit') as factype, decode(APP_LOANTYPE,'A','4','5') as no, decode(upper(FACILITY_STATUS),'OL','Open/Lodged','PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from applications a,facilities f,com_companydetails,facility_corp fc, facility_master fm where facility_appno=app_no and app_no=com_compdtappno and com_compdtappno=facility_appno and com_facility_sno=facility_sno and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_headid=fm.facility_catid and APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and com_oldlapsid='^' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' union select app_no,to_char(facility_sno) as sno,f.cbs_accountno,FACILITY_CATDESC as desc1,FACILITY_SANCAMT,decode(APP_LOANTYPE,'A','Agriculture','Corporate') as Moduletype, to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,decode(facility_group,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit') as factype, decode(APP_LOANTYPE,'A','4','5') as no, decode(upper(FACILITY_STATUS),'OL','Open/Lodged','PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from applications a,facilities f,com_demographics,facility_corp fc, facility_master fm where facility_appno=demo_appno and app_no=demo_appno and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_headid=fm.facility_catid and APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and DEMO_COMAPPID='^' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' union select fin_ratappno,'1' as sno,'' as cbsaccountno,'' as desc1,0.00 as amt,'Only for Rating' as Moduletype, to_char(FIN_PROCESSEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'' as factype,'6' as no, decode(upper(fin_status),'PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from fin_rating where fin_appid in(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid='^') union select sol_appl_no,'1' as sno,'' as cbsaccountno,'' as desc1,to_number(sol_amount),'Solvency' as Moduletype, to_char(SOL_APPROVE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'' as factype,'7' as no, decode(upper(sol_status),'PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from solvency where sol_oldid='^' union select addkbow_app_no,'1' as sno,'' as cbsaccountno,'' as desc1,addkbow_limitsanctioned,'K-Power' as Moduletype, to_char(addkbow_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'' as factype,'8' as no, decode(upper(addkbow_status),'PA','Process/Approved','PR','Process/Rejected','CA','Closed/Approved','CR','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from addkbowerdetails where ADDKBOW_OLDID='^' union select dev_appno,'1' as sno,'' as cbsaccountno,'' as desc1,0.00,'Permission' as Moduletype,to_char(dev_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'' as factype,'9' as no,decode(dev_appstatus,'pa','Process/Approved','pr','Process/Rejected','ca','Closed/Approved','cr','Closed/Rejected','Open/Pending') as status from appl_deviation,perapplicant where dev_cbsid=perapp_cbsid and perapp_oldid='^' and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and nvl(dev_delflag,'N')='N' ) order by no,app_no,sno
update per_demographics set demo_appid=?,DEMO_OLDAPPID=? where DEMO_OLDAPPID=?
update facilities set borrower_id=? where borrower_id=?
update com_demographics set demo_comappid=?,demo_comappnewid=? where DEMO_COMAPPID=?
update cus_security_ownership set cus_owner_laps_id=? where cus_owner_laps_id=?
update app_securitydetails set app_sec_customerid=? where app_sec_customerid=?
update app_securitydetails set APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID=? where APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID=?
update app_securitydetails set APP_SEC_APPLICANT=? where APP_SEC_APPLICANT=?
update APP_BORROWEREXP set CUSTOMERID=? where CUSTOMERID=?
update com_companydetails set com_oldlapsid=?,com_compdtappid=? where com_oldlapsid=?
update com_banking set combk_companyname=? where combk_companyname=?
update com_groupconcerns set comgc_companyname=? where comgc_companyname=?
update solvency set sol_oldid=?,SOL_APPID=? where sol_oldid=?
update addkbowerdetails set ADDKBOW_OLDID=?,ADDKBOW_APP_ID=? where ADDKBOW_OLDID=?
update fin_rating set fin_cbsid=?,fin_appid=? where fin_appid in(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=?)
update cus_groupsmembers set cgm_membercbsid=?,cgm_memberid=?,cgm_memberoldid=? where cgm_membercbsid=?
update comapp_company_divisions set comapp_cbsid=?,comapp_div_appid=? where comapp_cbsid=?
select nvl(max(UCIC_ID),0)+1 as maxsno from set_UCICprocess
insert into set_UCICprocess(UCIC_ID,UCIC_modifiedDate,UCIC_modifiedBy,UCIC_oldCBSid,UCIC_newCBSid,UCIC_Remarks) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,?)
select comapp_id,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE,COMAPP_CBSID from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id='^'

select perapp_title||'.'||perapp_fname as name,perapp_fatname,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_CBSID,COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from comapp_company_divisions,perapplicant,COM_COMPANYDETAILS where PERAPP_ID=COM_COMPDTID and comapp_id='^' and comapp_divisiontype='^' and comapp_divisionsubtype='^' and perapp_oldid=(select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id=COMAPP_DIV_appID) and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n'

insert into facility_mclrspread(facility_appno,facility_sno,facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,mclr_crp_total,mclr_bsp_total,mclr_spread,mclr_msme) select ?,?,facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,mclr_crp_total,mclr_bsp_total,mclr_spread,mclr_msme from facility_mclrspread where facility_sno=? and facility_appno=?

insert into facility_mclrspreadvalue(facility_appno,facility_sno,mclr_spreadtype,mclr_caption,mclr_option,mclr_spreadval,mclr_captionval) select ?,?,mclr_spreadtype,mclr_caption,mclr_option,mclr_spreadval,mclr_captionval from facility_mclrspreadvalue where facility_sno=? and facility_appno=?

insert into fac_shg_share(fac_appno,fac_mem_sno,fac_mem_share,fac_loan_taken,fac_loan_amt,fac_loan_bank,fac_sno) select ?,?,fac_mem_share,fac_loan_taken,fac_loan_amt,fac_loan_bank,fac_sno from fac_shg_share where fac_sno=? and fac_appno=?

select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,con_comaddr1 as con_permaddr1, con_comaddr2 as con_permaddr2,con_comcity as con_permcity,con_comstate as con_permstate,con_comzip as con_permzip,con_comphone as con_permphone,con_email as con_peremail,perapp_constitution,con_permdist,con_mobile,PERAPP_NETWORTH,con_comcountry,con_comphone1,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_AADHAAR,APPNRI_PASSPORT_NO from perapplicant left join PERAPPLICANT_NRI on APPNRI_ID=PERAPP_ID,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_id=con_appid and indinfo_appid=con_appid and perapp_id=indinfo_appid and PERAPP_CBSID='^'
select kyc_kycActivity,kyc_occupationcode from applicant_kycnorms where kyc_custid='^'
select count(*) as printcount from document_print_history where DOC_APPNO='^' and DOC_CODE='^'
select count(*) as printcount from document_print_history where DOC_APPNO='^' and DOC_CODE='^' and DOC_FACSNO='^'

select combk_facility,combk_limit,combk_os,combk_facility_sno,combk_type,combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno, combk_accountopen,combk_prefix,combk_suffix,combk_cbsappno,combk_modtype,combk_type from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and (COMBK_CBSAPPNO is null and (COMBK_PREFIX is null and COMBK_SUFFIX is null)) and combk_credittype='E' order by combk_parentappno
update com_banking set com_exposure=?,combk_baltype=?,combk_ratingcheck=?,combk_osasondate=sysdate where combk_appno=? and combk_parentappno=? and combk_parentfacsno=?

select comgc_facility,comgc_limit,comgc_os,comgc_facility_sno,comgc_type,comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno, comgc_accountopen,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_prefix,comgc_suffix,comgc_modtype,comgc_type from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^' and (COMGC_CBSAPPNO is null and (COMGC_PREFIX is null and COMGC_SUFFIX is null)) order by comgc_parentappno
update com_groupconcerns set comgc_exposure=?,comgc_baltype=?,comgc_ratingcheck=?,comgc_osasondate=sysdate where comgc_appno=? and comgc_parentappno=? and comgc_parentfacsno=?

insert into edu_loan(eduloan_appno,edu_univ_name,edu_coursename,edu_duration) select ?,replace(LN_INSTITUTIONNAME,chr(10),' '),LN_COURSENAME,replace(LN_DURATION,'-','~') as courseduration from nsdl_course where LN_CAF_REFNO=?
select nsdl_ref_id from NSDL_APPLICATION where nsdl_laps_inwardappno='^'

select CAF_YR_YEARVAL,CAF_YR_TUTIONFEE,CAF_YR_EXAMFEE,CAF_YR_BOOKSANDSTATIONARY, CAF_YR_EQUIPMENTCOMPUTER,CAF_YR_HOSTELEXPENSES,CAF_YR_SUNDRIESTRAVEL,CAF_YR_OWNSOURCEAMOUNT, CAF_YR_SCHOLARSHIPAMOUNT,CAF_YR_LOANREQUIRED from NSDL_YEARWISE_COURSE where CAF_YR_REFNO='^'

select doc_docuname,doc_id,doc_module,doc_doctype,doc_template,doc_sno,DOC_DYNAMICCONTENT,doc_jspname,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE,to_char(doc_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_createddate from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id='^' and to_date(to_char(doc_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') order by doc_modifieddate desc

select sec.APP_SEC_APPNO as appno, case ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG when 'F' then 'Fresh' when 'R' then 'Renewal ' when 'P' then 'Post Sanction' when 'S' then 'Restructured' else '' end as ProposalType,to_number('1') as facslno,p.PERAPP_FNAME,prd.PRD_DESC as descp, case ap.APP_LOANTYPE when 'P' then'Retail' when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as Module, l.LOAN_RECMDAMT as loanamt, case ap.APP_STATUS when 'op' then 'Open/Pending' when 'pa' then 'Processed/Approved' when 'ol' then 'Open/Lodged' when 'pr' then 'Processed/Rejected' when 'ca' then 'Closed/Approved' when 'cr' then 'Closed/Rejected' else '' end as appstatus, ap.CBS_ACCOUNTNO, case sec.APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end as SecurityType,sec.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE from app_securitydetails sec,LOANDETAILS l, PERAPPLICANT p,applications ap,PRODUCTS prd,CUS_SECURITIES cs,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where APP_SEC_SECID='^' and sec.APP_SEC_APPNO=l.LOAN_APPNO and l.LOAN_APPNO=ap.APP_NO and prd.PRD_CODE=ap.APP_PRDCODE and cs.CUS_SEC_ID=sec.APP_SEC_SECID and sec.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P'and pd.DEMO_APPNO=l.LOAN_APPNO and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and ap.APP_DELFLAG!='Y' union all select sec.APP_SEC_APPNO as appno, STAT_DATA_DESC1 as ProposalType, f.FACILITY_SNO as facslno,p.PERAPP_FNAME, fc.COM_FACDESC as descp, case ap.APP_LOANTYPE when 'P' then'Retail' when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as Module,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT as loanamt, case facility_status when 'op' then 'Open/Pending' when 'pa' then 'Processed/Approved' when 'ol' then 'Open/Lodged' when 'pr' then 'Processed/Rejected' when 'ca' then 'Closed/Approved' when 'cr' then 'Closed/Rejected' else '' end as appstatus, f.CBS_ACCOUNTNO, case sec.APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end as SecurityType,sec.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE from app_securitydetails sec, PERAPPLICANT p,applications ap,CUS_SECURITIES cs,FACILITIES f left join STATIC_DATA on STAT_DATA_ID='146' and STAT_DATA_DESC =FACILITY_SEL_TYPE,facility_corp fc where APP_SEC_SECID='^' and cs.CUS_SEC_ID=sec.APP_SEC_SECID and sec.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and sec.APP_SEC_FACSNO=f.FACILITY_SNO and ap.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and f.FACILITY_APPNO=sec.APP_SEC_APPNO and p.PERAPP_ID=f.BORROWER_ID and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_MODULE in ('c','a') and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and ap.APP_DELFLAG!='Y'

insert into app_termsandcond(app_termappno, app_termid, app_termscontent, app_termstype, app_termsdel,app_general_terms_type,app_termprint,terms_prepost,terms_supportdoc,terms_prdcode)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,'Y',?,?,?)

insert into app_termsandcond(app_termappno, app_termid, app_termscontent, app_termstype, app_termsdel,app_general_terms_type,app_termprint,terms_prepost,terms_supportdoc,terms_prdcode,TERM_SNO)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,'Y',?,?,?,?)
insert into SEC_MODIFIED_HISTORY(SEC_PARAMATER_MODIFIED,SEC_EXISTING_VALUE,SEC_MODIFIED_VALUE,SEC_MODIFIEDBY,SEC_MODIFIED_DATE,SEC_SECID) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)
select SEC_PARAMATER_MODIFIED from SEC_MODIFIED_HISTORY where SEC_SECID='^'

select SEC_PARAMATER_MODIFIED,SEC_EXISTING_VALUE,SEC_MODIFIED_VALUE,SEC_MODIFIEDBY as SEC_MODIFIEDBY,to_char(SEC_MODIFIED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as SEC_MODIFIED_DATE1,SEC_MODIFIED_DATE from SEC_MODIFIED_HISTORY,users where SEC_SECID='^' and usr_id=SEC_MODIFIEDBY order by SEC_MODIFIED_DATE
select CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CUS_RELEASEFLAG from CUS_SECURITIES where CUS_SEC_ID='^'

insert into SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP (SEC_ID,SEC_CREATEDBY,SEC_CREATEDDATE,SEC_FLAG,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_NEW,SEC_AMTCHARGED_OLD,SEC_AMTCHARGED_NEW,SEC_VALUERNAME_OLD,SEC_VALUERNAME_NEW,SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD,SEC_VALUATIONDATE_NEW, SEC_ORGSCODE,SEC_COMMENTS,SECORGDEPT,SEC_VALUERCODE_OLD,SEC_VALUERCODE_NEW)values (?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)
insert into SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP (SEC_ID,SEC_CREATEDBY,SEC_CREATEDDATE,SEC_FLAG,SEC_ORGSCODE,SECORGDEPT) values (?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)
select count(SEC_ID) as appno from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_FLAG in ('V','N') and (SEC_APPROVEDBY='^' or SEC_APPROVEDBY is null) and SEC_ORGSCODE='^' ^

select cus_sec_id,perapp_fname,sm1.sec_name as sectype, sm2.sec_name as secclassification,st.SEC_CREATEDBY, to_char(st.SEC_CREATEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_CREATEDDATE,st.SEC_APPROVEDBY,st.SEC_CREATEDBY from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP st,cus_securities cs,perapplicant p,SECURITY_MASTER sm1,SECURITY_MASTER sm2,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP CSO where(perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and p.perapp_oldid=cso.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and cso.CUS_OWNER_SNO='1' and sm1.SEC_Id=cus_sec_type and sm2.sec_id=cus_sec_classification and st.SEC_ID=cs.cus_sec_id and cs.CUS_SEC_ID=cso.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and st.SEC_ID=cso.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and st.SEC_FLAG in ('V','N') and (st.SEC_APPROVEDBY='^' or st.SEC_APPROVEDBY is null) and st.SEC_ORGSCODE='^' ^ order by SEC_APPROVEDBY

select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_security_description,cus_sec_netsecurity, cus_sec_type,cus_sec_classification,p1.perapp_fname as exappname,p1.perapp_oldid as exapplapsid,p1.perapp_cbsid as exappcbsid, st.SEC_CREATEDBY,st.SEC_APPROVEDBY,st.SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD,st.SEC_SECURITYVALUE_NEW,st.SEC_VALUERNAME_OLD,st.SEC_VALUERNAME_NEW, to_char(st.SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD,to_char(st.SEC_VALUATIONDATE_NEW,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_VALUATIONDATE_NEW, SEC_COMMENTS,SEC_AMTCHARGED_OLD,SEC_AMTCHARGED_NEW,SEC_FLAG,cus_sec_type,sec_valuercode_old,sec_valuercode_new,st.SEC_VALUERVALUE_OLD,st.SEC_VALUERCODE_NEW ,st.SEC_SALEVALUE_OLD,st.SEC_SALEVALUE_NEW ,st.SEC_VALUERVALUE_OLD,st.SEC_VALUERVALUE_NEW,st.SEC_SALEVALUE_OLD,st.SEC_SALEVALUE_NEW from CUS_SECURITIES,SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP st, perapplicant p1,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP cso where st.SEC_FLAG in ('V','N') and (p1.perapp_renew is null or p1.perapp_renew='n') and st.SEC_ID=cso.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and p1.perapp_oldid=cso.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and cso.CUS_OWNER_SNO='1' and sec_id=cus_sec_id and cus_sec_id='^'
update SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP set SEC_APPROVEDBY=? where SEC_ID=? and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')
update SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP set SEC_APPROVEDDATE=sysdate,SEC_FLAG=? where SEC_ID=? and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')
select CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED,CUS_SEC_TOTALSECVALUE,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from CUS_SECURITIES where CUS_SEC_ID='^'
update CUS_SECURITIES set CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY=?,CUS_SEC_TOTALSECVALUE=?,CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED=?,CUS_SEC_COMMENTS=? where CUS_SEC_ID=?
update CUS_SECURITIES set CUS_SEC_VALUER_NAME=?,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE=? where CUS_SEC_ID=?
update CUS_SECURITIES set CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where CUS_SEC_ID=?

insert into other_parameters (loan_paramslno, loan_paramval,LOAN_PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG,LOAN_PARAM_CREATEDATE) select loan_paramslno, loan_paramval,'N',LOAN_PARAM_CREATEDATE from other_parameters where loan_paramslno=? and LOAN_PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG='Y'
select lpad(BSADSA_SEQ.nextval,9,0) as maxno from dual

insert into BSADSA_MASTER (BSADSA_TYPE,BSADSA_SLNO,BSADSA_ID,BSADSA_CREATE_DATE,BSADSA_NAME,BSADSA_ADDRESS1,BSADSA_ADDRESS2,BSADSA_CITY,BSADSA_STATE, BSADSA_COUNTRY,BSADSA_PINCODE,BSADSA_CONSTITUTION,BSADSA_NONINDVNAME,BSADSA_MOBILENON,BSADSA_TELEPHONENO,BSADSA_EMAILID,BSADSA_PAN,BSADSA_KEYPERSON,BSADSA_DESIGN_KEYPERSON, BSADSA_ACCTYPE,BSADSA_BANKNAME,BSADSA_BANKBRANCH,BSADSA_IFSC,BSADSA_ACCNO,BSADSA_EMPANEL_DET,BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE,BSADSA_EMPANEL_SINCE,BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,BSADSA_ACTION, BSA_REF_NAME,BSA_DOB,BSA_RERA_REGNO,BSA_WHTEMP,BSA_EMP_BANKNAME,DSA_SERVICE_BANK,DSA_PAST_EXP,DSA_OFFICE_PREMISES,DSA_REG_STATUTORY,bsa_ref_contactno,BSADSA_SCODE,bsadsa_othtype, bsadsa_dealershipno,bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,bsadsa_regnovalidto,bsadsa_textfield1,bsadsa_textfield2,bsadsa_textfield3,bsadsa_textfield4, bsadsa_textfield5,bsadsa_masterfield1,bsadsa_masterfield2,bsadsa_masterfield3,bsadsa_masterfield4,bsadsa_masterfield5,bsadsa_textfieldval1, bsadsa_textfieldval2,bsadsa_textfieldval3,bsadsa_textfieldval4,bsadsa_textfieldval5,bsadsa_masterfieldval1,bsadsa_masterfieldval2, bsadsa_masterfieldval3,bsadsa_masterfieldval4,bsadsa_masterfieldval5,bsadsaapi_flag) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, ?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update BSADSA_MASTER set BSADSA_NAME=upper(?),BSADSA_ADDRESS1=upper(?),BSADSA_ADDRESS2=upper(?),BSADSA_CITY=?,BSADSA_STATE=?, BSADSA_COUNTRY=?,BSADSA_PINCODE=?,BSADSA_CONSTITUTION=?,BSADSA_NONINDVNAME=upper(?),BSADSA_MOBILENON=?,BSADSA_TELEPHONENO=?,BSADSA_EMAILID=?,BSADSA_PAN=upper(?),BSADSA_KEYPERSON=upper(?),BSADSA_DESIGN_KEYPERSON=upper(?), BSADSA_ACCTYPE=?,BSADSA_BANKNAME=?,BSADSA_BANKBRANCH=upper(?),BSADSA_IFSC=upper(?),BSADSA_ACCNO=upper(?),BSADSA_EMPANEL_DET=upper(?),BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),BSADSA_EMPANEL_SINCE=?,BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),BSADSA_ACTION=?, BSA_REF_NAME=upper(?),BSA_DOB=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),BSA_RERA_REGNO=?,BSA_WHTEMP=?,BSA_EMP_BANKNAME=?,DSA_SERVICE_BANK=?,DSA_PAST_EXP=?,DSA_OFFICE_PREMISES=?,DSA_REG_STATUTORY=upper(?),bsa_ref_contactno=upper(?), BSADSA_SCODE=?,bsadsa_othtype=?,bsadsa_dealershipno=?,bsadsa_regnovalidfrom=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),bsadsa_regnovalidto=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),bsadsa_textfield1=?,bsadsa_textfield2=?, bsadsa_textfield3=?,bsadsa_textfield4=?,bsadsa_textfield5=?,bsadsa_masterfield1=?,bsadsa_masterfield2=?,bsadsa_masterfield3=?, bsadsa_masterfield4=?,bsadsa_masterfield5=?,bsadsa_textfieldval1=?,bsadsa_textfieldval2=?,bsadsa_textfieldval3=?,bsadsa_textfieldval4=?, bsadsa_textfieldval5=?,bsadsa_masterfieldval1=?,bsadsa_masterfieldval2=?,bsadsa_masterfieldval3=?,bsadsa_masterfieldval4=?,bsadsa_masterfieldval5=? where BSADSA_ID=?

select distinct BSADSA_TYPE,BSADSA_ID,BSADSA_NAME,BSADSA_ADDRESS1,BSADSA_ADDRESS2,BSADSA_CITY,BSADSA_STATE,BSADSA_COUNTRY,BSADSA_PINCODE, BSADSA_CONSTITUTION,BSADSA_NONINDVNAME,BSADSA_MOBILENON,BSADSA_TELEPHONENO,BSADSA_EMAILID,BSADSA_PAN,BSADSA_KEYPERSON,BSADSA_DESIGN_KEYPERSON, BSADSA_ACCTYPE,BSADSA_BANKNAME,BSADSA_BANKBRANCH,BSADSA_IFSC,BSADSA_ACCNO,BSADSA_EMPANEL_DET,TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE, BSADSA_EMPANEL_SINCE, TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,BSADSA_ACTION,BSA_REF_NAME, TO_CHAR(BSA_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSA_DOB,BSA_RERA_REGNO,BSA_WHTEMP,BSA_EMP_BANKNAME,DSA_SERVICE_BANK,DSA_PAST_EXP,DSA_OFFICE_PREMISES,DSA_REG_STATUTORY,bsa_ref_contactno, a.CITY_NAME,b.STATE_NAME,c.CON_COUNTRY,bsadsa_scode,bsadsa_othtype,bsadsa_dealershipno,to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidto,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidto,bsadsa_textfield1,bsadsa_textfield2,bsadsa_textfield3, bsadsa_textfield4,bsadsa_textfield5,bsadsa_masterfield1,bsadsa_masterfield2,bsadsa_masterfield3,bsadsa_masterfield4,bsadsa_masterfield5, bsadsa_textfieldval1,bsadsa_textfieldval2,bsadsa_textfieldval3,bsadsa_textfieldval4,bsadsa_textfieldval5,bsadsa_masterfieldval1, bsadsa_masterfieldval2,bsadsa_masterfieldval3,bsadsa_masterfieldval4,bsadsa_masterfieldval5 from BSADSA_MASTER,laps_cities a, laps_states b, COUNTRYSETUP c where BSADSA_TYPE='^' and city_code(+)=BSADSA_CITY and state_code(+)=BSADSA_STATE and a.state_id=b.State_id and BSADSA_COUNTRY=c.CON_COUNTRYCODE ^

select distinct BSADSA_TYPE,BSADSA_ID,BSADSA_NAME,BSADSA_ADDRESS1,BSADSA_ADDRESS2,BSADSA_CITY,BSADSA_STATE,BSADSA_COUNTRY,BSADSA_PINCODE, BSADSA_CONSTITUTION,BSADSA_NONINDVNAME,BSADSA_MOBILENON,BSADSA_TELEPHONENO,BSADSA_EMAILID,BSADSA_PAN,BSADSA_KEYPERSON,BSADSA_DESIGN_KEYPERSON, BSADSA_ACCTYPE,BSADSA_BANKNAME,BSADSA_BANKBRANCH,BSADSA_IFSC,BSADSA_ACCNO,BSADSA_EMPANEL_DET,TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE, BSADSA_EMPANEL_SINCE, TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE, BSADSA_ACTION,BSA_REF_NAME, TO_CHAR(BSA_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSA_DOB,BSA_RERA_REGNO,BSA_WHTEMP,BSA_EMP_BANKNAME,DSA_SERVICE_BANK,DSA_PAST_EXP, DSA_OFFICE_PREMISES,DSA_REG_STATUTORY,bsa_ref_contactno,a.CITY_NAME,b.STATE_NAME,c.CON_COUNTRY,bsadsa_scode,bsadsa_othtype,bsadsa_dealershipno, to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidto,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidto, bsadsa_textfield1,bsadsa_textfield2,bsadsa_textfield3,bsadsa_textfield4,bsadsa_textfield5,bsadsa_masterfield1,bsadsa_masterfield2, bsadsa_masterfield3,bsadsa_masterfield4,bsadsa_masterfield5,bsadsa_textfieldval1,bsadsa_textfieldval2,bsadsa_textfieldval3, bsadsa_textfieldval4,bsadsa_textfieldval5,bsadsa_masterfieldval1,bsadsa_masterfieldval2,bsadsa_masterfieldval3,bsadsa_masterfieldval4, bsadsa_masterfieldval5 from BSADSA_MASTER ,laps_cities a, laps_states b,COUNTRYSETUP c where BSADSA_ID='^' and city_code(+)=BSADSA_CITY and state_code(+)=BSADSA_STATE and a.state_id=b.State_id and BSADSA_COUNTRY=c.CON_COUNTRYCODE

select distinct BSADSA_TYPE,BSADSA_ID,BSADSA_NAME,BSADSA_ADDRESS1,BSADSA_ADDRESS2,BSADSA_CITY,BSADSA_STATE,BSADSA_COUNTRY,BSADSA_PINCODE, BSADSA_CONSTITUTION,BSADSA_NONINDVNAME,BSADSA_MOBILENON,BSADSA_TELEPHONENO,BSADSA_EMAILID,BSADSA_PAN,BSADSA_KEYPERSON,BSADSA_DESIGN_KEYPERSON, BSADSA_ACCTYPE,BSADSA_BANKNAME,BSADSA_BANKBRANCH,BSADSA_IFSC,BSADSA_ACCNO,BSADSA_EMPANEL_DET,TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EMPANEL_DATE, BSADSA_EMPANEL_SINCE, TO_CHAR(BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSADSA_EXPIRY_DATE,BSADSA_ACTION,BSA_REF_NAME, TO_CHAR(BSA_DOB,'DD/MM/YYYY') as BSA_DOB, BSA_RERA_REGNO,BSA_WHTEMP,BSA_EMP_BANKNAME,DSA_SERVICE_BANK,DSA_PAST_EXP,DSA_OFFICE_PREMISES,DSA_REG_STATUTORY,bsa_ref_contactno,a.CITY_NAME, b.STATE_NAME,c.CON_COUNTRY,bsadsa_scode,bsadsa_othtype,bsadsa_dealershipno,to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidfrom,to_char(bsadsa_regnovalidto,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bsadsa_regnovalidto,bsadsa_textfield1,bsadsa_textfield2,bsadsa_textfield3, bsadsa_textfield4,bsadsa_textfield5,bsadsa_masterfield1,bsadsa_masterfield2,bsadsa_masterfield3,bsadsa_masterfield4,bsadsa_masterfield5, bsadsa_textfieldval1,bsadsa_textfieldval2,bsadsa_textfieldval3,bsadsa_textfieldval4,bsadsa_textfieldval5,bsadsa_masterfieldval1, bsadsa_masterfieldval2,bsadsa_masterfieldval3,bsadsa_masterfieldval4,bsadsa_masterfieldval5 from BSADSA_MASTER,laps_cities a, laps_states b , COUNTRYSETUP c where upper(BSADSA_NAME) like upper('%^%') and city_code(+)=BSADSA_CITY and state_code(+)=BSADSA_STATE and a.state_id=b.State_id and BSADSA_COUNTRY=c.CON_COUNTRYCODE and BSADSA_TYPE='^' ^
select BSADSA_NAME,BSADSA_MOBILENON from BSADSA_MASTER where BSADSA_ID='^'
select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as staticbankname from static_data where STAT_DATA_ID='147' and STAT_DATA_SNO='^'

insert into sms_master(sms_process,sms_approved,sms_reject,sms_createdby,sms_modifieddate,activeflag,SMS_CBS_ID_CREATION,SMS_CBS_ACCOUNT_CREATION,FIELD_INVESTIGATION_COMPLETED,KYC_NOT_COMPLETED,SMS_CARLOAN,SMS_ABMQUERY,SMS_PERMIS_APPROVED,SMS_POST_APPROVED,SMS_PERMIS_REJECT,SMS_POST_REJECT,SMS_PERMIS_SEND,SMS_POST_SEND,SMS_SECURITY_90,SMS_SECURITY_60,SMS_SECURITY_30,SMS_SECURITY_07)values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,'Y',?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update sms_master set activeflag='N' where activeflag='Y'

select sms_process,sms_approved,sms_reject,sms_createdby,sms_dsabsa_inprocess,sms_dsabsa_approved,sms_dsabsa_reject,SMS_CBS_ID_CREATION,SMS_CBS_ACCOUNT_CREATION,FIELD_INVESTIGATION_COMPLETED,KYC_NOT_COMPLETED,SMS_CARLOAN,SMS_ABMQUERY,SMS_POST_APPROVED,SMS_POST_REJECT ,SMS_PERMIS_APPROVED,SMS_PERMIS_REJECT,SMS_POST_SEND,SMS_PERMIS_SEND,SMS_SECURITY_90,SMS_SECURITY_60,SMS_SECURITY_30,SMS_SECURITY_07 from sms_master where activeflag='Y'
select SMS_CARLOAN,SMS_ABMQUERY,SMS_TRIGGRING from sms_master where activeflag='Y'
select stat_data_desc from static_data where stat_data_id='252' and STAT_DATA_VALUE='Y' order by stat_data_desc1
insert into smshistroy(sh_mobileno,sh_senddate,sh_request,sh_response,sh_inwardno)values(?,sysdate,?,?,?)

select perapp_fname,loan_recmdamt,con_mobile from loandetails,perapplicant,per_demographics,cust_contactinfo where demo_appno='^' and loan_appno=demo_appno and demo_appid=perapp_id and perapp_id=CON_APPID and demo_appid=CON_APPID and demo_type='a'
select rej_desc from app_reject_reasons a,reject_reasons where app_no='^' and a.rej_code=reject_reasons.REJ_CODE

Select inward_docreceived,inward_no,INWARD_CBSCUSTID,INWARD_SECTOR,INWARD_APPATACHED,inward_applnprocessat,inward_bankscheme,INWARD_CANVASSEDBYSTAFF,INWARD_AGENTID,INWARD_LEADGENBY from appinwardreg where INWARD_NO='^'
select NVL(max(ass_det_sno),0) as maxslno from PER_ASSESSMENT_DETAILS where ass_det_app_no='^'
delete from SET_POSTSANC_PARAM where PS_MODULE_TYPE='P'
delete from SET_POSTSANC_PARAM where PS_MODULE_TYPE is null
insert into SET_POSTSANC_PARAM (PS_PARAM_ID, PS_PARAM_ORGLEVEL,PS_PARAM_MINCLASS,PS_MODULE_TYPE,PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG) values (?,?,?,?,?)

select PS_PARAM_DESC,PS_PARAM,PS_PARAM_ORGLEVEL,PS_PARAM_MINCLASS,PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG from app_post_sanc_pagemap left join SET_POSTSANC_PARAM on ps_param_id=ps_param and nvl(ps_module_type,'C')=nvl(ps_moduletype,'C') where nvl(ps_moduletype,'C')=^ and PS_ACTIVE='Y'

INSERT INTO COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES (FIN_APPNO,RATIOSAPP_YEAR, RATIOSAPP_ROWID,RATIOSAPP_AUDIT,RATIOSAPP_UNAUDIT,RATIOSAPP_ESTIMATED,RATIOSAPP_PROJECTION,RATIOSAPP_SNO,RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE) values (?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES where FIN_APPNO=? and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE=?

select SEC_ID,SEC_FLAG,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD,SEC_AMTCHARGED_OLD,SEC_VALUERNAME_OLD,to_char(SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD,sec_valuercode_old from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID='^' and SEC_FLAG in ('NCV','NCN')
select cus_sec_id from CUS_SECURITIES where cus_releaseflag='NC' and cus_sec_id='^'
update SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP set SEC_FLAG=? where SEC_ID=?
select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_NEW,SEC_APPROVEDBY from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID='^' and SEC_FLAG in ('N','V')

select FIN_APPNO,RATIOSAPP_YEAR,RATIOSAPP_ROWID from COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES where FIN_APPNO='^' and to_char(RATIOSAPP_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE='^'
update COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES set RATIOSAPP_AUDIT=? where to_char(RATIOSAPP_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_appno =? and RATIOSAPP_ROWID=? and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE=?
update COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES set RATIOSAPP_UNAUDIT=? where to_char(RATIOSAPP_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_appno =? and RATIOSAPP_ROWID=? and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE=?
update COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES set RATIOSAPP_ESTIMATED=? where to_char(RATIOSAPP_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_appno =? and RATIOSAPP_ROWID=? and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE=?
update COM_RATIOSAPPVALUES set RATIOSAPP_PROJECTION=? where to_char(RATIOSAPP_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_appno =? and RATIOSAPP_ROWID=? and RATIOSAPP_PAGETYPE=?
update appinwardreg set INWARD_DELFLAG='Y', INWARD_DELDATE=sysdate where inward_no = ?
select fm.FACILITY_CATDESC from FACILITIES f,FACILITY_CORP fc,FACILITY_MASTER fm where f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_SUBFAC=fm.FACILITY_CATID and f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.FACILITY_SNO='^'
select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where cbs_static_data_id='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE= (select USER_DESIGNATION from USERS where USR_ID='^')
select INDINFO_STAFF_ID from INDIVIDUAL_INFO where INDINFO_APPID='^' and INDINFO_IS_STAFF='02'

select o.ORG_NAME ||' '|| lc.CITY_NAME as depositbranch, o.ORG_ZIP , to_char(SEC_DEPOSIT_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_DEPOSIT_DATE from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,SECURITY_LAND p,ORGANISATIONS o, laps_cities lc,laps_states ls where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=p.SEC_ID and p.SEC_BRANCH=o.ORG_SCODE and city_code(+)=org_city and lc.STATE_ID=ls.state_id and ls.STATE_CODE=sec_state and s.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' ^
select inward_no,app_delflag,app_no from appinwardreg left join applications on app_inwardno=inward_no where inw_leadno='^' and INWARD_DELFLAG is null

select distinct(perapp_id),perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry, e.con_permaddr1,e.con_permaddr2,e.con_permdist,e.con_permzip,e.con_permcountry,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME, lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,lc1.CITY_NAME as con_permcity,ls1.STATE_NAME as con_permstate,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,p.PERAPP_SEX,p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.perapp_marstat,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob,p.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,cc.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,PERAPPLICANT p,cust_contactinfo e,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc1,LAPS_STATES ls1,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHip o,CUS_SECURITIES c,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cc where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and p.PERAPP_ID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and o.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and p.PERAPP_ID=cc.COM_COMPDTID and e.CON_APPID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc1.city_code(+)=con_permcity and ls1.STATE_CODE=e.con_permstate and ls1.STATE_ID=lc1.STATE_ID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID ^

select distinct(perapp_id),perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry, e.con_permaddr1,e.con_permaddr2,e.con_permzip,e.con_permcountry,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,p.perapp_marstat, lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,lc1.CITY_NAME as con_permcity,ls1.STATE_NAME as con_permstate,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,p.PERAPP_SEX,p.PERAPP_CBSID,to_char(PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c,PERAPPLICANT p,cust_contactinfo e,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc1,LAPS_STATES ls1,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd ,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIp cso where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and a.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and cso.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID=p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_ID=e.CON_APPID and p.PERAPP_ID=ii.INDINFO_APPID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc1.city_code(+)=con_permcity and ls1.STATE_CODE=e.con_permstate and ls1.STATE_ID=lc1.STATE_ID and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and pd.DEMO_OLDAPPID=a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID and pd.DEMO_TYPE in (^) and c.CUS_SEC_ID=cso.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID ^

select distinct(a.APP_SEC_SECID), a.APP_SEC_APPNO from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,cus_securities s where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and a.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and s.cus_SEC_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and cus_sec_type in ('10','11','12','13','14','15','16','17')

select p.PERAPP_TITLE || '. '|| p.PERAPP_FNAME as ownername,a.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,s.SEC_NAME from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,PERAPPLICANT p,CUS_SECURITIES c,SECURITY_MASTER s where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=p.PERAPP_ID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and s.SEC_ID=c.CUS_SEC_TYPE and s.SEC_PARENT='0' and a.APP_SEC_SECID='^'
delete from app_security_MDTD where MDTD_APPNO =? and MDTD_SECID=?
delete from app_security_MDTD where MDTD_APPNO =?
insert into app_security_MDTD(MDTD_APPNO, MDTD_SECID,MDTD_COMMENTS) values (?,?,?)
select MDTD_APPNO, MDTD_SECID,MDTD_COMMENTS from app_security_MDTD where MDTD_APPNO ='^' and MDTD_SECID='^'

select m.MDTD_SECID,m.MDTD_COMMENTS,c.CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from app_security_MDTD m,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where m.MDTD_APPNO='^' and m.MDTD_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and m.MDTD_SECID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=m.MDTD_SECID and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and pd.DEMO_OLDAPPID=a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID and pd.DEMO_TYPE in (^) ^

select a.APP_SEC_SECID,c.CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c,PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where a.APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and a.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=pd.DEMO_OLDAPPID and a.APP_SEC_APPNO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE in (^) ^

select PERAPP_TITLE||'. '||perapp_fname as borrrowername from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID in ( select pd.DEMO_APPID as appdid from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where DEMO_APPNO='^' and pd.DEMO_DOCACCOPERTED='Y' union select cast(cd.COMAPP_DIV_APPID as int) as appid from comapp_company_divisions cd,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where pd.DEMO_APPID=cd.COMAPP_ID and pd.DEMO_APPNO='^'and cd.COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED='Y' )

select PERAPP_TITLE||'. '||perapp_fname as borrrowername from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID in ( select COM_COMPDTAPPID from com_companydetails where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED='Y' and COM_FACILITY_SNO='^' union select cast(ccd.COMAPP_DIV_APPID as int) as appid from COM_COMPANYDETAILS cd,comapp_company_divisions ccd where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and ccd.COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED='Y' and cd.COM_COMPDTAPPID=ccd.COMAPP_ID and COM_FACILITY_SNO='^' union select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^' and DEMO_DOC_ACCOPERATED='Y' union select cast(ccd.COMAPP_DIV_APPID as int)as appid from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cd,COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS ccd where cd.DEMO_APPNO='^' and cd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=ccd.COMAPP_ID and ccd.COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED='Y' )
update COM_DEMOGRAPHICS set DEMO_DOCPRINT=?,DEMO_DOC_ACCOPERATED=? where DEMO_APPNO=?

select min(PRD_AMTRANGETO) as minrange from applications a,LOANDETAILS l,prdint_master pm where APP_NO='^' and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and pm.PRDINT_PRDCODE=a.APP_PRDCODE and lower(l.LOAN_INTTYPE)= lower(pm.PRDINT_INTTYPE) and prd_roitype=LOAN_ROITYPE and PRDINT_REFTYPE='^'

select min(pl.PRD_INTEREST) as min_interestrate from applications a,LOANDETAILS l,prdint_master pm,prd_interest_limit pl where APP_NO='^' and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and pm.PRDINT_PRDCODE=a.APP_PRDCODE and lower(l.LOAN_INTTYPE)= lower(pm.PRDINT_INTTYPE) and pm.PRDINT_SNO=pl.PRD_INTID and prd_roitype=LOAN_ROITYPE and PRDINT_REFTYPE='^'
select APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO='^'
update loandetails set LOAN_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),loan_sancemi=?,loan_sancroi=? where loan_appno=?
update loandetails set loan_sancemi=loan_emi,loan_sancroi=loan_modintrate where loan_appno=?
update facilities set facility_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),facility_sanctionedroi=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?

select p.PERAPP_TITLE||'. '||p.PERAPP_FNAME as borrowename,p.PERAPP_AADHAAR,p.PERAPP_CBSID,d.DEMO_TYPE as app_type from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS d,APPLICATIONS a where PERAPP_ID='^' and p.PERAPP_ID=d.DEMO_APPID and a.APP_NO=d.DEMO_APPNO

select a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(a.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,rn.FINACLESANCREFNO from applications a ,APP_REFERNCENUMBER rn where a.APP_NO=rn.APP_NO and a.APP_STATUS in ('pa') and a.APP_NO in (select distinct(APP_SEC_APPNO) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_SECID ='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_APPNO!='^') and nvl(app_renew_flag,'F')!='P' and nvl(sancref_flag,'n')='n' and app_loantype='P' union select f.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(a.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,rn.FINACLESANCREFNO from applications a , APP_REFERNCENUMBER rn,APP_SECURITYDETAILS sec,facilities f where a.APP_NO=rn.APP_NO and f.facility_status in ('pa') and a.APP_NO=facility_appno and APP_SEC_SECID ='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO=facility_sno and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_APPNO!='^' and nvl(FACILITY_TYPEFOR,'F')!='P' and rn.app_no=f.facility_appno and APP_SEC_APPNO=facility_appno and nvl(sancref_flag,'n')='n' and app_loantype in ('A','C')

select a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(a.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,rn.FINACLESANCREFNO from applications a ,APP_REFERNCENUMBER rn where a.APP_NO=rn.APP_NO and a.APP_NO in (select distinct(APP_SEC_APPNO) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_SECID ='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^') and nvl(sancref_flag,'n')='n'

select m.MDTD_SECID,m.MDTD_COMMENTS,c.CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from app_security_MDTD m,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c,PERAPPLICANT p,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cd where m.MDTD_APPNO='^' and m.MDTD_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and m.MDTD_SECID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=m.MDTD_SECID and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=p.PERAPP_ID and cd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and cd.DEMO_COMAPPID=a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID and a.APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' union all select m.MDTD_SECID,m.MDTD_COMMENTS,c.CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from app_security_MDTD m,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c,PERAPPLICANT p,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cd where m.MDTD_APPNO='^' and m.MDTD_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and m.MDTD_SECID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=m.MDTD_SECID and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=p.PERAPP_ID and cd.COM_COMPDTAPPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and cd.COM_OLDLAPSID=a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID and a.APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and cd.COM_COMPDTTYPE in ('C')

select m.MDTD_SECID,m.MDTD_COMMENTS,c.CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from app_security_MDTD m,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c,PERAPPLICANT p,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cd where m.MDTD_APPNO='^' and m.MDTD_APPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and m.MDTD_SECID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and c.CUS_SEC_ID=m.MDTD_SECID and a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=p.PERAPP_ID and cd.COM_COMPDTAPPNO=a.APP_SEC_APPNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and cd.COM_OLDLAPSID=a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID and a.APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and cd.COM_COMPDTTYPE in ('S','G','CO','SP')

update SEC_MODIFIED_HISTORY set SEC_MODIFIEDBY=?,SEC_MODIFIED_DATE=sysdate where SEC_SECID=? and SEC_MODIFIED_DATE=(select max(SEC_MODIFIED_DATE) from SEC_MODIFIED_HISTORY where SEC_SECID=SEC_SECID) and sec_paramater_modified in ('Date of Valuation' ,'Market Value','Amount Charged to other institution','Valuer Name','Net Security Value','Value as per valuation','Forced sale value')

select perapp_cbsid as PERAPP_ID,p.PERAPP_TITLE||'. '|| p.PERAPP_FNAME as ownername,cs.CUS_SEC_ID,sm.SEC_NAME,sa.SEC_CREATEDBY,to_char(sa.SEC_CREATEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_CREATEDDATE from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP sa,CUS_SECURITIES cs,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP cso,PERAPPLICANT p,SECURITY_MASTER sm,organisations o where SEC_FLAG in ('V','N') and sa.SEC_ID=cs.CUS_SEC_ID and cs.CUS_SEC_ID=cso.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and cso.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID=p.PERAPP_ID and sm.SEC_ID=cs.CUS_SEC_TYPE and sa.SEC_ORGSCODE=o.ORG_SCODE ^
select a.APP_PARENT_APPNO from APPLICATIONS a ,PRODUCTS p where APP_NO='^' and a.APP_PRDCODE=p.PRD_CODE and p.PRD_LOANTYPE='OD' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG='R'

select sum(g.agr_artnetwt) as agr_artnetwttotal from agr_goldloan g, per_demographics d, applications a, perapplicant p where g.agr_articletype='^' and d.demo_oldappid='^' and d.demo_type='a' and a.app_status not in('pr','cr','ca') and g.agr_artcatid=d.demo_appno and g.agr_artcatid=a.app_no and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and a.APP_DELFLAG='N' and AGR_ARTCATID!='^'
select org_name,org_scode,org_code from per_cuscbsaccountdata,organisations where appno='^' and org_scode=loandisbbranch
select LOAN_PARAMVAL,LOAN_PARAMSLNO from OTHER_PARAMETERS where LOAN_PARAMSLNO in ('7','8')
select LOAN_PARAMVAL,LOAN_PARAMSLNO from other_parameters where loan_paramslno in ('^') and LOAN_PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG ='Y'
update cus_securities set cus_companyshareval=?,CUS_SEC_TOTALSECVALUE=(CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT*?),cus_sec_netsecurity=(CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT*?) where cus_companycode=?

select CUS_SEC_ID from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid=CUS_SEC_ID and cus_sec_netsecurity<>app_sec_securityvalue and cus_sec_classification='40'

select (case when app_loantype='P' then app_status else (select facility_status from facilities where facility_appno=app_sec_appno and facility_sno=app_sec_facsno) end) status,(case when app_loantype='P' then (select prd_type from products where prd_code=app_prdcode) else (select com_loanagainstshares from facilities,facility_corp where facility_appno=app_sec_appno and facility_sno=app_sec_facsno and COM_FACID=facility_code) end) loantype,app_sec_appno,app_sec_facsno from applications,app_securitydetails where app_sec_secid='^' and app_no=app_sec_appno and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_status in ('op','pa','ol')

select facility_catdesc as fac_desc,com_loanagainstshares,facility_sno from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='0'

select CUS_SEC_ID,CUS_COMPANYCODE from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid=CUS_SEC_ID and cus_sec_classification='40'
select sum(app_sec_securityvalue) as totalsec from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_securitytype='1' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='A'

select loan_paramval,loan_paramslno from OTHER_PARAMETERS where loan_paramslno in ('^') and to_date(to_char(loan_param_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^ order by loan_param_createdate desc
select svm_companyapproveflag,cus_sec_sharetype,svm_companyactiveflag from sharevaluemaster,cus_securities where svm_companycode=CUS_COMPANYCODE and CUS_SEC_ID='^'

select CUS_SEC_ID,CUS_COMPANYCODE from app_securitydetails,cus_securities,sharevaluemaster where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid=CUS_SEC_ID and cus_sec_classification='40' and svm_companycode=CUS_COMPANYCODE and (SVM_COMPANYAPPROVEFLAG='U' or SVM_COMPANYACTIVEFLAG='n')

select DUEDILIG_APPNO,DUEDILIG_APPID,DDR_BANKWITHUS,DDR_ACC_CONDUCT,DDR_REPUT_INTRODUCER,DDR_SELFINTRO_DOC,DDR_WHT_PHYINSP,DDR_PHYINSP_USERID,DDR_PHYINSP_USERNAME,DDR_PHYINSP_USERDESIG,DDR_PHYINSP_REASON, DDR_PASSPORT_DET,DDR_DRIVINGLICENCE_DET,DDR_ELECTIONCARD_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC1_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC2_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC3_DET,DDR_APPRESIDENCE,DDR_APP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_KYC_COMPLIEDBY, DDR_PRESBANK_NAME,DDR_PRESBANK_ADDRESS,DDR_PRESBANK_BANKSINCE,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_FROM,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_TO,DDR_PRESBANK_CHEQUERETURN,DDR_PRESBANK_MAXBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_MINBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_TOTCTO,DDR_PRESBANK_DIFINSALES,DDR_PRESBANK_VARIATIONRSN,DDR_PRESBANK_WHT_CONFREPOBT,DDR_PRESBANK_CONFREPDATE,DDR_PRESBANK_RSN_CONFREPOBT, to_char(DDR_AGR_FARMVISITDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_AGR_FARMVISITDATE,DDR_AGR_LANDEXTEND,DDR_AGR_STANDINGCROPS,DDR_AGR_CROPGROWN,DDR_AGR_LIAB_PACS,to_char(DDR_AGR_NOCOBTDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_AGR_NOCOBTDATE,to_char(DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_FROM,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_FROM,to_char(DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_TO,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_TO,DDR_AGR_ACCSTATUS,DDR_AGR_FNO60_OBT,to_char(DDR_AGR_FNO60_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_AGR_FNO60_DATE, DDR_SALEMP_SALESTUENOVER,DDR_SALEMP_PROFIT,DDR_SALEMP_BANKNAME,DDR_SALEMP_BRANCHNAME,DDR_SALEMP_ACCOUNTNUM,DDR_SALEMP_INTSERV_ACC,DDR_SALEMP_PERMSN_REFNO,DDR_SALEMP_SAL_BANKACC,DDR_SALEMP_RSN_VARIATION,to_char(DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DATE,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NAME,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DESIGN,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NUM, DDR_SELFEMP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_SELFEMP_APPACTIVITY,DDR_SELFEMP_ADDRESS,to_char(DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,DDR_LISTEDEMPLOYER,DDR_STOCKEXCHANGENAME,DDR_VERIFIED_BY,to_char(DDR_VERIFIED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as DDR_VERIFIED_DATE from DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW where DUEDILIG_APPNO = '^'and DUEDILIG_APPID='^'

insert into DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW (DUEDILIG_APPNO,DUEDILIG_APPID,DDR_BANKWITHUS,DDR_ACC_CONDUCT,DDR_REPUT_INTRODUCER,DDR_SELFINTRO_DOC,DDR_WHT_PHYINSP,DDR_PHYINSP_USERID,DDR_PHYINSP_USERNAME,DDR_PHYINSP_USERDESIG,DDR_PHYINSP_REASON,DDR_PASSPORT_DET,DDR_DRIVINGLICENCE_DET,DDR_ELECTIONCARD_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC1_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC2_DET,DDR_OTHERDOC3_DET,DDR_APPRESIDENCE,DDR_APP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_KYC_COMPLIEDBY, DDR_PRESBANK_NAME,DDR_PRESBANK_ADDRESS,DDR_PRESBANK_BANKSINCE,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_FROM,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_TO,DDR_PRESBANK_CHEQUERETURN,DDR_PRESBANK_MAXBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_MINBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_TOTCTO,DDR_PRESBANK_DIFINSALES,DDR_PRESBANK_VARIATIONRSN,DDR_PRESBANK_WHT_CONFREPOBT,DDR_PRESBANK_CONFREPDATE,DDR_PRESBANK_RSN_CONFREPOBT, DDR_AGR_FARMVISITDATE,DDR_AGR_LANDEXTEND,DDR_AGR_STANDINGCROPS,DDR_AGR_CROPGROWN,DDR_AGR_LIAB_PACS,DDR_AGR_NOCOBTDATE,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_FROM,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_TO,DDR_AGR_ACCSTATUS,DDR_AGR_FNO60_OBT,DDR_AGR_FNO60_DATE, DDR_SALEMP_SALESTUENOVER,DDR_SALEMP_PROFIT,DDR_SALEMP_BANKNAME,DDR_SALEMP_BRANCHNAME,DDR_SALEMP_ACCOUNTNUM,DDR_SALEMP_INTSERV_ACC,DDR_SALEMP_PERMSN_REFNO,DDR_SALEMP_SAL_BANKACC,DDR_SALEMP_RSN_VARIATION,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DATE,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NAME,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DESIGN,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NUM,DDR_SELFEMP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_SELFEMP_APPACTIVITY,DDR_SELFEMP_ADDRESS,DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,DDR_LISTEDEMPLOYER,DDR_STOCKEXCHANGENAME,DDR_VERIFIED_BY,DDR_VERIFIED_DATE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
delete from DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW where DUEDILIG_APPNO =? and DUEDILIG_APPID=?

select PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_PANNO,CON_COMPHONE,CON_MOBILE,CON_EMAIL,CIBIL_SCORE,PERAPP_BANK,to_char(PERAPP_BANKSINCE,'yyyy') as PERAPP_BANKSINCE,PERAPP_INTRONAME,(select cbs_static_data_desc from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTION) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,CON_RESTYPE,CON_YEARS,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,PEREMP_EXPINYRS,PEREMP_DESIGN,PEREMP_NOOFYRS,perapp_id,CON_PERMPHONE,CON_PEREMAIL,cominfo_cin,PERAPP_SATISFACTORY,PERAPP_JUST_DETAILS,perinc_monsalary,demo_type from PERAPPLICANT,perincexpenses,CUS_CIBILDETAILS,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,CUST_CONTACTINFO,INDIVIDUAL_INFO,PEREMPLOYER,COMPANY_INFO where peremp_id= perapp_id and DEMO_APPID = perapp_id and cibil_appid = perapp_id AND INDINFO_APPID=DEMO_APPID and CON_APPID=DEMO_APPID and cominfo_appid=perapp_id and perinc_id=perapp_id and demo_type in ('^') and DEMO_APPNO= '^' order by demo_type

select PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_PANNO,CON_COMPHONE,CON_MOBILE,CON_EMAIL,CIBIL_SCORE,PERAPP_BANK,to_char(PERAPP_BANKSINCE,'yyyy') as PERAPP_BANKSINCE,PERAPP_INTRONAME,(select cbs_static_data_desc from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTION) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,CON_RESTYPE,CON_YEARS,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,PEREMP_EXPINYRS,PEREMP_DESIGN,PEREMP_NOOFYRS,perapp_id,CON_PERMPHONE,CON_PEREMAIL,cominfo_cin,PERAPP_SATISFACTORY,PERAPP_JUST_DETAILS,perinc_monsalary,demo_type from PERAPPLICANT,perincexpenses,CUS_CIBILDETAILS,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,CUST_CONTACTINFO,INDIVIDUAL_INFO,PEREMPLOYER,COMPANY_INFO where peremp_id= perapp_id and DEMO_APPID = perapp_id and cibil_appid = perapp_id AND INDINFO_APPID=DEMO_APPID and CON_APPID=DEMO_APPID and cominfo_appid=perapp_id and perinc_id=perapp_id and demo_type='^' and DEMO_APPNO= '^'

select PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_AADHAAR from comapp_company_divisions,perapplicant where comapp_id='^' and comapp_divisiontype='^' and comapp_divisionsubtype='^' and perapp_oldid=(select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id=COMAPP_DIV_appID) and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n'

select VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUERS_ACTIVE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC,VALUERS_NAME,to_char( valuers_expdateofsanc, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuers_expdateofsanc from VALUERSMASTER where VALUERS_CODE='^' and VALAPPFLAG='V'
select district_code,district_desc from district_master where state_code='^' and district_desc like '^%'
delete from CUS_SEC_VALUERLIST where CUS_SECID=?

INSERT INTO CUS_SEC_VALUERLIST (CUS_SECID,CUS_SLNO, CUS_VALUERNAME,CUS_VALSUBM_DATE, CUS_VALRECEIPT_DATE, CUS_VALUATION_DATE, CUS_SECURITY_VALUE, CUS_APPROVE_FLAG,CUS_VALUERCODE) values (?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?)

select CUS_SECID,CUS_SLNO, CUS_VALUERNAME,to_char(CUS_VALSUBM_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALSUBM_DATE, to_char(CUS_VALRECEIPT_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALRECEIPT_DATE,to_char(CUS_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALUATION_DATE, CUS_SECURITY_VALUE, CUS_APPROVE_FLAG,CUS_VALUERCODE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,(select stat_data_value from static_data where stat_data_id='205' and STAT_DATA_DESC=VALUER_CATEGORYCODE) as valuation_limit,replace(valuer_valuedloc,'@','$')as valuer_valuedloc from CUS_SEC_VALUERLIST,valuersmaster where CUS_SECID='^' and CUS_VALUERCODE= valuers_code and valappflag='V' order by CUS_APPROVE_FLAG desc

select sec_id,((select sec_name from security_master where sec_id=p.sec_parent)||' - '||sec_name) as sec_name,sec_parent,sec_cbssecurity,SEC_COLLATFLAG,sec_isliquidflag from security_master p where sec_parent != '^' order by SEC_PARENT

select distinct(CUS_SEC_ID) as CUS_SEC_ID,CUS_COMPANYCODE from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid=CUS_SEC_ID and cus_sec_classification='40' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='A'

select sum(cnt) as sharecnt from (select nvl(sum(app_sec_sharecnt),0) as cnt from app_securitydetails,applications,loandetails where app_no=app_sec_appno and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_loantype='P' and app_status='pa' and app_renew_flag!='P' and app_no=loan_appno and APP_SEC_SECID='^' union select nvl(sum(app_sec_sharecnt),0) from app_securitydetails,applications,facilities where app_no=app_sec_appno and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_loantype in ('A','C') and app_renew_flag!='P' and facility_status='pa' and app_no=facility_appno and facility_appno=app_sec_appno and facility_sno=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_SECID='^')

select sum(cnt) as sharecnt from (select nvl(sum(app_sec_sharecnt),0) as cnt from app_securitydetails,applications,loandetails where app_no=app_sec_appno and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_loantype='P' and app_renew_flag!='P' and app_no=loan_appno and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and app_no='^' union select nvl(sum(app_sec_sharecnt),0) from app_securitydetails,applications,facilities where app_no=app_sec_appno and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_loantype in ('A','C') and app_renew_flag!='P' and app_no=facility_appno and facility_appno=app_sec_appno and facility_sno=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and app_no='^')
select PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE,sum(nvl(perbank_limit,0)) as amt from per_otherbank where PERBANK_DELETEFLAG is null and PERBANK_OLDID='^' and PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE in ('4','5') group by PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE

select sum(nvl(LOAN_RECMDAMT,0)) as amt,PRD_SHARETYPE from loandetails,applications,products,per_demographics where app_no=loan_appno and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and prd_type='pS' and loan_appno=demo_appno and app_prdcode=prd_code and app_status='pa' group by PRD_SHARETYPE

select sum(nvl(facility_sancamt,0)) as amt,com_sharetype from facilities,applications,facility_corp where COM_LOANAGAINSTSHARES='Y' and facility_appno=app_no and COM_FACID=facility_code and facility_status='pa' and BORROWER_ID='^' group by com_sharetype
select LOAN_PARAMVAL,LOAN_PARAMSLNO,LOAN_PARAMVAL1 from OTHER_PARAMETERS where LOAN_PARAMSLNO in ('^')
select loan_recmdamt,PRD_SHARETYPE from applications,products,loandetails where loan_appno=app_no and app_no='^' and app_prdcode=prd_code
select stat_data_id,stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_sno from static_data where stat_data_id in ('206','207','208') and stat_data_active='Y' and stat_data_desc='^' order by stat_data_desc

select distinct(app_sec_secid) as sec_id,cus_sec_type from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_attached='A' and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid=cus_sec_id and to_number(cus_sec_type) between 10 and 19
insert into ddr_securitydetails(ddr_appno,ddr_sec_id,ddr_sectype,ddr_cersaiobser,ddr_propdesc_val,ddr_propdesc_law,ddr_propdesc_variationcmt, ddr_officerid_acc) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into ddr_securitydetails(ddr_appno,ddr_sec_id,ddr_sectype,ddr_authorised_dealer,ddr_invoicedate,ddr_subdealer,ddr_maindealername, ddr_maindealeraddress,ddr_confirmadateofsubdealer,ddr_subdealertinno,ddr_modeofrepay,ddr_verificationofveh) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
delete from ddr_securitydetails where ddr_appno=?

select ddr_sec_id,ddr_sectype,ddr_cersaiobser,ddr_propdesc_val,ddr_propdesc_law,ddr_propdesc_variationcmt, ddr_officerid_acc,ddr_authorised_dealer,to_char(ddr_invoicedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ddr_invoicedate,ddr_subdealer,ddr_maindealername, ddr_maindealeraddress,to_char(ddr_confirmadateofsubdealer,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ddr_confirmadateofsubdealer,ddr_subdealertinno,ddr_modeofrepay,to_char(ddr_verificationofveh,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ddr_verificationofveh from ddr_securitydetails where ddr_appno='^' and ddr_sec_id='^'
insert into ddr_generalinfo(ddr_appno,ddr_marketreport,ddr_enquiredwith,ddr_contactno,ddr_opinionabtbor,ddr_contactedby) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select ddr_appno,ddr_marketreport,ddr_enquiredwith,ddr_contactno,ddr_opinionabtbor,ddr_contactedby from ddr_generalinfo where ddr_appno='^'
delete from ddr_generalinfo where ddr_appno=?

select perapp_title || ' ' ||PERAPP_FNAME as PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_PANNO,CON_COMPHONE,CON_MOBILE,CON_EMAIL,CIBIL_SCORE,PERAPP_BANK,to_char(PERAPP_BANKSINCE,'yyyy') as PERAPP_BANKSINCE,PERAPP_INTRONAME,(select cbs_static_data_desc from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTION) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,CON_RESTYPE,CON_YEARS,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,perapp_id,CON_PERMPHONE,CON_PEREMAIL,PERAPP_SATISFACTORY,PERAPP_JUST_DETAILS,perinc_monsalary,perinc_yearsalary,demo_type, c.CITY_NAME as con_city,s.STATE_NAME as con_state, s1.STATE_NAME as perm_state, c1.CITY_NAME as perm_city,ddr.DDR_BANKWITHUS,ddr.DDR_ACC_CONDUCT,ddr.DDR_REPUT_INTRODUCER,ddr.DDR_SELFINTRO_DOC, ddr.DDR_WHT_PHYINSP,ddr.DDR_PHYINSP_USERID,ddr.DDR_PHYINSP_USERNAME,ddr.DDR_PHYINSP_USERDESIG,ddr.DDR_PHYINSP_REASON, ddr.DDR_PASSPORT_DET,ddr.DDR_DRIVINGLICENCE_DET,ddr.DDR_ELECTIONCARD_DET,ddr.DDR_OTHERDOC1_DET,ddr.DDR_OTHERDOC2_DET,ddr.DDR_OTHERDOC3_DET,ddr.DDR_APPRESIDENCE,ddr.DDR_APP_NEARBRANCH,ddr.DDR_KYC_COMPLIEDBY ,kyc.KYC_RESIPROOFTYPE,to_char(kyc.KYC_DOC_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as KYC_DOC_DATE,ddr.DDR_KYC_COMPLIEDBY, DDR_PRESBANK_NAME,DDR_PRESBANK_ADDRESS,DDR_PRESBANK_BANKSINCE,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_FROM,DDR_PRESBANK_ACCVER_TO,DDR_PRESBANK_CHEQUERETURN,DDR_PRESBANK_MAXBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_MINBAL,DDR_PRESBANK_TOTCTO,DDR_PRESBANK_DIFINSALES,DDR_PRESBANK_VARIATIONRSN,DDR_PRESBANK_WHT_CONFREPOBT,DDR_PRESBANK_CONFREPDATE,DDR_PRESBANK_RSN_CONFREPOBT ,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DET,to_char(PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_REGNO ,to_char(PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,PERAPP_COM_AUTHCAPTAL,PERAPP_COM_PAIDUPCAP,PERAPP_COM_MOAVERIFIED,PERAPP_COM_AMENDEDMOA ,to_char(PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_TRUST_REGTYPE,PERAPP_TRUST_PERMREFNO ,PERINC_CAPITALGAIN,perinc_agriculture as PERINC_OTHERS,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS1,PERINC_INC_SUPPORTDOC ,DDR_AGR_FARMVISITDATE,DDR_AGR_LANDEXTEND,DDR_AGR_STANDINGCROPS,DDR_AGR_CROPGROWN,DDR_AGR_LIAB_PACS,DDR_AGR_NOCOBTDATE,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_FROM,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_TO,DDR_AGR_ACCSTATUS,DDR_AGR_FNO60_OBT,DDR_AGR_FNO60_DATE ,DDR_SALEMP_SALESTUENOVER,DDR_SALEMP_PROFIT,DDR_SALEMP_BANKNAME,DDR_SALEMP_BRANCHNAME,DDR_SALEMP_ACCOUNTNUM,DDR_SALEMP_INTSERV_ACC,DDR_SALEMP_PERMSN_REFNO,DDR_SALEMP_SAL_BANKACC,DDR_SALEMP_RSN_VARIATION,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DATE,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NAME ,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DESIGN,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NUM,DDR_SELFEMP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_SELFEMP_APPACTIVITY,DDR_SELFEMP_ADDRESS,to_char(DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,perapp_cbsid,DDR_LISTEDEMPLOYER,DDR_STOCKEXCHANGENAME,PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID
from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,perincexpenses pi,CUS_CIBILDETAILS cc,CUST_CONTACTINFO ci,INDIVIDUAL_INFO io,DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW ddr,laps_cities c,laps_states s,laps_cities c1, laps_states s1 ,applicant_kycnorms kyc
where pd.DEMO_APPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and pi.PERINC_ID(+)=p.PERAPP_ID and cc.CIBIL_APPID=to_char(p.PERAPP_ID) and io.INDINFO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ci.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPNO(+)=pd.DEMO_APPNO and s.state_code=ci.CON_COMSTATE(+) and c.city_code=ci.CON_COMCITY and s1.state_code=ci.CON_PERMSTATE and c1.city_code=ci.CON_PERMCITY and c1.STATE_ID=s1.state_id and c.STATE_ID=s.state_id and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPID(+)= pd.DEMO_OLDAPPID and kyc.KYC_CUSTID=p.PERAPP_ID order by demo_type
select COMAPP_ID,COMAPP_DIV_NAME,COMAPP_DINNUMBER from COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS where COMAPP_ID='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='D'
INSERT INTO COM_CHARGE_ASSETS (COM_APPLICANT_ID,COM_SEC_ID,COM_ASSET_NAME,COM_CHARG_HOLDER,COM_CHARG_DATE) values (?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
delete from COM_CHARGE_ASSETS where COM_APPLICANT_ID=?
select COM_SEC_ID,COM_ASSET_NAME,COM_CHARG_HOLDER,to_char(COM_CHARG_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_CHARG_DATE from COM_CHARGE_ASSETS where COM_APPLICANT_ID='^'

select peremp_address1,peremp_address2,peremp_address3,city_name as peremp_city,state_name as peremp_state,peremp_zip, PEREMP_NAME,PEREMP_EMAIL,peremp_phone,trunc(((months_between(sysdate,peremp_establish))/12),1) as commencementyr,peremp_design from laps_cities ,peremployer, laps_states where peremp_id='^' and city_code(+) =peremp_city and state_code(+)=peremp_state

,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DESIGN,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NUM,DDR_SELFEMP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_SELFEMP_APPACTIVITY,DDR_SELFEMP_ADDRESS,DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,perapp_cbsid,DDR_LISTEDEMPLOYER,DDR_STOCKEXCHANGENAME,PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID
from PERAPPLICANT p,com_demographics pd,perincexpenses pi,CUS_CIBILDETAILS cc,CUST_CONTACTINFO ci,INDIVIDUAL_INFO io,DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW ddr,laps_cities c,laps_states s,laps_cities c1, laps_states s1 ,applicant_kycnorms kyc
where pd.DEMO_APPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_OLDID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and pi.PERINC_ID(+)=p.PERAPP_ID and cc.CIBIL_APPID=to_char(p.PERAPP_ID) and io.INDINFO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ci.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPNO(+)=pd.DEMO_APPNO and s.state_code(+)=ci.CON_COMSTATE and c.city_code(+)=ci.CON_COMCITY and s1.state_code(+)=ci.CON_PERMSTATE and c1.city_code(+)=ci.CON_PERMCITY and c1.STATE_ID=s1.state_id and c.STATE_ID=s.state_id and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPID (+)= pd.DEMO_COMAPPID and kyc.KYC_CUSTID=p.PERAPP_ID
union all

,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DET,to_char(PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_PARTNERSHIP_REGNO ,to_char(PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_COM_SEARCHREPDATE,PERAPP_COM_AUTHCAPTAL,PERAPP_COM_PAIDUPCAP,PERAPP_COM_MOAVERIFIED,PERAPP_COM_AMENDEDMOA ,to_char(PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERAPP_TRUST_DEEDDATE,PERAPP_TRUST_REGTYPE,PERAPP_TRUST_PERMREFNO ,PERINC_CAPITALGAIN,perinc_agriculture as PERINC_OTHERS,PERINC_PROFITBUSINESS1,PERINC_INC_SUPPORTDOC ,DDR_AGR_FARMVISITDATE,DDR_AGR_LANDEXTEND,DDR_AGR_STANDINGCROPS,DDR_AGR_CROPGROWN,DDR_AGR_LIAB_PACS,DDR_AGR_NOCOBTDATE,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_FROM,DDR_AGR_PACSVERI_TO,DDR_AGR_ACCSTATUS,DDR_AGR_FNO60_OBT,DDR_AGR_FNO60_DATE ,DDR_SALEMP_SALESTUENOVER,DDR_SALEMP_PROFIT,DDR_SALEMP_BANKNAME,DDR_SALEMP_BRANCHNAME,DDR_SALEMP_ACCOUNTNUM,DDR_SALEMP_INTSERV_ACC,DDR_SALEMP_PERMSN_REFNO,DDR_SALEMP_SAL_BANKACC,DDR_SALEMP_RSN_VARIATION,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DATE,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NAME ,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_DESIGN,DDR_SALEMP_EMPCONT_NUM,DDR_SELFEMP_NEARBRANCH,DDR_SELFEMP_APPACTIVITY,DDR_SELFEMP_ADDRESS,DDR_SELFEMP_VISITDATE,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,perapp_cbsid,DDR_LISTEDEMPLOYER,DDR_STOCKEXCHANGENAME,PERAPP_INTROTYPE,PERAPP_INTROSTAFFID,PERAPP_INTROCBSID
from PERAPPLICANT p,applications a,perincexpenses pi,CUS_CIBILDETAILS cc,CUST_CONTACTINFO ci,INDIVIDUAL_INFO io,DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW ddr,laps_cities c,laps_states s,laps_cities c1, laps_states s1 ,applicant_kycnorms kyc where a.app_no='^' and p.PERAPP_OLDID in (select distinct(COM_OLDLAPSID) from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^') AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and pi.PERINC_ID=p.PERAPP_ID and cc.CIBIL_APPID=to_char(p.PERAPP_ID) and io.INDINFO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ci.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPNO=a.app_no and s.state_code(+)=ci.CON_COMSTATE and c.city_code(+)=ci.CON_COMCITY and s1.state_code(+)=ci.CON_PERMSTATE and c1.city_code(+)=ci.CON_PERMCITY and c1.STATE_ID=s1.state_id and c.STATE_ID=s.state_id and ddr.DUEDILIG_APPID (+)= p.PERAPP_OLDID and kyc.KYC_CUSTID=p.PERAPP_ID
select PER_ID,PER_NAME,PER_INTEREST,PER_FINANCE from PERMISSION_MASTER where PER_PARENT='^'
select PER_ID,PER_NAME,PER_INTEREST,PER_FINANCE from PERMISSION_MASTER where PER_PARENT='^' and PER_STATUS='E'
select nvl(max(to_number(substr(DEV_APPNO,length(DEV_APPNO)-5,length(DEV_APPNO)-5)))+1,1) as DEV_APPNO from APPL_DEVIATION where substr(DEV_APPNO,1,4)='^'

insert into APPL_DEVIATION (DEV_APPNO,DEV_TYPE,DEV_SUBTYPE,DEV_WHTCUSAVAIL,DEV_CBSID,DEV_DEVPARAM,DEV_CREATEDATE,DEV_USERID,DEV_ORGSCODE,DEV_APPSTATUS,dev_applholder) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?)

select DEV_APPNO,DEV_TYPE,DEV_SUBTYPE,DEV_WHTCUSAVAIL,DEV_CBSID,DEV_DEVPARAM,DEV_USERID,DEV_ORGSCODE,DEV_APPSTATUS,dev_applholder,dev_sanccmts,dev_processedby,to_char(DEV_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DEV_PROCESSDATE,DEV_FREEZE_FLAG from APPL_DEVIATION where DEV_APPNO='^'

select count(a.DEV_APPNO) as appno from APPL_DEVIATION a,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST p ,DEV_APPMAILBOX m where DEV_APPLHOLDER='^' and a.DEV_APPNO=p.DEV_APPNO and (upper(DEV_DELFLAG)='N' or DEV_DELFLAG is null) and m.dev_appno=a.dev_appno and DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.dev_appno=m.dev_appno) and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null) and dev_appstatus in('op','pa','pr')

select a.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,DEV_FROMUSRID,to_char(DEV_SENTDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DEV_SENTDATE,decode(DEV_APPSTATUS,'op','Open/Pending', 'pa','Processed/Approved','pr','Processed/Rejected',''),a.DEV_ORGSCODE,PG_EMPLOYERNAME from APPL_DEVIATION a,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST p ,DEV_APPMAILBOX m where DEV_APPLHOLDER='^' and a.DEV_APPNO=p.DEV_APPNO and (upper(DEV_DELFLAG)='N' or DEV_DELFLAG is null) and m.dev_appno=a.dev_appno and DEV_SENTDATE=(select max(DEV_SENTDATE) from DEV_APPMAILBOX b where b.dev_appno=m.dev_appno) and (DEV_MAILTYPE='C' or DEV_MAILTYPE is null) and dev_appstatus in('op','pa','pr')
update APPL_DEVIATION set DEV_DEVPARAM=? where DEV_APPNO=?
select duedilig_appno from due_diligence_reportnew where duedilig_appno='^'

select duedilig_appno,duedilig_appid from due_diligence_reportnew,applications where duedilig_appid in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid='^') and duedilig_appno=app_no and app_status in ('pa','ca','op') order by duedilig_appid desc

insert into due_diligence_reportnew (duedilig_appno,duedilig_appid,ddr_bankwithus,ddr_acc_conduct,ddr_reput_introducer,ddr_selfintro_doc,ddr_wht_phyinsp,ddr_phyinsp_userid,ddr_phyinsp_username, ddr_phyinsp_userdesig,ddr_phyinsp_reason,ddr_passport_det,ddr_drivinglicence_det,ddr_electioncard_det,ddr_otherdoc1_det,ddr_otherdoc2_det, ddr_otherdoc3_det,ddr_appresidence,ddr_app_nearbranch,ddr_kyc_compliedby,ddr_presbank_name,ddr_presbank_address,ddr_presbank_banksince, ddr_presbank_accver_from,ddr_presbank_accver_to,ddr_presbank_chequereturn,ddr_presbank_maxbal,ddr_presbank_minbal,ddr_presbank_totcto, ddr_presbank_difinsales,ddr_presbank_variationrsn,ddr_presbank_wht_confrepobt,ddr_presbank_confrepdate,ddr_presbank_rsn_confrepobt) select ?,?,ddr_bankwithus,ddr_acc_conduct,ddr_reput_introducer,ddr_selfintro_doc,ddr_wht_phyinsp,ddr_phyinsp_userid,ddr_phyinsp_username, ddr_phyinsp_userdesig,ddr_phyinsp_reason,ddr_passport_det,ddr_drivinglicence_det,ddr_electioncard_det,ddr_otherdoc1_det,ddr_otherdoc2_det, ddr_otherdoc3_det,ddr_appresidence,ddr_app_nearbranch,ddr_kyc_compliedby,ddr_presbank_name,ddr_presbank_address,ddr_presbank_banksince, ddr_presbank_accver_from,ddr_presbank_accver_to,ddr_presbank_chequereturn,ddr_presbank_maxbal,ddr_presbank_minbal,ddr_presbank_totcto, ddr_presbank_difinsales,ddr_presbank_variationrsn,ddr_presbank_wht_confrepobt,ddr_presbank_confrepdate,ddr_presbank_rsn_confrepobt from due_diligence_reportnew where duedilig_appid=? and duedilig_appno=?

select DUEDILIG_APPNO,DUEDILIG_APPID from DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW,applications where DUEDILIG_APPID in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid in (select DEMO_OLDAPPID from per_demographics where demo_appno='^')) and DUEDILIG_APPNO=app_no and app_status in ('pa','ca') union select DUEDILIG_APPNO,DUEDILIG_APPID from DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW,applications where DUEDILIG_APPID in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid in (select DEMO_COMAPPID from com_demographics where demo_appno='^')) and DUEDILIG_APPNO=app_no and app_status in ('pa','ca') union select DUEDILIG_APPNO,DUEDILIG_APPID from DUE_DILIGENCE_REPORTNEW,applications where DUEDILIG_APPID in (select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid in (select distinct(com_oldlapsid) from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^')) and DUEDILIG_APPNO=app_no and app_status in ('pa','ca')

select distinct(com_oldlapsid) as demo_appid, com_oldlapsid as demo_oldappid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' union select DEMO_COMAPPID,DEMO_COMAPPID from com_demographics where demo_appno='^'
select count(SEC_SECID) as appno from cus_security_ownership_temp where security_statusflag='op' and sec_approvedby='^'
select count(SEC_ID) as appno from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_FLAG in ('V','N') and SEC_APPROVEDBY='^'

insert into DEV_PERMISSION_GIST(DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,PG_CONSTITUTION,PG_MANAGEMENTDET,PG_ACTIVITY,PG_ESTBDATE,PG_GRPCRCN_POT, PG_EMPLOYERNAME,PG_NOOFEMP_SALDRAW,PG_NAMEOFTRUSTEE,PG_EXCESSINCOME,PG_DEALINGSINCE,PG_EXSTFAC_COLSEC,PG_ITRETURNS_TAXPAID, PG_PROPFAC_SEC_PRIME,PG_PROPFAC_SEC_COLLATERAL,PG_RSN_SWITCH,PG_ACC_INTRODBY, PG_LANDCOST,PG_PROMOTCONTRIB,PG_PERCENTTOTAL1,PG_CONSTRUCTIONCOST,PG_ADVANCEAMT,PG_PERCENTTOTAL2,PG_LOANFROMKBL,PG_PERCENTTOTAL3,PG_TOTPROJECTCOST,PG_TOTMEANSOFFINANCE,PG_PERCENTTOTAL4, PG_SRC_MARGINMONEY,PG_SRC_REPAYMENT,PG_TOTAREA,PG_TOTBUILTUPAREA,PG_FLOORDETAILS,PG_TOTCONSTCOST,PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_RF,PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_CP,PG_PROJECTEDRENT, PG_CONF_AUTH_CONSTBUILD,PG_SCHEME_GUIDELINES,PG_DEVPERM_SOUGHTOTHERS,PG_EARLIERCONCESSION,PG_JUSTF_SPECCONSID,PG_CONCESSION_RECOMMENDED,PG_CONCESSION_JUSTIF,PG_DETOFVISIT,PG_PARTYBG_EARPROJECTS, PG_DEVOBSERVED,PG_WHTPERM_EXTENDED,PG_TA_BRTOT_ACS,PG_TA_BRTOT_AMT,PG_TA_NPA_ACS,PG_TA_NPA_AMT,PG_TA_NPAPER_ACS,PG_TA_NPAPER_AMT,PG_SL_BRTOT_ACS,PG_SL_BRTOT_AMT,PG_SL_NPA_ACS,PG_SL_NPA_AMT,PG_SL_NPAPER_ACS, PG_SL_NPAPER_AMT,PG_LE_BRTOT_ACS,PG_LE_BRTOT_AMT,PG_LE_NPA_ACS,PG_LE_NPA_AMT,PG_LE_NPAPER_ACS,PG_LE_NPAPER_AMT,PG_ANYOTHER_INFO,PG_RECOMMEND_BRANCH, PG_APPLADDRESS1,PG_APPLADDRESS2,PG_CITYCODE,PG_DISTCODE,PG_STATECODE,PG_PINCODE,PG_PHONE_NUMBER,PG_MAIL_ID,PG_CONSTITUTED_ON,PG_APPL_TITLE,PG_INCEXPEN_DATE,PG_EXISINGFAC_BOWID,PG_CRE_EXPOSURE,PG_BOR_RATING,PG_RATINGDATE,PG_CIBIL_SCORE,PG_CIBIL_REPORTEDDATE,PG_CIBIL_DETAILS,PG_CRIF_SCORE,PG_CRIF_DATE,PG_CRIF_DETAILS,PG_PRIME_SECVAL,PG_COLLATERAL_SECVAL) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,? ,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)

select DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,PG_CONSTITUTION,PG_MANAGEMENTDET,PG_ACTIVITY,to_char(PG_ESTBDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_ESTBDATE,PG_GRPCRCN_POT, PG_EMPLOYERNAME,PG_NOOFEMP_SALDRAW,PG_NAMEOFTRUSTEE,PG_EXCESSINCOME,to_char(PG_DEALINGSINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_DEALINGSINCE, PG_EXSTFAC_COLSEC,PG_ITRETURNS_TAXPAID,PG_PROPFAC_SEC_PRIME,PG_PROPFAC_SEC_COLLATERAL,PG_RSN_SWITCH,PG_ACC_INTRODBY, PG_LANDCOST,PG_PROMOTCONTRIB,PG_PERCENTTOTAL1,PG_CONSTRUCTIONCOST,PG_ADVANCEAMT,PG_PERCENTTOTAL2,PG_LOANFROMKBL,PG_PERCENTTOTAL3,PG_TOTPROJECTCOST,PG_TOTMEANSOFFINANCE, PG_PERCENTTOTAL4,PG_SRC_MARGINMONEY,PG_SRC_REPAYMENT,PG_TOTAREA,PG_TOTBUILTUPAREA,PG_FLOORDETAILS,PG_TOTCONSTCOST,PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_RF, PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_CP,PG_PROJECTEDRENT,PG_CONF_AUTH_CONSTBUILD, PG_SCHEME_GUIDELINES,PG_DEVPERM_SOUGHTOTHERS,PG_EARLIERCONCESSION,PG_JUSTF_SPECCONSID,PG_CONCESSION_RECOMMENDED,PG_CONCESSION_JUSTIF,PG_DETOFVISIT,PG_PARTYBG_EARPROJECTS, PG_DEVOBSERVED,PG_WHTPERM_EXTENDED,PG_TA_BRTOT_ACS,PG_TA_BRTOT_AMT,PG_TA_NPA_ACS,PG_TA_NPA_AMT,PG_TA_NPAPER_ACS,PG_TA_NPAPER_AMT,PG_SL_BRTOT_ACS,PG_SL_BRTOT_AMT,PG_SL_NPA_ACS, PG_SL_NPA_AMT,PG_SL_NPAPER_ACS,PG_SL_NPAPER_AMT,PG_LE_BRTOT_ACS,PG_LE_BRTOT_AMT,PG_LE_NPA_ACS,PG_LE_NPA_AMT,PG_LE_NPAPER_ACS,PG_LE_NPAPER_AMT,PG_ANYOTHER_INFO,PG_RECOMMEND_BRANCH, PG_APPLADDRESS1,PG_APPLADDRESS2,PG_CITYCODE,PG_DISTCODE,PG_STATECODE,PG_PINCODE,PG_PHONE_NUMBER,PG_MAIL_ID,to_char(PG_CONSTITUTED_ON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CONSTITUTED_ON,PG_APPL_TITLE,to_char(PG_INCEXPEN_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_INCEXPEN_DATE,PG_EXISINGFAC_BOWID,PG_CRE_EXPOSURE,PG_BOR_RATING,to_char(PG_RATINGDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_RATINGDATE, PG_CIBIL_SCORE,to_char(PG_CIBIL_REPORTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CIBIL_REPORTEDDATE,PG_CIBIL_DETAILS,PG_CRIF_SCORE,to_char(PG_CRIF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CRIF_DATE,PG_CRIF_DETAILS,PG_PRIME_SECVAL,PG_COLLATERAL_SECVAL from DEV_PERMISSION_GIST where DEV_APPNO='^'
delete from DEV_PERMISSION_GIST where DEV_APPNO=?
insert into perm_assessment_master (PERM_TYPE_ID,PERM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION,PERM_TYPE_VALUE,PERM_TYPE_ASSESSMENT) values(?,?,?,?)
select NVL(max(PERM_TYPE_id),0)+1 as snomax from PERM_ASSESSMENT_master
insert into perm_assessment_rangeparam (PERM_ID,PERM_SNO,PERM_RANGE,PERM_MAXVALUE)values(?,?,?,?)
insert into permission_master (per_id,per_name,per_parent,prd_approval,prd_reject,PER_ORGAPP,PER_ORGREJ,PER_TERMSANDCONDID,PER_STATUS,PER_INTEREST,PER_FINANCE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
