select NVL(max(per_id),0)+1 as snomax from permission_master
select per_id,per_name from permission_master where per_parent = '^' order by per_id

select per_id,per_name,per_parent,prd_approval,prd_reject,per_orgapp,per_orgrej,PER_TERMSANDCONDID,PER_STATUS,PER_INTEREST,PER_FINANCE from permission_master where per_parent != '^' and per_parent='^'
delete from permission_master where per_id=?
update permission_master set per_name=?,per_parent=?,prd_approval=?,prd_reject=?,PER_ORGAPP=?,PER_ORGREJ=?,PER_TERMSANDCONDID=?,PER_STATUS=?,PER_INTEREST=?,PER_FINANCE=? where per_id=?
select PERM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION,PERM_TYPE_VALUE,PERM_TYPE_ASSESSMENT,PERM_TYPE_ID from PERM_ASSESSMENT_master
select PERM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION,PERM_TYPE_VALUE,PERM_TYPE_ASSESSMENT,PERM_TYPE_ID from PERM_ASSESSMENT_master where PERM_TYPE_ID='^'
select PERM_RANGE,PERM_MAXVALUE,PERM_SNO from PERM_ASSESSMENT_RANGEPARAM where PERM_ID='^' order by PERM_SNO
update perm_assessment_master set PERM_TYPE_VALUE=? where PERM_TYPE_ID=?
delete from perm_assessment_rangeparam where PERM_ID=?
delete perm_assessment_master where PERM_TYPE_ID=?

select PERM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION,PERM_TYPE_VALUE,PERM_TYPE_ASSESSMENT,PERM_TYPE_ID,PERM_BRANCH_VALUE,PERM_HO_VALUE,PERM_MAXMARKS,perm_sub_description from PERM_ASSESSMENT_master left join PERM_ASSESSMENT on PERM_APPNO='^' and PERM_DESCRIPTION=PERM_TYPE_ID order by PERM_TYPE_ID
select PERM_RANGE,PERM_MAXVALUE,perm_sno from PERM_ASSESSMENT_RANGEPARAM where PERM_ID='^'
delete from PERM_APPLICANT_BG where APPLBG_APPNO=?
select APPLBG_COMMENTS from PERM_APPLICANT_BG where APPLBG_APPNO='^'
insert into PERM_APPLICANT_BG(APPLBG_APPNO,APPLBG_COMMENTS) values (?,?)

insert into PERM_APPDOCUMENTS(apdoc_appno,apdoc_doccode,apdoc_substatus,apdoc_subdate,apdoc_totpages,apdoc_rendate, apdoc_doctype,apdoc_remarks, doc_created_date,APDOC_CreateUSERID,APDOC_FAC_SLNO) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,sysdate,?,?)
update PERM_APPDOCUMENTS set apdoc_remarks=?, doc_created_date = TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,apdoc_substatus= ? where apdoc_appno=? and apdoc_doccode=?
update PERM_APPDOCUMENTS set APDOC_DELFLAG=?,APDOC_DELUSERID=?,APDOC_DELDATE=sysdate where apdoc_appno=? and APDOC_DOCCODE=?

select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as doc_docname,doc_jspname,doc_doctype,doc_id,APDOC_FAC_SLNO,DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,perm_appdocuments,static_data where doc_id = to_char(apdoc_doccode) and apdoc_appno ='^' and doc_doctype='O' and STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and APDOC_DELFLAG is null and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where doc_id=d.doc_id) order by APDOC_FAC_SLNO
delete from APPL_DEVIATION where DEV_APPNO=?

insert into DEV_APPMAILBOX(DEV_APPNO,DEV_FROMUSRID,DEV_TOUSRID,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT,DEV_sentDATE,DEV_MAILTYPE,DEV_FROM_ORGCODE,DEV_FROM_ORGDEPT,DEV_TO_ORGCODE,DEV_TO_ORGDEPT) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into DEV_APPMAILBOX(DEV_APPNO,DEV_FROMUSRID,DEV_TOUSRID,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT,DEV_sentDATE,DEV_MAILTYPE,DEV_FROM_ORGCODE,DEV_FROM_ORGDEPT,DEV_TO_ORGCODE,DEV_TO_ORGDEPT,DEV_REALLOCATION_FLAG) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select terms_ruleno,terms_content from setmodtermscond, permission_master p where PER_PARENT='^' and per_termsandcondid=terms_id and terms_action='E' and PER_ID=(select max(PER_ID) from permission_master where PER_PARENT=p.PER_PARENT)

select distinct(ap.DEV_CBSID),upper(pg.PG_APPLIANTNAME) as appname,o.ORG_NAME from APPL_DEVIATION ap,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST pg,organisations o where ap.DEV_APPNO=pg.DEV_APPNO and ap.DEV_APPNO='^' and o.ORG_SCODE=ap.DEV_ORGSCODE and (upper(DEV_DELFLAG)='N' or DEV_DELFLAG is null)

select distinct(perapp_cbsid),upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,org_name,perapp_oldid from perapplicant,organisations where perapp_branchcode = org_scode and perapp_cbsid='^' and (perapp_renew='n' or perapp_renew is null)

select distinct(DEV_CBSID),upper(PG_APPLIANTNAME) as perappname, org_name from DEV_PERMISSION_GIST g, organisations,APPL_DEVIATION d where ^ and DEV_ORGSCODE=org_scode and g.DEV_APPNO=d.DEV_APPNO and org_code like '^' order by perappname

select ap.DEV_APPNO,upper(pg.PG_APPLIANTNAME) as appname,ap.DEV_CBSID,ap.DEV_APPSTATUS,ap.DEV_APPLHOLDER,USR_FNAME from APPL_DEVIATION ap,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST pg,USERS where ap.DEV_APPNO=pg.DEV_APPNO ^ and ap.DEV_APPLHOLDER=USR_ID and (upper(DEV_DELFLAG)='N' or DEV_DELFLAG is null)
update APPL_DEVIATION set DEV_DELFLAG='Y',DEV_DELDATE=sysdate, DEV_DELUSRID=? where DEV_APPNO=?
insert into app_querydetails(aq_appno,aq_sno,aq_orgcode,aq_orgdept,aq_query,aq_raisedby,aq_createdon,aq_status,aq_sentorgcode,aq_sentorgdept,AQ_PARENTID)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(aq_sno),0)+(0.1) as sno from app_querydetails where aq_appno='^' and AQ_PARENTID='^'
select nvl(max(cast(aq_sno as int)),0)+1 as sno from app_querydetails where aq_appno='^'

select aq_sno,aq_orgcode,aq_orgdept,aq_query,aq_reply,aq_raisedby,to_char(aq_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_createdon, to_char(aq_raisedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_raisedon,aq_status,to_char(aq_repliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_repliedon, to_char(aq_closeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_closeddate,aq_repliedby,aq_closedby,org_level,aq_sentorgdept,org_code,AQ_PARENTID from app_querydetails,organisations where aq_appno='^' and org_code=aq_sentorgcode order by aq_sno
update app_querydetails set aq_orgcode=?,aq_orgdept=?,aq_query=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?
delete from app_querydetails where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?

select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,'' as desc1 from users where usr_avail='a' and usr_id in (select mail_fromusrid from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null)union select mail_tousrid from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null)) and usr_orgcode=^

select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,cbs_static_data_desc as desc1 from users,cbs_staticdata where usr_avail='a' and cbs_static_data_id='130' and cbs_static_data_code=usr_rlpftype and usr_id in (select mail_fromusrid from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null)union select mail_tousrid from appmailbox where mail_appno='^' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null)) and usr_orgcode=^
insert into QUERY_APPMAILBOX(QM_APPNO,QM_QueryID,QM_FROMUSRID,QM_TOUSRID,QM_DATE,QM_MAILTYPE,QM_FROM_ORGCODE,QM_FROM_ORGDEPT,QM_TO_ORGCODE,QM_TO_ORGDEPT) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)
update app_querydetails set aq_status=?,aq_raisedon=sysdate,AQ_RAISEDBY=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?
select count(aq_appno) as cnt from app_querydetails,QUERY_APPMAILBOX where AQ_SNO=QM_QueryID and aq_appno=QM_APPNO and AQ_STATUS='QS' and QM_TOUSRID='^'

select count(aq_appno) as cnt from (select distinct aq_appno,aq_sno as cnt from app_querydetails,QUERY_APPMAILBOX where AQ_SNO=QM_QueryID and aq_appno=QM_APPNO and AQ_STATUS='QR' and QM_FROMUSRID='^')

select aq_appno,aq_sno,QM_FROMUSRID,to_char(QM_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as QM_DATE,decode('','P','Retail','A','Agriculture','C','Corporate','') as module,a.PG_APPLIANTNAME from app_querydetails,QUERY_APPMAILBOX,appl_deviation b,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST a where AQ_SNO=QM_QueryID and aq_appno=QM_APPNO and AQ_STATUS='QS' and QM_TOUSRID='^' and b.DEV_APPNO=aq_appno and a.DEV_APPNO=aq_appno

select distinct aq_appno,aq_sno,AQ_REPLIEDBY,to_char(AQ_REPLIEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as AQ_REPLIEDON,decode('','P','Retail','A','Agriculture','C','Corporate','Permission') as module,a.PG_APPLIANTNAME from app_querydetails,QUERY_APPMAILBOX,appl_deviation b,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST a where AQ_SNO=QM_QueryID and aq_appno=QM_APPNO and AQ_STATUS='QR' and QM_FROMUSRID='^' and b.DEV_APPNO=aq_appno and a.DEV_APPNO=aq_appno

select aq_appno,aq_sno,aq_orgcode,aq_orgdept,aq_query,aq_reply,aq_raisedby,to_char(aq_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_createdon,to_char(aq_raisedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_raisedon,aq_status,aq_repliedby,to_char(aq_repliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as aq_repliedon from app_querydetails where aq_appno='^' and aq_sno='^'
update app_querydetails set aq_status=?,aq_reply=?,aq_repliedon=sysdate,aq_repliedby=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?
update app_querydetails set aq_status=?,aq_closeddate=sysdate,aq_closedby=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?

select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,'' as desc1 from users where usr_avail='a' and usr_id in (select dev_fromusrid from dev_appmailbox where dev_appno='^' and (dev_mailtype='C' or dev_mailtype is null)union select dev_tousrid from dev_appmailbox where dev_appno='^' and (dev_mailtype='C' or dev_mailtype is null)) and usr_orgcode=^

select usr_id, usr_fname, user_designation, usr_class,cbs_static_data_desc as desc1 from users,cbs_staticdata where usr_avail='a' and cbs_static_data_id='130' and cbs_static_data_code=usr_rlpftype and usr_id in (select dev_fromusrid from dev_appmailbox where dev_appno='^' and (dev_mailtype='C' or dev_mailtype is null)union select dev_tousrid from dev_appmailbox where dev_appno='^' and (dev_mailtype='C' or dev_mailtype is null)) and usr_orgcode=^
delete from COM_FINANCIAL where FIN_APPNO =?
insert into COM_FINANCIAL(FIN_APPNO,FIN_YEAR,FIN_ROWID,FIN_AUDIT,FIN_UNAUDIT,FIN_ESTIMATED,FIN_PROJECTION,FIN_SLNO) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into PERM_TERMSANDCOND(PERM_TERMAPPNO, PERM_TERMID, PERM_TERMSCONTENT, PERM_TERMSDEL,PERM_TERMSTYPE)values(?,?,?,?,?)
select NVL(max(PERM_TERMID),0)+1 as snomax from PERM_TERMSANDCOND where PERM_TERMAPPNO='^'
insert into PERM_TERMSANDCOND(PERM_TERMAPPNO, PERM_TERMID, PERM_TERMSCONTENT, PERM_TERMSDEL,PERM_TERMPRINT,PERM_TERMSTYPE)values(?,?,?,?,'Y',?)
update PERM_TERMSANDCOND set PERM_TERMSCONTENT=? where PERM_TERMAPPNO=? and PERM_TERMID = ?
update PERM_TERMSANDCOND set PERM_TERMSDEL = ?,PERM_TERMSDELCOMM=? where PERM_TERMAPPNO=? and PERM_TERMID = ?
update PERM_TERMSANDCOND set PERM_TERMPRINT=? where PERM_TERMAPPNO=? and PERM_TERMID = ?
select PERM_TERMID,PERM_TERMSCONTENT,PERM_TERMPRINT,PERM_TERMSTYPE from PERM_TERMSANDCOND where PERM_TERMAPPNO='^' and PERM_TERMSDEL!='Y' order by PERM_TERMID
select PERM_TERMSCONTENT, PERM_TERMSDELCOMM, PERM_TERMID from PERM_TERMSANDCOND where PERM_TERMAPPNO='^' and PERM_TERMSDEL='Y' order by PERM_TERMID
update PERM_TERMSANDCOND set PERM_TERMSDEL='N' where PERM_TERMID=? and PERM_TERMAPPNO=?
insert into PERM_FIN_YEAR (PERM_FIN_SNO,PERM_FIN_APPNO,PERM_FIN_FINTYPE,PERM_FIN_FINYEAR,PERM_AMTTYPE) values (?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
delete from PERM_FIN_YEAR where PERM_FIN_APPNO=?
select PERM_FIN_APPNO from PERM_FIN_YEAR where PERM_FIN_APPNO='^'

select FIN_APPNO,FIN_YEAR,FIN_ROWID,FIN_AUDIT,FIN_UNAUDIT,FIN_ESTIMATED,FIN_PROJECTION,FIN_SLNO,yr.PERM_FIN_FINTYPE from PERM_FIN_YEAR yr left outer join COM_FINANCIAL f on yr.PERM_FIN_FINYEAR=f.FIN_YEAR where FIN_APPNO='^' and FIN_ROWID='^' and f.FIN_APPNO=yr.PERM_FIN_APPNO order by PERM_FIN_SNO
select PERM_FIN_SNO,PERM_FIN_APPNO,PERM_FIN_FINTYPE,to_char(PERM_FIN_FINYEAR,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERM_FIN_FINYEAR,PERM_AMTTYPE from PERM_FIN_YEAR Where PERM_FIN_APPNO='^' order by PERM_FIN_SNO

select DEV_FROMUSRID||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname as fromusrname, DEV_TOUSRID||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname as tousername,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT, to_char(DEV_SENTDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as sentdate,DEV_MAILTYPE, DEV_FROMUSRID, DEV_TOUSRID from DEV_APPMAILBOX left join users usr1 on DEV_FROMUSRID=usr1.usr_id,users usr2 where DEV_APPNO like '^' and DEV_TOUSRID=usr2.usr_id order by DEV_SENTDATE
insert into PERM_PROPOSALFLOW (PERM_PF_NAME,PERM_PF_DESIGNATION,PERM_PF_USERID,PERM_PF_APPNO,PERM_PF_SNO) values(?,?,?,?,?)
select PERM_PF_NAME,PERM_PF_DESIGNATION,PERM_PF_USERID,PERM_PF_APPNO,PERM_PF_SNO from PERM_PROPOSALFLOW where PERM_PF_APPNO='^' order by PERM_PF_SNO asc
update PERM_PROPOSALFLOW set PERM_PF_NAME=? , PERM_PF_DESIGNATION=? ,PERM_PF_USERID=? where PERM_PF_APPNO=? and PERM_PF_SNO=?
delete from PERM_PROPOSALFLOW where PERM_PF_APPNO=? and PERM_PF_SNO=?
select NVL(max(PERM_PF_SNO),0)+1 as maxid from PERM_PROPOSALFLOW where PERM_PF_APPNO='^'
delete from PERM_BASIC_INFO where PERM_APPNO=?

insert into PERM_BASIC_INFO (PERM_APPNO,PERM_PROP_SUBMITTED,PERM_SANC_DEPT,PERM_SANC_AUTH,PERM_SANC_INTIMATE,PERM_HANDLING_CHARGE,PERM_REFNO,PERM_SANC_DATE,PERM_SANC_BRANCH,PERM_PER_BRANCH) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)

select PERM_APPNO,PERM_PROP_SUBMITTED,PERM_SANC_DEPT,PERM_SANC_AUTH,PERM_SANC_INTIMATE,PERM_HANDLING_CHARGE,PERM_REFNO,to_char(PERM_SANC_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERM_SANC_DATE ,PERM_SANC_BRANCH,PERM_PER_BRANCH from PERM_BASIC_INFO where PERM_APPNO='^'
update PERM_BASIC_INFO set PERM_PROP_SUBMITTED=? ,PERM_SANC_DEPT=?,PERM_SANC_AUTH=?,PERM_SANC_INTIMATE=?,PERM_HANDLING_CHARGE=?,PERM_REFNO=?,PERM_SANC_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where PERM_APPNO=?

select DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,PG_APPLADDRESS,PG_CONSTITUTION,PG_MANAGEMENTDET,PG_ACTIVITY,to_char(PG_ESTBDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PG_ESTBDATE,PG_GRPCRCN_POT, PG_EMPLOYERNAME,PG_NOOFEMP_SALDRAW,PG_NAMEOFTRUSTEE,PG_EXCESSINCOME,to_char(PG_DEALINGSINCE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PG_DEALINGSINCE,PG_EXSTFAC_COLSEC, PG_ITRETURNS_TAXPAID,PG_PRESENT_NATURE,PG_PRESENT_LOANAMT,PG_PRESENT_INTEREST,PG_PRESENT_PERIOD,PG_PRESENT_PURPOSE,PG_PROPFAC_SEC_PRIME, PG_PROPFAC_SEC_COLLATERAL,PG_RSN_SWITCH,PG_ACC_INTRODBY,PG_LANDCOST,PG_PROMOTCONTRIB,PG_PERCENTTOTAL1,PG_CONSTRUCTIONCOST,PG_ADVANCEAMT,PG_PERCENTTOTAL2, PG_LOANFROMKBL,PG_PERCENTTOTAL3,PG_TOTPROJECTCOST,PG_TOTMEANSOFFINANCE,PG_PERCENTTOTAL4,PG_SRC_MARGINMONEY,PG_PERIOD_SOUGHT,PG_HOLIDAYPERIOD,PG_SRC_REPAYMENT, PG_TOTAREA,PG_TOTBUILTUPAREA,PG_FLOORDETAILS,PG_TOTCONSTCOST,PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_RF,PG_AVGSELLINGPRICE_CP,PG_PROJECTEDRENT,PG_CONF_AUTH_CONSTBUILD, PG_SCHEME_GUIDELINES,PG_DEVPERM_SOUGHTOTHERS,PG_EARLIERCONCESSION,PG_JUSTF_SPECCONSID,PG_CONCESSION_RECOMMENDED,PG_CONCESSION_JUSTIF, PG_DETOFVISIT,PG_PARTYBG_EARPROJECTS,PG_DEVOBSERVED,PG_WHTPERM_EXTENDED,PG_TA_BRTOT_ACS,PG_TA_BRTOT_AMT,PG_TA_NPA_ACS,PG_TA_NPA_AMT,PG_TA_NPAPER_ACS, PG_TA_NPAPER_AMT,PG_SL_BRTOT_ACS,PG_SL_BRTOT_AMT,PG_SL_NPA_ACS,PG_SL_NPA_AMT,PG_SL_NPAPER_ACS,PG_SL_NPAPER_AMT,PG_LE_BRTOT_ACS,PG_LE_BRTOT_AMT, PG_LE_NPA_ACS,PG_LE_NPA_AMT,PG_LE_NPAPER_ACS,PG_LE_NPAPER_AMT,PG_ANYOTHER_INFO,PG_RECOMMEND_BRANCH, PG_APPLADDRESS1,PG_APPLADDRESS2,PG_CITYCODE,PG_DISTCODE,PG_STATECODE,PG_PINCODE,PG_PHONE_NUMBER,PG_MAIL_ID,to_char(PG_CONSTITUTED_ON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CONSTITUTED_ON, PG_APPL_TITLE,to_char(PG_INCEXPEN_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_INCEXPEN_DATE,PG_BOR_RATING,to_char(PG_RATINGDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_RATINGDATE, PG_CIBIL_SCORE,PG_CIBIL_DETAILS,to_char(PG_CIBIL_REPORTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CIBIL_REPORTEDDATE,PG_CRIF_SCORE,PG_CRIF_DETAILS,to_char(PG_CRIF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PG_CRIF_DATE, PG_PRIME_SECVAL,PG_COLLATERAL_SECVAL from DEV_PERMISSION_GIST where DEV_APPNO='^'
insert into perm_assessment (PERM_APPNO,PERM_DESCRIPTION,PERM_SUB_DESCRIPTION,PERM_MAXMARKS,PERM_BRANCH_VALUE,PERM_HO_VALUE,PERM_SNO) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from perm_assessment where PERM_APPNO=?
select PERM_TERMSCONTENT,PERM_TERMSDEL from PERM_TERMSANDCOND where PERM_TERMAPPNO='^' and perm_termprint='Y' and PERM_TERMSDEL='N' order by PERM_TERMID
select PERM_APPNO,PERM_DESCRIPTION,PERM_SUB_DESCRIPTION,PERM_MAXMARKS,PERM_BRANCH_VALUE,PERM_HO_VALUE from PERM_ASSESSMENT where PERM_APPNO='^'
select PERM_RANGE from PERM_ASSESSMENT_RANGEPARAM where PERM_ID='^' and PERM_SNO='^' order by PERM_SNO
select perm_type_description from perm_assessment_master where perm_type_id='^'

select dev_toflowpoint,to_char(dev_sentdate,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as dev_sentdate,prd_minclass, to_char(prd_duration+dev_sentdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dueon_date from DEV_APPMAILBOX,prd_solkpowflowpoint where dev_appno='^' and dev_sentdate=(select max(dev_sentdate) from DEV_APPMAILBOX where dev_appno='^') and prd_code='3' and prd_flowpoint=dev_toflowpoint
update appl_deviation set dev_processdate=sysdate,dev_appstatus=?,dev_processedby=?,dev_processedorgcode=?,dev_sanccmts=? where dev_appno=?
update appl_deviation set dev_appstatus='op', dev_processdate=null, dev_processedorgcode=null, dev_processedby=null where dev_appno=?
update appl_deviation set dev_undoby=?,dev_undo_flag=? where dev_appno=?
select org_head,usr_function from appl_deviation, users, organisations where org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_id=dev_applholder and dev_appno='^'
update appl_deviation set dev_applholder=? where dev_appno = ?

select pg.PG_APPLIANTNAME,(select sum(DEV_PRESENT_LOANAMT) from DEV_PERMGIST_LOANREQ where DEV_PRESENT_APPNO=ad.DEV_APPNO) as reqloanamt,pg.PG_SCHEME_GUIDELINES,to_char(DEV_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DEV_PROCESSDATE,org.org_code,org.ORG_SCODE ,org.ORG_NAME,org.ORG_MANAGER_CTNUM,ad.DEV_SUBTYPE from APPL_DEVIATION ad,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST pg,ORGANISATIONS org where ad.DEV_APPNO=pg.DEV_APPNO and ad.DEV_ORGSCODE=org.ORG_SCODE and ad.DEV_APPNO='^'
select FIN_APPNO,to_char(fin_year,'yyyy'),fin_rowid from COM_FINANCIAL where fin_appno='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and fin_rowid='^'
update COM_FINANCIAL set fin_audit=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_appno =?
update COM_FINANCIAL set FIN_UNAUDIT=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_appno =?
update COM_FINANCIAL set FIN_ESTIMATED=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_appno =?
update COM_FINANCIAL set FIN_PROJECTION=? where to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=? and fin_rowid=? and fin_appno =?

select prd_approval,prd_reject,decode(per_orgapp,'A','1','D','2','R','3','C','4','0') as per_orgapp,decode(per_orgrej,'A','1','D','2','R','3','C','4','0') as per_orgrej from permission_master where per_id='^'

select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' and demo_type='a' union select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'

select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, (case when PERAPP_CONSTITUTION='01' then (case perapp_sex when 'F' then 'Y' else 'N' end) else (case PERAPP_STAKEHELD_WOMEN when 'Y' then 'Y' else 'N' end) end ) as owned_by_women from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' and demo_type='a' union select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, (case when PERAPP_CONSTITUTION='01' then (case perapp_sex when 'F' then 'Y' else 'N' end) else (case PERAPP_STAKEHELD_WOMEN when 'Y' then 'Y' else 'N' end) end ) as owned_by_women from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
SELECT FACILITY_SNO FROM FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^'
select loan_paramval from other_parameters where LOAN_PARAMSLNO='117'

select perapp_id,(select cbs_static_cgtmse from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION_CGTMSE from PERAPPLICANT where perapp_id= '^'

select DEMO_APPID,(select cbs_static_cgtmse from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION_CGTMSE from PERAPPLICANT,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPID = perapp_id and demo_type in ('a') and DEMO_APPNO= '^' order by demo_type
select cbs_static_cgtmse from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE='^'
select loan_paramslno,loan_paramval from other_parameters where loan_paramslno in ('116') and LOAN_PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG ='Y'

select TXNDET_APPNO,TXNDET_CREATEDDATE,TXNDET_CREATEDBY,TXNDET_TXNID,to_char(TXNDET_TXNDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_TXNDATE,TXNDET_TXNAMOUNT,TXNDET_APPL_STATUS,TXNDET_APPL_REFNO,to_char(TXNDET_APPL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_APPL_DATE,TXNDET_CGPAN_NO, to_char(TXNDET_APPROVAL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_APPROVAL_DATE,TXNDET_REJECTION_REMARKS,TXNDET_PAYMENT_ACKNO,to_char(TXNDET_GUA_STARTDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_GUA_STARTDATE,to_char(TXNDET_GUA_ENDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_GUA_ENDDATE,TXNDET_MODIFIEDDATE,TXNDET_MODIFIEDBY,TXNDET_FAC_SNO, TXNDET_CRDT_AMT,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSED,TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_AMT,to_char(TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT, to_char(TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT, to_char(TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB, to_char(TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB, TXNDET_CRDT_FUNDBASED,TXNDET_CRDT_NONFUNDBASED,TXNDET_OUTSTD_FUND,to_char(TXNDET_OUTFB_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTFB_DT,TXNDET_OUTSTD_NONFUND,to_char(TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT, TXNDET_GUARANTEE_FEE_AMOUNT,TXNDET_TAXABLE_AMOUNT,TXNDET_IGST_RATE,TXNDET_IGST_AMOUNT,TXNDET_CGST_RATE,TXNDET_CGST_AMOUNT,TXNDET_SGST_RATE,TXNDET_SGST_AMOUNT,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSEDWC,to_char(TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC, to_char(TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC from WORFLOW_CGTMSE_TXNDETAILS where TXNDET_APPNO='^' and TXNDET_FAC_SNO='^'

insert into WORFLOW_CGTMSE_TXNDETAILS( TXNDET_APPNO,TXNDET_CREATEDDATE,TXNDET_CREATEDBY,TXNDET_TXNID,TXNDET_TXNDATE,TXNDET_TXNAMOUNT,TXNDET_APPL_STATUS,TXNDET_APPL_REFNO,TXNDET_APPL_DATE, TXNDET_CGPAN_NO,TXNDET_APPROVAL_DATE,TXNDET_REJECTION_REMARKS,TXNDET_PAYMENT_ACKNO,TXNDET_GUA_STARTDATE,TXNDET_GUA_ENDDATE,TXNDET_FAC_SNO,TXNDET_CRDT_AMT,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSED, TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_AMT,TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT,TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT,TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB,TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSEDWC,TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC,TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC,TXNDET_CRDT_FUNDBASED, TXNDET_CRDT_NONFUNDBASED,TXNDET_OUTSTD_FUND,TXNDET_OUTFB_DT,TXNDET_OUTSTD_NONFUND,TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT, TXNDET_GUARANTEE_FEE_AMOUNT,TXNDET_TAXABLE_AMOUNT,TXNDET_IGST_RATE,TXNDET_IGST_AMOUNT,TXNDET_CGST_RATE,TXNDET_CGST_AMOUNT,TXNDET_SGST_RATE,TXNDET_SGST_AMOUNT) values(?,sysdate,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?, ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?, ?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

SELECT DEMO_COMAPPID,(SELECT cbs_static_cgtmse from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTION) as AS_PERAPP_CONSTITUTION_CGTMSE from PERAPPLICANT,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS WHERE DEMO_COMAPPID=PERAPP_ID AND DEMO_APPNO='^'

SELECT LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_REQTERMS,LOAN_MCLRTYPE,LOAN_MODINTRATE,LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT,case LOAN_PERIODICITY when 'm' then 'MONTHLY' when 'q' then 'Quarterly' when 'h' then 'HALF' when 'y' then 'Yearly' else ' ' end as LOAN_PERIODICITY,TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS APP_PROCESSDATE,APP_NO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,TO_CHAR(LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,TO_CHAR(LOAN_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS LOAN_DUEDATE,L.LOAN_BASERATE,L.LOAN_INTTYPE,L.LOAN_INTRATE,TO_CHAR(MONDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS MONDATE FROM PER_LOAN_SECURE P,LOANDETAILS L,APPLICATIONS A WHERE P.LOAN_APPNO=L.LOAN_APPNO and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO AND A.APP_NO='^'
SELECT STAT_DATA_DESC1,STAT_DATA_DESC FROM STATIC_DATA WHERE STAT_DATA_ID='^' AND STAT_DATA_DESC='^' order by STAT_DATA_SNO

update WORFLOW_CGTMSE_TXNDETAILS set TXNDET_TXNID=?,TXNDET_TXNDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_TXNAMOUNT=?,TXNDET_APPL_STATUS=?,TXNDET_APPL_REFNO=?,TXNDET_APPL_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_CGPAN_NO=?,TXNDET_APPROVAL_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_REJECTION_REMARKS=?, TXNDET_PAYMENT_ACKNO=?,TXNDET_GUA_STARTDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_GUA_ENDDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_MODIFIEDDATE=sysdate,TXNDET_MODIFIEDBY=?,TXNDET_CRDT_AMT=?,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSED=?,TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_AMT=?,TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSEDWC=?,TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_CRDT_FUNDBASED=?,TXNDET_CRDT_NONFUNDBASED=?,TXNDET_OUTSTD_FUND=?,TXNDET_OUTFB_DT=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TXNDET_OUTSTD_NONFUND=?,TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), TXNDET_GUARANTEE_FEE_AMOUNT=?,TXNDET_TAXABLE_AMOUNT=?,TXNDET_IGST_RATE=?,TXNDET_IGST_AMOUNT=?,TXNDET_CGST_RATE=?,TXNDET_CGST_AMOUNT=?,TXNDET_SGST_RATE=?,TXNDET_SGST_AMOUNT=? where TXNDET_APPNO=? and TXNDET_FAC_SNO=?
select COMAPP_CBSID,COMAPP_DIV_NAME from COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where COMAPP_ID= DEMO_APPID and DEMO_APPNO='^' and DEMO_TYPE='a' and COMAPP_CBSID='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE in (^)
select NVL(max(PM_SUBCATID),0)+1 as snomax from PMAY_Master

insert into PMAY_Master(PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATEGORYFAMILY_INCOME,PM_FEMALE_OWNERSHIP,PM_LOAN_SUBSIDY,PM_INTEREST_SUBSIDY,PM_MAXLOAN_TENOR, PM_AREA,PM_NRI_BORROWER,PM_ELIGIBILITY_HOMEEXT,PM_FROM_DATE,PM_FINISH_DATE,PM_MAX_SUBSIDY,PM_AADHAR_MANDATORY,PM_SUBCATID,PM_MAIN_CATEGORY,PM_ACTIVE_TYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)

update PMAY_Master set PM_SUBCATEGORY=?,PM_SUBCATEGORYFAMILY_INCOME=?,PM_FEMALE_OWNERSHIP=?,PM_LOAN_SUBSIDY=?,PM_INTEREST_SUBSIDY=?,PM_MAXLOAN_TENOR=?, PM_AREA=?,PM_NRI_BORROWER=?,PM_ELIGIBILITY_HOMEEXT=?,PM_FROM_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),PM_FINISH_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),PM_MAX_SUBSIDY=?,PM_AADHAR_MANDATORY=?,PM_MAIN_CATEGORY=?,PM_ACTIVE_TYPE=? where PM_SUBCATID=?
select PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATID from PMAY_Master where PM_MAIN_CATEGORY='^'
select PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATID from PMAY_Master where PM_SUBCATID='^'
delete from PMAY_Master where PM_SUBCATID=?

select PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATEGORYFAMILY_INCOME,PM_FEMALE_OWNERSHIP,PM_LOAN_SUBSIDY,PM_INTEREST_SUBSIDY,PM_MAXLOAN_TENOR,PM_AREA,PM_NRI_BORROWER,PM_ELIGIBILITY_HOMEEXT,to_char(PM_FROM_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PM_FROM_DATE,to_char(PM_FINISH_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PM_FINISH_DATE,PM_MAX_SUBSIDY,PM_AADHAR_MANDATORY,PM_SUBCATID,PM_MAIN_CATEGORY,PM_ACTIVE_TYPE from PMAY_Master where PM_MAIN_CATEGORY='^' and PM_SUBCATID='^'

select COM_BANKSCHEME,FACILITY_SNO,com_facility_loantype,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_TENOR,COM_FACNATURE,COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,FACILITY_ACCOUNTOPEN,com_facility_emischeme,TO_CHAR(FAC_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,COM_FOREXFAC from FACILITIES,facility_corp where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and facility_sno='^' and facility_code=COM_FACID
select Scheme_ID, Scheme_RULENO, Document_CONTENT from setschemedocument where Scheme_ID='^' and scheme_active='E'
insert into facility_chklist (FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,SCHEME_RULENO,DOC_MANDATORY,doc_REASON,DOC_EXPECTED_DD,FAC_BANKSCHEME) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)
delete from facility_chklist where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?

select f.SCHEME_RULENO,DOC_MANDATORY,DOC_REASON,to_char(DOC_EXPECTED_DD,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DOC_EXPECTED_DD,fac_bankscheme,Document_CONTENT from FACILITY_CHKLIST f,setschemedocument s where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and Scheme_ID=fac_bankscheme and s.Scheme_RULENO=f.SCHEME_RULENO

insert into CORP_CGTMSE (CG_SNO,CG_APPLICATION_NO,CG_PROPOSALNO,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT,CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED,CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY,CG_WC_ASSESSED, CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO,CG_OTHERIDNAME,CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY, CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN,CG_CREATED_DATE,CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge,CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_ISSUEDATE,cg_ourbank_coverage,CG_DEFAULTER,CG_Existing,CG_CIBIL_MSME_RANK,CG_REPAY_YEAR,CG_EDUCATION,CG_NCGTC,CG_TYPEOFLOAN,CG_UNIT_ENGAGED) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select CG_SNO,CG_APPLICATION_NO,CG_PROPOSALNO,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT,CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED, CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY,CG_WC_ASSESSED, CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO, CG_OTHERIDNAME,CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY,CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN, to_char(CG_CREATED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CG_CREATED_DATE,CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge, CG_INTERNAL_RATING,to_char(CG_ISSUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CG_ISSUEDATE,cg_ourbank_coverage,CG_DEFAULTER,CG_Existing,CG_CIBIL_MSME_RANK,CG_REPAY_YEAR,CG_EDUCATION,CG_NCGTC,CG_TYPEOFLOAN,CG_TC_PROMOENTITY,CG_UNIT_ENGAGED from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_SNO='^'

select COMAPP_DIV_APPID,COMAPP_DIV_NAME,COMAPP_CBSID,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_CHF_NPA from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID in (select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^') and COMAPP_DIV_APPID='^'
select CG_PROPOSALNO,CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_OURBANK_COVERAGE from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_SNO='^'
delete from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO=? and CG_SNO=?

select sec_name,ap.APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,ap.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION from app_securitydetails ap,security_master sm,cus_securities cs where app_sec_appno='^' and ap.app_sec_securitytype='^' and ap.app_sec_loantype='^' and ap.app_sec_secid= cs.cus_sec_id and cs.cus_sec_type= sm.sec_id and cs.CUS_SEC_TYPE in ('^')
select au_usr_id,au_ip_address from available_users where au_usr_id='^'
select au_usr_id, au_usr_name from available_users where upper(au_usr_id) like upper('%^') and upper(au_usr_name) like upper('^')
delete from available_users where au_usr_id=?
select COM_BANKSCHEME,FACILITY_SNO from FACILITIES,FACILITY_CORP where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and COM_FACID=FACILITY_CODE order by FACILITY_SNO
select DEMO_APPNO from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS where DEMO_APPNO='^' and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=COMAPP_ID and COMAPP_CBSID='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE in (^)
select PERAPP_ID FROM PERAPPLICANT, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where PERAPP_ID = DEMO_APPID AND demo_appno='^' and demo_type in ('a','c','o','g') and PERAPP_SEX='F'
select PERAPP_AADHAAR from PERAPPLICANT,per_demographics where perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and PERAPP_AADHAAR is null
select app_no from applications where app_no in (select FACILITY_OLDAPPNO from facilities where facility_appno='^') order by app_processdate desc
insert into COM_COMMENTS (COM_APPNO,COM_SNO,COM_COMMENTS,COM_PAGE) select ?,COM_SNO,COM_COMMENTS,COM_PAGE from COM_COMMENTS where COM_APPNO=? and COM_PAGE=?

insert into COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN(COM_SHP_APPNO,COM_SHP_SNO,COM_SHP_SHARESHELDBY,COM_SHP_NOFSHARES,COM_SHP_FACVALUE, COM_SHP_AMOUNT,COM_SHP_PERCENT,COM_SHP_MRKTVALOFSHARES,COM_SHAREHOLDERNAME) select ?,COM_SHP_SNO,COM_SHP_SHARESHELDBY,COM_SHP_NOFSHARES,COM_SHP_FACVALUE, COM_SHP_AMOUNT,COM_SHP_PERCENT,COM_SHP_MRKTVALOFSHARES,COM_SHAREHOLDERNAME from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO=?

insert into com_companydetails(COM_COMPDTAPPNO,COM_COMPDTID,COM_COMPDTTYPE,COM_COMPDTFNAME,COM_COMPDTLNAME,COM_COMPDTMNAME,COM_COMPDTDOB,COM_COMPDTADDRESS1,COM_COMPDTADDRESS2,COM_COMPDTCITY,COM_COMPDTSTATE,COM_COMPDTPIN,COM_COMPDTPHONE,COM_COMPDTFAX,COM_COMPDTEMAIL,COM_COMDTPERSHARE,COM_COMPDTSHAREHELD,COM_COMPDTNETWORTH,COM_COMPDATE,CAPCONTRIBUTION,COM_PERCENT,COM_COMPDSEX,COM_COMPDACA,COM_COMPDEXP,COM_COMPDSTKHOLDER,COM_BACKGROUND,COM_FACEVALUE,COM_COMPDTDESIGNATION,COM_COMPDTDIN,COM_COMPDTAPPID,COM_OLDLAPSID,COM_COMPRELATIONSHIP,COM_COMPRATINGGRADE1,COM_COMPRATINGASON1,COM_COMPRATINGTYPE1,COM_COMPRATINGGRADE2,COM_COMPRATINGASON2,COM_COMPRATINGTYPE2,COM_COMPBORRNAME,COM_CBSRELATIONTYPE,COM_COMPDTTYPE_BACKUP,COM_FACILITY_SNO,COM_FAC_DOCPRINT,COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED) select ?,COM_COMPDTID,COM_COMPDTTYPE,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,COM_COMPDTMNAME,perapp_dob,con_comaddr1,con_comaddr2,con_comcity,con_comstate,con_comzip,con_comphone,con_comfax,con_email,COM_COMDTPERSHARE,COM_COMPDTSHAREHELD,COM_COMPDTNETWORTH,COM_COMPDATE,CAPCONTRIBUTION,COM_PERCENT,perapp_sex,COM_COMPDACA,COM_COMPDEXP,COM_COMPDSTKHOLDER,COM_BACKGROUND,COM_FACEVALUE,COM_COMPDTDESIGNATION,COM_COMPDTDIN,perapp_id,COM_OLDLAPSID,COM_COMPRELATIONSHIP,COM_COMPRATINGGRADE1,COM_COMPRATINGASON1,COM_COMPRATINGTYPE1,COM_COMPRATINGGRADE2,COM_COMPRATINGASON2,COM_COMPRATINGTYPE2,COM_COMPBORRNAME,COM_CBSRELATIONTYPE,COM_COMPDTTYPE_BACKUP,?,COM_FAC_DOCPRINT,COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED from com_companydetails,perapplicant, cust_contactinfo where COM_COMPDTAPPNO=? and COM_FACILITY_SNO=? and perapp_oldid=com_oldlapsid and perapp_id=con_appid and (upper(perapp_renew)='N' or perapp_renew is null)

insert into app_securitydetails(APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP,APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_PROPOSAL_TYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,(select cus_owner_laps_id from CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP where CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and cus_owner_sno='1'),CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL,APP_SEC_FACTYPE, APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION, (select cus_owner_laps_id from CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP where CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and cus_owner_sno='1'), APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW, APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_PROPOSAL_TYPE, CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and cus_sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_loantype='P'
select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from com_companydetails,perapplicant where com_compdtappno='^' and perapp_id=com_compdtappid and perapp_profilestatus<>'Y'

select app_sec_customerid,com_oldlapsid,app_sec_secid,(select perapp_cbsid from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=app_sec_customerid and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') as cbsid,(select perapp_fname from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=app_sec_customerid and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') as name from app_securitydetails left join com_companydetails on COM_COMPDTAPPNO=app_sec_appno and COM_FACILITY_SNO=app_sec_facsno and com_oldlapsid=app_sec_customerid where app_sec_appno='^' and com_oldlapsid is null and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='A'
select cus_sec_id from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and cus_sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID and CUS_RELEASEFLAG in ('^')

delete from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno=? and APP_SEC_SECID in (select cus_sec_id from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and cus_sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID and CUS_RELEASEFLAG='Y') and app_sec_loantype='P'
select CG_PROPOSALNO from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_SNO='^'
select org_level,org_code,ORG_NAME,DEV_CBSID from APPL_DEVIATION,ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SCODE=dev_orgscode and dev_appno='^'
select indinfo_family_income from per_demographics,individual_info where demo_appid=indinfo_appid and demo_type='a' and demo_appno='^'

select cre_appno,to_char(RATING_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as RATING_YEAR,RATING_YEARTYPE,CRE_WEIGHT,DEMO_FINSTANDARD,app_processdate,RATING_YEAR as RATING_YEAR1 from creditscoring,com_demographics,applications where cre_appno=demo_appno and DEMO_COMAPPID='^' and demo_appno=app_no and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' and cre_rmdflag='Y' and app_status in ('pa','ca') union select cre_appno,to_char(RATING_YEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as RATING_YEAR,RATING_YEARTYPE,CRE_WEIGHT,to_char(FIN_FINID),FIN_PROCESSEDON,RATING_YEAR as RATING_YEAR1 from creditscoring,fin_rating,perapplicant where cre_appno=FIN_RATAPPNO and fin_cbsid=perapp_cbsid and perapp_oldid='^' and cre_rmdflag='Y' and FIN_STATUS in ('PA','cA') order by RATING_YEAR1 desc
update rat_data_rating set rat_rmdprint=? where RDR_APPNO=? and RDR_SNO=?
delete from PERM_RECOMMENDATION where PERM_APPNO=?
insert into PERM_RECOMMENDATION(PERM_APPNO,PERM_COMMENTS1,PERM_COMMENTS2,PERM_COMMENTS3) values (?,?,?,?)
select PERM_COMMENTS1,PERM_COMMENTS2,PERM_COMMENTS3 from PERM_RECOMMENDATION where PERM_APPNO='^'

select COM_FACNATURE,FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY,com_factype,FACILITY_PROPOSED,FACILITY_EXISTING,COM_FACCODE,facility_sel_type from FACILITY_CORP,FACILITIES where COM_FACID=FACILITY_Code and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'

select case CG_ASISTBANK when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_ASISTBANK,case CG_NPA when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_NPA,case CG_MIC_ENTP when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_TYPEOFLOAN ,CG_CGPAN,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT ,case CG_MINCOMMUITY when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_MINCOMMUITY ,CG_SOCIALCATGRY, CG_LEGALID ,CG_LEGALIDNO,case CG_NEW_UNIT when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_CHECKBX ,case CG_NEW_UNIT_WO when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,case CG_MSE_UNIT when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_MSE_UNIT ,case CG_COLSEC when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_COLSEC,case CG_PRV_CGP when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_PRV_CGP, case CG_THIRDPARTY when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_THIRDPARTY,case CG_JOINTFINANCE when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,case CG_ARTISAN_CC when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_ARTISAN_CC, case CG_GF_ASF when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,case CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY , case CG_NPA when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_NPA ,CG_OTHERIDNAME,CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_PREV_CGPAN,case CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' 'end as CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY,CG_WC_ASSESSED ,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,case CG_APPDET_NPA when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' else ' ' end as CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,decode(cg_firstcharge,'Y','YES','N','No','') as cg_firstcharge,decode(CG_INTERNAL_RATING,'Y','YES','N','NO','') as CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,to_char(CG_ISSUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CG_ISSUEDATE,cg_ourbank_coverage,decode(CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,'Y','YES','N','NO','') as CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_CIBIL_MSME_RANK,CG_REPAY_YEAR,CG_LOANTYPE,CG_UNIT_ENGAGED,CG_NCGTC,CG_EDUCATION from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_SNO='^'

select sec_name,ap.APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,ap.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION from app_securitydetails ap,security_master sm,cus_securities cs where app_sec_appno='^' and ap.app_sec_securitytype='^' and ap.app_sec_loantype='^' and ap.app_sec_secid= cs.cus_sec_id and cs.cus_sec_type= sm.sec_id and cs.CUS_SEC_TYPE in ('^') and ap.app_sec_facsno='^'

select FACILITY_ID,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,facility_inttype,case FACILITY_PERINSTALL when 'm' then 'MONTHLY' when 'q'then 'Quarterly' when 'h'then 'Half-Yearly' else ' ' end as FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_MONTHS,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE, TO_CHAR(FACILITY_OSASON,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FACILITY_OSASON,TO_CHAR(FAC_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS APP_PROCESSDATE, CBS_ACCOUNTNO,to_char(FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,TO_CHAR(FACILITY_DUEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FACILITY_DUEDATE,FACILITY_REPAYTYPE from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'

SELECT LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_REQTERMS,LOAN_MCLRTYPE,LOAN_MODINTRATE,LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT,case LOAN_PERIODICITY when 'm' then 'MONTHLY' when 'q' then 'Quarterly' when 'h' then 'HALF' when 'y' then 'Yearly' else ' ' end as LOAN_PERIODICITY,TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS APP_PROCESSDATE,APP_NO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,TO_CHAR(LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LOAN_RELEASEDATEOFMCLR,TO_CHAR(LOAN_DUEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LOAN_DUEDATE FROM PER_LOAN_SECURE P,LOANDETAILS L,APPLICATIONS A WHERE P.LOAN_APPNO=L.LOAN_APPNO and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO AND A.APP_NO='^'

select org_scode,d.perapp_id,perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'DD/MM/YYYY') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,d.perapp_bank, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment,'a' as app_type, to_char(app_cpcdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, e.con_comaddr1,e.con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perapp_networthason,d.PERAPP_CBSID,d.PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,d.PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_AADHAAR from applications a, organisations b, COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and c.DEMO_APPNO = a.app_no and c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID = d.perapp_id and c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=e.con_appid

select PERAPP_NETWORTH,PERAPP_FNAME as fullname,COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from PERAPPLICANT,COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_COMPDTAPPID=PERAPP_ID and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and com_facility_sno='^' and COM_COMPDTTYPE='G'
select usr_id,usr_orgcode,USR_RLPFTYPE,USR_DEPARTMENT,org_level,org_scode from users,organisations where org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_orgcode like '^' and USR_CLASS between ^ and ^ ^

insert into dev_permission_gist(DEV_APPNO,PG_APPL_TITLE,PG_APPLIANTNAME,PG_EMPLOYERNAME,PG_CONSTITUTION,PG_DEALINGSINCE,PG_ACC_INTRODBY,PG_ACTIVITY ,PG_PHONE_NUMBER,PG_MAIL_ID,PG_APPLADDRESS1,PG_APPLADDRESS2,PG_PINCODE,PG_CITYCODE,PG_DISTCODE,PG_STATECODE,PG_MANAGEMENTDET,PG_EXISINGFAC_BOWID,PG_NAMEOFTRUSTEE)values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select PER_ID,PER_NAME,PER_STATUS from PERMISSION_MASTER where PER_ID='^'
select perapp_oldid,upper(perapp_fname) as perappname from perapplicant where perapp_id ='^'

SELECT CUS_SEC_ID,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,cus_sec_security_description,(select perapp_fname from perapplicant where perapp_oldid='^' and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') as appname FROM CUS_SECURITIES CST WHERE CST.CUS_SEC_ID IN (SELECT CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID FROM CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP WHERE CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID='^') and cst.cus_sec_statusflag='Y' and cst.cus_releaseflag='N' order by CUS_SEC_ID
select hwc_refno from HW_CIBIL_DETAILS where hwc_appno = '^' and hwc_appid = '^'
delete from HW_CIBIL_DETAILS where hwc_appno = ? and hwc_appid = ?
delete from HW_CIBIL_BLOBDATA where hwc_refno = ?
update per_demographics set demo_cibil=? where demo_appno=? and demo_appid=?
select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from com_companydetails,perapplicant where com_compdtappno='^' and perapp_id=com_compdtappid

update organisations set org_level=?, org_scode=?, org_name=?, org_add1=?, org_add2=?, org_city=?, org_zip=?, org_state=?, org_phone=?, org_fax=?, org_taxid=?, org_trasitid=?, org_url=?, org_micr=?, org_head=?,org_district=?,org_excelupload_flag=? where org_code =?
insert into hw_cibil_userdetails (hu_appno,hu_appid,hu_userid,hu_createddate) values(?,?,?,sysdate)
select 'CIBIL'||lpad(hw_cibil_seq.nextval,14,0)as seqNo from dual
insert into hw_cibil_blobdata (hwc_refno,hwc_cibildata,hwc_bloblength)values(?,?,?)
insert into hw_cibil_details (hwc_appno,hwc_appid,hwc_refNo,hwc_createddate,hwc_sno,hwc_genuserid)values(?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)
update PER_DEMOGRAPHICS set ^=? where demo_appno =? and demo_appid=?
select demo_appid from per_demographics left outer join hw_cibil_details on demo_appid=hwc_appid where demo_appno='^' and hwc_appid is null
select hwc_cibildata,hwc_bloblength from hw_cibil_blobdata where hwc_refno = '^'

SELECT request_status,(case when action='CIBIL' then (DECODE(cibil_status,'FINISH','FINISH','ALREADY PROCESSED INQUIRY','FINISH','ERROR')) else (DECODE(hm_status,'FINISH','FINISH','ALREADY PROCESSED INQUIRY','FINISH','ERROR')) end) AS hm_status, request_id,action FROM hm_los_inquiry hm WHERE request_id=(SELECT MAX(request_id ) FROM hm_los_inquiry WHERE application_id=hm.application_id AND consumer_id=hm.consumer_id) AND application_id='^' AND consumer_id='^'

select demo_appid,perapp_fname as appname, demo_type,demo_relation, demo_includeincome,demo_type||demo_appid as creditappid, perapp_status,DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,perapp_employment,demo_cibil,demo_cibil_score,demo_crif_score from perapplicant,per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_appid=perapp_id and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' order by demo_type
select hwc_refno,sysdate-hwc_createddate as dayDiff from hw_cibil_details where hwc_appno = '^' and hwc_appid = '^' and hwc_sno='^' order by HWC_CREATEDDATE desc

select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC, case a.APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as moduletype, F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(F.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,to_char(FACILITY_PURPOSE) as purpose,f.FACILITY_INTEREST,'' as presentROI,to_char(F.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,'' as Arrears,F.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A, FACILITY_CORP fc,FACILITY_MASTER fm,app_referncenumber ref where F.Borrower_Id='^' And F.Facility_Appno=A.App_No And F.Facility_Group='0' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_HEADFAC=fm.FACILITY_CATID and ref.APP_NO=F.FACILITY_APPNO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and F.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO and FACILITY_RENEW is null) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO in (select distinct (CBS_ACCOUNTNO) from FACILITIES where BORROWER_ID='^' and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null) and f.facility_renew is null union select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC, case a.APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as moduletype, F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(F.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,to_char(FACILITY_PURPOSE) as purpose,f.FACILITY_INTEREST,'' as presentROI,to_char(F.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,'' as Arrears,F.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A , FACILITY_CORP fc,FACILITY_MASTER fm,app_referncenumber ref where F.BORROWER_ID='^' and F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and F.FACILITY_GROUP='0' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_HEADFAC=fm.FACILITY_CATID and ref.APP_NO=F.FACILITY_APPNO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and F.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and f.facility_renew is null

select applicationno,Facility_sno,CAT_NAME,'Retail' as moduletype,CBS_Accountno,LOAN_RECMDAMT,SANCTIONREFNO,APP_PROCESSDATE,purpose,LOAN_MODINTRATE,presentROI,LOAN_DUEDATE,arrears from ( select demo_appno as applicationno,'1' as FACILITY_SNO,pc.CAT_NAME,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,l.LOAN_RECMDAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(app.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,to_char(LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN) as purpose,l.LOAN_MODINTRATE, '' as presentROI,to_char(l.LOAN_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LOAN_DUEDATE,'' as arrears from per_demographics demo, applications app,products p,PRD_CATEGORY pc,LOANDETAILS l,app_referncenumber ref where demo.DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.app_prdcode=p.prd_code and prd_type not in ('pG','pR') and app.APP_STATUS ='pa' and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and p.PRD_CATID=pc.CAT_ID and app.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and ref.APP_NO= app.APP_NO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null and app.APP_RENEW_FLAG != 'P' and APP_PROCESSDATE=(select max(APP_PROCESSDATE) from applications where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) union select demo_appno as applicationno,'1' as FACILITY_SNO,pc.CAT_NAME,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,l.LOAN_RECMDAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(app.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,to_char(LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN) as purpose,l.LOAN_MODINTRATE, '' as presentROI,to_char(l.LOAN_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LOAN_DUEDATE,'' as arrears from per_demographics demo, applications app,products p,PRD_CATEGORY pc,LOANDETAILS l,app_referncenumber ref where demo.DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.app_prdcode=p.prd_code and prd_type not in ('pG','pR') and app.APP_STATUS ='pa' and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and p.PRD_CATID=pc.CAT_ID and app.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and ref.APP_NO=app.APP_NO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and app.APP_RENEW_FLAG != 'P')

select distinct(APP_SEC_SECID),APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_FACSNO,to_char(APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION) as APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_MARGIN,PERAPP_FNAME from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,PERAPPLICANT where APP_SEC_APPNO in (^) and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID=PERAPP_ID

select inq.application_id,inq.consumer_id, ref.bureau_name as BUREAU,LTRIM(scr.SCORE,0) score,action from hm_los_inquiry inq join Bureau_reference_tracking ref on inq.request_id=ref.request_id join HM_BUR_RES_SCORE_DTL scr on ref.tracking_id=scr.tracking_id where inq.APPLICATION_ID=? and inq.consumer_id=? and inq.request_id=(SELECT MAX(request_id ) FROM hm_los_inquiry WHERE application_id=inq.application_id AND consumer_id=inq.consumer_id)

select AQ_APPNO,AQ_SNO,AQ_ORGCODE,AQ_QUERY,AQ_RAISEDBY,AQ_CREATEDON,to_char(AQ_RAISEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as AQ_RAISEDON,AQ_STATUS, AQ_REPLIEDBY,to_char(AQ_REPLIEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as AQ_REPLIEDON,AQ_REPLY,(b.usr_fname || ' ' || b.usr_lname) as created_user,c.org_name as created_org,(d.usr_fname || ' ' || d.usr_lname) as replied_user,e.org_name as replied_org,AQ_PARENTID from APP_QUERYDETAILS a left outer join USERS b on AQ_RAISEDBY=b.USR_ID left outer join ORGANISATIONS c on c.ORG_CODE=aq_sentorgcode left outer join USERS d on AQ_REPLIEDBY=d.USR_ID left outer join ORGANISATIONS e on e.ORG_CODE=AQ_ORGCODE where AQ_APPNO='^' and AQ_PARENTID='^' order by AQ_SNO

select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC, case a.APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as moduletype, F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(F.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,to_char(FACILITY_PURPOSE) as purpose,f.FACILITY_INTEREST,'' as presentROI,F.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'' as Arrears,F.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A, FACILITY_CORP fc,FACILITY_MASTER fm,app_referncenumber ref where F.Facility_Appno=A.App_No And F.Facility_Group='0' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_HEADFAC=fm.FACILITY_CATID and ref.APP_NO=F.FACILITY_APPNO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and F.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.Facility_Appno in (select distinct COM_COMPDTAPPNO from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_OLDLAPSID='^') and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO and FACILITY_RENEW is null) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null and f.facility_renew is null union select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC, case a.APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as moduletype, F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(F.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,to_char(FACILITY_PURPOSE) as purpose,f.FACILITY_INTEREST,'' as presentROI,FACILITY_DUEDATE,'' as Arrears,F.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A , FACILITY_CORP fc,FACILITY_MASTER fm,app_referncenumber ref where F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and F.FACILITY_GROUP='0' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_HEADFAC=fm.FACILITY_CATID and ref.APP_NO=F.FACILITY_APPNO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and F.Facility_Appno in (select distinct COM_COMPDTAPPNO from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_OLDLAPSID='^') and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and F.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and f.facility_renew is null

select applicationno,Facility_sno,CAT_NAME,'Retail' as moduletype,CBS_Accountno,LOAN_RECMDAMT,SANCTIONREFNO,APP_PROCESSDATE,purpose,LOAN_MODINTRATE,presentROI,LOAN_DUEDATE,arrears from ( select demo_appno as applicationno,'1' as FACILITY_SNO,pc.CAT_NAME,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,l.LOAN_RECMDAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(app.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,to_char(LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN) as purpose,l.LOAN_MODINTRATE, '' as presentROI,l.LOAN_DUEDATE,'' as arrears from per_demographics demo, applications app,products p,PRD_CATEGORY pc,LOANDETAILS l,app_referncenumber ref where demo.DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and demo_type!='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.app_prdcode=p.prd_code and prd_type not in ('pG','pR') and app.APP_STATUS ='pa' and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and p.PRD_CATID=pc.CAT_ID and app.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and ref.APP_NO= app.APP_NO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null and app.APP_RENEW_FLAG != 'P' and APP_PROCESSDATE=(select max(APP_PROCESSDATE) from applications where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) union select demo_appno as applicationno,'1' as FACILITY_SNO,pc.CAT_NAME,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,l.LOAN_RECMDAMT,ref.SANCTIONREFNO,to_char(app.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,to_char(LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN) as purpose,l.LOAN_MODINTRATE, '' as presentROI,l.LOAN_DUEDATE,'' as arrears from per_demographics demo, applications app,products p,PRD_CATEGORY pc,LOANDETAILS l,app_referncenumber ref where demo.DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and demo_type!='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.app_prdcode=p.prd_code and prd_type not in ('pG','pR') and app.APP_STATUS ='pa' and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and p.PRD_CATID=pc.CAT_ID and app.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and ref.APP_NO=app.APP_NO and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null) and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and app.APP_RENEW_FLAG != 'P')
select per_status from PERMISSION_MASTER where PER_ID='^'
select DEV_DEVPARAM,DEV_CBSID from APPL_DEVIATION where DEV_APPNO='^'
select PER_INTEREST,PER_FINANCE,PER_NAME from PERMISSION_MASTER where PER_ID='^'

insert into SECURITY_LIVESTOCK (SEC_SECURITYID,SEC_TOTNUMBER,SEC_APP_TITLE,SEC_APP_NAME,SEC_APP_SURVEYNO,SEC_APP_ADDR1,SEC_APP_ADDR2,SEC_APP_CITYCODE,SEC_APP_STATECODE,SEC_APP_DISTRICTCODE,SEC_APP_PINCODE,SEC_APP_COUNTRY,SEC_APP_CBSID)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK where SEC_SECURITYID=?

select SEC_SECURITYID,SEC_TOTNUMBER,SEC_APP_TITLE,SEC_APP_NAME,SEC_APP_SURVEYNO,SEC_APP_ADDR1,SEC_APP_ADDR2,SEC_APP_CITYCODE,SEC_APP_STATECODE,SEC_APP_DISTRICTCODE,SEC_APP_PINCODE,SEC_APP_COUNTRY,SEC_APP_CBSID from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK where SEC_SECURITYID='^'
insert into SECURITY_LIVESTOCK_DET (SEC_SECURITYID,SEC_SERIAL_NO,SEC_AGE,SEC_BREED,SEC_IDMARK)values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK_DET where SEC_SECURITYID=?
select SEC_AGE,SEC_BREED,SEC_IDMARK from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK_DET where SEC_SECURITYID='^'
select count(*)as auto_count from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK_DET where SEC_SECURITYID='^'

select APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and c.CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE in ('1','5','6')

select APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' ^

select distinct(d.perapp_id),upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.perapp_cbsid, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cus_owner_sno ,cc.DEMO_APPTYPE as app_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHip o,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cc where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and s.APP_SEC_APPNO=cc.DEMO_APPNO and d.PERAPP_ID=cc.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and e.CON_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and c.CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='^' and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE!='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and o.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and PERAPP_OLDID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID order by cus_owner_sno

select distinct(d.perapp_id),upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.perapp_cbsid, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cus_owner_sno ,cc.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHip o,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cc where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID=cc.COM_COMPDTID and e.CON_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and o.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and PERAPP_OLDID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID order by cus_owner_sno

select distinct(d.perapp_id),upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.perapp_cbsid, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cus_owner_sno,cc.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHip o,COM_COMPANYDETAILS cc where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID=cc.COM_COMPDTID and e.CON_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and c.CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='^' and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE!='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and o.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and PERAPP_OLDID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID order by cus_owner_sno

select distinct(d.perapp_id),upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.perapp_cbsid, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cus_owner_sno ,CC.COM_COMPDTTYPE as app_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS s,CUS_SECURITIES c, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHip o,COM_COMPANYDETAILS CC where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and s.APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID=cc.COM_COMPDTID and e.CON_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n' and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and o.CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and PERAPP_OLDID=o.CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and APP_SEC_SECID='^' order by cus_owner_sno

select sec_machinetype,sec_working,sec_manucompany,sec_year,sec_model,sec_balancesheetvalue,sec_purchasevalue,sec_bookvalue,sec_valuervalue,sec_salevalue,to_char(sec_balancesheetdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_balancesheetdate, to_char(SEC_LAST_INSP_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SEC_LAST_INSP_DATE,sec_dealername,sec_dealercont,sec_dealeraddress1,sec_dealercity,sec_dealeraddress2,sec_dealerstate,sec_dealerdistrict, sec_dealercountry,sec_dealerpin,sec_dealermail,SEC_DEALERCODE,SEC_DEALERTINNO,SEC_MACHINERY_TYPE,SEC_MACHINERY_BELONGS,SEC_MACHINERY_BELONGS_NAME,SEC_BELONGSTO_DOORNO,SEC_ADDRESS1,SEC_ADDRESS2, SEC_CITY,SEC_DISTRICT ,SEC_STATE,SEC_PINCODE,SEC_COUNTRY,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY, case CUS_RELEASEFLAG when 'V' then (select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')) else CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY end as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from SECURITY_PLANTMACHINERY m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s where m.SEC_ID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_CITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_DISTRICT and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_COUNTRY and m.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID

select SEC_AREA,SEC_MEASUREMENT,SEC_SALUTATION,SEC_BELONGING,SEC_SUR_NO,SEC_ADDRESS_1,SEC_ADDRESS_2,SEC_CITY,SEC_DIST,SEC_STATE,SEC_COUNTRY, SEC_PIN,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY, case CUS_RELEASEFLAG when 'V' then (select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')) else CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY end as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY, (SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION from SECURITY_CROP m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s where m.SEC_ID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_CITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_DIST and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_COUNTRY and m.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID

select SEC_STOCK_NAME,SEC_STOCK_SURVEY,SEC_STOCK_ADDRESS1,SEC_STOCK_ADDRESS2,SEC_STOCK_CITY,SEC_STOCK_STATE, SEC_STOCK_DIST,SEC_STOCK_COUNTRY,SEC_STOCK_ZIP,SEC_STOCK_SAL,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY,s.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from security_Stock m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s where m.SEC_ID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_CITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_STATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_DIST and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_COUNTRY and m.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID

select sec_natureofasset,sec_make,sec_model,sec_year,sec_purchasevalue,sec_presentvalue,sec_valuervalue,SEC_SALUTATION_NAME,SEC_SURVEYNO, SEC_ADDRESS1,SEC_ADDRESS2,SEC_PINCODE,SEC_CITY,SEC_STATE,SEC_COUNTRY,SEC_DISTRICT,SEC_SALUTATION ,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY, case CUS_RELEASEFLAG when 'V' then (select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')) else CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY end as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from SECURITY_FURNITURES m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s where m.SEC_ID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_CITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_DISTRICT and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_COUNTRY and m.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID

select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and CUS_SEC_TYPE='4' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^'

select SEC_SECURITYID,SEC_TOTNUMBER,SEC_APP_TITLE,SEC_APP_NAME,SEC_APP_SURVEYNO,SEC_APP_ADDR1,SEC_APP_ADDR2,SEC_APP_CITYCODE, SEC_APP_STATECODE,SEC_APP_DISTRICTCODE,SEC_APP_PINCODE,SEC_APP_COUNTRY ,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY, case CUS_RELEASEFLAG when 'V' then (select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD from SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP where SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and SEC_FLAG in ('V','N')) else CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY end as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY ,sm.SEC_NAME from SECURITY_LIVESTOCK m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s,SECURITY_MASTER sm where m.SEC_SECURITYID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE='1' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_APP_CITYCODE and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_APP_STATECODE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_APP_DISTRICTCODE and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_APP_COUNTRY and m.SEC_SECURITYID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and sm.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION

select l.SEC_SECURITYID,l.SEC_AGE,s.STAT_DATA_DESC1,l.SEC_IDMARK From SECURITY_LIVESTOCK_DET l,STATIC_DATA s where SEC_SECURITYID='^' and l.SEC_BREED=s.STAT_DATA_DESC and s.STAT_DATA_ID='212' order by l.SEC_SERIAL_NO

INSERT INTO COM_CHARGE_ASSETS (COM_APPLICANT_ID,COM_SEC_ID,COM_ASSET_NAME,COM_CHARG_HOLDER,COM_CHARG_DATE) select ?,COM_SEC_ID,COM_ASSET_NAME,COM_CHARG_HOLDER,COM_CHARG_DATE from COM_CHARGE_ASSETS where COM_APPLICANT_ID=?

select facility_sno, STAT_DATA_DESC1 as fac_desc from facilities b,facility_corp c,static_data where b.facility_appno ='^' and b.FACILITY_CODE=c.COM_FACID and facility_category in ('R','A','O','D') and STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7),facility_sno
select AQ_REPLIEDBY,USR_FNAME from users,APP_QUERYDETAILS where AQ_REPLIEDBY=USR_ID and AQ_APPNO='^'
update LOANDETAILS set LOAN_TOT_INT=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
select PERM_APPNO from perm_assessment where PERM_APPNO='^'

select PERM_APPNO,c.CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE,c.CBS_STATIC_CGTMSE,CBS_STATIC_DATA_PASSING_CODE from PERM_BASIC_INFO p,CBS_STATICDATA c where PERM_APPNO='^' and c.CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='26' and p.PERM_SANC_DEPT=c.CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE
update appl_deviation set dev_cbsid=? where dev_cbsid=?

select TXNDET_CRDT_AMT,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSED,TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_AMT,to_char(TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTS_BAL_DT,to_char(TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_FST_INS_DUE_DT,to_char(TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_FST_DISB,to_char(TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_LST_DISB,TXNDET_CRDT_FUNDBASED,TXNDET_CGPAN_NO, TXNDET_CRDT_NONFUNDBASED,TXNDET_OUTSTD_FUND,to_char(TXNDET_OUTFB_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTFB_DT,TXNDET_OUTSTD_NONFUND,to_char(TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_OUTNFB_DT,TXNDET_AMT_DISBURSEDWC,to_char(TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_FST_DISBWC,to_char(TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TXNDET_DT_LST_DISBWC from WORFLOW_CGTMSE_TXNDETAILS where TXNDET_APPNO='^' and txndet_fac_sno='^'
select ston_sno, ston_takeovernorm,ston_active_type from set_takeovernorms where ston_normfor='^' and ston_active_type='E' order by ston_sno
select rbi_restr_sno, rbi_restr_desc,rbi_active_type from set_rbiguidelines_restr where rbi_restr_for='^' and rbi_compliance='^' and rbi_active_type='E' order by rbi_restr_sno

select PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATEGORYFAMILY_INCOME,PM_FEMALE_OWNERSHIP,PM_LOAN_SUBSIDY,PM_INTEREST_SUBSIDY,PM_MAXLOAN_TENOR,PM_AREA,PM_NRI_BORROWER,PM_ELIGIBILITY_HOMEEXT,to_char(PM_FROM_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PM_FROM_DATE,to_char(PM_FINISH_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PM_FINISH_DATE,PM_MAX_SUBSIDY,PM_AADHAR_MANDATORY,PM_SUBCATID,PM_MAIN_CATEGORY,PM_ACTIVE_TYPE from PMAY_Master where PM_MAIN_CATEGORY='^' and PM_SUBCATID='^'
select PM_SUBCATEGORY,PM_SUBCATID from PMAY_Master where PM_MAIN_CATEGORY='^' and PM_ACTIVE_TYPE='E'

select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC as SEC_STOCK_SAL,SEC_STOCK_NAME,SEC_STOCK_SURVEY,SEC_STOCK_ADDRESS1,SEC_STOCK_ADDRESS2,SEC_STOCK_CITY,SEC_STOCK_STATE, SEC_STOCK_DIST,SEC_STOCK_COUNTRY,SEC_STOCK_ZIP,CITY_NAME,STATE_NAME,DISTRICT_DESC,CON_COUNTRY,s.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from security_Stock m,LAPS_CITIES lc, LAPS_STATES ls,district_master dm,COUNTRYSETUP cs,CUS_SECURITIES s,CBS_STATICDATA where m.SEC_ID in (select app_sec_secid from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^') and lc.CITY_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_CITY and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_STATE and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and dm.DISTRICT_CODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_DIST and cs.CON_COUNTRYCODE(+)=m.SEC_STOCK_COUNTRY and m.SEC_ID=s.CUS_SEC_ID and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1' and m.SEC_STOCK_SAL=CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE

Select DEMO_APPID,demo_oldappid,demo_appid as perapp_id from per_demographics,PERAPPLICANT where demo_appno='^' and DEMO_OLDAPPID=PERAPP_OLDID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' order by demo_type

select perapp_id, com_compdtappno, com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname,COM_COMPDTTYPE,COM_FAC_DOCPRINT,COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED from com_companydetails,PERAPPLICANT where com_compdtappno='^' and com_facility_sno='^' and COM_OLDLAPSID=PERAPP_OLDID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' union select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID,c.DEMO_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_LNAME,'a' as COM_COMPDTTYPE ,c.DEMO_DOCPRINT,DEMO_DOC_ACCOPERATED from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c,PERAPPLICANT p where DEMO_APPNO='^' and c.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' order by COM_FAC_DOCPRINT desc
select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^'
select perapp_id,perapp_profilestatus from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'

select DEMO_APPNO from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,applications where APP_NO=DEMO_APPNO and APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and DEMO_APPID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)) union select DEMO_APPNO from com_DEMOGRAPHICS,applications where APP_NO=DEMO_APPNO and APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)) union select COM_COMPDTAPPNO from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,applications where APP_NO= COM_COMPDTAPPNO and APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and COM_COMPDTAPPID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null))

select ADDKBOW_APP_NO from addkbowerdetails where ADDKBOW_STATUS in ('PA') and ADDKBOW_APP_ID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null))
update CUS_CIBILDETAILS set cibil_rat_status=?,cibil_score=?,cibil_reporteddate=sysdate,cibil_auto_update='Y' where cibil_appid=?
insert into cus_cibildetails(cibil_rat_status,cibil_score,cibil_reporteddate,cibil_appid,cibil_auto_update) values (?,?,sysdate,?,'Y')
update cus_cibildetails set crif_refered=?,crif_score=?,crif_date=sysdate,crif_auto_update='Y' where cibil_appid=?
insert into CUS_CIBILDETAILS(crif_refered,crif_score,crif_date,cibil_appid,crif_auto_update) values (?,?,sysdate,?,'Y')

select SOL_APPL_NO from solvency where SOL_STATUS in ('PA') and SOL_APPID=(select to_char(perapp_id) as perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null))
delete from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO=?
select distinct(com_bankscheme) as scheme from FACILITY_CORP,facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_code=com_facid
insert into PERM_MEMBERSDETAIL(PERM_MEM_PROPNO,PERM_MEM_LAPSID,PERM_MEM_ID,PERM_MEM_CBSID) values (?,?,?,?)
select CRE_RATING,CRE_WEIGHT from CREDITSCORING where CRE_APPNO='^' and CRE_NONPOOLFLAG='Y' and CRE_RMDFLAG='Y' order by CRE_ASONDATE DESC
delete from PERM_MEMBERSDETAIL where PERM_MEM_PROPNO=? and PERM_MEM_ID='C'

select m.PERM_MEM_LAPSID,p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,PERM_MEM_ID,PERM_MEM_CBSID from PERM_MEMBERSDETAIL m,PERAPPLICANT p where m.PERM_MEM_PROPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_oldID=m.PERM_MEM_LAPSID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n'order by PERM_MEM_ID
select PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID='^'
select p.PERAPP_OLDID from APPL_DEVIATION a,PERAPPLICANT p where a.DEV_APPNO='^' and a.DEV_CBSID=p.PERAPP_CBSID
update APPL_DEVIATION set DEV_FREEZE_FLAG=? where DEV_APPNO=?
select CRE_RATING,CRE_WEIGHT from CREDITSCORING where CRE_APPNO='^' and CRE_NONPOOLFLAG is null order by CRE_ASONDATE DESC
delete from financialcomments where fin_appno=? and fin_cma_title=? and FIN_FACILITY=?

select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from com_companydetails,perapplicant where com_compdtappno='^' and perapp_id=com_compdtappid and perapp_profilestatus<>'Y' union all select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPNO='^' and perapp_id=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and perapp_profilestatus<>'Y'

select PERM_APPNO,PERM_CREATEDATE,PERM_EXIST_APPNO,PERM_EXIST_FACSNO,PERM_EXIST_FACNAME,PERM_EXIST_MODTYPE,PERM_EXIST_ACCNO,PERM_EXIST_LIMIT,PERM_EXIST_PURPOSE, PERM_EXIST_SANCREFNO,to_char(PERM_EXIST_SANCDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERM_EXIST_SANCDATE,PERM_EXIST_SANCROI,PERM_EXIST_PRESENTROI, PERM_EXIST_BALANCEOS,to_char(PERM_EXIST_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERM_EXIST_DUEDATE,PERM_EXIST_ARREARSTATUS,PERM_EXIST_BORNAME, PERM_ACCOUNTOPEN,PERM_PREFIX,PERM_SUFFIX,PERM_BORROWERID from PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY where PERM_APPNO='^'

select PERM_EXISTSEC_PROPOSALNO,PERM_EXISTSEC_FACSNO,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECID,PERM_EXISTSEC_APPLNAME,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECDESCRIP,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECVALUE,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECTYPE, PERM_EXISTSEC_MARGIN from PERM_DEV_EXSTSECURITY where PERM_APPNO='^'
select PERM_EXST_BANKNAME,PERM_EXST_FACILITY,PERM_EXST_LIMIT,to_char(PERM_EXST_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERM_EXST_DUEDATE,PERM_EXST_ARREARS,PERM_EXST_FLAG from PERM_DEV_OTHERBANK where PERM_APPNO='^'

select PERM_EXISTDEP_NAME,PERM_EXISTDEP_ACCNO,PERM_EXISTDEP_DEPOSITAMT,PERM_EXISTDEP_PRESENTBAL,to_char(PERM_EXISTDEP_MATURITYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERM_EXISTDEP_MATURITYDATE,PERM_EXISTDEP_ROI from PERM_DEV_EXSTDEPOSIT where PERM_APPNO='^'
select perm_appno,perm_exist_appno from PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY where perm_appno='^' and 1=0

insert into PERM_DEV_EXSTSECURITY(PERM_APPNO,PERM_EXSTSEC_CREATEDATE,PERM_EXISTSEC_PROPOSALNO,PERM_EXISTSEC_FACSNO,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECID,PERM_EXISTSEC_APPLNAME,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECDESCRIP,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECVALUE,PERM_EXISTSEC_SECTYPE,PERM_EXISTSEC_MARGIN) values (?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into PERM_DEV_OTHERBANK(PERM_APPNO,PERM_EXST_CREATEDATE,PERM_EXST_BANKNAME,PERM_EXST_FACILITY,PERM_EXST_LIMIT,PERM_EXST_DUEDATE,PERM_EXST_ARREARS,PERM_EXST_FLAG) values (?,sysdate,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?)

insert into PERM_DEV_EXSTDEPOSIT(PERM_APPNO,PERM_CREATEDATE,PERM_EXISTDEP_NAME,PERM_EXISTDEP_ACCNO,PERM_EXISTDEP_DEPOSITAMT,PERM_EXISTDEP_PRESENTBAL,PERM_EXISTDEP_MATURITYDATE,PERM_EXISTDEP_ROI) values (?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)
delete from PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY where PERM_APPNO=?
delete from PERM_DEV_EXSTSECURITY where PERM_APPNO=?
