delete from PERM_DEV_OTHERBANK where PERM_APPNO=?
delete from PERM_DEV_EXSTDEPOSIT where PERM_APPNO=?

update SECURITIES_APPROVAL_TEMP set SEC_FLAG=?,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD=?,SEC_SECURITYVALUE_NEW=?,SEC_AMTCHARGED_OLD=?,SEC_AMTCHARGED_NEW=?, SEC_VALUERNAME_OLD=?,SEC_VALUERNAME_NEW=?,SEC_VALUATIONDATE_OLD=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),SEC_VALUATIONDATE_NEW=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),SEC_VALUERCODE_OLD=?,SEC_VALUERCODE_NEW=?,SEC_COMMENTS=? where sec_id=?
select facility_appno from facility_chklist where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'
update loandetails set loan_profee=?,loan_docfee=? where loan_appno=?
select PS_PARAM_ID,PS_PARAM_ORGLEVEL,PS_PARAM_MINCLASS,PS_MODULE_TYPE,PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG from SET_POSTSANC_PARAM where PS_PARAM_ID='^' and PS_MODULE_TYPE='P'
select PS_PARAM_ID,PS_PARAM_ORGLEVEL,PS_PARAM_MINCLASS,PS_MODULE_TYPE,PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG from SET_POSTSANC_PARAM where PS_PARAM_ID='^' and PS_MODULE_TYPE is null
select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt From APP_QUERYDETAILS,APPL_DEVIATION where AQ_APPNO=DEV_APPNO and ((AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QR') or (AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS'))
select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt From APP_QUERYDETAILS where AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS'

select q.AQ_APPNO,a.PG_APPLIANTNAME as PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Permission' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,appl_deviation b,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST a where q.AQ_APPNO=b.DEV_APPNO and b.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO and q.AQ_ORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS='QS' ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,a.PG_APPLIANTNAME as PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Permission' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,appl_deviation b,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST a where q.AQ_APPNO=b.DEV_APPNO and b.DEV_APPNO=a.DEV_APPNO and q.AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS in ('QR') ^
update PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY set PERM_EXIST_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERM_EXIST_BALANCEOS=?,perm__Baltypeid=?,PERM_EXIST_BALANCEOSASONDATE=sysdate where PERM_APPNO=? and PERM_EXIST_ACCNO=?

update PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY set PERM_EXIST_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERM_EXIST_BALANCEOS=?,perm__Baltypeid=?,PERM_EXIST_BALANCEOSASONDATE=sysdate where PERM_APPNO=? and PERM_PREFIX=? and PERM_SUFFIX=?
update PERM_DEV_EXISTFACILITY set PERM_EXIST_PRESENTROI=?,PERM_EXIST_ARREARSTATUS=?,PERM_EXIST_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where PERM_APPNO=? and perm_exist_appno=? and perm_exist_facsno=?

select P.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,ADD_MONTHS(d.DEV_PROCESSDATE,6)as DEV_PROCESSDATE ,sysdate from APPL_DEVIATION d,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST P where DEV_APPSTATUS='pa' and P.DEV_APPNO=d.DEV_APPNO and DEV_CBSID='^'

select P.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,DEV_CBSID,dev_type, ADD_MONTHS(d.DEV_PROCESSDATE,6)as DEV_PROCESSDATE ,sysdate from APPL_DEVIATION d,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST P where DEV_APPSTATUS='pa' and P.DEV_APPNO=d.DEV_APPNO and P.DEV_APPNO='^'
update applications set app_perm_no=? where app_no=?
select APP_PERM_NO,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI,APP_ORGLEVEL,APP_AMBER_EXISTS from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO='^'
select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE,MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from mis_staticdata where MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='12'

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and q.AQ_ORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS='QS' ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON, case APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='^' and q.AQ_ORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS='QS' ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and q.AQ_SENTORGCODE='^'and q.AQ_STATUS in ('QR') ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON, case APP_LOANTYPE when 'C' then 'Corporate' when 'A' then 'Agriculture' else '' end as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='^' and q.AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS in ('QR') ^

select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt,APP_LOANTYPE From APP_QUERYDETAILS,APPLICATIONS where AQ_APPNO=APP_NO and ((AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QR') or (AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS')) group by APP_LOANTYPE
select sec_id,sec_name from security_master where sec_parent='^' and (SEC_ID in ('^') or SEC_ACTION='E') order by sec_id

select cibil_score,cibil_details, to_char(cibil_reporteddate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cibil_reporteddate,CRIF_SCORE,CRIF_DETAILS,to_char(CRIF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CRIF_DATE from CUS_CIBILDETAILS,perapplicant where cibil_appid=to_char(perapp_id) and PERAPP_CBSID='^' and (PERAPP_RENEW is null or perapp_renew='n')

select cibil_appid,cibil_score,cibil_details, to_char(cibil_reporteddate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as cibil_reporteddate,CRIF_SCORE,CRIF_DETAILS,to_char(CRIF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CRIF_DATE, cibil_rat_status,CRIF_REFERED,cibil_reporteddate as cibildate,CRIF_DATE as crifdate from CUS_CIBILDETAILS,perapplicant where cibil_appid=to_char(perapp_id) and PERAPP_OLDID=(select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id='^') and perapp_id<'^' order by cibildate,crifdate desc

select perapp_id as demo_appid,p.PERAPP_FNAME as appname,(select com_compdttype from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and com_compdtappid=perapp_id and rownum='1') as demo_type,'' as demo_relation, '' as demo_includeincome,(select com_compdttype from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and com_compdtappid=perapp_id and rownum='1')||perapp_id as creditappid, perapp_status,'' as DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,perapp_employment,'' as demo_cibil from PERAPPLICANT P where PERAPP_ID in (select distinct(com_compdtappid) from COM_COMPANYDETAILS where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^') and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' union select c.DEMO_COMAPPID,perapp_fname as appname,'A' as demo_type,'' as demo_relation,'' as demo_includeincome, 'a'||DEMO_COMAPPID as creditappid, perapp_status,'' as DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE,perapp_employment,demo_cibil from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c,PERAPPLICANT p where c.DEMO_APPNO='^' and c.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' order by demo_type
update COM_DEMOGRAPHICS set demo_cibil=? where DEMO_APPNO=? and DEMO_COMAPPID=?
update COM_COMPANYDETAILS set demo_cibil=? where COM_COMPDTAPPNO=? and com_compdtappid=?
update COM_DEMOGRAPHICS set ^=? where DEMO_APPNO =? and DEMO_COMAPPID=?
update COM_COMPANYDETAILS set ^=? where COM_COMPDTAPPNO =? and com_compdtappid=?
delete from PERM_DEV_OTHERBANK where PERM_APPNO=? and PERM_EXST_FLAG=?
select prd_catid,prd_desc,prd_whetheragri from products where prd_code='^'

select aq_sno,aq_orgcode,aq_orgdept,aq_query,aq_reply,aq_raisedby,to_char(aq_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_createdon, to_char(aq_raisedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_raisedon,aq_status,to_char(aq_repliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_repliedon, to_char(aq_closeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_closeddate,aq_repliedby,aq_closedby,org_level,aq_sentorgdept,org_code from app_querydetails,organisations where aq_appno='^' and org_code=aq_sentorgcode and aq_sno='^'

select aq_sno,aq_orgcode,aq_orgdept,aq_query,aq_reply,aq_raisedby,to_char(aq_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_createdon, to_char(aq_raisedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_raisedon,aq_status,to_char(aq_repliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_repliedon, to_char(aq_closeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as aq_closeddate,aq_repliedby,aq_closedby,org_level,aq_sentorgdept,org_code,AQ_PARENTID,aq_sentorgcode from app_querydetails,organisations where aq_appno='^' and org_code=aq_sentorgcode and AQ_PARENTID='^' order by aq_sno
update app_querydetails set aq_status=?,aq_closeddate=sysdate,aq_closedby=? where aq_appno=? and AQ_PARENTID=?
update app_querydetails set aq_reply=?,aq_repliedon=sysdate,aq_repliedby=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?
update app_querydetails set aq_status=? where aq_appno=? and aq_sno=?
select app_no,app_delflag,app_status,app_autorej from applications where app_inwardno='^' order by nvl(app_delflag,'N')
select sec_id,sec_name from security_master where sec_id='^' and sec_action='D'
select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from static_data where stat_data_id='214' and stat_data_desc='^'

select sum(loan_recmdamt) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,PRODUCTS prd where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and prd.PRD_CODE=a.APP_PRDCODE and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('ol','op','pa','ca') and nvl(a.app_delflag,'N')='N' and d.demo_type='a' and prd.PRD_BANKSCHEME in (select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E' and MIS_MCLR_SCHEME='Y' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1') and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','S','R') and a.app_no<>'^' ^

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('ol','op','pa','ca') and nvl(a.app_delflag,'N')='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and nvl(f.facility_sancstatus,'A')='A' and fc.COM_BANKSCHEME in (select MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from MIS_STATICDATA where MIS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E' and MIS_MCLR_SCHEME='Y' and MIS_STATIC_DATA_ID='1') and f.FACILITY_TYPEFOR in ('F','S','R') and (f.facility_appno <>'^' and f.facility_sno <>'^') ^ group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin

select MIS_ACTIVITYSNO,MIS_SNO,MIS_TYPE,MIS_LOAN_PRD,MIS_HOLIDAY_PRD,MIS_AGRI_SERVICE_CTG,MIS_CLASSIFICATION,MIS_EXPO_DT_FROM,MIS_EXPO_DT_TO from MIS_MASTER where mis_type='09' and MIS_EFFECT_DT < =to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') order by mis_effect_dt desc

select a.app_no from mis_appclassification m,applications a,per_demographics d where m.app_no=a.app_no and d.DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and d.demo_type='a' and d.demo_appno=a.app_no and app_standup_india='Y' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' union select a.app_no from mis_appclassification m,applications a,com_demographics d where m.app_no=a.app_no and d.DEMO_COMAPPID='^' and d.demo_appno=a.app_no and app_standup_india='Y' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N'
select app_no as appl_attach from applications where APP_PERM_NO='^' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N'

select P.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,'' as appl_attach, ADD_MONTHS(d.DEV_PROCESSDATE,6)as DEV_PROCESSDATE ,sysdate from APPL_DEVIATION d,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST P where DEV_APPSTATUS='pa' and P.DEV_APPNO=d.DEV_APPNO and DEV_CBSID=(select PERAPP_CBSID from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where p.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPNO='^')

select P.DEV_APPNO,PG_APPLIANTNAME,'' as appl_attach,ADD_MONTHS(d.DEV_PROCESSDATE,6)as DEV_PROCESSDATE ,sysdate from APPL_DEVIATION d,DEV_PERMISSION_GIST P where DEV_APPSTATUS='pa' and P.DEV_APPNO=d.DEV_APPNO and DEV_CBSID=(select p.PERAPP_CBSID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cd,PERAPPLICANT p where DEMO_APPNO='^' and cd.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID)
select PERAPP_CBSID from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where p.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and pd.DEMO_APPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_CBSID='^'

select p.PERAPP_CBSID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cd,PERAPPLICANT p where DEMO_APPNO='^' and cd.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_CBSID='^' union all select p.PERAPP_CBSID from com_companydetails cc,PERAPPLICANT p where com_compdtappno='^' and cc.COM_COMPDTAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_CBSID='^'
select distinct(apa_doccode) as apa_doccode from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_delflag is null
select count(aq_sno) as cnt from app_querydetails where aq_appno='^' and aq_sno >'^' and AQ_PARENTID='^'

select sum(facility_sancamt) as sanction_amt from mis_appclassification,facilities where app_no='^' and APP_STANDUP_INDIA='Y' and facility_appno=app_no and facility_sno=app_facility_sno and APP_FACILITY_SNO<>'^'
select NVL(max(PHPA_SNO),0)+1 as maxid from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where PHPA_APPNO ='^'
select NVL(max(AUTO_SNO),0)+1 as maxid from per_auto where AUTO_APPNO ='^'
select sec_name from security_master where sec_parent='0' and sec_id='^'

select LOAN_TAKEOVER,loan_metlifepremiumamt,SEC_PROPERTYTYPE,SEC_SURVEYNO,SEC_PLOTNO,SEC_STREETNO,SEC_CITY,SEC_DISTRICT,SEC_STATE,SEC_ZIP,SEC_TOTALAREA ,SEC_EXTENTOFBUILDING,SEC_VALUERVALUE,SEC_SALEVALUE,sec_measurement,sec_extofbuildmeas, CUS_SEC_TYPE,CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE,to_char(CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,to_char(CUS_VALRECVDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALRECVDATE,to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_VALUER_NAME,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,SEC_EXTENTOFBUILDING,sec_salevalue,LOAN_AGEOFVEH,CUS_SEC_GOVT_VALUER from LOANDETAILS l,SECURITY_LAND s,CUS_SECURITIES c where l.LOAN_APPNO='^' and c.CUS_SEC_ID='^' and c.CUS_SEC_ID=s.SEC_ID

insert into PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET(PHPA_APPNO,PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID,PHPA_SNO,PHPA_TAKE_OVER,PHPA_PROP_TYPE,PHPA_AME_SECURTYPE,PHPA_AME_SECURCLASSIFIC,PHPA_NATUREOFCHARGE,PHPA_PROP_SURVEYNO,PHPA_PROP_PLOTNO, PHPA_PROP_STREET,PHPA_PROP_CITY,PHPA_PROP_DISTRICT,PHPA_PROP_STATE,PHPA_PROP_PINCODE,PHPA_SITE_AREA,PHPA_FLOORSPACE_AREA,PHPA_EDIT_APPLYFLAG,PHPA_LOAN_PURPOSE,phpa_site_purchase_price,phpa_site_market_value,phpa_metlifepremiumamt,PHPA_PREMISES_AGE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into VALUATIONENTRY(APP_NO,SEC_SECURITYID,VALU_SNO,SEND_DATE,RECD_DATE,ENTRY_DATE,VALUERNAME,ESTI_VAL_FORCE,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG,VALUERS_CODE) values (?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?)
delete from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where PHPA_APPNO=? and PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID=?
delete from VALUATIONENTRY where APP_NO=? and SEC_SECURITYID=?
delete from PER_AUTO where AUTO_APPNO=? and AUTO_SEC_SECID=?

select LOAN_TAKEOVER,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE,SEC_VEHICLETYPE,SEC_COMPANY,SEC_VEHICLECAT,SEC_MODEL,SEC_MAKE,SEC_REGNO,SEC_HPNO,SEC_CHASSISNO,SEC_DEALERNAME,SEC_DEALERADDRESS1,SEC_DEALERADDRESS2,SEC_AGE, SEC_DEALERCITY,SEC_DEALERSTATE,SEC_DEALERDISTRICT,SEC_DEALERPIN,SEC_DEALERCONT, to_char(CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,to_char(CUS_VALRECVDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALRECVDATE,to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_VALUER_NAME,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,cus_sec_totalsecvalue,SEC_PURCHASEVALUE,SEC_BOOKVALUE,LOAN_PREMISESAGE from LOANDETAILS l,SECURITY_VEHICLE s,CUS_SECURITIES c where l.LOAN_APPNO='^' and c.CUS_SEC_ID='^' and c.CUS_SEC_ID=s.SEC_ID

insert into PER_AUTO(AUTO_APPNO,AUTO_SEC_SECID,AUTO_SNO,AUTO_TAKE_OVER,AUTO_NATUREOFCHARGE,auto_category,auto_articlename,AUTO_VEHICLETYPE,AUTO_MAKE,auto_model,auto_registration,AUTO_ENGINE,AUTO_CHASIS,auto_dealer,auto_deleraddress1,auto_deleraddress2,auto_delercity,auto_delerstate,auto_delerpin,auto_delerphone,AUTO_EDIT_APPLYFLAG,auto_applnt,auto_originalcost,AUTO_AGE,auto_valuationentry) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into VALUATIONENTRY(APP_NO,SEC_SECURITYID,VALU_SNO,SEND_DATE,RECD_DATE,ENTRY_DATE,VALUERNAME,mark_val_land,BRANCHPANEL,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG,VALUERS_CODE) values (?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?)
select loan_doc_branchcode,LOAN_MODUSRID,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONC,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_PENALTY,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONDESC from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select ORG_NAME,ORG_HEAD, USR_FNAME as org_headname,ORG_CITY from ORGANISATIONS,USERS where ORG_SCODE='^'and USR_ID=ORG_HEAD

select FACILITY_SANCSTATUS as facility_category,facility_group,FACILITY_PROPOSED,FACILITY_MONTHS,to_char(FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate,ceil(months_between(facility_duedate,sysdate)) as duemonths from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
delete from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where PHPA_APPNO=? and PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID is not null
delete from PER_AUTO where AUTO_APPNO=? and AUTO_SEC_SECID is not null
delete from VALUATIONENTRY where APP_NO=? and SEC_SECURITYID is not null

select org_scode,d.perapp_id,upper(perapp_title || ' ' || perapp_fname) as fullname, perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dob, perapp_employment as empemployment ,d.perapp_occupation,d.perapp_constitution,d.perapp_bank,d.PERAPP_CBSID, to_char(d.perapp_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_banksince,perapp_employment, to_char(app_cpcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_cpcdate,to_char(app_clpudate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_clpudate,to_char(APP_ROHODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_ROHODATE, UPPER(e.con_comaddr1) as con_comaddr1 ,UPPER(e.con_comaddr2) as con_comaddr2,e.con_comvillage,e.con_comcity,e.con_comdist,e.con_comstate,e.con_comzip,e.con_comcountry ,a. app_renew_flag,d.perapp_networth,to_char(perapp_networthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_networthason,lc.CITY_NAME as con_comcityname,ls.STATE_NAME as con_comstatename,d.PERAPP_FATNAME,d.PERAPP_SEX,d.PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW ,e.CON_PERMADDR1,e.CON_PERMADDR2,e.CON_PERMZIP,lc2.CITY_NAME as CON_PERMCITY, ls2.STATE_NAME as CON_PERMSTATE,ii.INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,ii.INDINFO_SPOUSE_NAME,d.perapp_marstat,cd.DEMO_DOCPRINT as app_type from applications a, organisations b, perapplicant d,cust_contactinfo e,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,LAPS_CITIES lc2,LAPS_STATES ls2,INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS CD where a.app_orgcode = b.org_code and a.app_no = '^' and lc.city_code(+)=con_comcity and ls.STATE_CODE=e.CON_COMSTATE and ls.STATE_ID=lc.STATE_ID and lc2.city_code(+)=CON_PERMCITY and ls2.STATE_CODE=e.CON_PERMSTATE and ls2.STATE_ID=lc2.STATE_ID and ii.INDINFO_APPID=d.PERAPP_ID and CD.DEMO_APPNO=A.APP_NO AND CD.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=D.PERAPP_ID and d.PERAPP_ID=e.CON_APPID and lc.active_flag='E' and lc2.active_flag='E'
select ORG_CODE,BUILDER_NAME,BUILDER_CITY,BUILDER_PROJECTNAME from BUILDERMASTER where BUILDER_CODE='^'
select app_no from applications, COM_COMPANYDETAILS where app_no=COM_COMPDTAPPNO and lower(app_status) in ('pa','ca','pr','cr') and COM_COMPDTAPPID=^
insert into per_comments (cmt_appno, cmt_pgtype, cmt_comments,cmt_intercomments) select ?, cmt_pgtype, cmt_comments,cmt_intercomments from per_comments where cmt_appno=?

insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS (APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID, APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,app_proposal_type) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,case when (select count(SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD) from securities_approval_temp where sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID and sec_flag='V' and SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD is not null)=0 then (select cus_sec_netsecurity from cus_securities where cus_sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID) else (select SEC_SECURITYVALUE_OLD from securities_approval_temp where sec_id=APP_SEC_SECID and sec_flag='V') end as sec, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT, APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE, APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID, APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,app_proposal_type from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype=?
select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from per_demographics,perapplicant where demo_appno='^' and perapp_id=demo_appid and perapp_profilestatus<>'Y'
select distinct(perapp_cbsid) as id from per_demographics,perapplicant where demo_appno='^' and perapp_id=demo_appid

select app_sec_customerid,demo_oldappid,app_sec_secid,(select perapp_cbsid from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=app_sec_customerid and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') as cbsid,(select perapp_fname from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=app_sec_customerid and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') as name from app_securitydetails left join per_demographics on demo_appno=app_sec_appno and demo_oldappid=app_sec_customerid where app_sec_appno='^' and demo_oldappid is null and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='A'
delete from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where phpa_appno=?
select lpad(BUREAU_APPNO.nextval,6,0) as maxno from dual

insert into BUREAU_INWARDREG(BUR_APPNO,BUR_CBSID,BUR_CUSTYPE,CREATED_USRID,CREATED_ORG,CREATED_DATE,BUR_FNAME,BUR_DOB,BUR_GENDER,BUR_ADDRESS1, BUR_ADDRESS2,BUR_CITY,BUR_STATE,BUR_DIST,BUR_ZIP,BUR_PANNO,BUR_COUNTRY,BUR_AADHAR,BUR_EMAIL,BUR_PRDTYPE,BUR_REQAMNT,BUR_TENOR,BUR_ORGCODE,BUR_PERAPPID,BUR_FATHERNAME,bur_marstat,bur_mobile,BUR_HUNTER_REQ) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?, to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select BUR_APPNO,BUR_CBSID,BUR_CUSTYPE,CREATED_USRID,CREATED_ORG,to_char(CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CREATED_DATE,BUR_FNAME,to_char(BUR_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BUR_DOB,BUR_GENDER,BUR_ADDRESS1, BUR_ADDRESS2,BUR_CITY,BUR_STATE,BUR_DIST,BUR_ZIP,BUR_PANNO,BUR_COUNTRY,BUR_AADHAR,BUR_EMAIL,BUR_PRDTYPE,BUR_REQAMNT,BUR_TENOR,BUR_ORGCODE,BUR_PERAPPID,BUR_FATHERNAME,bur_marstat,created_usrid,bur_mobile,BUR_HUNTER_REQ,to_char(BUR_HUNTER_FETCH_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BUR_HUNTER_FETCH_DATE,BUR_HUNTER_SCORE from BUREAU_INWARDREG where BUR_APPNO='^'

update BUREAU_INWARDREG set BUR_CBSID=?,BUR_CUSTYPE=?,CREATED_USRID=?,CREATED_ORG=?,CREATED_DATE=sysdate,BUR_FNAME=?,BUR_DOB=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),BUR_GENDER=?,BUR_ADDRESS1=?, BUR_ADDRESS2=?,BUR_CITY=?,BUR_STATE=?,BUR_DIST=?,BUR_ZIP=?,BUR_PANNO=?,BUR_COUNTRY=?,BUR_AADHAR=?,BUR_EMAIL=?,BUR_PRDTYPE=?,BUR_REQAMNT=?,BUR_TENOR=?,BUR_ORGCODE=?,BUR_PERAPPID=?,BUR_FATHERNAME=?,bur_marstat=?,bur_mobile=?,BUR_HUNTER_REQ=? where BUR_APPNO=?
update BUREAU_INWARDREG set bur_delflag='Y',bur_deldate=sysdate,bur_delusrid=? where BUR_APPNO=?

select facility_sno, sd.stat_data_desc1 as fac_desc,facility_catid,com_facid,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b,facility_corp c,static_data sd where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and c.com_facid=b.facility_code and b.facility_appno ='^' and sd.stat_data_id='180' and sd.stat_data_desc=b.facility_displaydesc order by facility_sno

select BUR_APPNO,BUR_CBSID,BUR_CUSTYPE,CREATED_USRID,CREATED_ORG,to_char(CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CREATED_DATE,BUR_FNAME,to_char(BUR_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BUR_DOB,BUR_GENDER,BUR_ADDRESS1, BUR_ADDRESS2,BUR_CITY,BUR_STATE,BUR_DIST,BUR_ZIP,BUR_PANNO,BUR_COUNTRY,BUR_AADHAR,BUR_EMAIL,BUR_PRDTYPE,BUR_REQAMNT,BUR_TENOR,BUR_ORGCODE,ORG_CODE from BUREAU_INWARDREG,ORGANISATIONS where BUR_ORGCODE=ORG_CODE ^ and bur_delflag is null

select BUR_PERAPPID as demo_appid, BUR_FNAME as appname,'a' as demo_type,'' as demo_relation,'' as demo_includeincome,'a'||BUR_CBSID as creditappid, '' as perapp_status,'' as DEMO_CBSRELATIONTYPE, '' as perapp_employment,'' as demo_cibil from BUREAU_INWARDREG where BUR_APPNO='^'
update BUREAU_INWARDREG set BUR_CIBIL=? where BUR_APPNO=? and BUR_PERAPPID=?
update BUREAU_INWARDREG set ^=?,^=sysdate where BUR_APPNO=? and BUR_PERAPPID=?
insert into CUS_CIBILDETAILS(cibil_rat_status,cibil_score,cibil_reporteddate,cibil_auto_update,cibil_appid) values('Y',?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'Y',?)

insert into CUS_CIBILDETAILS(crif_refered,crif_score,crif_date,crif_auto_update,cibil_rat_status,cibil_score,cibil_reporteddate,cibil_auto_update,cibil_appid) values('Y',?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'Y','Y',?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'Y',?)
insert into CUS_CIBILDETAILS(crif_refered,crif_score,crif_date,crif_auto_update,cibil_appid) values('Y',?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'Y',?)

select BUR_APPNO,b.BUR_CBSID,p.PERAPP_ID From BUREAU_INWARDREG b,PERAPPLICANT p,cus_cibildetails c where b.BUR_APPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_CBSID=b.BUR_CBSID and to_char(p.perapp_id)=c.cibil_appid and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)
select SOL_APPL_NO from solvency where SOL_STATUS in ('PA') and SOL_APPID='^'
select ADDKBOW_APP_NO from addkbowerdetails where ADDKBOW_STATUS in ('PA') and ADDKBOW_APP_ID='^'
select phpa_appno,PHPA_SNO,PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID,PHPA_EDIT_APPLYFLAG from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where phpa_appno='^'
select APP_NO,SEC_SECURITYID,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG from VALUATIONENTRY where APP_NO='^'
select AUTO_APPNO,AUTO_EDIT_APPLYFLAG,AUTO_SEC_SECID from PER_AUTO where AUTO_APPNO='^'

update PER_AUTO set AUTO_TAKE_OVER=?,AUTO_NATUREOFCHARGE=?,auto_category=?,auto_articlename=?,AUTO_VEHICLETYPE=?,AUTO_MAKE=?,auto_model=?,auto_registration=?,AUTO_ENGINE=?,AUTO_CHASIS=?,auto_dealer=?,auto_deleraddress1=?,auto_deleraddress2=?,auto_delercity=?,auto_delerstate=?,auto_delerpin=?,auto_delerphone=?,AUTO_EDIT_APPLYFLAG=?,auto_applnt=?,auto_originalcost=?,AUTO_AGE=?, auto_valuationentry=? where AUTO_APPNO=? and AUTO_SEC_SECID=?

update VALUATIONENTRY set SEND_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),RECD_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),ENTRY_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),VALUERNAME=?,mark_val_land=?,BRANCHPANEL=?,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG=?,VALUERS_CODE=? where APP_NO=? and SEC_SECURITYID=?

update VALUATIONENTRY set SEND_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),RECD_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),ENTRY_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),VALUERNAME=?,ESTI_VAL_FORCE=?,EDIT_APPLY_FLAG=?,VALUERS_CODE=? where APP_NO=? and SEC_SECURITYID=?

update PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET set PHPA_TAKE_OVER=?,PHPA_PROP_TYPE=?,PHPA_AME_SECURTYPE=?,PHPA_AME_SECURCLASSIFIC=?,PHPA_NATUREOFCHARGE=?,PHPA_PROP_SURVEYNO=?, PHPA_PROP_PLOTNO=?,PHPA_PROP_STREET=?,PHPA_PROP_CITY=?,PHPA_PROP_DISTRICT=?,PHPA_PROP_STATE=?,PHPA_PROP_PINCODE=?,PHPA_SITE_AREA=?,PHPA_FLOORSPACE_AREA=?, PHPA_EDIT_APPLYFLAG=?,PHPA_LOAN_PURPOSE=?,phpa_site_purchase_price=?,phpa_site_market_value=?,phpa_metlifepremiumamt=?,PHPA_PREMISES_AGE=? where PHPA_APPNO=? and PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID=?
select u.USR_ID,o.ORG_LEVEL,o.ORG_CODE,o.ORG_SCODE,u.USR_CLASS,org_branchin from ORGANISATIONS o,USERS u where ORG_SCODE='^' and o.ORG_HEAD=u.USR_ID

insert into appinwardreg (inward_no,inward_sector,inward_createdon,inward_appliedon,inward_custname ,inward_borrowertype,inward_cbscustid,inward_add1,inward_add2,inward_city,inward_state,inward_zipcode,inward_phone, inward_mobile,inward_email,inward_dob,inward_pantan,inward_purpose,inward_termloanamt,inward_docreceivedon,inward_docreceived,inward_applnprocessat ,inward_orgscode,inward_usrid,inward_valuesin,inward_modifiedby,inward_modifieddate,inward_appliedfor,inward_proptype,inward_dist,inward_appstatus, inward_rejreason,inward_schemedesc,inward_bankscheme,inward_govtspons,inward_canvassedbystaff,inward_borrowerstatus,inw_leadno,INWARD_EXTERNALAPP_FLAG, INWARD_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,inward_scheme,inward_digiappno,inward_leadgenby,inward_leadregion,inward_agentid,INWARD_CONVERTEDBY,INWARD_STAFFID, INWARD_SCHMETYPE,INWARD_SPONAGENCY,INWARD_OTHERAGENCY,INWARD_SUBSAMOUNT,INWARD_SUBSDTYPE) values (?,?,sysdate,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update appinwardreg set inward_custname=?,inward_borrowertype=?,inward_cbscustid=?,inward_add1=?, inward_add2=?,inward_city=?,inward_state=?,inward_zipcode=?,inward_phone=?, inward_mobile=?,inward_email=?,inward_dob=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),inward_pantan=?, inward_purpose=?,inward_termloanamt=?,inward_docreceivedon=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),inward_docreceived=?,inward_applnprocessat=?,inward_orgscode=?,inward_usrid=?, inward_valuesin=?,inward_modifiedby=?,inward_modifieddate=sysdate,inward_appliedfor=?,inward_proptype=?,inward_dist=?,inward_appstatus=?, inward_rejreason=?,inward_schemedesc=?,inward_bankscheme=?,inward_govtspons=?,inward_canvassedbystaff=?,inward_borrowerstatus=?, inw_leadno=?,INWARD_EXTERNALAPP_FLAG=?,INWARD_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG=?,inward_scheme=?,inward_digiappno=?,inward_leadgenby=?,inward_leadregion=?,inward_agentid=?, INWARD_CONVERTEDBY=?,INWARD_STAFFID=? where inward_no=?

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE from APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc where PERAPP_PANNO='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pH' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or a.APP_STATUS='pr' or a.APP_STATUS='pa') and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE from APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc where p.PERAPP_CBSID='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pH' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or a.APP_STATUS='pr' or a.APP_STATUS='pa') and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc
select o.ORG_SCODE from APPLICATIONS a,ORGANISATIONS o where a.APP_ORGCODE=o.ORG_CODE and a.APP_NO='^'
select apa_filename,to_char(APA_CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APA_CREATED_DATE from app_docattachments where apdoc_appno = '^' and apdoc_doctype = '^' and apa_doccode = '^' and apa_sno = '^'

insert into perapplicant(perapp_oldid, PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_TITLE,PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_LNAME,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_SEX,PERAPP_MARSTAT, PERAPP_STATUS,PERAPP_TAXSLAB,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,PERAPP_BANK,PERAPP_BANKSINCE,PERAPP_SATISFACTORY, PERAPP_RELATION_BANKSTAFF,PERAPP_INTROTYPE,perapp_appdate,PERAPP_BRANCHCODE,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,PERAPP_EXTNAPPL, PERAPP_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,PERAPP_PAN_FLAG,PERAPP_FIADDRESS_FLAG,PERAPP_FIEMP_FLAG,PERAPP_FIBANKSTAT_FLAG,PERAPP_EMANDATE_FLAG,PERAPP_EMAN_BANKACC,PERAPP_EMAN_BANKNAME,PERAPP_CBSCUSTFLAG, perapp_istatus,perapp_occupation,perapp_blood_relation,perapp_tradefinance,perapp_pagestatus,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_cbsstatus,PERAPP_PERM_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,PERAPP_KYCPEND_FLAG,PERAPP_FIPEND_FLAG, PERAPP_EMANPEND_FLAG,PERAPP_FATNAME,PER_ITR_FLAG,PERAPP_BUSINESSPROOF_FLAG,PERAPP_OFFICEADDRESS_FLAG,PERAPP_RENEW,perapp_introname,perapp_introstatus,PERAPP_NETWORTH, PERAPP_PROFORMA_INVOICE,PERAPP_RESIDENCE_PROOF,PERAPP_NETWORTHASON,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER,PERAPP_SALES_TURNOVER_DATE,PERAPP_CRITERIA_SALES_TURNOVER,PERAPP_MSME_CLASSIFICATION,PERAPP_CERTIFICATION_DATE,PERAPP_AADHAAR) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'099','0','0','N','Y','Y','Y',?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)

select perapp_id,p.PERAPP_CBSID,perapp_oldid from PERAPPLICANT p where p.PERAPP_PANNO='^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)
insert into COMPANY_INFO (cominfo_appid,COMINFO_COMMENCEMENT_DATE,COMINFO_EMPLOYEES_ASONDATE,COMINFO_GSTIN,COMINFO_GSTINREG) values (?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),sysdate,?,?)

insert into CUST_CONTACTINFO(CON_APPID,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_COMCITY,CON_COMDIST,CON_COMSTATE,CON_COMCOUNTRY,CON_COMZIP, CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMDIST,CON_PERMSTATE,CON_PERMCOUNTRY,CON_PERMZIP,CON_RESTYPE,CON_YEARS,con_permis,con_status,CON_MOBILE,CON_EMAIL) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'2','Y',?,?)

insert into cus_rating(rat_id, rat_type,rat_status) values (?,?,?)
insert into CUS_DEFAULTER(DEF_ID,RAT_STATUS) values (?,?)

insert into loandetails(loan_appno,loan_modintrate,loan_intrate,loan_amtreqd,loan_costloanprd,loan_recmdamt,loan_reqterms,loan_inttype,loan_purposeofloan,loan_filedon, loan_repaymenttype,loan_profee,loan_receivedate,loan_modeofpay,loan_govt,loan_takeover,loan_emi,loan_createddate,loan_metlifepremiumamt,LOAN_FILENO,LOAN_MCLRTABCODE,LOAN_MCLRTYPE, LOAN_DIGI_TOT_PROCESSINGFEE,LOAN_DIGI_PROCESSINGFEEPAID,LOAN_CATLOANPURPOSE,LOAN_AGEOFVEH,LOAN_BASERATE,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL,LOAN_CREDITRSKVAL,LOAN_INTERESTCHARGED,loan_intcalcmode,LOAN_MARGIN,LOAN_CFR_VERIFIED,LOAN_CFR_BORNAME,LOAN_CERSAI_CHECK,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,loan_premium_loan_amount,LOAN_OPERATIVEACCNO,LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH,LOAN_DIGI_MAXEMI, GOVT_SCHEME,LOAN_SPONSERAGENCY,LOAN_AGENCYNAME,LOAN_SUB,LOAN_SUBSIDYTYPE,loan_Digi_deviation,loan_Digi_Residual,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_PENALTY,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONC,DIGI_APP_NO,LOAN_ECSBANKNAME,LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE,LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM, LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE,LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE,loan_upfrontfee,LOAN_ROITYPE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'O')

insert into loandetails(loan_appno,loan_modintrate,loan_intrate,loan_amtreqd,loan_costloanprd,loan_recmdamt,loan_reqterms,loan_inttype,loan_purposeofloan,loan_filedon, loan_repaymenttype,loan_profee,loan_receivedate,loan_modeofpay,loan_govt,loan_takeover,loan_emi,loan_createddate,loan_metlifepremiumamt,LOAN_FILENO,LOAN_MCLRTABCODE,LOAN_MCLRTYPE, LOAN_DIGI_TOT_PROCESSINGFEE,LOAN_DIGI_PROCESSINGFEEPAID,LOAN_CATLOANPURPOSE,LOAN_AGEOFVEH,LOAN_BASERATE,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL,LOAN_CREDITRSKVAL,LOAN_INTERESTCHARGED,loan_intcalcmode,LOAN_MARGIN,LOAN_CFR_VERIFIED,LOAN_CFR_BORNAME,LOAN_CERSAI_CHECK,LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,loan_premium_loan_amount,LOAN_OPERATIVEACCNO,LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH,LOAN_DIGI_MAXEMI, GOVT_SCHEME,LOAN_SPONSERAGENCY,LOAN_AGENCYNAME,LOAN_SUB,LOAN_SUBSIDYTYPE,loan_Digi_deviation,loan_Digi_Residual,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_PENALTY,DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONC,DIGI_APP_NO,LOAN_ECSBANKNAME,LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE,LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM, LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE,LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE,loan_upfrontfee,LOAN_ROITYPE,loan_docrecvd) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'O',?)

select KBL_CUST_ID, KBL_ACC_NUMBER, KBL_LOAN_AMOUNT, KBL_ROI, KBL_TENURE, KBL_PROCESSING_FEE, KBL_BUREAU_SCORE, KBL_BRE_SCORE,KBL_EMI_LIMIT,KBL_SALARY from KBL_PREAPPROVED_OFFER where KBL_CUST_ID='^' and KBL_ACC_NUMBER='^'

select app_no,perapp_fname, cat_name, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), demo_appid, mail_type,prd_type,perapp_cbsstatus,app_renew_flag,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, per_demographics, perapplicant, products, prd_category, organisations where mail_date=(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno= a.mail_appno) and mail_appno=app_no and mail_tousrid='^' and prd_type in ('^') and cat_id=prd_catid and prd_code=app_prdcode and perapp_id=demo_appid and org_code=app_orgcode and org_scode=MAIL_TO_ORGCODE and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and app_loantype='P' and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PR') and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

insert into SECURITY_LAND (SEC_ID, SEC_PROPERTYTYPE, SEC_PLOTNO, SEC_STREETNO, SEC_WARDNO, SEC_ADDRESS, SEC_CITY, SEC_DISTRICT,SEC_STATE, SEC_ZIP, SEC_TOTALAREA, SEC_EXTENTOFBUILDING, SEC_VALUERVALUE, SEC_SALEVALUE, SEC_BRANCH, SEC_SURVEYNO, SEC_PROPACQUISITION, SEC_MEASUREMENT, SEC_EXTOFBUILDMEAS) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into SEC_PROP_LEGALOPINION (SEC_PL_ID, SEC_PL_LAWNAME, SEC_PL_LEGSUBMITTEDDATE, SEC_PL_LEGRECVDATE, SEC_PL_LEGOPDATE, SEC_PL_TITLE, SEC_PL_EC, SEC_PL_TAX, SEC_PL_SEARCHFROM_PROP, SEC_PL_PERIOD_EC) values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)

select PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_TITLE, p.PERAPP_FNAME, p.PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_PERM_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG, p.PERAPP_RELAT_STAFFID, p.PERAPP_LNAME, p.PERAPP_MARSTAT, p.PERAPP_OCCUPATION, p.PERAPP_INTRONAME, p.PERAPP_INTROSTATUS, p.PERAPP_PANNO,p.PERAPP_AADHAAR, perapp_employment as PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT, p.PERAPP_SEX, c.CON_COMADDR1, c.CON_COMADDR2, c.CON_COMCITY, c.CON_COMSTATE, c.CON_COMZIP, c.CON_COMCOUNTRY, c.CON_COMPHONE, c.CON_PERMADDR1, c.CON_PERMADDR2, c.CON_PERMCITY, c.CON_PERMSTATE, c.CON_PERMCOUNTRY, c.CON_PERMZIP,PERAPP_BRANCHCODE, kyc_occupationcode,KYC_IDPROOFTYPE as idprooftype,k.KYC_IDPROOFREF, PERAPP_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,PERAPP_PAN_FLAG,perapp_fatname,ii.INDINFO_EDU_QUAL,ie.PERINC_MONSALARY,CON_EMAIL,CON_RESTYPE,PERAPPACTUALINCOME, pe.PEREMP_ADDRESS1,pe.PEREMP_ADDRESS2,pe.PEREMP_CITY,pe.PEREMP_STATE,pe.PEREMP_STATE,pe.PEREMP_ZIP,pe.PEREMP_PHONE,pe.PEREMP_EMAIL,PEREMP_NAME,CON_MOBILE,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_TAXSLAB,perapp_companyname,KYC_ID_VALID,ii.indinfo_religion,ii.indinfo_spouse_name,ii.indinfo_caste,p.PERAPP_CBSID_VER_FLAG,demo_type from PERAPPLICANT p left outer join CUST_CONTACTINFO c on p.PERAPP_ID=c.CON_APPID left outer join APPLICANT_KYCNORMS k on p.PERAPP_ID=k.KYC_CUSTID left outer join INDIVIDUAL_INFO ii on p.PERAPP_ID=ii.INDINFO_APPID left outer join PERINCEXPENSES ie on p.PERAPP_ID=ie.PERINC_ID left outer join peremployer pe on p.PERAPP_ID=pe.PEREMP_ID left outer join PER_DEMOGRAPHICS on p.PERAPP_ID=demo_appid, static_data sd1 where p.PERAPP_ID='^' and sd1.stat_data_id='54' and k.KYC_IDPROOFTYPE=stat_data_desc
select KBL_CUST_ID, KBL_ACC_NUMBER, KBL_LOAN_AMOUNT, KBL_ROI, KBL_TENURE, KBL_PROCESSING_FEE, KBL_BUREAU_SCORE, KBL_BRE_SCORE,KBL_EMI_LIMIT,KBL_SALARY from KBL_PREAPPROVED_OFFER where KBL_CUST_ID='^'

select l.LOAN_FILENO from LOANDETAILS l, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, applications a where l.LOAN_APPNO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and pd.DEMO_APPID='^' order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc
select NVL(SUBSTR(max(LOAN_FILENO),^,10),'0') from LOANDETAILS where SUBSTR(LOAN_FILENO,1,^)='^'

select PRD_CODE from PRODUCTS where PRD_WHTDIGIPRD='Y' and PRD_TYPE='^' and PRD_PURPOSE='^' and ^ between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to and PRD_REPAYTYPE like '%^@%' and prd_stop='n' and prd_renew='n' order by PRD_INTRO_DATE desc

insert into applications (app_no, app_createdate, app_prdcode, app_usrid, app_orgcode, app_loantype, app_status, app_delflag, app_inwardno, app_valuesin, app_orglevel, app_applnholder,mailchkstatus,app_clpudate,app_cpcdate, APP_ROHODATE,app_facilityrequired,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI,app_amber_exists,app_bussinessId,app_stptype) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,'op','N',?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?)

select mclr_sno,MCLR_TYPE,MCLR_BASERATESPREAD,MCLR_TABLECODE,to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy') as effdate,cs.cbs_static_data_desc as description,MCLR_TABLECODEOVERDRAFTS from MCLRMASTER a,cbs_staticdata cs WHERE CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=a.MCLR_TYPE and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='34' and MCLR_ACTIVE='Y' and MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM = (select max(b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) from MCLRMASTER b WHERE a.MCLR_TYPE=b.MCLR_TYPE and b.MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM <= sysdate) and a.MCLR_TYPE='^'

select DIGI_DEV_APPNO,DIGI_DEV_APPTYPE,DIGI_DEV_LAPSID,DIGI_DEV_CIBIL,DIGI_DEV_CIBILCOMMENTS,DIGI_DEV_INCOME,DIGI_DEV_INCOMECOMMENTS, DIGI_DEV_CBSID,DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_CIBIL,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_CIBIL,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDDATE_CIBIL, DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_INCOME,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_INCOME,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDDATE_INCOME, DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_CIBIL,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_CIBIL,DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_INCOME,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_INCOME from DIGI_EXTNAPPL_DEVIATION where DIGI_DEV_APPNO='^' and DIGI_DEV_APPTYPE in ('^')

update DIGI_EXTNAPPL_DEVIATION set DIGI_DEV_CIBILCOMMENTS=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_CIBIL=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_CIBIL=?, DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDDATE_CIBIL=sysdate,DIGI_DEV_INCOMECOMMENTS=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_INCOME=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_INCOME=?, DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDDATE_INCOME=sysdate where DIGI_DEV_APPNO=? and DIGI_DEV_LAPSID=?

update DIGI_EXTNAPPL_DEVIATION set DIGI_DEV_CIBILCOMMENTS=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_CIBIL=?,DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDBY_CIBIL=?, DIGI_DEV_APPROVEDDATE_CIBIL=sysdate where DIGI_DEV_APPNO=? and DIGI_DEV_APPTYPE='S'

select p.PERAPP_FNAME||' '||p.PERAPP_LNAME as perapp_fname,p.PERAPP_CBSID,cc.CIBIL_SCORE,pd.DEMO_TYPE, PERAPP_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,PERAPP_PAN_FLAG,PERAPP_FIADDRESS_FLAG,PERAPP_FIEMP_FLAG,PERAPP_FIBANKSTAT_FLAG,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,pd.DEMO_INCLUDEINCOME, PERAPP_PERM_ADDRESSCHANGE_FLAG,PERAPP_EMANDATE_FLAG,PERAPP_CBSCUSTFLAG,PERAPP_KYCPEND_FLAG,PERAPP_FIPEND_FLAG,PERAPP_EMANPEND_FLAG,PERAPP_EMAN_BANKNAME,PERAPP_EMAN_BANKACC,PER_ITR_FLAG,PERAPP_BUSINESSPROOF_FLAG,PERAPP_OFFICEADDRESS_FLAG,PERAPP_CBSID_VER_FLAG, PERAPP_PROFORMA_INVOICE,PERAPP_RESIDENCE_PROOF,PERAPP_COLLATERAL_FLAG,PERAPP_RESIDENCE_VISIT_FLAG,PERAPP_BUSINESS_VISIT_FLAG,PEAPP_GSTIN_FLAG,PERAPP_UAN_FLAG,PERAPP_BALANCESHEET_FLAG,PERAPP_TRADING_ACC_FLAG,PERAPP_FINANCIAL_FLAG,PERAPP_LITIGATION_CORP_FLAG, PERAPP_LITIGATION_IND_FLAG,PERAPP_DOC_SUBMITTED_FLAG,PERAPP_FINANCIAL_PEND_FLAG,PERAPP_OTHERS_PEND_FLAG,DEMO_DIGI_AMBERRULES, DIGI_HUNTERSCORE,DIGI_HUNTER_RULEMATCH,DIGI_JOCATA_MATCH,DIGI_CFR_MATCH,DIGI_THICKSCORE,DIGI_THINSCORE,p.PERAPP_FNAME as fname,perapp_dedupeflag,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_AADHAAR from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,CUS_CIBILDETAILS cc where DEMO_APPNO='^' and p.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and to_char(pd.DEMO_APPID)=cc.CIBIL_APPID order by DEMO_TYPE
select APP_NO,ESTI_VAL_FORCE from VALUATIONENTRY where APP_NO='^'
select DIGI_DEV_APPNO from DIGI_EXTNAPPL_DEVIATION where DIGI_DEV_APPNO='^' and (DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_CIBIL='S' or DIGI_DEV_APPROVALSTAT_INCOME='S')
update APPINWARDREG set INWARD_CBSCUSTID=? where INWARD_NO=?
update applications set app_status=?, app_processdate=sysdate, app_approvedby=?, app_processorgscode=?, app_processusrclass=? where app_no=?
update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_CBSID=?,PERAPP_CBSCUSTFLAG=? where PERAPP_ID=?

select a.APP_NO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,APP_STATUS,APP_PROCESSDATE,p.PERAPP_CBSID,ar.SANCTIONREFNO,PERAPP_CBSCUSTFLAG,PERAPP_EMANDATE_FLAG from PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, APPLICATIONS a left outer join APP_REFERNCENUMBER ar on a.APP_NO=ar.APP_NO where a.APP_NO='^' and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and p.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID

insert into APP_VERIFICATION_CHKBOX(VERI_APPNO,VERI_APPID,VERI_CHKBOX_VALUE,VERI_CHKBOX_DATE,VERI_USERID,VERI_FI_ADDRESS,VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT,VERI_FI_BANKSTAT,VERI_SMS_SENT_FLAG,VERI_PHOTOGRAPH,VERI_SPECIMEN_SIGN,VERI_MANCHECK_COMPLETED,VERI_HO_RECOMMEND,VERI_BRANCH_RECOMMEND,VERI_PERM_OBT,VERI_DEVREF_NUM,VERI_DEV_REMARK,VERI_GSTCHECK_AUTO) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from APP_VERIFICATION_CHKBOX where VERI_APPNO=?

select VERI_APPNO,VERI_APPID,VERI_CHKBOX_PARAM,VERI_CHKBOX_VALUE,VERI_CHKBOX_DATE,VERI_USERID,VERI_FI_ADDRESS ,VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT,VERI_FI_BANKSTAT,VERI_SMS_SENT_FLAG,VERI_PHOTOGRAPH,VERI_SPECIMEN_SIGN,VERI_MANCHECK_COMPLETED,VERI_HO_RECOMMEND,VERI_BRANCH_RECOMMEND,VERI_PERM_OBT,VERI_DEVREF_NUM,VERI_DEV_REMARK,VERI_GSTCHECK_AUTO from APP_VERIFICATION_CHKBOX where VERI_APPNO='^' and VERI_APPID='^'
update APP_DOCATTACHMENTS set APA_LEAD_NUMBER=?,APA_FILENAME=?,APA_DOC_SIZE=?,APA_DOCURL=?,APA_GENERATED_URL=?, APA_GENURL_EXPDATE=? where APA_DMS_REFNO=?
update APP_DOCATTACHMENTS set APA_GENERATED_URL=?, APA_GENURL_EXPDATE=? where APDOC_APPNO=? and apa_sno=?

select APA_DOCURL,to_char(APA_GENURL_EXPDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APA_GENURL_EXPDATE,APA_DMS_REFNO,apa_sno,apa_filename,apa_userid,APA_GENERATED_URL,APA_DOC_MIMETYPE from APP_DOCATTACHMENTS where APDOC_APPNO = '^' and APA_DOCCODE ='^'
insert into APPDOCUMENTS (APDOC_APPNO,APDOC_SUBSTATUS,APDOC_DOCTYPE,DOC_CREATED_DATE,APDOC_DOCCODE,APDOC_CREATEUSERID,APDOC_EXTAPPL_LEADNUMBER) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)

insert into APP_DOCATTACHMENTS (APDOC_APPNO,APDOC_DOCTYPE,APA_DOCCODE,APA_FILENAME,APA_USERID,APA_CREATED_DATE,APA_SNO,APA_DMS_REFNO,APA_GENURL_EXPDATE,APA_DOCURL,APA_DOC_SIZE,APA_GENERATED_URL,APA_LEAD_NUMBER,APA_DOC_MIMETYPE) values (?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)

select d.DOC_DOCUNAME as Document_Code,doc_id as Document_ID,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as Document_Name,doc_doctype, d.DOC_DOCSUBTYPE from doc_dynamicmaster d,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=DOC_DOCUNAME and STAT_DATA_ID='191' and stat_data_active='Y' and doc_doctype in ('I','A') and DOC_MODULE like '%ret%' and doc_modifieddate=(select max(doc_modifieddate) from doc_dynamicmaster where DOC_DOCUNAME=d.DOC_DOCUNAME) and d.DOC_DOCUNAME='^' order by d.DOC_DOCTYPE
select NVL(count(*),0)+1 as filecount from APP_DOCATTACHMENTS where APDOC_APPNO='^'
select a.APP_NO,ap.INW_LEADNO,ap.INWARD_DIGIAPPNO,ap.inward_no from APPLICATIONS a,APPINWARDREG ap where a.APP_NO='^' and inward_no=app_inwardno
delete from APP_DOCATTACHMENTS d where APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APA_LEAD_NUMBER=(select i.INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)

delete from APPDOCUMENTS d where d.APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APDOC_EXTAPPL_LEADNUMBER=(select i.INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)
select nvl(max(PHPA_SNO),'0') as sno from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where phpa_appno='^'
select nvl(max(AUTO_SNO),'0')as sno from PER_AUTO where AUTO_APPNO='^'
select nvl(max(VALU_SNO),'0') as sno from valuationentry where APP_NO='^'
select app_prdcode,terms_desc from setmodtermscond,applications,prod_business where terms_id=buss_termid and buss_prdid=app_prdcode and app_no='^' and rownum='1'

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p,products prd where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and prd.prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd.prd_code=a.app_prdcode and q.AQ_ORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS='QS' ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p,products prd where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and prd.prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pJ','pV','pS') and prd.prd_code=a.app_prdcode and q.AQ_ORGCODE='^' and q.AQ_STATUS='QS' ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p,products prd where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and prd.prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pJ','pV','pS') and prd.prd_code=a.app_prdcode and q.AQ_SENTORGCODE='^'and q.AQ_STATUS in ('QR') ^

select q.AQ_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,q.AQ_RAISEDBY,to_char(q.AQ_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as AQ_CREATEDON,'Retail' as Moduletype,q.AQ_SNO from app_querydetails q,APPLICATIONS a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p,products prd where q.AQ_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and prd.prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd.prd_code=a.app_prdcode and q.AQ_SENTORGCODE='^'and q.AQ_STATUS in ('QR') ^

select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt,APP_LOANTYPE From APP_QUERYDETAILS,APPLICATIONS where AQ_APPNO=APP_NO and ((AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QR') or (AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS')) and APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') group by APP_LOANTYPE

select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt,APP_LOANTYPE From APP_QUERYDETAILS,APPLICATIONS,PRODUCTS where AQ_APPNO=APP_NO and ((AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QR') or (AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS')) and prd_type in ('pH','pA','pP','pM','pU','pK','pE','pL','pI','pC','pN','pJ','pV','pS') and prd_code=app_prdcode and APP_LOANTYPE='P' group by APP_LOANTYPE

select count(AQ_APPNO) as cnt,APP_LOANTYPE From APP_QUERYDETAILS,APPLICATIONS,PRODUCTS where AQ_APPNO=APP_NO and ((AQ_SENTORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QR') or (AQ_ORGCODE='^' and AQ_STATUS='QS')) and prd_type in ('pG','pR') and prd_code=app_prdcode group by APP_LOANTYPE
insert into DIGI_CBS_BRE(FDRDFLG,BALANCE,TOTAL_CREDIT_TXN,CASH_CREDIT,CASH_DEBIT,TOTAL_CREDIT,TOTAL_DEBIT,CURRENT_DATE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
select o.ORG_SCODE,o.ORG_LEVEL,o.ORG_CODE,u.USR_DEPARTMENT from USERS u,ORGANISATIONS o where u.USR_ORGCODE=o.ORG_CODE and u.USR_ID='^'

select APP_NO,PERAPP_FNAME,APP_USRID as APP_APPLNHOLDER,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE from applications,perapplicant,loandetails,per_demographics,organisations,products,CUST_CONTACTINFO where app_no=demo_appno and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appid=perapp_id and prd_code=app_prdcode and CON_APPID=demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=loan_appno and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and prd_type='pC' and ORG_CODE like '^' and PERAPP_KYCPEND_FLAG='Y' AND APP_STATUS in ('op','pa') ORDER BY APP_CREATEDATE

select APP_NO,PERAPP_FNAME,APP_USRID as APP_APPLNHOLDER,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE from perapplicant,loandetails,per_demographics,organisations,products,CUST_CONTACTINFO, applications left outer join APP_VERIFICATION_CHKBOX on APP_NO=VERI_APPNO where app_no=demo_appno and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appid=perapp_id and prd_code=app_prdcode and CON_APPID=demo_appid
and demo_type='a' and app_no=loan_appno and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and prd_type='pC' and ORG_CODE like '^' and PERAPP_FIPEND_FLAG='Y' and ( (VERI_FI_ADDRESS not in ('4','5') or VERI_FI_ADDRESS is null) or ( VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT not in('4','5') or VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT is null ) or ( VERI_FI_BANKSTAT not in('4','5') or VERI_FI_BANKSTAT is null ) ) and app_status in ('op','pa') ORDER BY APP_CREATEDATE

select APP_NO,PERAPP_FNAME,APP_USRID as APP_APPLNHOLDER,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE from applications,perapplicant,loandetails,per_demographics,organisations,products,CUST_CONTACTINFO where app_no=demo_appno and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appid=perapp_id and prd_code=app_prdcode and CON_APPID=demo_appid and demo_type='a' and app_no=loan_appno and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and prd_type='pC' and ORG_CODE like '^' and PERAPP_KYCPEND_FLAG='Y' and app_status in ('op','pa') union select APP_NO,PERAPP_FNAME,APP_USRID as APP_APPLNHOLDER,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE from perapplicant,loandetails,per_demographics,organisations,products,CUST_CONTACTINFO, applications left outer join APP_VERIFICATION_CHKBOX on APP_NO=VERI_APPNO where app_no=demo_appno and org_code=app_orgcode and demo_appid=perapp_id and prd_code=app_prdcode and CON_APPID=demo_appid
and demo_type='a' and app_no=loan_appno and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and prd_type='pC' and ORG_CODE like '^' and PERAPP_FIPEND_FLAG='Y' and ( (VERI_FI_ADDRESS not in ('4','5') or VERI_FI_ADDRESS is null) or ( VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT not in('4','5') or VERI_FI_EMPLOYMENT is null ) or ( VERI_FI_BANKSTAT not in('4','5') or VERI_FI_BANKSTAT is null ) ) and app_status in ('op','pa') ORDER BY APP_CREATEDATE

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE, to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,to_char(bir_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bir_processdate from APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc,per_bir bir where p.PERAPP_CBSID='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pH' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or a.APP_STATUS='pa' or a.APP_STATUS='pr') and a.APP_NO=bir.appno and bir.bir_flag='Y' order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE, to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,to_char(bir_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bir_processdate from APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc,per_bir bir where PERAPP_PANNO='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pH' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or a.APP_STATUS='pa' or a.APP_STATUS='pr') and a.APP_NO=bir.appno and bir.bir_flag='Y' order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc
update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_KYCPEND_FLAG=? where PERAPP_ID=?
update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_FIPEND_FLAG=? where PERAPP_ID=?
update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_EMANPEND_FLAG=? where PERAPP_ID=?

select CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID,CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE,CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC,CBS_STATIC_DATA_PASSING_CODE,CBS_SLNO,CBS_STATIC_SANC_REFNO from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='26' and CBS_STATIC_CGTMSE='C' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E'

select sum(nvl(phpa_site_purchase_price,0)) as Purchseplotprice,sum(nvl(phpa_constucion_cost,0)) as Constructioncost, sum(nvl(phpa_bldg_estimate_cost,0)) as Estimatedcost,sum(nvl(phpa_bldg_purchase_price,0)) as Purchasebuiltprice,sum(nvl(PHPA_SITE_PURCHASE_PRICE,0)) as SitePurchaseprice from PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET where phpa_appno='^'
select sum(nvl(auto_valuationentry,0)) as valuationamt,sum(nvl(auto_actualconsideration,0)) as Leastval from PER_AUTO where AUTO_APPNO='^'
insert into APP_REVALIDATION(APP_NO,APP_CREATEDBY,APP_CREDATEDDATE,APP_CREATEDORG,APP_STATUS,APP_REVALIDATION_REASON,APP_CRE_DEPARTMENT,app_sno) values(?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

select APP_NO,APP_CREATEDBY,APP_CREDATEDDATE,APP_CREATEDORG,APP_PROCESSEDBY,APP_PROCESSORG,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,APP_STATUS,APP_REVALIDATION_REASON,APP_SANCTION_CMTS,APP_REFERENCENO from APP_REVALIDATION where APP_NO='^' and app_sno='^'
update APPLICATIONS set APP_REVALIDATEDBY=?,APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG=?,APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS=?,APP_REVALIDATIONDATE=sysdate where app_no=?
update APPLICATIONS set APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS=? where app_no=?
update facilities set FAC_REVALIDATEDBY=?,FAC_REVALIDATIONFLAG=?,FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS=?,FAC_REVALIDATIONDATE=sysdate where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?
update facilities set FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?

select count(appno) as appno from( select APP_NO as appno from APPLICATIONS where APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG='Y' and (APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS='op' or (APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS in ('pa','pr') and cbs_accountno is null)) and APP_REVALIDATEDBY='^' union select distinct(facility_appno) from facilities where FAC_REVALIDATIONFLAG='Y' and (FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS='op' or (FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS in ('pa','pr') and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null)) and FAC_REVALIDATEDBY='^')

select r.APP_NO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,o.ORG_NAME,a.APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS,r.APP_CREATEDBY, to_char(r.APP_CREDATEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREDATEDDATE,a.APP_LOANTYPE,prd_type from APP_REVALIDATION r ,APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,organisations o,products pr where pr.prd_code=app_prdcode and r.APP_NO=a.APP_NO and pd.demo_appno=a.app_no and p.perapp_id=pd.demo_appid and pd.demo_type='a' and o.ORG_CODE=a.APP_ORGCODE and a.APP_REVALIDATEDBY='^' and a.APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG='Y' and (a.APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS='op' or (a.APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS in ('pa','pr') and a.cbs_accountno is null)) union select r.APP_NO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,o.ORG_NAME,f.FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS,r.APP_CREATEDBY, to_char(r.APP_CREDATEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREDATEDDATE,a.APP_LOANTYPE,'' as prd_type from APP_REVALIDATION r ,APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p,com_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,organisations o,facilities f where r.APP_NO=a.APP_NO and a.app_no=facility_appno and r.app_no=f.facility_appno and f.facility_sno=r.app_sno and pd.demo_appno=a.app_no and p.perapp_id=pd.DEMO_COMAPPID and o.ORG_CODE=a.APP_ORGCODE and f.FAC_REVALIDATEDBY='^' and f.FAC_REVALIDATIONFLAG='Y' and (f.FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS='op' or (f.FAC_REVALIDATIONSTATUS in ('pa','pr') and f.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null))
update APP_REVALIDATION set APP_REVALIDATION_REASON=? where app_no=? and app_sno=?
update APP_REVALIDATION set APP_PROCESSEDBY=?,APP_PROCESSORG=?,APP_PROCESSDATE=sysdate,APP_STATUS=?,APP_SANCTION_CMTS=?,APP_PRO_DEPARTMENT=?,app_referenceno=? where APP_NO=? and app_sno=?

update APP_REVALIDATION set app_undousrid=?,app_undoflag=?,app_undodoneon=sysdate,APP_STATUS=?,APP_PROCESSEDBY=?,APP_PROCESSORG=?,APP_PROCESSDATE=?,APP_PRO_DEPARTMENT=?,app_referenceno=?,APP_SANCTION_CMTS=null where APP_NO=? and app_sno=?

select APP_PRDCODE,APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG,APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS,APP_REVALIDATEDBY,PRD_BRANCH,PRD_RO,PRD_HO,PRD_CLPU,PRD_SANC_VALID,PRD_REVALID_DAYS, PRD_NOTAVAILED_DAYS,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,to_char(APP_REVALIDATIONDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_REVALIDATIONDATE, APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG,APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS,APP_REVALIDATEDBY from APPLICATIONS,prd_authority where app_no='^' and app_prdcode=prd_code

select APP_REVALIDATIONFLAG,APP_REVALIDATIONSTATUS,APP_REVALIDATEDBY,COM_HO_POWER,COM_RO_POWER,COM_CLPU_POWER,COM_BRANCH_POWER,COM_SANC_DAYS, COM_NOTAVAILED_DAYS,COM_REVALID_DAYS,to_char(FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,facility_sno,fac_revalidationflag,fac_revalidationstatus, to_char(fac_revalidationdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fac_revalidationdate,FAC_REVALIDATEDBY from APPLICATIONS,COM_OTHERDET c,facilities f where facility_appno='^' ^ and c.facility_code=f.FACILITY_CODE and app_no=facility_appno order by facility_sno
select app_general_terms_type,term_sno from app_termsandcond where app_termappno='^'
select TERMS_MODE,TERMS_ID,TERMS_TERMTYPE from com_termscond where terms_appno='^'
select fac_terms,fac_mode,fac_prepost,FAC_SNO,FAC_PARENT_ID from facility_terms where fac_moduletype='^' and fac_action='E' and fac_mode in ('O','B','P','G') order by fac_mode
select fac_sno,fac_terms,fac_mode,fac_prepost,FAC_PARENT_ID,facility_sno,facility_code from facility_terms,facilities where fac_facilitycode =facility_code and facility_appno='^' and fac_action='E'
update applications set app_termflag='N' where app_no=?
select terms_termdesc from com_termscond where terms_appno='^' and terms_status='Y'

select ps_app_no from app_post_sanction,applications where ps_old_app_no='^' and ps_app_no=app_no and ps_modify_terms like '%MOEX%' and app_status='pa' and app_edu_moexflag='Y' and app_processdate <= (select case when app_processdate is null then sysdate else app_processdate end from applications where app_no='^') order by app_processdate desc

phpa_premises_age,phpa_residual_life,phpa_branch_distance,phpa_prop_location,phpa_prop_surveyno,phpa_prop_plotno, phpa_bldg_purchase_price,phpa_bldg_valuation_cost,phpa_bldg_estimate_cost,phpa_bldg_rennovation_cost,phpa_project_name, phpa_project_details,phpa_builder_name,phpa_builder_background,phpa_project_finance,phpa_loc_road,phpa_loc_market,phpa_loc_public, phpa_loc_neighbourhood,phpa_ame_road,phpa_ame_water,phpa_ame_drainage,phpa_ame_electricity,phpa_already_mortgage,phpa_sec_secid, phpa_ame_securtype,phpa_ame_securclassific,phpa_natureofcharge,phpa_metlifepremiumamt,phpa_hidtown,PHPA_HOUSE_TYPE,PHPA_SNO,PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID,PHPA_EDIT_APPLYFLAG, phpa_constucion_cost) select ?,phpa_loan_purpose,phpa_take_over,phpa_prop_type,phpa_prop_nature,phpa_prop_usedfor, phpa_premises_age,phpa_residual_life,phpa_branch_distance,phpa_prop_location,phpa_prop_surveyno,phpa_prop_plotno, phpa_prop_street,phpa_prop_taluk,phpa_prop_city,phpa_prop_district,phpa_prop_state,phpa_prop_pincode,phpa_site_area, phpa_floorspace_area,phpa_site_market_value,phpa_site_purchase_price,phpa_site_valuation_cost,phpa_bldg_market_value, phpa_bldg_purchase_price,phpa_bldg_valuation_cost,phpa_bldg_estimate_cost,phpa_bldg_rennovation_cost,phpa_project_name, phpa_project_details,phpa_builder_name,phpa_builder_background,phpa_project_finance,phpa_loc_road,phpa_loc_market,phpa_loc_public, phpa_loc_neighbourhood,phpa_ame_road,phpa_ame_water,phpa_ame_drainage,phpa_ame_electricity,phpa_already_mortgage,phpa_sec_secid, phpa_ame_securtype,phpa_ame_securclassific,phpa_natureofcharge,phpa_metlifepremiumamt,phpa_hidtown,PHPA_HOUSE_TYPE,PHPA_SNO,PHPA_SEC_SECURITYID,PHPA_EDIT_APPLYFLAG, phpa_constucion_cost from per_house_proposed_asset_ps where phpa_proposedappno=?
select PRD_CODE from PRODUCTS where PRD_WHTDIGIPRD='Y' and PRD_TYPE='^' and prd_stop='n' and prd_renew='n' order by PRD_INTRO_DATE desc
update LOANDETAILS set LOAN_COSTLOANPRD=?,LOAN_RECMDAMT=?,LOAN_APPAMT=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
insert into per_bir(appno,bir_flag,bir_charges)values(?,?,?)
insert into cus_defaulter(def_id,RAT_STATUS,def_rbidefis,def_wildefis,DEF_SUITFILED,def_ecgsepis,def_exitpolis,asonRBIdate,asonECGCIdate,asonWillfuldate)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,sysdate,sysdate)
update other_parameters set loan_paramval=?,LOAN_PARAMVAL1=?,LOAN_PARAM_CREATEDATE=sysdate,LOAN_PARAMVAL2=? where loan_paramslno=? and loan_param_activeflag='Y'
select org_code,dev_applholder from APPL_DEVIATION,organisations where DEV_APPNO='^' and dev_orgscode=org_scode
update LOANDETAILS set loan_metlifepremiumamt=? where loan_appno=?

select appno,bir_flag,to_char(bir_submitteddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bir_submitteddate,to_char(bir_receiptdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bir_receiptdate,bir_charges,bir_comments,to_char(bir_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bir_processdate,bir_service_name,bir_quality_report,bir_opinion_all,BIR_VERIFIED_BY,to_char(BIR_VERIFIED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BIR_VERIFIED_DATE from per_bir where appno='^'
update nsdl_application set nsdl_reallocation_orgcode=? where nsdl_reallocation_orgcode=?
select org_scode from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_CODE IN (select SUBSTR(ORG_CODE,0,6)||'000000000' from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_NAME like '%^%')
update app_verification_chkbox set veri_sms_sent_flag=? where veri_appno=?
select COMAPP_DIV_APPID,COMAPP_CBSID from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID='^'
select PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CBSID,perapp_fname as appname from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID in (select com_compdtappid from com_companydetails where com_facility_sno='^' and com_compdtappno='^')
select COMAPP_DIV_APPID,COMAPP_CBSID from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID in (select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^')
select stat_data_desc,stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC in ('^') order by stat_data_desc1

insert into appmailbox (mail_appno,mail_fromusrid,mail_tousrid,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint,mail_date,mail_type,mail_from_orgcode, mail_from_orgdept,mail_to_orgcode,mail_to_orgdept) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?)
select pc.CAT_NAME from APPLICATIONS a,products p,PRD_CATEGORY pc where a.APP_NO='^' and a.APP_PRDCODE=p.PRD_CODE and p.PRD_CATID=pc.CAT_ID
select stat_data_desc,stat_data_desc1,stat_data_active from static_data where stat_data_id='^' and stat_data_value='^' and stat_data_active='Y' order by stat_data_desc
update per_cuscbsaccountdata set CER_GISTOFSECURITUES=? where APPNO=?

insert into CORP_CGTMSE_PS(CG_SNO,CG_APPLICATION_NO,CG_PROPOSALNO,CG_PROPOSAL_APPNO,CG_SNO_BK,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT, CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED,CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY, CG_WC_ASSESSED, CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO,CG_OTHERIDNAME, CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY,CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN,CG_CREATED_DATE, CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge,CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_ISSUEDATE) select CG_SNO,CG_APPLICATION_NO,CG_PROPOSALNO,?,?,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT, CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED,CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY, CG_WC_ASSESSED,CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO,CG_OTHERIDNAME, CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY,CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN,CG_CREATED_DATE, CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge,CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_ISSUEDATE from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO=? and CG_SNO=?
delete from CORP_CGTMSE_PS where CG_PROPOSALNO=? and CG_SNO=?

insert into CORP_CGTMSE(CG_SNO,CG_APPLICATION_NO,CG_PROPOSALNO,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT, CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED,CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY, CG_WC_ASSESSED, CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO,CG_OTHERIDNAME, CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY,CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN,CG_CREATED_DATE, CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge,CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_ISSUEDATE) select ?,CG_APPLICATION_NO,?,CG_NPA,CG_MIC_ENTP,CG_PROJ_OPTI_SALES,CG_PROJ_OPTI_EXPORT,CG_NEW_UNIT,CG_NEW_UNIT_WO,CG_MSE_UNIT, CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_MSMED,CG_ARTISAN_CC,CG_GF_ASF,CG_IDENTY_DC,CG_TC_PROMOTERS,CG_TC_SUBSIDY,CG_TC_OTHERS,CG_TC_PROJ_COST,CG_TC_PROJ_OUTLAY,CG_TL_MARGIN_MONEY, CG_WC_ASSESSED,CG_CREATED_BY,CG_ORGCODE,CG_ASISTBANK,CG_NATUREINDUSTRY,CG_INDUSTRYSECTOR,CG_NOEMP,CG_MINCOMMUITY,CG_SOCIALCATGRY,CG_LEGALID,CG_LEGALIDNO,CG_OTHERIDNAME, CG_OTHERIDNO,CG_COLSEC,CG_THIRDPARTY,CG_JOINTFINANCE,CG_JFCGPAN,CG_HANDLOOMSCHEME,CG_NAMESCHEME,CG_CHECKBX,CG_PRV_CGP,CG_PREV_CGPAN,CG_CREATED_DATE, CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE,CG_APPDET_OUTSTAN_AMT,CG_APPDET_NPA,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT,cg_firstcharge,CG_INTERNAL_RATING,CG_ISSUEDATE from CORP_CGTMSE_PS where CG_PROPOSAL_APPNO=? and CG_SNO_BK=?

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE,ai.INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from appinwardreg ai,APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc where PERAPP_PANNO='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pA' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or (a.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null)) and ai.INWARD_NO = a.APP_INWARDNO and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc

select p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_FATNAME,to_char(p.PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,p.PERAPP_PANNO,a.APP_NO,a.APP_STATUS,CON_MOBILE,ai.INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from appinwardreg ai,APPLICATIONS a,PERAPPLICANT p, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pr ,CUST_CONTACTINFO cc where p.PERAPP_CBSID='^' and pd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pr.PRD_CODE and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and cc.CON_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and pr.PRD_TYPE='pA' and (a.APP_STATUS='op' or (a.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null)) and ai.INWARD_NO = a.APP_INWARDNO and (upper(app_delflag) !='Y' or app_delflag is null) order by a.APP_CREATEDATE desc
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_value from static_data where stat_data_id='32' and stat_data_desc in ('DMSUpload','Digiloan','TMS') order by stat_data_desc1
select INWARD_NO,INWARD_DIGIAPPNO,INWARD_EXTERNALAPP_FLAG from APPINWARDREG where INWARD_DIGIAPPNO='^'

select USR_ID,USR_FNAME,usr_department,USR_FUNCTION,USR_CLASS,(select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=user_designation) as user_designation from users where USR_ORGCODE in (select ORG_CODE from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_CODE like substr('^',0,6)||'%' and ORG_LEVEL='R') and USR_FUNCTION in ('Delegated Authority','Processing') and usr_avail='a'

select USR_ID,USR_FNAME,usr_department,USR_FUNCTION,USR_CLASS,(select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=user_designation) as user_designation from users where USR_ORGCODE in (select ORG_CODE from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_CODE like '^%' and ORG_LEVEL='D') and USR_FUNCTION in ('Delegated Authority','Processing') and usr_avail='a'

select (case when((select count(demo_appno) from per_demographics,applications where demo_appno=cominfo_appid and app_no=demo_appno and app_status in ('ca','pa')) +(select count(demo_appno) from com_demographics,applications where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=cominfo_appid and app_no=demo_appno and app_status in ('ca','pa')))>0 then (case when COMINFO_GSTINREG is null then 'NA' else COMINFO_GSTINREG end) else COMINFO_GSTINREG end) as COMINFO_GSTINREG,COMINFO_GSTIN from COMPANY_INFO where cominfo_appid='^'

select CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,CUS_VALRECVDATE,CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,cus_sec_totalsecvalue,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,SEC_PURCHASEVALUE,SEC_BOOKVALUE,SEC_VEHICLETYPE,SEC_COMPANY,SEC_VEHICLECAT,SEC_MODEL,SEC_MAKE,SEC_REGNO,SEC_HPNO,SEC_CHASSISNO,SEC_DEALERNAME,SEC_DEALERADDRESS1,SEC_DEALERADDRESS2,SEC_AGE, SEC_DEALERCITY,SEC_DEALERSTATE,SEC_DEALERDISTRICT,SEC_DEALERPIN,SEC_DEALERCONT,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE ,CUS_SEC_VALUER_NAME,CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from SECURITY_VEHICLE ,CUS_SECURITIES where SEC_ID='^' and CUS_SEC_ID=SEC_ID
update APPLICATIONS set app_sanctioningcomments=? where APP_NO=?

select usr_id,(select grp_name from GROUPS where grp_id=usr_grpid) as usr_grpid , usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=user_designation) as user_designation, usr_emailid,usr_department,usr_rmdflag,usr_rlpftype,(select ORG_SCODE from ORGANISATIONs where ORG_CODE=usr_orgcode) as ORG_SCODE from users where usr_id='^'

select to_char(CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALSUBMITTEDDATE,to_char(CUS_VALRECVDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_VALRECVDATE,to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE, cus_sec_totalsecvalue,CUS_SEC_VALUERCODE,SEC_PURCHASEVALUE,SEC_BOOKVALUE,SEC_VEHICLETYPE,SEC_COMPANY,SEC_VEHICLECAT,SEC_MODEL,SEC_MAKE,SEC_REGNO,SEC_HPNO,SEC_CHASSISNO,SEC_DEALERNAME,SEC_DEALERADDRESS1,SEC_DEALERADDRESS2,SEC_AGE, SEC_DEALERCITY,SEC_DEALERSTATE,SEC_DEALERDISTRICT,SEC_DEALERPIN,SEC_DEALERCONT,CUS_SEC_NATUREOFCHARGE ,CUS_SEC_VALUER_NAME,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from SECURITY_VEHICLE ,CUS_SECURITIES where SEC_ID='^' and CUS_SEC_ID=SEC_ID

select distinct case CBS_STATIC_DATA_PASSING_CODE when 'O' then 'MCLR' else CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC end as CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC, CBS_STATIC_DATA_PASSING_CODE from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='34' order by CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC desc

with Split_values as (select cus_sec_id,CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID from cus_securities where regexp_like(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID, '^') and nvl(cus_releaseflag,'N') in ('W','V','N','NC')) select cus_sec_id,regexp_substr (CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID, '[^@]+', 1, level) CERSAI_ID from Split_values connect by regexp_substr(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID, '[^@]+', 1, level) is not null

with Split_values as (select SEC_ID,SEC_CERSAI_ID from Security_Land,cus_securities where SEC_CERSAI_ID like '^' and sec_id=cus_sec_id and nvl(cus_releaseflag,'N') in ('W','V','N','NC')) select SEC_ID,regexp_substr (SEC_CERSAI_ID, '[^@]+', 1, level) CERSAI_ID from Split_values connect by regexp_substr(SEC_CERSAI_ID, '[^@]+', 1, level) is not null
update loandetails set loan_creditrskval=?,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
select CON_COMDIST,CON_PERMDIST,CON_COMCITY,CON_COMSTATE,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMSTATE from cust_contactinfo where con_appid='^'
update CUS_CIBILDETAILS set cibil_score=? where cibil_appid=?

select PERAPP_APPDATE,PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_FNAME,CON_COMADDR1,CON_COMADDR2,CON_COMCITY,CON_COMZIP,CON_COMSTATE,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMSTATE, CON_PERMZIP,CON_EMAIL,CON_PERMPHONE,CON_COMPHONE,app_prdcode from CUST_CONTACTINFO,PERAPPLICANT,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,applications where CON_APPID=demo_appid and PERAPP_ID=demo_appid and app_no=demo_appno and demo_appno='^'
select LOAN_RECALCULATE_FACILITY from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select FACILITY_ADHOCFAC,FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_ADHOCFAC like ('^%')

delete from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_facsno=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECID in (select APP_SEC_SECID from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_facsno=? and app_sec_loantype='P')
select com_oldlapsid as appid,com_compdttype,COM_COMPDTID from com_companydetails where com_facility_sno='^' and com_compdtappno='^' and com_oldlapsid='^'

select inward_digiappno,phpa_site_valuation_cost,phpa_residual_life,loan_premium_tenor,loan_premium_loan_amount,LOAN_MCLRTYPE,PHPA_PREMISES_AGE from appinwardreg,PER_HOUSE_PROPOSED_ASSET,LOANDETAILS where phpa_appno=loan_appno and INWARD_NO=(select app_inwardno from APPLICATIONS where app_no=loan_appno) and loan_appno='^'

update loandetails set loan_recmdamt=?,loan_amtreqd=?,loan_emi=?,LOAN_INTEREST_EMI=?,loan_premium_tenor=?,loan_modinrate=?,LOAN_RECALCULATE_FACILITY=?,LOAN_MCLRTABCODE=?, LOAN_MCLRTYPE=?,LOAN_CREDITRSKVAL=?,LOAN_BUSSTATVAL=?,loan_recalculated_date=sysdate where LOAN_APPNO=?
update per_loan_secure set loan_noofinstalllment=? where loan_appno=?
update APPRAISALSANCTION set SANCTION_AMOUNT=? where APPSANC_APPNO=?
update MPBF_CALCULATION set MPBF_ELIGIBLEAMOUNT=? where MPBF_APPNO=?
update loandetails set LOAN_RECALCULATE_FACILITY=? where LOAN_APPNO=?

select perapp_id as demo_appid,p.PERAPP_FNAME as appname,demo_cibil,DEMO_CIBIL_SCORE,DEMO_CRIF_SCORE from PERAPPLICANT P,COM_COMPANYDETAILS where PERAPP_ID=com_compdtappid and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' union select c.DEMO_COMAPPID,perapp_fname as appname,demo_cibil,demo_cibil_score,demo_crif_score from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c,PERAPPLICANT p where c.DEMO_APPNO='^' and c.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01'
update per_auto set auto_purpose=?,auto_valuation=?,auto_tax=?,auto_charges=?,auto_accessories=?,auto_insurance=?,auto_discount=?,total_cost=?,verf_doneby=?,AUTO_FUEL_USED=? where auto_appno=?
insert into PER_SOURCEOFMARGIN(per_margin_appno,per_margin_costincured,per_margin_ownsavings) VALUES (?,?,?)
insert into PER_VERIFICATION(verify_appno,verify_doneby) VALUES (?,?)

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PC') and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc
update per_demographics set demo_appid=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=DEMO_OLDAPPID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') where demo_appno=?
update com_demographics set demo_comappnewid=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=DEMO_COMAPPID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') where demo_appno=?
update com_companydetails set com_compdtappid=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid=COM_OLDLAPSID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') where com_compdtappno=?

update mon_legal_report set legal_audit_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), NEXT_ALERT_DATE=add_months(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),23),LEGAL_ADVISOR=?,LEGAL_OPINION_ADVISOR=?,LEGAL_OPINION_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where ACTIVE_ALERT_STATUS='Y' and SECURITY_ID=? and NVL(mon_alert_status,'RAH') in ('RZB','RHZ','RHB','E','RAH','RBZ','RBH')

update mon_security_mortgaged set VALUATION_DATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),NEXT_ALERT_DATE=add_months(to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),35) where ACTIVE_ALERT_STATUS='Y' and SECURITY_ID=? and NVL(mon_alert_status,'RAH') in ('RZB','RHZ','RHB','E','RAH','RBZ','RBH')
update mon_security_mortgaged set VALUER_NAME=? where ACTIVE_ALERT_STATUS='Y' and SECURITY_ID=? and NVL(mon_alert_status,'RAH') in ('RZB','RHZ','RHB','E','RAH','RBZ','RBH')
select cus_releaseflag from CUS_SECURITIES where cus_sec_id in (select app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='P') and cus_releaseflag='V'
select perapp_sex,indinfo_caste from PERAPPLICANT,INDIVIDUAL_INFO where PERAPP_ID=INDINFO_APPID and PERAPP_ID='^'
select COMINFO_MAJORITYMEMBER,perapp_stakeheld_women from PERAPPLICANT,COMPANY_INFO where PERAPP_ID=cominfo_appid and PERAPP_ID='^'

update mis_appdetails set mis_appdata_flag='N' where app_no in ( select demo_appno from per_demographics,applications where DEMO_APPID=? and demo_appno=app_no and app_status in ('op','ol') union select demo_appno from com_demographics,applications where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=? and demo_appno=app_no and app_status in ('op','ol'))
update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_CBSID_VER_FLAG=? where PERAPP_ID=?

select BUR_CIBIL_SCORE,BUR_CRIF_SCORE,to_char(bur_crifdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bur_crifdate,to_char(bur_cibildate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bur_cibildate from BUREAU_INWARDREG where BUR_CIBIL='Y' and to_char(bur_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' and (decode(bur_panno,'NOPAN','',bur_panno)='^' or bur_aadhar='^') and bur_delflag is null order by created_date desc

update loandetails set LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME=?,LOAN_METLIFEPREMIUMAMT=?,LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR=?,LOAN_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT=?, LOAN_INS_ACCOUNT_NO=?,LOAN_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME=?,loan_sub=?,LOAN_AMTREQD=?,LOAN_RECMDAMT=?, LOAN_REQTERMS=?,LOAN_EMI=?,LOAN_FILENO=?,LOAN_COSTLOANPRD=?,loan_modeofpay=?,loan_operativeaccno=?,loan_secvalue=?,LOAN_ECSBANKNAME=?, LOAN_ECSACCOUNTTYPE=?,LOAN_ECSOPERACCNUM=?,LOAN_ECSATHUNMODE=?,LOAN_ECSIFSCCODE=?,LOAN_DIGI_RESIDUAL=?,LOAN_DUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),LOAN_PROFEE=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
