select perapp_id,CON_COMSTATE,PERAPP_RELIGION ,INDINFO_MINORITY from cust_contactinfo,perapplicant,perincexpenses,individual_info where perapp_id='^' and perapp_id=con_appid and perinc_id=con_appid and INDINFO_APPID=con_appid
select app_no from applications, perapplicant, per_demographics,COMPANY_INFO where app_no=demo_appno and app_no='^' and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=perapp_id and perapp_id=COMINFO_APPID ^
select app_no from applications, perapplicant, com_demographics,COMPANY_INFO where app_no=demo_appno and app_no='^' and demo_comappnewid=perapp_id and perapp_id=COMINFO_APPID ^
select loan_mclrtype ,loan_mclrtabcode,LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,FBILL_FRQ from facility_mclrspread where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'

Select * from (SELECT A.PERAPP_CBSID CBS, A.PERAPP_FNAME ACNM,a.perapp_panno as PANNO,m.CON_MOBILE AS Mobileno, DECODE(C.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail') AS MODULE, DECODE(B.DEMO_TYPE,'a','Borrower','c', 'Co-Borrower','o','Co-Obligant','g','Guarantor','s','Sole Proprietor') as Type, C.APP_NO APPNO, TO_NUMBER('1') AS FAC_SNO, 'Main Limit' AS LIMITTYPE,'' as faccateogry, DECODE(C.APP_RENEW_FLAG,'F','Fresh','R','Renew','S','Restructure') AS FACILITYTYPE, E.PRD_DESC PRDDE, D.LOAN_RECMDAMT AS LOANAMOUNT, F.SANCTIONREFNO SANREF, to_char(C.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd-mm-yyyy') APDT, C.CBS_ACCOUNTNO ACNUM ,S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC FROM PERAPPLICANT A, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS B, APPLICATIONS C, LOANDETAILS D, PRODUCTS E, APP_REFERNCENUMBER F ,CUST_CONTACTINFO m ,MIS_STATICDATA S WHERE A.PERAPP_ID=B.DEMO_APPID AND C.APP_NO=B.DEMO_APPNO AND C.APP_NO=D .LOAN_APPNO AND C.APP_PRDCODE=E.PRD_CODE AND C.APP_NO=F.APP_NO AND C.APP_STATUS='pa' AND NVL(C.APP_RENEW_FLAG,'N')!='P' AND F.SANCREF_FLAG='n' AND A.PERAPP_ID=m.CON_APPID AND E.PRD_BANKSCHEME = S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE and S.mis_static_data_id = '1' AND PERAPP_CBSID = '^'
union ALL SELECT A.PERAPP_CBSID, A.PERAPP_FNAME,a.perapp_panno as PANNO,m.CON_MOBILE AS Mobileno, DECODE(E.APP_LOANTYPE,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture'), 'Borrower' , C.FACILITY_APPNO, C.FACILITY_SNO, DECODE(C.FACILITY_GROUP,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit'),decode(FACILITY_CATEGORY,'R','Regular Limit','A','Adhoc Limit','O','One Time Limit','D','Additional Limit','') as faccateogry, DECODE(C.FACILITY_TYPEFOR, 'F', 'Fresh', 'R', 'Renew'), D.COM_FACDESC, C.FACILITY_SANCAMT, F.SANCTIONREFNO, to_char(C.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd-mm-yyyy'), C.CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC FROM PERAPPLICANT A, COM_DEMOGRAPHICS B, FACILITIES C, FACILITY_CORP D, APPLICATIONS E, APP_REFERNCENUMBER F ,CUST_CONTACTINFO m ,MIS_STATICDATA S WHERE A.PERAPP_ID=B.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID AND B.DEMO_APPNO=C.FACILITY_APPNO AND C.FACILITY_CODE=D.COM_FACID AND C.FACILITY_APPNO=E.APP_NO AND E.APP_NO=F.APP_NO AND C.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' AND NVL(E.APP_RENEW_FLAG,'N')!='P' AND F.SANCREF_FLAG='n' AND A.PERAPP_ID=m.CON_APPID AND S.mis_static_data_id = '1' AND D.COM_BANKSCHEME = S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE AND S.mis_static_data_id = '1' AND PERAPP_CBSID = '^' union ALL SELECT A.PERAPP_CBSID, A.PERAPP_FNAME,a.perapp_panno as PANNO,m.CON_MOBILE AS Mobileno, DECODE(E.APP_LOANTYPE,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture'), DECODE(B.COM_COMPDTTYPE,'C','Co-Borrower','CO','Co-Obligant','G','Guarantor','SP','Sole Proprietor') , C.FACILITY_APPNO, C.FACILITY_SNO, DECODE(C.FACILITY_GROUP,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit'),decode(FACILITY_CATEGORY,'R','Regular Limit','A','Adhoc Limit','O','One Time Limit','D','Additional Limit','') as faccateogry,DECODE(C.FACILITY_TYPEFOR, 'F', 'Fresh', 'R', 'Renew'), D.COM_FACDESC, C.FACILITY_SANCAMT, F.SANCTIONREFNO, to_char(C.FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd-mm-yyyy'), C.CBS_ACCOUNTNO ,S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_DESC FROM PERAPPLICANT A, COM_COMPANYDETAILS B, FACILITIES C, FACILITY_CORP D, APPLICATIONS E, APP_REFERNCENUMBER F,CUST_CONTACTINFO m, MIS_STATICDATA S WHERE A.PERAPP_ID=B.COM_COMPDTAPPID AND B.COM_COMPDTAPPNO=C.FACILITY_APPNO AND C.FACILITY_SNO=B.COM_FACILITY_SNO AND C.FACILITY_CODE=D.COM_FACID AND C.FACILITY_APPNO=E.APP_NO AND E.APP_NO=F.APP_NO AND C.FACILITY_STATUS='pa' AND NVL(E.APP_RENEW_FLAG,'N')!='P' AND A.PERAPP_ID=m.CON_APPID AND F.SANCREF_FLAG='n' AND D.COM_BANKSCHEME = S.MIS_STATIC_DATA_CODE AND S.mis_static_data_id = '1' AND PERAPP_CBSID = '^')
select * from DIGI_DMS_CONNECTION
select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC,CBS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW,CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='^' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE='^' order by CBS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW
select to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as createddate,APP_STATUS from applications where app_no='^'

select PS_PARAM_ID,PS_PARAM_DESC,PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG from app_post_sanc_pagemap, SET_POSTSANC_PARAM where ps_param_id=ps_param and nvl(ps_module_type,'C')=nvl(ps_moduletype,'C') and nvl(ps_moduletype,'C')=^ and PS_ACTIVE='Y' and PS_ENABLE_DISABLE_FLAG in ('E','D')

select facility_sno, a.facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, b.facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_intadjustment, bplr, fac.facility_catdesc as facilityhead, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks,b.FACILITY_BANKTYPE,b.FACILITY_GROUP,a.FACILITY_CODE, b.FACILITY_TYPEFOR,b.FAC_INS_COMPANY_NAME,b.FAC_METLIFEPREMIUMAMT ,b.FACILITY_MONTHS,b.FACILITY_TENOR,b.FACILITY_OSASON,b.FACILITY_DP, b.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING,b.FACILITY_BANKTYPE,b.FACILITY_INTTYPE, b.FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM,b.FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE,b.FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY, b.FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE,b.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,b.FACILITY_PROPOSED, b.FACILITY_MARGIN,b.FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,b.FACILITY_INTERESTREC, b.FACILITY_INTERESTCHARGED,b.FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,b.FACILITY_OPERATIONACCNO ,b.FACILITY_REMARKS,b.FACILITY_AGENCY,b.FACILITY_TUF,b.FACILITY_DUEDATE,b.FAC_ROITYPE, b.FACILITY_RENEWALJUSTIF,b.FACILITY_EXISTING,DECODE(b.FACILITY_GROUP,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit') as facility_type ,b.FACILITY_INTEREST,b.FACILITY_OUTSTANDING,b.FACILITY_DP,b.SECURITY_VALUE,b.FACILITY_PURPOSE,b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO, b.FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,b.FACILITY_PERINSTALL,b.FACILITY_REVIEWDATE,b.facility_freshlimit ,b.FACILITY_DESC,b.FACILITY_SUBSIDYAMUNT,b.FACILITY_AGENCY,b.FAC_MARGINRELAX,b.FAC_ACTUALMARGIN,b.FAC_ACTUALRELAXED,b.FACILITY_EXISTBANKTYPE,b.FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE from facility_master a,facilities b, facility_master fac where fac.facility_catid=a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid =b.facility_id and b.facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^' order by b.facility_headid, facility_sno
select ORG_CODE,ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME from MSME_APPDETAILS ,ORGANISATIONS where MSME_ORGSCODE=ORG_SCODE and MSME_APPNO='^'
select ORG_LEVEL as msme_orglevel,ORG_CODE as msme_orgcode,MSME_ORGDEPT as msme_orgdept from MSME_APPDETAILS,ORGANISATIONS where MSME_APPROVEDORG=ORG_CODE and MSME_ORGSCODE='^'
INSERT INTO MSME_HISDATA (MSME_APPNO,MSME_USRID,MSME_ORGCODE,MSME_INITIATEDATE,MSME_FALG,MSME_REMARKS,MSME_ACTIONDATE) VALUES (?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,sysdate)
select COMAPP_CBSID,COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID ='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='PT'

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age,COMINFO_MINORITY_COMMUNITY from perapplicant, company_info where COMINFO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW!='01'and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) ^

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age,INDINFO_MINORITY from perapplicant,INDIVIDUAL_INFO where INDINFO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW='01' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) ^

select distinct(perapp_id), perapp_fname, perapp_panno, perapp_oldid, perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,round((months_between(sysdate,perapp_dob))/12) as age,COMINFO_MINORITY_COMMUNITY from perapplicant, company_info where COMINFO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null) and perapp_cbsid = '^'
select count(COMAPP_CBSID) as COMAPP_CBSID from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID ='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='PT'

select ORG_CODE as msme_orgcode,MSME_ORGDEPT as msme_orgdept,MSME_APPNO,(select ORG_LEVEL from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SCODE=MSME_ORGSCODE) as msme_orglevel,MSME_ORGSCODE from MSME_APPDETAILS,ORGANISATIONS where (MSME_APPROVEDORG=ORG_CODE or MSME_ORGSCODE=ORG_SCODE) and MSME_APPNO='^'

select distinct(b.APP_NO) as ProposalNo,'1' as FacilitySlNo,prd_desc as FacilityName,loan_recmdamt as Amount,ma.APP_ACTIVITYCODE as ActivityCode,md.APP_EQUIPVAL as EquipmentValue, case b.APP_STATUS when 'op' then 'Open/Pending' when 'pa' then 'Processed/Approved' when 'ol' then 'Open/Lodged' when 'pr' then 'Processed/Rejected' when 'ca' then 'Closed/Approved' when 'cr' then 'Closed/Rejected' else '' end as StatusOfFacility,pr.PERAPP_CBSID,pr.perapp_oldid, pr.PERAPP_FNAME,APP_AGRICULTURE,APP_PLANTVAL ,mc.app_sector,mc.APP_STANDUP_INDIA,mc.APP_GOVTANNOUNCESCHEME ,to_char(b.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE from applications b,per_demographics pd,loandetails l,MIS_APPDETAILS ma,MIS_APPDISPLAYSCREEN md,MIS_APPCLASSIFICATION mc, products p, PERAPPLICANT pr where b.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and b.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and ma.APP_NO=b.APP_NO and md.APP_NO=b.APP_NO and mc.APP_NO=b.APP_NO and b.APP_PRDCODE=p.PRD_CODE and pr.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and b.APP_NO='^' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' and (app_status in ('op','ol','pa') or (app_status='pr' and app_autorej='Y')) and APP_RENEW_FLAG<>'P' and app_agriculture in ('7','8','9','11','12','13','14','18','19','20','21','22','23','24','26','27','28')

select distinct (ma.APP_NO) as ProposalNo,p.PERAPP_CBSID,p.PERAPP_FNAME,ma.APP_FACILITY_SNO as FacilitySlNo,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as FacilityName, f.FACILITY_SANCAMT as Amount,ma.APP_ACTIVITYCODE as ActivityCode,md.APP_EQUIPVAL as EquipmentValue,ma.APP_MISDATE,case a.APP_STATUS when 'op' then 'Open/Pending' when 'pa' then 'Processed/Approved' when 'ol' then 'Open/Lodged' when 'pr' then 'Processed/Rejected' when 'ca' then 'Closed/Approved' when 'cr' then 'Closed/Rejected' else '' end as StatusOfFacility,o.ORG_NAME,p.perapp_oldid,APP_AGRICULTURE, APP_PLANTVAL ,mc.app_sector,mc.APP_STANDUP_INDIA,mc.APP_GOVTANNOUNCESCHEME,to_char(a.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE from MIS_APPDETAILS ma,MIS_APPDISPLAYSCREEN md,APPLICATIONS a,mis_appclassification mc,com_DEMOGRAPHICS pd,PERAPPLICANT p,ORGANISATIONS o,FACILITIES f, static_data sd where ma.APP_NO=md.APP_NO and ma.APP_FACILITY_SNO=md.APP_FACILITY_SNO and a.APP_NO=md.APP_NO and md.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=p.PERAPP_ID and o.ORG_CODE=a.APP_ORGCODE and ma.APP_FACILITY_SNO=f.FACILITY_SNO and ma.app_facility_sno=mc.app_facility_sno and mc.app_no=md.app_no and ma.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and a.APP_NO='^' and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N' and facility_status in ('op','ol','pa') and sd.stat_data_id='180' and facility_displaydesc=STAT_DATA_DESC and APP_RENEW_FLAG<>'P' and app_agriculture in ('7','8','9','11','12','13','14','18','19','20','21','22','23','24','26','27','28')

select USR_ID,USR_FNAME,ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,ORG_LEVEL,USER_DESIGNATION,USR_CLASS,USR_DEPARTMENT,USR_FUNCTION,USR_GRPID,usr_orgcode from users,organisations where USR_ORGCODE = org_code and ORG_SCODE = '^'and USR_AVAIL = 'a'

select distinct(b.app_no) as app_no,a.perapp_cbsid,a.perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, app_renew_flag,prd_catid, to_char(b.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE, g.LOANDISBBRANCH as scode,c.loan_duedate,'' as LAPS_HANDOFF_TIME,c.LOAN_RECMDAMT,'OVERDRAFT' as facdesc,c.loan_reqterms from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS, PERAPPLICANT a,APPLICATIONS b,LOANDETAILS c,PRODUCTS d ,ORGANISATIONS e ,APPINWARDREG f,PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA g where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and app_status='pa' and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO and DEMO_TYPE='a' and ORG_CODE=APP_ORGCODE and appno=app_no and APP_NO=LOAN_APPNO and prd_type in ('pB') and prd_loantype='OD' and app_renew_status is null and a.perapp_cbsid = '^' order by APP_PROCESSDATE
select SEC_CERSAIREFNO,SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,cus_sec_type,SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,sec_croptype From Security_Land,CUS_SECURITIES where Sec_Id='^' and Sec_Id=CUS_SEC_ID

select SEC_CERSAIREFNO,SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,cus_sec_type,Sec_Id,SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,sec_croptype From Security_Land,CUS_SECURITIES,app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO = '^' and Sec_Id=CUS_SEC_ID and Sec_Id = APP_SEC_SECID and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE = 'P'

select m.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,m.APP_MAINACTIVITY ,m.APP_SUBACTIVITY from MIS_APPDETAILS m ,MIS_ACTIVITY a where m.APP_NO='^' and m.APP_MAINACTIVITY=a.MIS_MAINACT and a.MIS_SUBACTCODE=m.APP_SUBACTIVITY

select distinct m.APP_ACTIVITYCODE from MIS_APPDETAILS m ,MIS_ACTIVITY a where m.APP_ACTIVITYCODE='^' and m.APP_NO='^' and m.APP_FACILITY_SNO ='^' and a.MIS_SUBACTCODE=m.APP_SUBACTIVITY and a.MIS_MAINACT ='01' and a.MIS_SUBACTCODE in('11','12','13','14','15','18')
select m.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,m.APP_MAINACTIVITY ,m.APP_SUBACTIVITY from MIS_APPDETAILS m ,MIS_ACTIVITY a where m.APP_NO='^' and m.APP_MAINACTIVITY=a.MIS_MAINACT and a.MIS_SUBACTCODE=m.APP_SUBACTIVITY

select org_code from organisations where org_scode = '^' and org_level = '^'

select sum(nvl(LOAN_RECMDAMT,0)) as amt from loandetails,applications,products,per_demographics where app_no=loan_appno and demo_appno=app_no and demo_type='a' and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' and prd_type='pR' and loan_appno=demo_appno and app_prdcode=prd_code and app_status='pa'

delete SOLPRD_PROCESSCHARGE where process_prdcode = ? and process_id =?

delete from SOLPRD_SANCTION_LIMIT where prd_code=?

select sanction_limit from SOLPRD_SANCTION_LIMIT where prd_code='^' and sanction_limit ^ and sanction_limit!=0 order by sanction_limit

select NVL(max(process_id),0)+1 from SOLPRD_PROCESSCHARGE where process_prdcode='^'

select stat_data_sno, stat_data_desc, stat_data_id, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_active,stat_data_value,stat_data_valuedesc,stat_data_descvalue1,STATIC_DATA_GECLDESC,STATIC_DATA_MAXVAL,STATIC_DATA_SECTOR,STATIC_BANK_SCHEME,STATIC_DATA_RANGE_FROM,STATIC_DATA_RANGE_TO from static_data where stat_data_id='^'

select count(*)as products from SOLPRD_PROCESSCHARGE where PROCESS_PRDCODE ='^' and (('^' between process_rangefrom and process_rangeto) or ('^' between process_rangefrom and process_rangeto) or (process_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (process_rangeto between '^' and '^'))

select count(*)as products from SOLPRD_PROCESSCHARGE where PROCESS_PRDCODE ='^' and process_id!='^' and (('^' between process_rangefrom and process_rangeto) or ('^' between process_rangefrom and process_rangeto) or (process_rangefrom between '^' and '^' ) or (process_rangeto between '^' and '^'))
select grp_id, grp_name,prd_power from groups, SOL_DELEGATE where prd_userid(+)=grp_id and grouplimitslist != 0 and prd_schemeid(+)=^ order by grp_name, grp_id
delete from SOL_DELEGATE where prd_schemeid=?
insert into SOL_DELEGATE(prd_sno, prd_schemeid,prd_userid,prd_power) values(?,?,?,?)
select NVL(max(BANKER_BANKERNO),0)+1 as BANKER_BANKERNO from BANKERCERTIFICATE ,ORGANISATIONS where banker_orgcode=ORG_CODE and ORG_CODE='^'
select count(BANKER_APPL_NO) as appno,BANKER_LOANTYPE from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPLNHOLDER='^' and BANKER_STATUS in ('OP','PA','PR') group by BANKER_LOANTYPE

select BANKER_APPL_NO,BANKER_APPLICANT_NAME,ORG_NAME ,to_char(as_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'),a.AS_FROMUSRID,BANKER_APPID,BANKER_STATUS,'' as app_renew_flag, ORG_SCODE from BANKERCERTIFICATE,APPMAILBOX_BANKER a,ORGANISATIONS where org_code=BANKER_ORGCODE and as_date=(select max(as_date) from APPMAILBOX_BANKER b where b.as_appno=a.as_appno)and as_appno=BANKER_APPL_NO and as_tousrid='^' and BANKER_STATUS in ('OP','PA','PR')
select nvl(max (ars_sno),0)+1 as ars_sno from APP_REFERNCENUMBER_BANKER where ARS_ORG_LEVEL='^' and ars_financialyear='^'

select BANKER_AMOUNT from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'

select SOL_AMOUNT from SOLVENCY where SOL_APPL_NO='^'
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_value from static_data where stat_data_id='258' and STAT_DATA_ACTIVE='Y' order by stat_data_desc1

select LOAN_APPNO,LOAN_SLNO,LOAN_ACCNO,LAON_DATEOFISSUE,LOAN_PRESENTOS,LOAN_MATURITYVAL,to_char(loan_matdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as loan_matdate from PER_LOANAGAINSTDEPOSIT where LOAN_APPNO='^'

select FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^'

select to_char(perapp_invocdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_invocdate from perapplicant where perapp_cbsid='^' and PERAPP_ID !='^'

select APP_STATUS from com_demographics,APPLICATIONS where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID = '^' and DEMO_APPNO=APP_NO

select app_renew_flag,APP_LOANTYPE from applications,loandetails where app_no='^' and LOAN_APPNO = APP_NO and LOAN_RESTR_SCHEME in ('27','28','29')
update applications set app_enchflag=?,app_enachdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') where app_no = ?
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE (SYSDATE - app_enachdate) * 1440 > ^ and APP_NO='^'
select stat_data_desc from static_data where stat_data_id = '255' and stat_data_desc = '^'
select STATIC_DATA_CERSAIREQ from static_data where stat_data_id = '267' and stat_data_desc = '^' and STAT_DATA_ACTIVE ='Y'

select a.app_no,a.app_status from applications a,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS c,PERAPPLICANT p where a.APP_NO = c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_APPID = p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_CBSID = '^' and a.APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and a.APP_STATUS = 'op' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI = 'PR' union select a.app_no,a.app_status from applications a,com_demographics c,PERAPPLICANT p where a.APP_NO = c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID = p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_CBSID = '^' and a.APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and a.APP_STATUS = 'op' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI = 'PC' union select a.app_no,a.app_status from applications a,com_companydetails c,PERAPPLICANT p where a.APP_NO = c.COM_COMPDTAPPNO and c.COM_COMPDTAPPID = p.PERAPP_ID and p.PERAPP_CBSID = '^' and a.APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and a.APP_STATUS = 'op' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI = 'PC'
update perapplicant set perapp_dedupeflag=? where perapp_id = ?

select facility_sancamt as facility_proposed,facility_months,fac_printflag as loan_releasedateofmclr,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,facility_restr_flag, facility_group,FACILITY_RENEW_FLAG,m.app_sector,m.app_subsector,ma.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,FAC_RESTR_SCHEME,a.ACT_MAINACTCODE,a.ACT_SUBACTCODE from facilities,MIS_APPCLASSIFICATION m ,MIS_APPDETAILS ma ,MIS_ACTIVITYCODE a where facility_appno='^' and FACILITY_APPNO=m.APP_NO and FACILITY_SNO=m.APP_FACILITY_SNO and m.APP_NO =ma.APP_NO and ma.APP_ACTIVITYCODE=a.ACT_ACTIVITYCODE

select m.app_sector,m.app_subsector,ma.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,LOAN_RESTR_SCHEME from LOANDETAILS,MIS_APPCLASSIFICATION m ,MIS_APPDETAILS ma where LOAN_APPNO='^' and LOAN_APPNO=m.APP_NO and m.APP_NO =ma.APP_NO
select PRD_TYPE,PRD_CODE ,APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI from APPLICATIONS,PRODUCTS where APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and APP_NO='^'
update mis_appdetails set mis_appdata_flag='N' where app_no in ( select m.app_no from MIS_APPDETAILS m,applications a where m.APP_NO=? and m.APP_NO=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('op','ol') )
select perapp_id from perapplicant,COMPANY_INFO where perapp_id = cominfo_appid and PERAPP_EXTNAPPL='Y' and perapp_cbsid is null and (^) and perapp_panno != 'NOPAN'

select DEMO_APPNO from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,ap plications where APP_NO=DEMO_APPNO and APP_STATUS in ('op','pr','ol') and APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and DEMO_APPID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)) union select DEMO_APPNO from com_DEMOGRAPHICS,applications where APP_NO=DEMO_APPNO and APP_STATUS in ('op','pr','ol') and APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)) union select COM_COMPDTAPPNO from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,applications where APP_NO = COM_COMPDTAPPNO and APP_STATUS in ('op','pr','ol') and APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and COM_COMPDTAPPID=(select perapp_id from perapplicant where perapp_oldid = '^' and (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null))
select PM_FINISH_DATE from PMAY_MASTER,PMAY_HOUSELOAN_DETAILS where PMAY_HOUSE_CAT = PM_SUBCATID and PMAY_APPNO = '^'

insert into AHP_HOUSELOAN_DETAILS(AHP_APPNO,AHP_ALLOTMENT_LETTER,AHP_INCOME_CERTIFICATE,AHP_BANKNAME,AHP_BRANCHNAME,AHP_ACCNUMBER, AHP_IFSCCODE,AHP_COSTLOANPRD,AHP_GOI_AMT,AHP_GOK_AMT,AHP_RESIDENT_TYPE,AHP_SAVINGS) select ?,AHP_ALLOTMENT_LETTER,AHP_INCOME_CERTIFICATE,AHP_BANKNAME,AHP_BRANCHNAME,AHP_ACCNUMBER, AHP_IFSCCODE,AHP_COSTLOANPRD,AHP_GOI_AMT,AHP_GOK_AMT,AHP_RESIDENT_TYPE,AHP_SAVINGS from AHP_HOUSELOAN_DETAILS where AHP_APPNO=?
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,STAT_DATA_ACTIVE,stat_data_sno from static_data where stat_data_id='^' and (stat_data_desc='080' or stat_data_desc='081')
select ORG_CODE,(select ORG_LEVEL from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SCODE=INWARD_ORGSCODE ) as ORGLEVEL, INWARD_ORGSCODE from APPINWARDREG,ORGANISATIONS where (INWARD_ORGSCODE=ORG_SCODE) and INWARD_NO='^'
select STATIC_SENDTOCLPH from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_ID = '268' and STATIC_BANK_SCHEMECLPH='^'
select DEVIATION_OLDVALUE from app_deviation,loandetails where DEVIATION_TYPE = 'LA' and APPNO = loan_appno and APPNO = '^'
select DEVIATION_APPREJ from APP_DEVIATION where APPNO = '^'
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,STAT_DATA_ACTIVE,stat_data_sno from static_data where stat_data_id='^' and (stat_data_desc!='080' and stat_data_desc!='081')
select INDINFO_STAFF_ID,COMINFO_CIN,PERAPP_PANNO from individual_info i, COMPANY_INFO c,perapplicant p where i.indinfo_appid=p.perapp_id and c.cominfo_appid=p.perapp_id and p.perapp_id ='^'

select COM_CUSTOMERID,COM_CUSTOMERNAME,COM_PROPOSALNUMBER,COM_CINNUMBER,COM_STAFFID,COM_ORGCODE,COM_ORGDEPT,to_char(COM_MODIFIEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as COM_MODIFIEDDATE from COMPANY_DEC_HISTORY where COM_PROPOSALNUMBER='^' order by COM_MODIFIEDDATE desc
select U.USR_ID ,U.USR_ORGCODE,U.USR_DEPARTMENT,O.ORG_SCODE from USERS U,ORGANISATIONS O where U.USR_ORGCODE=O.ORG_CODE and U.USR_ID='^'
select perapp_invocdate from perapplicant where sysdate < to_date('30/09/2021','dd/mm/yyyy') and PERAPP_id = '^'
select MSME_USRID,MSME_REMARKS,MSME_FALG,to_char(MSME_ACTIONDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as MSME_ACTIONDATE from MSME_HISDATA where MSME_APPNO='^' order by MSME_ACTIONDATE desc
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,STAT_DATA_ACTIVE,stat_data_sno from static_data where stat_data_id='^' and stat_data_valuedesc like '%^%' and STAT_DATA_ACTIVE='Y'
update MSME_APPDETAILS set MSME_APPSTATUS='sb', MSME_ApprovedOrg='',MSME_INITIATE_FLAG='' where MSME_APPNO=?
INSERT INTO MSME_HISDATA (MSME_APPNO,MSME_USRID,MSME_ORGCODE,MSME_INITIATEDATE,MSME_FALG,MSME_REMARKS,MSME_ACTIONDATE) VALUES (?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,sysdate)

insert into CORP_AAROGYA (CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE, CORP_CREATEDBY, CORP_CREATEDDATE) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, sysdate)

select CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE from CORP_AAROGYA where CORP_APPNO='^' and CORP_FACILITY='^'

select CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE, com_facdesc, facility_sno from CORP_AAROGYA, facilities,facility_corp where CORP_APPNO='^' and facility_appno=CORP_APPNO and com_facid=facility_code and facility_sno=CORP_FACILITY ORDER BY facility_sno

select CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE from CORP_AAROGYA where CORP_APPNO='^' and CORP_FACILITY='^'

select CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE from CORP_AAROGYA where CORP_APPNO='^'
delete from CORP_AAROGYA where CORP_APPNO=? and CORP_FACILITY=?

select perapp_id,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW, (select cbs_static_cgtmse from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2' and cbs_static_data_code=PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW) as CONSTITUTION_NCGTC from PERAPPLICANT where perapp_id= '^'
select perapp_id,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW, PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR from PERAPPLICANT where perapp_id= '^'
select COM_HEADFAC, COM_SUBFAC, COM_BANKSCHEME from facility_corp where com_facid='^'

select distinct(a.app_no),a.app_no,b.inward_digiappno ,p.perapp_cbsid, a.APP_APPROVEDBY,e.APPRAISAL_DEPARTMENT, e.APPRAISAL_SANCAUTH,e.APPRAISAL_DEPARTMENT, a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE, (select GRP_NAME from groups where GRP_ID = USR_GRPID)as USR_GRPID, g.USR_CLASS,(select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = g.USER_DESIGNATION) as USER_DESIGNATION, g.USR_FUNCTION, g.USR_FNAME,o.ORG_SCODE,g.USR_DEPARTMENT from applications a, appinwardreg b, APPRAISALSANCTION e, users g,ORGANISATIONS o,perapplicant p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS d where a.app_inwardno= b.inward_no and a.app_no=e.APPSANC_APPNO and a.APP_APPROVEDBY=g.USR_ID and APP_DELFLAG = 'N'and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and a.app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and g.usr_orgcode = o.org_code and p.PERAPP_ID=d.DEMO_APPID and d.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_PROCESSDATE BETWEEN to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') AND to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')+1 and b.INWARD_BANKSCHEME = '^' and d.demo_type='a'

select distinct(a.app_no),a.app_no,b.inward_digiappno ,p.perapp_cbsid, a.APP_APPROVEDBY,e.APPRAISAL_DEPARTMENT, e.APPRAISAL_SANCAUTH,e.APPRAISAL_DEPARTMENT, a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE, (select GRP_NAME from groups where GRP_ID = USR_GRPID)as USR_GRPID, g.USR_CLASS,(select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = g.USER_DESIGNATION) as USER_DESIGNATION, g.USR_FUNCTION, g.USR_FNAME,o.ORG_SCODE,g.USR_DEPARTMENT from applications a, appinwardreg b, APPRAISALSANCTION e, users g,ORGANISATIONS o,perapplicant p,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS d where a.app_inwardno= b.inward_no and a.app_no=e.APPSANC_APPNO and a.APP_APPROVEDBY=g.USR_ID and APP_DELFLAG = 'N'and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and a.app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and g.usr_orgcode = o.org_code and p.PERAPP_ID=d.DEMO_APPID and d.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and b.inward_digiappno='^'

select distinct(a.app_no), b.inward_digiappno,p.perapp_cbsid, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '15' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = e.COM_SANCAUTHORITY ) as COM_SANCAUTHORITY , a.APP_APPROVEDBY, e.COM_SANCDEPT, a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE,(select GRP_NAME from groups where GRP_ID = USR_GRPID )as USR_GRPID, g.USR_CLASS, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = g.USER_DESIGNATION ) as USER_DESIGNATION, g.USR_FUNCTION, g.USR_FNAME,o.ORG_SCODE,g.USR_DEPARTMENT from applications a, appinwardreg b,facilities c,facility_corp f,USERS g,COM_BRIEFBACKGROUND e,ORGANISATIONS o,perapplicant p,com_DEMOGRAPHICS d where a.app_inwardno= b.inward_no and APP_DELFLAG='N' and c.facility_code=f.COM_FACID and a.app_no=c.facility_appno and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PC' and app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and p.PERAPP_ID=d.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and d.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_APPROVEDBY=g.USR_ID and a.app_no=e.COM_APPNO and g.usr_orgcode = o.org_code and inward_digiappno='^'

select b.APP_RENEW_FLAG,c.LOAN_DUEDATE from applications a,applications b,loandetails c where a.app_no = '^' and a.APP_PARENT_APPNO = b.APP_NO and a.APP_NO = c.loan_appno and b.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI = 'PR'
update LOANDETAILS set LOAN_UPDROI_FLAG=?,LOAN_UPDROI_DATE=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
update facilities set FACILITY_UPDROI_FLAG=?,FACILITY_UPDROI_DATE=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?

select CORP_APPNO, CORP_FACILITY, CORP_TYPEOFPROJECT, CORP_GREENFIELD, CORP_BROWNFIELD, CORP_METROPROJECT, CORP_METROPROJELIGIBLE, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTOR, CORP_INDUSTRYSECTORELIGI, CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR, CORP_PROJECTUNITPIN, CORP_PROJECTNATURE, com_facdesc from CORP_AAROGYA, facilities,facility_corp, com_demographics where CORP_APPNO='^' and CORP_APPNO=demo_appno and facility_appno=demo_appno and facility_appno=CORP_APPNO and com_facid=facility_code and facility_sno=CORP_FACILITY and DEMO_COMAPPID='^'
update CORP_AAROGYA set CORP_UDYOGAADHAAR=? where CORP_APPNO=?
update appinwardreg set inward_dmsrefno=?,inward_dmsrefdate=sysdate where inward_no=?
delete from APP_DOCATTACHMENTS d where APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APA_LEAD_NUMBER=(select i.INWARD_NO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)
delete from APPDOCUMENTS d where d.APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APDOC_EXTAPPL_LEADNUMBER=(select i.INWARD_NO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)
select sanctionrefno from app_referncenumber where app_no='^' and sancref_flag='n'
select SNO from app_referncenumber where app_no='^' and sancref_flag='n' order by SNO desc
update app_referncenumber set sancref_flag=? where app_no=? and SNO !=?
update perapplicant set PERAPP_RENEW=? where perapp_oldid=? and PERAPP_ID!=?
update per_demographics set demo_oldappid=? where demo_appno=? and demo_appid=?
update perapplicant set perapp_oldid=?,PERAPP_RENEW=?,perapp_dedupeflag=?,PERAPP_CBSCUSTFLAG=?,perapp_cbsid=? where PERAPP_ID=?

select distinct(ORG_SCODE),ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,ORG_ADD1,ORG_ADD2,CITY_NAME as ORG_CITY,ORG_ZIP,(select STATE_NAME from laps_states where state_code=ORG_STATE) AS ORG_STATE, decode(upper(ORG_LEVEL),'H','HEAD OFFICE','R','REGIONAL OFFICE','D','CLPH','BRANCH') AS ORG_LEVEL,ORG_PHONE,ORG_HEAD from organisations left join laps_cities on city_code=org_city where ORG_CODE LIKE ^
select * from PER_GOLDRATE_UPDATE where trunc(PER_DATE)='^'

select a.GOLD_APPNO as Proposal_Number, d.PERAPP_FNAME as Borrower_Name, b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO as Account_Number,trunc(a.GOLD_REAPPDATE) as Date_of_Reappraisal from gold_reapprisal a, applications b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d ,per_cuscbsaccountdata e where a.GOLD_APPNO=b.APP_NO and b.APP_NO=c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_APPID=d.perapp_id and e.appno=b.app_no and gold_slno='1' and a.STATUS='op' and trunc(GOLD_REAPPDATE) between '^' and '^' and LOANDISBBRANCH='^'

select distinct(a.app_no), b.inward_digiappno,p.perapp_cbsid, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '15' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = e.COM_SANCAUTHORITY ) as COM_SANCAUTHORITY , a.APP_APPROVEDBY, e.COM_SANCDEPT, a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE,(select GRP_NAME from groups where GRP_ID = USR_GRPID )as USR_GRPID, g.USR_CLASS, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = g.USER_DESIGNATION ) as USER_DESIGNATION, g.USR_FUNCTION, g.USR_FNAME,o.ORG_SCODE,g.USR_DEPARTMENT from applications a, appinwardreg b,facilities c,facility_corp f,USERS g,COM_BRIEFBACKGROUND e,ORGANISATIONS o,perapplicant p,com_DEMOGRAPHICS d where a.app_inwardno= b.inward_no and APP_DELFLAG='N' and c.facility_code=f.COM_FACID and a.app_no=c.facility_appno and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PC' and app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and p.PERAPP_ID=d.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and d.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_APPROVEDBY=g.USR_ID and a.app_no=e.COM_APPNO and g.usr_orgcode = o.org_code and a.APP_PROCESSDATE BETWEEN to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') AND to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')+1 and f.COM_BANKSCHEME = '^'

select c.FACILITY_CODE,c.FACILITY_MONTHS,c.FACILITY_SANCSTATUS,c.FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,a.app_no, b.inward_digiappno, c.FACILITY_SANCINTEREST, FACILITY_MONTHS, FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD, FACILITY_INTERESTREC, SANCTIONREFNO, a.APP_PROCESSDATE,c.FACILITY_ID, c.FACILITY_SANCAMT, FAC_INS_COMPANY_NAME, e.COM_PROCESSINGFEE, (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from CBS_STATICDATA where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID = '15' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE = e.COM_SANCAUTHORITY) as COM_SANCAUTHORITY , c.FACILITY_SECAMOUNT, a.APP_APPROVEDBY, e.COM_SANCDEPT,a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE,c.FACILITY_sno from applications a, appinwardreg b, facilities c, APP_REFERNCENUMBER d, COM_BRIEFBACKGROUND e, facility_corp f where a.app_inwardno= b.inward_no and a.app_no=c.facility_appno and a.app_no=d.APP_NO and a.app_no=e.COM_APPNO and c.facility_code=f.COM_FACID and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PC' and app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and d.SANCREF_FLAG='n' and a.app_no='^'

select c.LOAN_RECMDAMT,c.LOAN_SECVALUE,c.LOAN_PREMIUM_TENOR,a.APP_APPROVEDORGSCODE,c.LOAN_MODINTRATE, loan_reqterms, LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT, LOAN_SERVISED, SANCTIONREFNO, a.APP_PROCESSDATE,f.PRD_DESC, c.LOAN_INS_COMPANY_NAME, LOAN_AGEOFVEH, c.LOAN_MARGIN,c.LOAN_PROFEE, LOAN_UPFRONTFEE, c.LOAN_COSTLOANPRD, a.APP_APPROVEDBY, e.APPRAISAL_SANCAUTH, e.APPRAISAL_DEPARTMENT from applications a,APP_REFERNCENUMBER d,loandetails c,APPRAISALSANCTION e, products f, PER_LOAN_SECURE h where a.app_no=c.loan_appno and a.app_no=d.APP_NO and a.app_no=e.APPSANC_APPNO and a.app_prdcode=f.PRD_CODE and c.loan_appno=h.LOAN_APPNO and APP_DELFLAG = 'N' and a.APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI='PR' and app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and d.SANCREF_FLAG='n' and a.app_no='^'
select org_name,org_code,org_level,org_scode,org_manager_ctnum from organisations where org_scode in (^)
update loandetails set LOAN_DIGI_MAXEMI_OLDVALUE=? where LOAN_APPNO =?
INSERT INTO APISTATUS (ERROR,REQUEST,REQ_DATE,STATUS,TYPE,API_NAME,API_RESP,API_UNIQNO) VALUES(?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

select d.PERAPP_FNAME as Party_Name,b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO as Account_Number,sum(a.GOLD_GROSSWEIGHT) as Total_Gross_Weight, sum(a.GOLD_NETWEIGHT) as Total_Net_Weight,trunc(a.GOLD_REAPPDATE) as Date_of_Reappraisal from gold_reapprisal a, applications b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d ,per_cuscbsaccountdata e where a.GOLD_APPNO=b.APP_NO and b.APP_NO=c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_APPID=d.perapp_id and e.appno=b.app_no and a.STATUS='pa' and trunc(GOLD_REAPPDATE) between '^' and '^' and LOANDISBBRANCH='^' and GOLD_REAPRCUSTID='^' group by d.PERAPP_FNAME,b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,a.GOLD_REAPPDATE
select max(exe_sno) as exe_sno from npa_prov_exec_status where trunc(exe_quarter)='^' and exe_status='S'

Select BANKER_SANCTION_FOR,BANKER_APPLICANT_NAME,BANKER_AMOUNT,BANKER_BENF_NAME,BANKER_BRIEF_WORKORDER,BANKER_SANC_REF_NO, BANKER_SANCTION_DATE ,BANKER_COMMISSION_EARNED,BANKER_CBS_ID, Tender_Notification_date,BANKER_DATE from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'
delete from BENEFICIAL_OWNERSHIP where kyc_custid=?
insert into BENEFICIAL_OWNERSHIP(BEN_OWN_ID,BEN_OWN,ID_DOC,ID_DOC_NUM,PERC_SHARES_HELD,RELA_BORR,NO_SHARES_HELD,GUART_AVB,KYC_CUSTID,CBSCUSID) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Select BEN_OWN_ID,BEN_OWN,ID_DOC,ID_DOC_NUM,PERC_SHARES_HELD,RELA_BORR,NO_SHARES_HELD,GUART_AVB from BENEFICIAL_OWNERSHIP where kyc_custid='^'
select CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC from cbs_staticdata where CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='32' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_PASSING_CODE='^'
select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_ID='54' and STAT_DATA_DESC='^'
select perapp_id,PERAPP_EXTNAPPL from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where demo_appno='^' and perapp_id=demo_appid and DEMO_TYPE!='a'
Update COMPANY_INFO set COMINFO_CIN=? where cominfo_appid=?
select ORG_SCODE from users ,organisations where USR_ORGCODE=org_code and usr_id='^'

select a.GOLD_APPNO as Proposal_Number, d.PERAPP_FNAME as Borrower_Name, b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO as Account_Number,trunc(a.GOLD_REAPPDATE) as Date_of_Reappraisal,a.GOLD_USERID as Entered_userid from gold_reapprisal a, applications b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d ,per_cuscbsaccountdata e where a.GOLD_APPNO=b.APP_NO and b.APP_NO=c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_APPID=d.perapp_id and e.appno=b.app_no and gold_slno='1' and a.STATUS='op' and trunc(GOLD_REAPPDATE) between '^' and '^' and LOANDISBBRANCH='^'
select * from per_cuscbsaccountdata a,organisations b, users c where a.LOANDISBBRANCH=b.org_scode and b.org_code=c.USR_ORGCODE and a.appno='^'

delete from APP_DOCATTACHMENTS d where APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APA_DOCURL is not null and d.APA_LEAD_NUMBER=(select i.INWARD_NO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)

delete from APPDOCUMENTS d where d.APDOC_APPNO=? and d.APDOC_EXTAPPL_LEADNUMBER is not null and d.APDOC_EXTAPPL_LEADNUMBER=(select i.INWARD_NO from APPINWARDREG i,applications a where i.INWARD_NO=a.APP_INWARDNO and a.APP_NO=d.APDOC_APPNO)

select d.PERAPP_FNAME as Party_Name,b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO as Account_Number,sum(a.GOLD_GROSSWEIGHT) as Total_Gross_Weight, sum(a.GOLD_NETWEIGHT) as Total_Net_Weight,trunc(a.GOLD_REAPPDATE) as Date_of_Reappraisal from gold_reapprisal a, applications b, per_demographics c, perapplicant d ,per_cuscbsaccountdata e where a.GOLD_APPNO=b.APP_NO and b.APP_NO=c.DEMO_APPNO and c.DEMO_APPID=d.perapp_id and e.appno=b.app_no and a.STATUS='pa' and trunc(GOLD_REAPPDATE) between '^' and '^' and LOANDISBBRANCH='^' and GOLD_REAPRCUSTID='^' group by d.PERAPP_FNAME,b.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,a.GOLD_REAPPDATE
select max(exe_sno) as exe_sno from npa_prov_exec_status where trunc(exe_quarter)='^' and exe_status='S'

insert into com_banking_det_history(com_bank_appno,com_bank_appid,com_bank_usrid,com_bank_cbsid,com_bank_status,com_bank_sanstatus,com_bank_date,com_bank_sno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)
select NVL(max(com_bank_sno),0)+1 as com_bank_sno from com_banking_det_history
update com_banking_det_history set com_bank_expdate=TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),com_bank_sanstatus=? where com_bank_appno=? and com_bank_sno=?
select count(*) as count from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_sanstatus ='ACTIVE' and com_bank_appno='^'
select sum(BANKER_AMOUNT)as BANKER_AMOUNT from com_banking_det_history,BANKERCERTIFICATE where com_bank_sanstatus ='ACTIVE' and BANKER_APPL_NO=com_bank_appno and com_bank_appno='^'
select count(*) as count from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_sanstatus ='EXPIRED' and com_bank_appno='^'
select sum(BANKER_AMOUNT)as BANKER_AMOUNT from com_banking_det_history,BANKERCERTIFICATE where com_bank_sanstatus ='EXPIRED' and BANKER_APPL_NO=com_bank_appno and com_bank_appno='^'
select NVL(max(com_bank_sno),0) as com_bank_sno from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^'
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_value from static_data where stat_data_id='277' and STAT_DATA_ACTIVE='Y' order by stat_data_desc1
select com_bank_sanstatus from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^' and com_bank_sno='^'

select banker_orgcode from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'
select BANKER_APPL_NO from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_STATUS in ('PA') and BANKER_APPID='^'

select city_name,city_code from laps_cities where city_name like '^%'
select district_desc,district_code from district_master where district_desc='^'
select con_country,con_countrycode from countrysetup where con_country='^'

select u.usr_id as usr_id, u.usr_grpid as usr_grpid, u.usr_orgcode as usr_orgcode, u.usr_fname as usr_fname, u.usr_mname as usr_mname, u.usr_lname as usr_lname, u.usr_password as usr_password, u.usr_class as usr_class, u.usr_supid as usr_supid, u.usr_supstatus as usr_supstatus, u.usr_avail as usr_avail, u.usr_function as usr_function , u.usr_sanction_limit as usr_sanction_limit, u.user_designation as user_designation from users u ,ORGANISATIONS o where upper(u.usr_id) like upper('^') and upper(u.usr_fname) like upper('^') and u.USR_ORGCODE= o.ORG_CODE and o.ORG_LEVEL='D' and u.USER_DESIGNATION in (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='27' and LEG_OPI='Y' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E')

select distinct(a.APP_NO) as appno,a.APP_PROCESSDATE,a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,round(sysdate-a.APP_PROCESSDATE) as noofdays,1 as facility_sno,c.CON_MOBILE as mobile,p.PERAPP_FNAME as perapp_name from APPLICATIONS a,LOANDETAILS l,PERAPPLICANT p,CUST_CONTACTINFO c,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where a.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and p.PERAPP_ID=c.CON_APPID and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID union all select distinct(a.APP_NO) as appno,a.APP_PROCESSDATE,a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,round(sysdate-a.APP_PROCESSDATE) as noofdays,f.FACILITY_SNO as facility_sno,c.CON_MOBILE as mobile ,p.PERAPP_FNAME as perapp_name from APPLICATIONS a,FACILITIES f,PERAPPLICANT p,CUST_CONTACTINFO c,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS cd where a.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and a.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and p.PERAPP_ID=c.CON_APPID and cd.DEMO_APPNO=a.APP_NO and cd.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID

select MCLR_BASERATESPREAD,MCLR_ACTIVE from MCLRMASTER where MCLR_TABLECODE='AGSEC' and MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM=(select max(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) from MCLRMASTER where MCLR_ACTIVE='Y' and MCLR_TABLECODE='AGSEC')
select APP_RENEW_FLAG,APP_STATUS,APP_LOANTYPE,app_stptype from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO='^'
update loandetails set LOAN_BASERATE=?,LOAN_MCLRTYPE=?,LOAN_MODINTRATE=?,LOAN_INTRATE=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
update loandetails set loan_crp=?,loan_bsp=? where LOAN_APPNO=?
select LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'
select sum(facility_sancamt) as totalamount from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^' and FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY='Y'
select CG_PRV_CGP from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_SNO not in('^') and CG_PRV_CGP='Y'
update CORP_CGTMSE set CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE=?,cg_ourbank_coverage=?,CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT=? where CG_PROPOSALNO=?
select max(CG_CGTMSE_COVERAGE) as Other_coverage,max(CG_HANDICRAFT_AVAIL_AMT) as Balance_AMT from CORP_CGTMSE where CG_PROPOSALNO='^' and CG_PRV_CGP='Y'
select LOAN_RECMDAMT from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'

select FACILITY_OLDAPPNO,FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO,(select TXNDET_GUA_endDATE from WORFLOW_CGTMSE_TXNDETAILS where TXNDET_APPNO=FACILITY_appno and TXNDET_FAC_SNO=FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO and TXNDET_GUA_endDATE>sysdate) as TXNDET_GUA_ENDDATE from FACILITIES f where FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY='Y' and FACILITY_TYPEFOR='R' and facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'

select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW,c.CBS_STATIC_CGTMSE_CONCERNTYPE from com_demographics a, perapplicant b, (select cbs_Static_data_id,cbs_static_data_code,CBS_STATIC_CGTMSE_CONCERNTYPE from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='2')c where a.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=b.PERAPP_ID and b.perapp_constitutionnew=cbs_static_data_code and a.DEMO_APPNO='^'

select b.PERAPP_FNAME,b.PERAPP_CBSID,a.COM_FACILITY_SNO,a.COM_COMPDTAPPID,c.COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE,d.FACILITY_DISPLAYDESC,e.STAT_DATA_DESC1 from com_companydetails a,perapplicant b,comapp_company_divisions c, facilities d, (select STAT_DATA_ID,STAT_DATA_DESC,STAT_DATA_DESC1 from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_ID='180')e where a.COM_COMPDTAPPID=b.PERAPP_ID and b.PERAPP_ID=c.COMAPP_DIV_APPID and a.COM_COMPDTAPPID=c.COMAPP_DIV_APPID and a.COM_COMPDTAPPNO||COM_FACILITY_SNO=d.FACILITY_APPNO||facility_sno and d.FACILITY_DISPLAYDESC=e.STAT_DATA_DESC and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' and c.COMAPP_ID='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE in (^) and FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY='Y'
select DEMO_APPID from LOANDETAILS,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where LOAN_APPNO=DEMO_APPNO and LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE='Y' and LOAN_APPNO='^' and demo_type='a'
select DEMO_APPID from LOANDETAILS,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where LOAN_APPNO=DEMO_APPNO and LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE='Y' and LOAN_APPNO='^' and demo_type not in ('a')
select COMAPP_DIV_APPID from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_DIV_APPID='^' and COMAPP_ID='^'
select PERAPP_FNAME from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID='^'
select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^'

select COM_COMPDTAPPID,COM_COMPDTFNAME,FACILITY_SNO from com_companydetails,FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=COM_COMPDTAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=COM_FACILITY_SNO and FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY='Y' and COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^'

select b.APP_AGRICULTURE,b.app_facility_sno from FACILITIES a,mis_appclassification b where a.FACILITY_APPNO=b.APP_NO and a.FACILITY_SNO=b.app_facility_sno and a.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY='Y'
select CG_MSE_UNIT_WO from CORP_CGTMSE b,FACILITIES a where a.FACILITY_APPNO=b.CG_PROPOSALNO and a.FACILITY_SNO=b.CG_SNO and a.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and a.FACILITY_SNO='^'
select b.APP_AGRICULTURE from LOANDETAILS a,mis_appclassification b where a.LOAN_APPNO=b.APP_NO and LOAN_CGTMSE_APPLICABLE='Y' and a.LOAN_APPNO='^'
select CG_MSE_UNIT_WO,CG_SNO from CORP_CGTMSE b,LOANDETAILS a where a.LOAN_APPNO=b.CG_PROPOSALNO and a.LOAN_APPNO='^'

select u.usr_id as usr_id, u.usr_grpid as usr_grpid, u.usr_orgcode as usr_orgcode, u.usr_fname as usr_fname, u.usr_mname as usr_mname, u.usr_lname as usr_lname, u.usr_password as usr_password, u.usr_class as usr_class, u.usr_supid as usr_supid, u.usr_supstatus as usr_supstatus, u.usr_avail as usr_avail, u.usr_function as usr_function , u.usr_sanction_limit as usr_sanction_limit, u.user_designation as user_designation from users u ,ORGANISATIONS o where upper(u.usr_id) like upper('^') and upper(u.usr_fname) like upper('^') and u.USR_ORGCODE= o.ORG_CODE and o.ORG_LEVEL='D' and u.USER_DESIGNATION in (select CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='27' and DDR_BIR='Y' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_SHOW='E')

select app_no,com_gecltype,f.FACILITY_STATUS from applications,facilities f,facility_corp,com_otherdet o where app_no=facility_appno and facility_sel_type in ('1','2','3') and app_delflag='N' and f.facility_code=com_facid and com_bankscheme='071' and borrower_id='^' and f.facility_code=o.facility_code

select PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE as perapp_facility_othbank from per_otherbank where PERBANK_ID in (select perapp_id from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_OLDID='550564' and nvl(PERAPP_RENEW,'n')='n') and PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE in ('G') or PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE in ('P') and perbank_deleteflag not in ('Y')
Update PERAPPLICANT set PERAPP_LEGAL_ENTITYID=?,PERAPP_LEGAL_EXPIRYDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERAPP_LEGAL_ISSUEDATE=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where PERAPP_ID=?

select sum(totexp) as totexp from (select sum(com_exposure) totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' and combk_appno='^' union all select sum(perbank_limit) from per_Otherbank where perbank_id in ( select DEMO_APPID from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a' union select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics where demo_appno='^') union all select sum(nvl(COM_PRO_FB,0) + nvl(COM_PRO_NFB,0)) from COM_MULTIPLEBANKING where COM_APPNO='^' union all select sum(sancamt) from ( select LOAN_RECMDAMT sancamt from applications app join loandetails loan on app.app_no=loan.loan_appno where APP_LOANTYPE='P' and loan_appno='^' union all select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) from facilities where facility_appno='^') )
select to_char(perapp_invocdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_invocdate from perapplicant where perapp_cbsid='^' and PERAPP_ID !='^'

APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and a. app_sec_loantype='P' and a.APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='F' and b.CUS_SEC_TYPE in('10','11','12','13','14','15','16','17')

APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and a. app_sec_loantype='P' and a.APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='E' and b.CUS_SEC_TYPE in('10','11','12','13','14','15','16','17')
delete from LEGAL_OPINION_VERIFICATION where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and APP_SEC_SECID=?

update com_termscond set TERMS_STATUS='Y',TERMS_FACSNO='98',TERMS_SUPPORTDOC='N' where TERMS_APPNO= ? and TERMS_ID='3263'
update com_termscond set TERMS_STATUS='N',TERMS_FACSNO='98',TERMS_SUPPORTDOC='' where TERMS_APPNO= ? and TERMS_ID='3263'

select ORG_HEAD,ORG_LEVEL from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SCODE='^'
select a.DEV_APPNO,a.DEV_ORGSCODE,a.DEV_APPLHOLDER,b.PERM_PER_BRANCH as PERM_PER_BRANCH from APPL_DEVIATION a, PERM_BASIC_INFO b where a.DEV_APPNO=b.PERM_APPNO and a.DEV_APPNO ='^'

insert into DEV_APPMAILBOX(DEV_APPNO,DEV_FROMUSRID,DEV_TOUSRID,DEV_FROMFLOWPOINT,DEV_TOFLOWPOINT,DEV_sentDATE,DEV_MAILTYPE,DEV_FROM_ORGCODE,DEV_FROM_ORGDEPT,DEV_TO_ORGCODE,DEV_TO_ORGDEPT,DEV_AUTO_REALLOCATION) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select grp_id from groups,users where USR_GRPID=grp_id and usr_id='^'

select distinct(a.APP_NO) as appno,a.APP_PROCESSDATE,a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,round(sysdate-a.APP_PROCESSDATE) as noofdays,1 as facility_sno, '8624906680' as mobile,p.PERAPP_FNAME as perapp_name from APPLICATIONS a,LOANDETAILS l,PERAPPLICANT p,CUST_CONTACTINFO c,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd, PRODUCTS pt where pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and a.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.CBS_ACCOUNTNO is null and a.APP_NO=l.LOAN_APPNO and p.PERAPP_ID=c.CON_APPID and a.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and pd.DEMO_APPID=p.PERAPP_ID and a.APP_PRDCODE=pt.PRD_CODE and pt.PRD_TYPE='pA' and pt.PRD_CATID in ('28','59') and to_date(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_date('01/01/2021','dd/mm/yyyy')

select APP_APPROVEDBY from APPLICATIONS where app_no='^'
select STATUS,ERROR from POSTSANCTION_APISTATUS where PROPOSAL_NO='^'
update loandetails set old_modified_roi=? where loan_appno=?
select old_modified_roi,loan_modintrate,LOAN_SANCT_EFF_ROI_DATE from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select PS_MODIFY_TERMS from app_post_sanction where PS_APP_NO='^'

select max(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM) as MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM from MCLRMASTER where to_date(to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') < =to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and (MCLR_TABLECODE='^' or mclr_tablecodeoverdrafts='^') order by MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM desc

select MCLR_TYPE, MCLR_BASERATESPREAD, MCLR_TABLECODE as MCLR_TABLECODE, MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM, MCLR_ACTIVE from MCLRMASTER where to_date(to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') =to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and MCLR_TABLECODE='^' union select MCLR_TYPE, MCLR_BASERATESPREAD, MCLR_TABLECODE as MCLR_TABLECODE , MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM, MCLR_ACTIVE from MCLRMASTER where to_date(to_char(MCLR_EFFECTIVEFROM,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') =to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and mclr_tablecodeoverdrafts='^'

insert into appmailbox (mail_appno,mail_fromusrid,mail_tousrid,mail_fromflowpoint,mail_toflowpoint,mail_date,mail_type,mail_from_orgcode, mail_from_orgdept,mail_to_orgcode,mail_to_orgdept,MAIL_AUTO_REALLOCATION) values(?,?,?,?,'4',sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select (to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as APP_CREATEDATE from applications where app_no='^' and to_date(to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date('01/10/2022','dd/mm/yyyy') and APP_RENEW_FLAG='P'
select MCLR_SPREAD,MCLR_TABLECODE,FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,MCLR_CRP_TOTAL from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'

select FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,FACILITY_BASERATE, FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,FACILITY_DEVIATION,FACILITY_CONCESSION,FACILITY_AS_PER_CIRCULAR,to_char(facility_effintroidate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as LOAN_DUEDATE, to_char(facility_effintroidate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_effintroidate from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select FACILITY_OLDAPPNO as app_parent_appno from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
update FACILITIES set old_modified_roi=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?
select facility_preroi,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST, to_char(facility_effintroidate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_effintroidate from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select to_char(REQ_DATE,'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as REQ_DATE,TYPE from POSTSANCTION_APISTATUS where proposal_no='^' and status='S'

select (to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as APP_CREATEDATE from applications where app_no='^' and to_date(to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date('01/10/2022','dd/mm/yyyy') and APP_RENEW_FLAG='P'

select app_no,com_gecltype,f.FACILITY_STATUS from applications,facilities f,facility_corp,com_otherdet o where app_no=facility_appno and facility_sel_type in ('1','2','3') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and app_delflag='N' and f.facility_code=com_facid and com_bankscheme='061' and borrower_id='^' and f.facility_code=o.facility_code and nvl(f.facility_additional_funding,'X')='Y'

select nvl(c.com_details,0)as totallimit,app_no,borrower_id from applications,facilities f,facility_corp,com_otherdet o,com_assesmentdetails c where app_no=facility_appno and facility_sel_type in ('1','2','3') and app_delflag='N' and f.facility_code=com_facid and com_bankscheme='061' and borrower_id='^' and f.facility_code=o.facility_code and com_gecltype in('GECL2','GECL1','GECL3') and f.facility_appno=app_no and c.COM_APPNO=f.facility_appno

insert into AGRI_UNIT_COST_MASTER(AGR_DATA_ID, AGR_DATA_SCHEME, AGR_DATA_STATE, AGR_DATA_ACTNAME, AGR_DATA_SPECIFICATIONS, AGR_ACTIVE, AGR_DATE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)

select fac_sno,fac_terms,fac_mode,fac_prepost,FAC_PARENT_ID,facility_sno,facility_code from facility_terms,facilities,TERMSANDCONDMASTER where fac_facilitycode =facility_code and facility_code=PROD_FAC_CODE and fac_sno=termscode and facility_appno='^' and fac_action='E' and TERMSFLAG='Y' group by fac_sno,fac_terms,fac_mode,fac_prepost,FAC_PARENT_ID,facility_sno,facility_code
select distinct facility_code from facilities where facility_appno='^'

select sum(totexp) as totexp from ( select sum(totexp) totexp from ( select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then COMBK_LIMIT*0.02 else nvl(COM_EXPOSURE,0) end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='P' and combk_appno='^' union select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT)*0.02 else nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT) end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' and combk_appno='^') union all select sum(perbank_limit) from per_Otherbank where perbank_id in ( select DEMO_APPID from per_demographics,perapplicant where demo_appno='^' and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and demo_type in ('a','c','g','o') and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') union select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics,perapplicant where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and demo_appno='^') union all select sum(nvl(COM_PRO_FB,0) + nvl(COM_PRO_NFB,0)) from COM_MULTIPLEBANKING where COM_APPNO='^' union all select sum(sancamt) from ( select LOAN_RECMDAMT sancamt from applications app, loandetails loan ,PRODUCTS p ,per_demographics,perapplicant where app.app_no=loan.loan_appno and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and PRD_TYPE not in ('pG','pR') and APP_LOANTYPE='P' and DEMO_APPNO=loan.loan_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and demo_type='a' and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and loan_appno='^' union all select distinct((select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) tot1 from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid!='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)+ (select sum(facility_sancamt*0.02) tot1 from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)) tot1 from facilities a , com_demographics,perapplicant where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and facility_appno='^'))

select sum(totexp) as totexp from ( select sum(totexp) totexp from ( select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then COMBK_LIMIT*0.02 else COMBK_LIMIT end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='P' and combk_appno='^' union select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT)*0.02 else nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT) end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' and combk_appno='^') union all select sum(perbank_limit) from per_Otherbank where perbank_id in ( select DEMO_APPID from per_demographics,perapplicant where demo_appno='^' and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and demo_type in ('a','c','g','o') and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') union select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics,perapplicant where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and demo_appno='^') union all select sum(nvl(COM_PRO_FB,0) + nvl(COM_PRO_NFB,0)) from COM_MULTIPLEBANKING where COM_APPNO='^' union all select sum(sancamt) from ( select LOAN_RECMDAMT sancamt from applications app, loandetails loan ,PRODUCTS p ,per_demographics,perapplicant where app.app_no=loan.loan_appno and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and PRD_TYPE not in ('pG','pR') and APP_LOANTYPE='P' and DEMO_APPNO=loan.loan_appno and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and demo_type='a' and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and loan_appno='^' union all select distinct((select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) tot1 from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid!='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)+ (select sum(facility_sancamt*0.02) tot1 from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)) tot1 from facilities a , com_demographics,perapplicant where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and PERAPP_CONSTITUTIONNEW not in ('183','184','185','186','187','188','189','190','192') and facility_appno='^'))

select sum(totexp) as totexp from ( select sum(totexp) totexp from ( select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then COMBK_LIMIT*0.02 else COMBK_LIMIT end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='P' AND combk_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) and combk_appno='^' UNION select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT)*0.02 else nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT) end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' AND combk_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) and combk_appno='^') union all select sum(perbank_limit) from per_Otherbank where perbank_id in ( select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics,perapplicant where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and demo_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) AND demo_appno='^') union all select sum(nvl(COM_PRO_FB,0) + nvl(COM_PRO_NFB,0)) from COM_MULTIPLEBANKING where COM_APPNO IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02')))AND COM_APPNO='^' union all select sum(sancamt) from ( select distinct((select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) sancamt from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid!='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)+ (select sum(facility_sancamt*0.02) sancamt from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)) sancamt from facilities a where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) and facility_appno='^'))

select sum(totexp) as totexp from ( select sum(totexp) totexp from ( select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then COMBK_LIMIT*0.02 else COMBK_LIMIT end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='P' AND combk_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) and combk_appno='^' UNION select case when nvl((select facility_headid from facilities where facility_appno|| facility_sno=combk_parentappno||combk_parentfacsno),'9')=1 then nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT)*0.02 else nvl(COMBK_OS,COMBK_LIMIT) end totexp from com_banking c where COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' AND combk_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) and combk_appno='^') union all select sum(perbank_limit) from per_Otherbank where perbank_id in ( select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics,perapplicant where PERAPP_ID=DEMO_COMAPPNEWID and demo_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02'))) AND demo_appno='^') union all select sum(nvl(COM_PRO_FB,0) + nvl(COM_PRO_NFB,0)) from COM_MULTIPLEBANKING where COM_APPNO IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code in ('01','02')))AND COM_APPNO='^' union all select sum(sancamt) from ( select distinct((select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) sancamt from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid!='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)+ (select sum(facility_sancamt*0.02) sancamt from facilities where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_headid='1' and facility_appno=a.facility_appno)) sancamt from facilities a where FACILITY_GROUP='0' and facility_appno IN (SELECT APP_NO FROM mis_appdetails WHERE app_mainactivity in (SELECT mis_static_data_code FROM MIS_STATICDATA where mis_static_data_id='2' and mis_static_data_code not in ('01','02'))) and facility_appno='^'))

select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,UPPER(PERAPP_PANNO) PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' and demo_type in ('a','c','g','o') union select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from COM_COMPANYDETAILS,PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=COM_COMPDTAPPID AND COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^' AND com_compdttype in ('G','C','CO') union select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select count(1) as reccount from mis_appdetails where app_no='^' and app_mainactivity in ('01','02')

select app_no,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_CREATEDATE,perapp_cbsid,upper(perapp_fname) as perappname from perapplicant,organisations,applications, per_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=perapp_id and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and APP_LOANTYPE='P'

select app_no,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_CREATEDATE,perapp_cbsid,upper(perapp_fname) as perappname from perapplicant,organisations,applications, com_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_COMAPPID=perapp_id and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and APP_LOANTYPE='^' and app_no='^'

select app_no,APP_LOANTYPE,perapp_cbsid,upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_CREATEDATE, to_char(PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE from perapplicant,organisations,applications, com_demographics,panmandateparameters where app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappnewid=perapp_id and demo_apptype='N' and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') AND PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG='Y' and PROPOSAL_NO=app_no union select app_no,APP_LOANTYPE,perapp_cbsid,upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_CREATEDATE, to_char(PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE from perapplicant,organisations,applications, per_demographics,panmandateparameters where app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_APPID=perapp_id and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and APP_LOANTYPE='P' AND PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG='Y' and PROPOSAL_NO=app_no
INSERT INTO panmandateparameters(PROPOSAL_NO,PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG,PARAM_CREATEDATE,PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE) VALUES (?,?,SYSDATE,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
UPDATE panmandateparameters SET PARAM_ACTIVEFLAG=? WHERE PROPOSAL_NO=?
SELECT count(1) as count FROM panmandateparameters where proposal_no='^' and PARAM_EFFECTIVETILLDATE>=sysdate
select inward_sector from appinwardreg where INWARD_NO='^'

select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,UPPER(PERAPP_PANNO) PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^' and demo_type in ('a') union all select PERAPP_MSE_REGNO,PERAPP_UDYOG_AADHAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_OLDID,PERAPP_ID,PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,PERAPP_UDYAM_REGNO from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT where DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select app_mainactivity from mis_appdetails where app_no='^'
UPDATE users SET USR_ORGCODE=?,USR_MODIFIED_DT=sysdate,USR_MODIFIED_BY='SYSUSER' WHERE usr_id=?
UPDATE users SET USR_AVAIL='u',USR_MODIFIED_DT=sysdate,USR_MODIFIED_BY='SYSUSER' WHERE usr_id=?
UPDATE users SET user_designation=?,usr_grpid=?,USR_MODIFIED_DT=sysdate,USR_MODIFIED_BY='SYSUSER' WHERE usr_id=?

select cm.stat_mast_id,cs.cbs_static_data_code, cs.cbs_static_data_desc,cs.cbs_slno,cs.cbs_static_data_show from cbsstatic_data_master cm,cbs_staticdata cs where cs.cbs_static_data_id=cm.stat_mast_id and stat_mast_id='27' and cbs_static_data_code='^' order by cm.stat_mast_id

insert into users (usr_id,usr_grpid, usr_orgcode,usr_fname,usr_mname,usr_lname,usr_password,usr_class, usr_supid,usr_supstatus,usr_avail,usr_function,usr_sanction_limit,user_designation, user_first_flag,usr_emailid,usr_department,usr_rmdflag,usr_rlpftype,bureaulink,USR_CREATED_BY,USR_CREATEDT) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,null,null,'a',?,0,?,'Y',?,?,'0','','N','SYSUSER',SYSDATE)
Select USR_FNAME, USER_DESIGNATION from users where usr_id='^'
SELECT DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONDESC FROM LOANDETAILS WHERE LOAN_APPNO='^' AND DIGI_DEVIATION_ROI_CONDESC IS NOT NULL

select * from PRODUCTS where PRD_WHTDIGIPRD='Y' and PRD_TYPE='^'
and ^ between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to and PRD_REPAYTYPE like '%^%' and prd_renew='n' and prd_stop='n' and prd_intrate='^' order by PRD_INTRO_DATE desc

select facility_sancupdroi,to_char(facility_effintroidate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_effintroidate from FACILITIES,app_post_sanction where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and PS_APP_NO=FACILITY_APPNO and PS_APP_SNO=FACILITY_SNO and PS_MODIFY_TERMS LIKE '%MRI%'
select perapp_renew from perapplicant where perapp_id='^'

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode,(Select AQ_STATUS||'-'||trunc(SYSDATE-AQ_RAISEDON) from APP_QUERYDETAILS Q1 where AQ_STATUS='QS' and AQ_RAISEDON=( Select min(AQ_RAISEDON) from APP_QUERYDETAILS Q2 where AQ_STATUS='QS' and Q1.AQ_APPNO=Q2.AQ_APPNO ) and Q1.AQ_APPNO=app_no) as query_status from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc

select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'CORP' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype, perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode,APP_NPREFID,MAIL_QRDPND_NO_DAYS from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI is null and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='C' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc
